string.name: name
string.value: Borrowing Sera's Mirror

string.name: parent
string.value: Sera's Mirror
Let's go to Heena.
I ran into Heena who was worrying about her face getting irritated by the strong sunlight. I have to get a mirror for Heena from her sister, Sarah.
Heena asked me to go to her sister and get a mirror for her. I walked my way to Sarah.

string.name: name
string.value: Suspicious Offer?!
An urgent message was sent from #b#p9000021##k.
An urgent message was sent from Agent #b#p9000021##k.

#bGaga#k came to see me and asked me to become an agent out of no where! Not sure why, but I agreed without really thinking Now what do I do? Come to think of it, the #bMaple Admin#k and #bCassandra#k both looked suspicious with their black sunglasses. What's going on? I think I need to talk to #bGaga#k for more details...

string.name: name
string.value: Co-op with Special Agent O
Gaga, who' now a secret agent, says he has someone he wants to introduce me to. I wonder who it is?

Gaga, who suddenly became a secret agent of an unknown organization, has deputized me and now I am an agent as well. Gaga suggested I do a co-op with special agent O. However, he didn't tell me the details of the mission and simply told me to meet special agent O myself. He said I could find the special agent O at the mini dungeon entrance...n
#b<Mini Dungeon Area where agent O is>
- Victoria Island : #m100020000#
- Victoria Island : #m105040304#
- Victoria Island : #m105050100#
- Ludus Lake : #m221023400#
- Nihal Desert : #m260020300#
- Nihal Desert : #m261020300#
- Minar Forest : #m240020500#
- Minar Forest : #m240040511#
- Minar Forest : #m240040520#
Through Gaga's introduction, I met Special Agent O. He seemed like quite a charadcter--full of personality and life.

string.name: name
string.value: Number of Special Agent Badges

Special Agent O told me to go to the mini dungeon and bring back #b#t4031988##k from the Agent Box which appears after 30 minutes
#i4031988# #t4031988# #b#c4031988# / 1

#k Each time I collect 10 badges, I'll receive #bAgent O's Nylon Gloves#k and when I collect 100, I can get #bAgent O's Leather Gloves#k..
I received a mission from Special Agent O to disarm the Agent Box in the mini dungeon and retrieve a Special Agent Badge, and I successfully completed it.

string.name: name
string.value: Agent W's Watermelon Investigation
The Maple Admin says he has something to talk to me about. I should go see the #rMaple Admin#k.

The Maple Admin said that #e#rMaster M#k#n had planted a bomb in Chumji's watermelons and asked me to retrieve the watermelons. After I get access to Chumji's watermelon field from the Maple Admin, I should get #b5 #t4031701##k and take it to #rAgent W#k at agent headquarters.\r\n#i4031701# #t4031701# #b#c4031701# / 5#k

There has been intelligence that a bomb from #rMaster M#k had been planted in Chumji's watermelons in his field. I carefully picked 5 watermelons from Chumji's watermelon field and delivered it to Agent W. Agent W is a self proclaimed demolitions expert! I don't feel all that safe around him...

string.name: name
string.value: Agent C's Intelligence Activity
I received a message from Gaga, the secret agent, regarding an order for me. I wonder what kind of mission it is? I feeling a bit anxious.

Secret Agent Gaga said once I get 5 Intelligence documents from party quests, go meet Agent C. 

#b<Party Quest where Agent C is>
- Moon Bunny's Rice Cake : Level 10 or higher
- First Accompaniment : Level 21 ~ Level 30
- Crack of Dimension : Level 35 ~ Level 50
- Tower of the Goddess : Level 51 ~ Level 70
- Lord Pirate : Level 55 ~ Level 100
- Romeo and Juliet : Level 71 ~ Level 85
- Poisonous Fog Forest : Level 45 ~ Level 55

 #kEach time I retrieve 5 Intelligence documents I will receive #bAgent C's old Receiver#k, and when I retrieve 100 Intelligence documents, I will receive #bAgent C's Titanium Titanium Receiver#k.
Secret Agent Gaga suggested that I go see Agent C at the reward map once I get 5 Intelligence documents from the party quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Information on Master M
I collected 5 Intelligence documents. Where am I supposed to find Agent C?
I delivered the 5 Intelligence documents I gathered from the party quests to Agent C. For my good work, Agent C gave me a receiver.
I delivered the 5 Intelligence documents I gathered from the party quests to Agent C. For my good work, Agent C gave me a receiver.

string.name: name
string.value: Bringing a Mirror to Heena

string.name: parent
string.value: Sera's Mirror
I borrowed a mirror from Sarah who was doing her laundry. I have to take this mirror to Heena.
I borrowed a mirror from Sarah, who was doing her laundry, and brought it back to Heena.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order: Find Master M's Orders!
There's a strange energy flowing through Maple World. Who is this Master M that is making everyone act so strange? If anyone, #b#p9000036##k should know. I should go visit her.
Agent E said that in order to protect Maple World, I must find #t4031999#. \n\n#i04031999# #t4031999# #b#c04031999# / 20#k
I found #t4031999# and delivered it. I hope #b#p9000036##k does a good job analyzing it...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order: Find Master M's Orders!
There is a strange energy flowing through Maple World. Who is this Master M that is making everyone act so strange? If anyone, #b#p9000036##k should know. I should go visit her.
Agent E said that in order to protect Maple World, I must find #t4032000#. \n\n#i04032000# #t4032000# #b#c04032000# / 20#k
I found #t4032000# and delivered it. I hope #b#p9000036##k does a good job analyzing it...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order: Find Master M's Orders!
There is a strange energy flowing through Maple World right now. Who is this Master M that is making everyone act so strange? If anyone, #b#p9000036##k should know. I should go visit her.
Agent E said that in order to protect Maple World, I must find #t4032001#. \n\n#i04032001# #t4032001# #b#c04032001# / 20#k
I found #t4032001# and delivered it. I hope #b#p9000036##k does a good job analyzing it...

string.name: name
string.value: Today's Mission!
Please check today's mission
I should clear the mission that is given to me each day!
I should clear the mission that is given to me each day! What is today's mission?

string.name: name
string.value: Obtain the Special Agent Badge!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!! 
<Hunt in the mini dungeon and obtain #b1 Special Agent Badge#k!>
Today's mission is obtaining a #bSpecial Agent Badge#k. According to rumors, the Special Agent Badge can be found in the mini dungeon...
I should go see Agent O whom Gaga introduced me to. If I haven't been introduced to #bAgent O#k yet, I should first go see #bAgent Gaga#k.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: 우수요원뱃지를 획득하라!

string.name: parent
string.value: 오늘의 미션!

오늘의 미션! 
<메모리칩을 지키고 #b우수요원 뱃지 1개#k를 획득하라!>

오늘의 미션은 #b우수요원 뱃지#k를 획득하는 것이다. 믿을 수 있는 정보원의 첩보에 따르면 #b요원W#k의 #bMS-07 작전#k의 임무수행을 도와주면 우수요원 뱃지를 받을 수 있다고 한다.
때가 되면 #b요원W#k가 찾아온다고 하는데...
오늘의 미션을 완료했습니다.

string.name: name
string.value: 요원특별강화프로그램에 참여하라!

string.name: parent
string.value: 오늘의 미션!

오늘의 미션!
<요원특별강화프로그램에 참여해서 #b50포인트#k를 얻어라!>#k

오늘의 미션은 요원특별강화프로그램에 참여해서 #b50포인트#k를 얻는 것이다. 요원특별강화프로그램은 #b요원 냥#k과 #b요원 냐옹#k이 특별 고안한 훈련 프로그램으로 가상공간에서 단계별로 나타나는 몬스터를 퇴치하는 훈련방법이다. 몬스터의 난이도에 따라서 #b포인트#k를 얻을 수 있다. 혼자서 참여할 수도 있고, 또는 파티단위로 참여할 수도 있다.
오늘의 미션을 완료했다.

string.name: name
string.value: Earn 50 points on the Speed Quiz!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!!
<Earn #b50 points#k on the Speed Quiz!>

Today's mission is to get #b50 points#k from the Speed Quiz. If you go see #bAgent Cassandra#k, you can take a speed quiz on the items and monsters of Maple World. You get 1 point per question and the quiz can be taken once every 30 minutes. You must earn a #btotal 50 points#k for today.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Invade the Watermelon Field!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!!
<Obtain #bChumji's Watermelon#k from the watermelon field!>

Today's mission is to obtain Chumji's watermelons. There has been intelligence that #rMaster#k has planted a bomb in Chumji's watermelons. Therefore, the watermelon field is currently being managed by the #bMaple Admin#k. Get into the watermelon field through the Maple Admin and bring back the watermelons!
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: Help Agent E!

string.name: parent
string.value: Today's Mission!

Today's Mission!!
<Complete Agent E's #bSpecial Operation Quest#k!> 

Agent E frequently assigns special operations to the agents to collect information on #bMaster M#k. In order to receive a special operation from Agent E, go to Agent E who is in each town.
Today's mission has been completed.

string.name: name
string.value: You are a True Special Agent!
#b#p9000021##k is said to have prepared a special gift for me for saving Maple World in the summer of 2009...
#b#p9000021##k is said to have prepared a special gift for me for saving Maple World in the summer of 2009...
2009 summer,... I was reborn as a true agent.

string.name: name
string.value: Long and Dangerous Road of an Agent
I lost the Parachute Agent Shoes that Gaga gave to me recently during his suspicious offer. I feel bad asking for another pair now, but should I still ask #bGaga#k?
Gaga seemed overly touched by the encouragement I gave in passing. I think he is going to give me the Parachute Agent Shoes again. I should talk to #bGaga#k again.
Gaga gave me the Parachute Agent Shoes again without any conditions. I feel bad for doubting him all this time...

string.name: name
string.value: What Sen wants to eat

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina and Sen's Dinner Menu
Let's talk to Nina.
I ran into Nina who was thinking about what to make for Dinner for her brother, Sen. I have to go and talk to Sen who is next to Nina, and find out what he wants to have for dinner.
I asked Sen, Nina's brother, what he wants to have for dinner. He answers he wants to have a #bMushroom Soup#k.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 I
리스 항구의 #b#p1002001##k에게 가면 도움을 받을 수 있다는데...

리스 항구에서 #b#p1002001##k를 만났다. #b#p1002001##k는 나를 보더니 모험을 하면서 고생했던 젊은 시절 기억이 난다고 하면서 나를 도와주고 싶다고 했다. #b#t4000016# 100개#k와 #b#t4000004# 50개#k를 모아오면 나의 발전가능성을 인정하고 지원을 해주겠다고 하는데... 훗! 멋진 모험가가 될 나에게 이 정도쯤이야. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
리스 항구에서 만난 #b#p1002001##k에게 나의 모험가로서의 자질을 보여주었다. #b#p1002001##k는 내 능력을 인정하고 여행하는데 필요한 자금을 지원해주었다. 이 자금을 밑거름 삼아 꼭 멋진 모험가가 되겠어.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 II
일전에 도움을 줬던 #b#p1002001##k를 다시 찾아가 보자.
더 강해진 모습을 #b#p1002001##k에게 증명하였다.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 I
리스 항구의 #b#p1002001##k에게 가면 도움을 받을 수 있다는데...

리스 항구에서 #b#p1002001##k를 만났다. #b#p1002001##k는 나를 보더니 모험을 하면서 고생했던 젊은 시절 기억이 난다고 하면서 나를 도와주고 싶다고 했다. #b#t4000016# 100개#k와 #b#t4000004# 50개#k를 모아오면 나의 발전가능성을 인정하고 지원을 해주겠다고 하는데... 훗! 멋진 모험가가 될 나에게 이 정도쯤이야. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
리스 항구에서 만난 #b#p1002001##k에게 나의 모험가로서의 자질을 보여주었다. #b#p1002001##k는 내 능력을 인정하고 여행하는데 필요한 자금을 지원해주었다. 이 자금을 밑거름 삼아 꼭 멋진 모험가가 되겠어.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 II
일전에 도움을 줬던 #b#p1002001##k를 다시 찾아가 보자.
더 강해진 모습을 #b#p1002001##k에게 증명하였다.

string.name: name
string.value: 추석맞이 달나라 여행
추석을 맞아 메이플 월드에서 풍성한 이벤트가 진행중이라는데...
#p9010000#는 추석을 맞아 월묘들이 #b달나라 여행#k을 준비했으니 달나라로 가보는 게 어떠냐고 말했다. 달나라 여행 외에도 #b명절 음식 만들기#k, #b알파벳 모으기#k 등 다양한 이벤트가 진행중이라는데...
#p9010000#는 추석을 맞아 월묘들이 달나라 여행을 준비했으니 달나라로 가보는 게 어떠냐고 말했다. 달나라 여행 외에도 명절 음식 만들기, 알파벳 모으기 등 다양한 이벤트가 진행중이라니 참가해 보자.

string.name: name
string.value: The Great Maple Book Drive
#b#p9010014##k in #b#m100000200##k has lost her books she collected for the Great Maple Book Drive.
#p9010014#, has asked me to help her find #b#t4000515##k . She says she'll show me #bfireworks#k if I help her.
#p9010014#, has asked me to help her find #b#t4000515##k . She says she'll show me fireworks if I help her.

string.name: name
string.value: 달은 어떻게 생겼나요
#b달나라#k에 사는 #b#p9001102##k는 달이 어떻게 생겼는지 모른다는데... 달나라에 살면서 달의 생김새를 모른다니, 무슨 말일까? #p9001102#를 찾아가 보자.

달의 전체 모습을 본 적이 없는 #p9001102#를 위해 지상의 월묘들이 달 사진을 보냈다. 그런데 달나라로 점프하면서 그만 사진이 찢어져 조각조각 흩어져 버렸다. #p9001102#에게 도착한 것은 액자뿐... 아기 월묘의 말에 의하면 사진 조각들은 #b누군가의 손에 있을 수도, 몬스터들이 가지고 있을 수도, 꽃들 속에 숨어버렸을 수도 있다고 한다#k. 흩어진 #b사진 조각#k을 모아 원래의 달 모습을 보여주자.
달의 사진을 본 아기월묘는 너무나도 아름다운 달의 모습에 깊이 감동한 모양이다.

string.name: name
string.value: 카산드라의 도움
#p9001102#의 달 사진 조각들은 어디에 흩어져 있을까? 메이플 월드의 모든 일을 꿰고 있는 #p9010010#라면 알고 있지 않을까? #b#p9010010##k를 찾아가 보자.
#p9010010#는 맛있는 추석 음식 #t2022004#, #t2022005#, #t2022352# 중에 #b아무거나 한 개#k 주면 달 사진 조각이 어디 있는지 알려주겠다고 말했다.
음식을 받은 #p9010010#는 생글생글 웃으며 주머니에서 달 사진 조각을 꺼내주었다. 사진 조각을 주운 건 다름아닌 #p9010010#였던 것이다. #p9010010#를 통해 세 개의 사진 조각 중 한 개를 구할 수 있었다.

string.name: name
string.value: Surprise Event : Special Alphabets
They say that Cassandra will be giving out a Special Alphabet Letter on Back To School day! The Cassandra is only giving it out on that one day, so I'd better to get it now!
Cassandra is apparently giving out 1 letter you ask for. They're only doing this for 1-day on Back To School day!
I received a Special Alphabet letter on Back To School day as part of MapleStory's Surprise Back To School event.

string.name: name
string.value: Returning to Nina

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina and Sen's Dinner Menu
Sen wants to have Mushroom Soup for Dinner. Let's get back to Nina now.
I told Nina what Sen wants for dinner.

string.name: name
string.value: 달꽃떡 받기
달나라 여행티켓 특별판! 이것만 있다면 달나라의 월묘에게서 달꽃떡을 받을 수 있다고 하는데...그렇다면 달나라 여행을 가볼까?
달나라에서 달꽃떡 5개를 받았다. 그런데 비슷비슷해 보이지만 뭔가 달라보이는데? 뭐가 다른거지?
달나라에서 달꽃떡 5개를 받았다. 그런데 비슷비슷해 보이지만 뭔가 달라보이는데? 뭐가 다른거지?

string.name: name
string.value: 아기새를 부탁해
요즘 #p9000042#가 안보이는데 어디 있는 걸까?
#p9000042#는 지금 #b알 돌보기#k에 한창이라고 한다. 메이플 월드에 날아들었던 새들 중 누군#p9000042# 흘리고 간 알을 #p9000042#가 돌보고 있다는 것이다. #p9000042#는 혼자서는 도저히 알을 돌볼 수 없다며 알 돌보기를 도와달라고 한다. #b#p9000042##k를 찾아가 보자.
#p9000042#는 지금 #b알 돌보기#k에 한창이라고 한다. 메이플 월드에 날아들었던 새들 중 누군#p9000042# 흘리고 간 알을 #p9000042#가 돌보고 있다는 것이다. #p9000042#는 혼자서는 도저히 알을 돌볼 수 없다며 알 돌보기를 도와달라고 한다. #b#p9000042##k를 찾아가 보자.

string.name: name
string.value: 길 잃은 도요새
무리에서 떨어져 #p9000043#가 도움을 청한다는데...
따뜻한 곳을 찾아 이동하던 도요새가 그만 길을 잃어 무리와 떨어지고 말았다고 한다. 친구들을 찾아 날아가고 싶지만 날개짓에 자신이 없는 도요새는 #b도움닫기 발판#k에서 도약해야만 날 수 있다는데... 도요새를 도와주려면 #b도요새를 도와줄래요#k로 말을 걸자.
도요새를 높은 가지 위로 올려 주었다. 이제 멋지게 도약해서 날아갈 수 있겠지? 그런데 왠지 불안한 기분이 드는걸...

string.name: name
string.value: Letter for Lucas

string.name: parent
string.value: Please bring this letter to Lucas
I heard Maria need a help...
I met Maria who was desperately looking for help. She gave me a letter and asked me to bring this to Lucas in Amherst...
I gave Maria's letter to Lucas in Amherst.

string.name: name
string.value: 아기새의 깃털
알에서 깬 병아리는 무심하고도 시크한 표정으로 여유롭게 날아가 버렸다. 남은 것은 보송보송한 깃털들 뿐인데... 응? 그런데 #b#p9000042##k에게 뭔가 할 말이 있는 것 같다.
#p9000042#는 눈물이 흐르는 얼굴로 환하게 웃으며 귀여운 병아리가 깨어나 기쁘다며, 기념으로 #b#t4032066##k을 간직하고 싶다고 말했다. ...표정이 그리 귀엽지 않은 병아리였는데 저렇게까지 기쁘다니 이해할 수 없지만... 깃털을 줘볼까?
#t4032066#을 받은 #p9000042#는 뛸듯이 기뻐하며 소중히 간직하겠다고 말했다. 그러면서 다음 알을 보살필 준비를 하는데..

#p9010010#는, #b#p9000042##k가 또 이상한 일에 휘말린 것 같다며 #p9000042#의 일을 도와주라고 말했다. 무슨 알 돌보기라는 것 같은데... 아무튼 #p9010010#가 #p9000042#를 놀려먹기만 하는 게 아니라 제대로 챙겨주기도 하는 것 같네...

string.name: name
string.value: 메이플 2000일의 이야기
메이플 월드에 모험가들이 첫 발을 내딛은 지도 어느새 2000일이 되었다. 메이플 운영자가 이 날을 기념하기 위해 작은 일을 계획중이라고 하는데... 내 도움이 필요한 것은 아닐까? #b#e메이플 운영자#n#k를 찾아가보자.

메이플 월드에 모헙가들이 첫 발을 내딛은 지도 어느새 #r2000일#k이 되었다. 메이플 운영자는 이 날을 기념해서 그 동안의 모험담을 모아서 책을 만들어 보겠다는 계획을 세웠다. 
메이플 운영자는 책을 만들기 위해서는 여러 모험가들의 이야기가 필요한다고 하면서 #e#b2000개의 이야기#k#n가 필요하다고 했다. #b몬스터를 사냥#k하거나, #bNPC들의 이야기#k를 모아서 메이플운영자에게 가져다 주자. 2000개의 이야기를 모두 모으면 운영자의 특별 선물을 받을 수 있다고 한다.

메이플 운영자의 사은품>
#i1002517:# #t1002517# 1개

메이플 월드에 모헙가들이 첫 발을 내딛은 지도 어느새 #r2000일#k이 되었다. 메이플 운영자는 이 날을 기념해서 그 동안의 모험담을 모아서 책을 만들어 보겠다는 계획을 세웠다. \n메이플 운영자는 책을 만들기 위해서는 여러 모험가들의 이야기가 필요한다고 하면서 #e#b2000개의 이야기#k#n가 필요하다고 했다.\n 2000개의 이야기를 모아서 운영자에게 가져다 주고 특별 사은품인 #b#t1002517##k을 받았다.

string.name: name
string.value: 만지의 모험담

메이플 운영자의 조언대로 메이플 월드의 최초 모험자들과 함께 모험을 시작한 페리온의 만지씨 이야기를 직접 듣는 것이 좋겠다. #b만지씨를 찾아가자.#k

메이플 운영자의 조언대로 메이플 월드의 최초 모험자들과 함께 모험을 시작한 '불굴의 모험가'의 그윈씨 이야기를 직접 듣는 것이 좋겠다. 지원물품인 #b드레이크의 피#k를 1개 가지고, 빅토리아 중앙던전 어딘가에 있는 #b그윈씨를 찾아가자.#k

string.value: 에릭손의 모험담
메이플 운영자가 나를 위해서 해줄 말이 있다고 한다.
메이플 운영자의 조언대로 오시리아 대륙의 씩씩한 모험가 에릭손씨를 찾아가서 직접 듣는 것이 좋겠다. 오르비스에 있는 #b에릭손씨를 찾아가자.#k 선물로 그가 기르는 애완동물에게 줄 #b맛좋은 사료 1개#k를 들고 가는 것이 좋을 거라는 메이플 운영자의 충고도 잊지 말자.
오시리아의 유명한 모험가 에릭손씨의 모험담은 그를 보지 못한 사람들 사이에서조차 유명하다. 그의 고양이 네로에게 줄 맛좋은 사료를 들고 가서 선물로 주고 그의 모험담을 얻었다.

string.name: name
string.value: 카산드라의 메이플 스카프
카산드라가 나에게 할 이야기가 있다고 한다. 온 동네 소문에 밝은 카산드라가 이번에는 무슨 일일까?
카산드라는 무언가 재밌는 일이 없는지 항상 궁금한가보다. 이번에는 몬스터들이 주는 소소한 이야기들을 100개나 모아달라고 하는데 왜 그렇게 다른 사람들의 이야기에 관심이 많은걸까...
카산드라에게 소소한 이야기 100개를 모아다 주고 메이플 스카프를 얻었다. 이걸 목에 두르고 있으면 정말 따뜻하겠는걸~

When I see Pio, he asks me to help collecting recycled goods.

I ran into Pio who is famous in Amherst for fixing broken goods. Pio tells me to break down scrap boxes from here and there in the village and bring back a #t4031161# and an #t4031162#. I think I saw some scrap boxes in the village...

#t4031162# #c4031162# / #r1#k
#t4031161# #c4031161# / #r1#k

As Pio asked me, I broke down some useless boxes that were lying here and there in the village, and returned it to him. It was fun collecting them because I could find some useful stuff in them as well.

string.name: name

어쩐지 가가의 얼굴이 슬퍼 보인다. 무슨 일이 있는 걸까? 가가의 이야기를 들어보는 것이 좋을 것 같다.
시무룩한 얼굴을 하고 있는 가가에게 이유를 물어보았다. 가가는 그 동안 열심히 자신이 하고 싶고, 할 수 있는 일을 찾아서 노력했는데 제대로 된 일이 아무것도 없다면서 열심히 노력해도 되지 않는 일이 있는 것 같다면서 슬퍼했다. 여러 가지 이야기를 해주면서 기분을 풀어주려 했지만 어쩐지 더 시무룩해지기만 하는 것 같은데…

string.name: name
string.value: 카산드라의 진심은?!
곤란한 표정의 카산드라가 하고 싶은 이야기가 있어 보인다.

카산드라는 요즘 가가가 너무 기운이 없는 것 같다면서 재미가 하나도 없다고 투덜댄다. 그 동안 많이 골려 먹었지만, 요새처럼 기운이 하나도 없는 가가는 재미가 없다나? 가가가 기운을 차릴 수 있도록 행운의 부적으로 알려진 '행운의 흰 원숭이 인형'을 모아다 주라고 부탁하면서 절대로 가가에게 미안해서 그러는 것이 아니라고 강조했다.\n\n#i4032087# #t4032087# #b#c4032087# / 10

카산드라는 요즘 가가가 너무 기운이 없는 것 같다면서 재미가 하나도 없다고 투덜댄다. 그 동안 많이 곯려 먹었지만, 요새처럼 기운이 하나도 없는 가가는 재미가 없다나? 카산드라의 부탁으로 가가가 기운을 차릴 수 있도록 행운의 부적으로 알려진 '행운의 흰 원숭이 인형'을 모아서 가져다 주었다.\n카산드라는 절~대 가가에게 미안해서 그러는게 아니라고 하지만 진심은 아닌 것 같다. 가가는 인형을 받고 행운이 찾아올지도 모른다고 기대하는 것 같다. 가가에게 정말 행운이 왔으면 좋겠다. 가가는 행운은 나누는 것이라며, 무엇이 나올지 모르는 두근두근 상자를 선물로 주었다.

string.name: name
string.value: 메이플스토리 그린 캠페인
메이플스토리 그린 캠페인이 시작되었습니다. 운영자를 만나 자세한 이야기를 들어보세요.
메이플스토리 그린 캠페인이 시작되었습니다. 운영자를 만나 자세한 이야기를 들어보세요.

I managed to read Vol.1, which was torn.

Time to find Vol.3 of Book of Cygnus. I wonder what's written on it this time.
I feel like I am slowly getting the hang of what the Cygnus Knights represent. Apparently, if I pass Cygnus' Pop Quiz, then I'll be blessed with something. I better use this book right now.

string.name: name
string.value: 해킹자료 분석
몬스터들의 마을 해킹 시도 정보가 파악되었습니다. 자세한 내용은 운영자에게 들어보세요.
웹사이트의 김박사의 보안본부에서 자신의 서버 공격 날짜를 체크한 후 김박사의 연락을 기다려 보자.
원로 그레이의 해킹 시도를 막았다.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Let's solve Rain's 3rd Quiz.
What would be Rain's 3rd Quiz? It won't matter cause I'm good~
I found out "E" is the hot-key for opening the Equipment Window. I can take off what I'm wearing by double-clicking on the item in the Equipment Window.

string.name: name
string.value: 골드리치의 초대
메이플월드의 대 상인 #b골드리치#k로부터의 전언이 도착했다. 무슨 내용일까?
메이플월드의 대 상인 #b골드리치#k로부터 자신이 모험가들을 위해 만든 미로에 초대한다는 전언이 도착했다. 메이플운영자의 특별 요청에 의해 만들어진 #b골드리치의 미로#k에 도전해 보고 싶다면 메이플 운영자를 찾아가 보라고 하는데...
메이플월드의 대 상인 #b골드리치#k로부터 자신이 모험가들을 위해 만든 미로에 초대한다는 전언이 도착했다. 메이플운영자의 특별 요청에 의해 만들어진 #b골드리치의 미로#k에 도전하기 위해 메이플운영자를 찾아갔더니 직접 미로의 입구까지 안내해 주었다.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 I
리스 항구의 #b#p1002001##k에게 가면 도움을 받을 수 있다는데...

리스 항구에서 #b#p1002001##k를 만났다. #b#p1002001##k는 나를 보더니 모험을 하면서 고생했던 젊은 시절 기억이 난다고 하면서 나를 도와주고 싶다고 했다. #b#t4000016# 100개#k와 #b#t4000004# 50개#k를 모아오면 나의 발전가능성을 인정하고 지원을 해주겠다고 하는데... 훗! 멋진 모험가가 될 나에게 이 정도쯤이야. 

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k
리스 항구에서 만난 #b#p1002001##k에게 나의 모험가로서의 자질을 보여주었다. #b#p1002001##k는 내 능력을 인정하고 여행하는데 필요한 자금을 지원해주었다. 이 자금을 밑거름 삼아 꼭 멋진 모험가가 되겠어.

string.name: name
string.value: 테오의 옛날 추억 회상 II
일전에 도움을 줬던 #b#p1002001##k를 다시 찾아가 보자.
더 강해진 모습을 #b#p1002001##k에게 증명하였다.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
You can solve Rain's Quizzes if you carefully think about it.
Rain's 4th Quiz was finding the hot-key for picking up the items on the ground. That's easy~ it's " Z" of course~ But I found out I can also pick up items with the number key "0"...
Let's solve #b#p12101##k's fourth Quiz.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
What would be the 5th Quiz?
Rain gave me a Quiz about Job Advancements. For Warriors, Thieves, and Bowmen, you need to be at least level 10, while for Magicians, you can advance at Level 8.
#b#p12101##k's fifth Quiz. What would it be about?

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Finally, it's the 6th Quiz. I'm happy that my Maple knowledge can be used here like this. Why don't I go for the 6th Quiz?
I learned that every time my level goes up, I get 5 Ability Points(AP) that I can upgrade my abilities. I can see the detail with the hot-key "S".
Shall we solve #b#p12101##k's sixth Quiz?

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Finally the last Quiz. Now I think I'm not a beginner~
Rain advised me to leave Maple Island and go for a greater journey. In Victoria Island, you can choose your job, and face a whole lot of new adventures. Ok...let's go to Maple Island's South Ferry...
This is #b#p12101##k's last Maple Quiz! I'm excited. Let's do it!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Mai in Maple Island seems like a Martial -Art specialist, who can train the beginners to boost up the strength...

I decided to get trained under the Famous Sword-Master, Mai, in Amherst. I guess hunting the weakest monsters is a good idea. Should I hunt Snail, Blue Snail, and Shroom in order?

#o100100# #r#a10161# #k
#o100101# #r#a10162# #k
#o120100# #r#a10163##k

 Ah, Mai told me to meet with #p20002# in Southperry and try training together...
Mai trained me, and I feel I'm a lot stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Final Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Mai's training is a simple monster-hunt. But it is very useful in getting used to hunting. Let's get Mai's training, which might be the last training in Maple Island.
Mai told me to hunt stronger monsters. Of course it is important to know your own strength, but to develop your strength, you need to try to hunt stronger monsters.\n\n#o1210102# #r#a10171# #k
After getting Mai's traning, I became much stronger. I think I am going to leave Maple Island to get a job I like. Let's go to South Ferry and head to Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Todd's How-to-Hunt
I hear Todd can teach us how to hunt...

Todd taught me to move towards upper right-hand side to attack and kill #bJr. Sentinel#k, and talk to #p2002#...

Jr. Sentinel #b#a10181##k
#t4000142# #b#c4000142#/1#k
I killed the monster just as Todd told me.

string.name: name
string.value: Sam's Suggestion
Sam suggested me to meet Mai...
When I talked to Sam, he first told me to go to the East...and he told me to hunt #r10#k #b#o100100##k...and meet #p12100#. \n\n#b#o100100# #r#a10191##k
As Sam told me, I hunted #r10#k #o100100##k...and met #p12100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Pio and the Recycling
I gathered up the recycling materials that Pio asked for, and he said he'll make me something nice in return...
Pio promised to make me a nice relaxing chair with the recylicing materials I gathered up for him.
I helped Pio gather up the recycling materials, and he made a nice comfortable chair.

string.name: name
string.value: Richie Gold is Here
A new, potentially powerful individual is creating a lot of buzz in the world of Maple. Let's click on the light bulb that's flashing on top of the individual's head.
Let's try to make a deal with #b#p2084001##k.
I engaged in a transaction with #b#p2084001##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Pendant of the Spirit
The Empress, who just returned to Maple World, has given a pendant for the explorers to Cassandra. I better talk to her for more information on this.
The Empress, who just returned to Maple World, has given a pendant for the explorers to Cassandra. I better talk to her for more information on this.

string.name: name
string.value: 가가의 크리스마스 추억
어렸을 적 가가가 받았던 크리스마스 선물은 뭘까? 따뜻한 집에서 행복하게 보낸 크리스마스의 추억을 그리워하는 가가에게 가 보자.
가가에게 크리스마스의 추억을 떠올릴 수 있는 물건을 가져다주자! 가가가 어렸을 적 받았던 선물을 모아 가가에게 가져다주면 보답을 하겠다고 한다. 어떤 물건이었지? 으음... 이번에는 어쩔 수 없네. 기억이 안 나면 가가에게 다시 가서 물어보는 수밖에...
가가가 부탁한 선물을 찾아 주었다. 어릴 적의 행복했던 크리스마스를 회상하느라 마음이 여유로워진 가가는 손수 만들었다는 루돌프의 빨간코에만 붙일 수 있는 특제 반창고를 주었다. 다시 갖고 싶은 선물이 또 있었는데...라고 중얼거리는 가가를 보니 다음에 말을 걸면 또 다른 선물을 부탁할 것만 같다. 10분 후에 다시 와 봐야지...

string.name: name
string.value: 카산드라의 두번째 새해선물
새해를 맞아 매일매일 접속만 해도 카산드라가 선물을 준다고 하는데... 인심 좋은 카산드라에게 가 보자.
#b카산드라#k가 준비한 선물은 뭘까~
새해를 맞아 #b카산드라#k가 1월 22일까지 접속만 해도 선물을 준다고 한다.

string.name: name
string.value: Lucas' Cute Daughter
They say there's a request for elder #b#p12000##k in #b#m1010000##k.

#p12000# is worried about his daughter in #b#m60000##k. To make the way safe for his daughter on her way home, he asked me to catch #r#o0130101##k. #o0130101#? Hmmm~ tough one..Then after killing #o0130101#, shall I go to #b#p20100##k? \n #k \n#o0130101# #r#a10221# #k
I let #p20100# know I beat off all of #o0130101#. Yes!

string.name: name
string.value: 스피드 퀴즈
겨울방학을 맞이하여 카산드라가 스피드 퀴즈를 준비했다고 하는데.
조금 있다 다시 도전해 보자!

string.name: name
string.value: 두근두근 메이플!두근두근 나의 펫!
메이플 월드를 탐험하는 모험가들의 마음속엔 언제나 두근두근 호기심이 가득하다. 메이플 운영자가 이런 호기심에 관심이 많다고 하는데...
메이플 월드를 탐험하는 모험가들의 마음속엔 언제나 두근두근 호기심이 가득하다. 메이플 운영자가 이런 호기심에 관심이 많다고 하는데...
메이플 월드를 탐험하는 모험가들의 마음속엔 언제나 두근두근 호기심이 가득하다. 두근두근 넥슨! 두근두근 메이플! 그리고 두근두근한 나의 달팽이까지!

string.name: name
string.value: Starlight Festival
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! If you'd like to participate in the Starlight Festival, go see #bCassandra#k from #bFebruary 5th to February 20th#k!
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! You will receive a star every hour you keep the Giant Star safe.
Exciting Maple star festival that resembles the twinkling stars in the sky! You will receive a star every hour you keep the Giant Star safe.

string.name: name
string.value: Here little Piggy...
#b#p20002##k in #b#m60000##k looks upset. What's going on?

#p20002# heard that somebody told him he looks like #o1210100#. That's why he's so mad. To be honest, they look alike.....anyway, for #p20002#, let's get #r2#o1210100##k. \n #k \n#o1210100# #r#a10231# #k
I defeated #o1210100#! #p20002# seems satisfied.

string.name: name
string.value: Gold Richie's Compass
Cassandra says something went wrong on Gold Richie's Treasure Island. Let's rush over to #bCassandra# and talk to her.
If you need a compass to give you directions to Treasure Island, talk to Cassandra.
If you've collected #bN,E,W,S for the Compass#k from the monsters, double-click the #b#t2430007##k to make a #t2430008# which will take you to Gold Richie's Treasure Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Golden Pig's Egg
If you have a #b#t4001255##k, go find #bGoldrich#k across Treasure Island.
Goldrich seems extremely interested in your #b#t4001255##k.
When you gave #b#t4001255##k to Goldrich, he gave you EXP in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Love Counseling ?!
#b#p2005##k said he needs to ask me something...I hope this isn't some weird favor...

#p2005# is helping #b#p20001##k, the crew of #b#m60000##k, to find ingredients for his girlfriend's present. He asked me to get #b3 #t4000003##k and hand in to #p20001#. #t4000003#? It's a monster which looks like a tree stump. If I find #r#o0130100##k, I think I can get what he says. \n\n#i4000003##t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/3
I gave #p20001# #t4000003#. #p20001# is going to make a boat. When would he finish it? Would #p20100# be on #p20001#'s boat?

string.name: name
string.value: 카산드라의 봄꽃축제
메이플월드에 봄이 오고 있다. 봄꽃 아가씨 카산드라를 찾아가 봄꽃축제에 참여해보자.
봄꽃 아가씨 카산드라의 부탁을 들어주자.
카산드라가 봄꽃을 피우는 것을 도와주고 봄꽃을 받았다. 이 봄꽃으로 메이플월드 곳곳에서 일어나는 봄꽃연구를 도와줄 수 있다고 한다.

string.name: summary
string.value: 카산드라의 봄꽃연구를 위해 봄날의 꽃씨 10개와 눈부신 햇살 10개를 가져다주자.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Nutritious Juice to Shanks

string.name: parent
string.value: Maria and Shanks
Would #b#p2103##k make a nutritious juice? Seems to ask for more...
#p2103# asked me to give nutritious juice to #b#p22000##k, the captain of #b#m60000##k. Hmm...are they dating?
I gave #p22000# #p2103#'s nutritious juice. #p22000# looked happy... #p2103# and #p22000# are dating. The juice looks...pretty nasty, actually; but #p22000# was encouraged and gave me some advice.

string.name: name
string.value: 순결한 향수 만들기1
어린 모험가들이 겁에 질려있어~! 도대체 무슨 일이 일어난걸까? #p9010010#를 찾아가 자세히 알아보자.
#p9010010#는 어린 아이를 괴롭히는 몬스터가 숨어있다고 한다. 몸집이 거대한 이 녀석은 냄새를 맡고 어린아이를 구분한다고 한다. 어린 아이로 위장하려면 어린 아이의 향기가 필요한데..
어린 아이의 향기가 나는 #t2430009#를 만들었다. 이 향수를 뿌리면 몬스터가 어린 아인줄 알겠지?

string.value: #b#t2430009##k의 재료인 #b#t4032271# 30개#k를 모아 카산드라에게 전해주자!

string.name: name
string.value: 숨어있는 몬스터 퇴치
순수한 향기가 가득한 #b#t2430009##k를 얻었다. 어떻게 사용하는 걸까? #p9010010#에게 사용법을 물어보자
아이들은 마을 밖 곳곳에서 몬스터를 봤다고 한다. 아이들이 본 곳에 가서 향수를 뿌려보자. 몬스터가 아이들에게 뺏은 장난감을 가져오면 #p9010010#가 마법을 걸어준다는데..
몬스터를 한 마리 퇴치하였다. 이것으로 어린 아이들은 조금 더 안전해지겠지!

string.name: summary
string.value: 숨어있는 몬스터를 멀리 내쫓아내고, 아이들이 몬스터에게 빼앗긴 장난감을 카산드라에게 가져다 주자!

string.name: name
string.value: 가가의 사랑 편지1
수줍음 많은 #p9000021#에게 고민거리가 하나 있다는데, #p9000021#를 찾아가 고민을 들어보자.
#p9000021#는 #p9020000#가 자신을 어떻게 생각하는지 궁금하다. 자신의 마음을 들키지 않고 마음을 전하고 싶은데... 일단 가가가 편지를 쓸 수 있도록 재료를 준비해주자. 거절한다면 만우절의 거짓말이라고 하면 될 테니까!
역시 사랑은 순수한 마음과 진정한 용기가 필요한 거에요. 저처럼 상처받는 게 두려워 만우절 거짓말처럼 고백하지 말고 당신은 용기 내어 진심으로 사랑을 고백하세요.

string.name: summary
string.value: 가가에게 편지 쓸 재료를 구해다 주자!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world
#b#p12100##k stands at #b#m50000##k. They say she is the strongest in Maple Island.... Why is she here? What's her life story like? Let's see #p12100#.

#p12100# is a new adventurer and worker on Victoria Island. But the elder, #p12000# in #m1010000# hired her in case of any dangerous situations on Maple Island. #p12100# says it's a hard time now because of all the work....Let's tell #b#p12000##k what #p12100# said.

#p12000# agreed with what #p12100# said. He said it's better to hire more workers. Then he asked me to tell #b#p1002101##k in #b#m104000000##k... #m104000000# is in Victoria Island...I have to go to #b#p22000##k in #b#m60000##k.

string.value: 메이플 6주년 축하해!
메이플스토리의 6번째 생일을 맞아 #b#p9010010##k를 통해 축하의 메시지를 전해 보자.
진심으로 메이플스토리의 6번째 생일을 진심으로 축하해 줄 마음이 생겼다면 #b#p9010010##k를 찾아가 축하 메시지를 전하도록 하자.
메이플스토리 6주년을 진심으로 축하했다.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: #p9010010#를 찾아가 #b메이플스토리 6주년 축하#k메시지를 전하자.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #Wbasic# #v4001126:# #t4001126# 1000개 #fUI/UIWindow.img/QuestIcon/8/0#

string.name: name
string.value: To Lith Harbor!

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world

To deliver a message of #p12000# to #p1002101#, I need to go to Victoria Island. The only way I can get there is to pay #p22000# in #m60000#... Fortunately, #p12000# said he will ask #p22000# a favor. Let's not worry and go to #b#p22000##k.
#p22000# let me on board for free as he heard from #p12000#. Good, now let's go to Victoria Island! #m104000000#! Now I only have to find #b#p1002101##k? much bigger than Maple Island..can I find it?

I met #p1002101# in #m104000000#. Hmmm~ This tough and stubborn guy is a friend of #p12000#! Amazing! Fortunately, #p1002101# would do a favor of #p12000#. Hope I can find a nice guy so that my first trip to the Maple World ends well...

string.value: 메이플 6주년 축하해!!
메이플스토리의 6번째 생일을 맞아 #b#p9010010##k를 통해 축하의 메시지를 전해 보자.

string.name: name
string.value: 인기 몬스터의 초상화 : 주황버섯
매일 매일 인기 몬스터의 초상화를 그려 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주면 푸짐한 선물을 준다고 한다.
#t04032302#를 모아 #b주황버섯#k의 초상화를 완성 시키자.
#b#p9010010##k를 위해 인기 몬스터의 초상을 그려 가져다 주었다.

string.name: summary
string.value: 주황버섯의 초상화를 완성해 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주자.

string.name: name
string.value: 인기 몬스터의 초상화 : 옥토퍼스
매일 매일 인기 몬스터의 초상화를 그려 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주면 푸짐한 선물을 준다고 한다.
#t04032303#를 모아 #b옥토퍼스#k의 초상화를 완성 시키자.
#b#p9010010##k를 위해 인기 몬스터의 초상을 그려 가져다 주었다.

string.name: summary
string.value: 옥토퍼스의 초상화를 완성해 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주자.

string.name: name
string.value: 인기 몬스터의 초상화 : 예티
매일 매일 인기 몬스터의 초상화를 그려 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주면 푸짐한 선물을 준다고 한다.
#t04032304#를 모아 #b예티#k의 초상화를 완성 시키자.
#b#p9010010##k를 위해 인기 몬스터의 초상을 그려 가져다 주었다.

string.name: summary
string.value: 예티의 초상화를 완성해 #b#p9010010##k에게 가져다 주자.

string.name: name
string.value: You are a True Maple Lover ♥
Because you kept the 15-Day Dreamer Medal safe, a Maple Admin came to see you.
The Maple Admin, touched at how passionate you were about Maple, exchanged your 15-Day Dreamer Medal for a Maple Lover Medal.
The Maple Admin, touched at how passionate you were about Maple, exchanged your 15-Day Dreamer Medal for a Maple Lover Medal.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Gift
Cassandra says she'll give you a pair of gloves to celebrate MapleStory's 6th Anniversary. Go talk to Cassandra to find out more.
Cassandra claims that she can make gloves out of maple leaves. Go collect some maple leaves!
You were told if you have Maple Gage currently equipped or in your Inventory, you can't receive it again. Failed equipment should be thrown away.

string.name: name
string.value: 아르미의 황금 단풍잎
다 자란 단풍나무에서 황금색으로 빛나는 황금 단풍잎이 떨어졌다. 단풍나무를 관리하는 #p9000055#에게 가져가보자.
황금단풍잎을 단풍나무를 관리하는 #p9000055#에게 가져가자.
다 자란 단풍나무에서 떨어진 황금단풍잎을 단풍나무 관리인인 #p9000055#에게 가져가자. 황금단풍잎은 새로운 단풍나무의 묘목이 된다면서 보답으로 선물을 주었다.

string.name: name
string.value: Sam's Advice
A kind guy on Maple Island, #bSam#k wanted to give me some Beginner advice...who says beginners aren't lucky?

Sam taught me #bHow to use AP#k which I can get whenever my level gets up. The investment of AP determines my power (STR), intelligence (INT), agility (DEX), luck (LUK). My investment choice of AP will increase my HP and MP. \n\nwhoa.. Fantastic! I learned a lot thanks to him. Sam said there is one more thing to tell me.

Sam told me to go to Victoria Island if I want to be a stronger adventurer through a Job Advancement. I can choose from a Warrior, a Magician, a Bowman, a Thief and a Pirate on Victoria Island. Each job has a stat requirement to join and train on that path: #bWarrior is STR 35, Magician INT 20, Bowman DEX 25, Thief DEX 25#k. I'll remember that and invest AP in the proper stats of the job i want!

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Map Reading
I'm at a crossroads. Where should I go? I should've seen the sign. Hhhhh! Let's ask Maria for help.
Maria showed me how to read the World Map. If I press W, the world map will appear. I can see some places that I haven't been...
I think the world map will make it easier to go around Maple World.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Secure Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Solid Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Witch's Sturdy Broomstick
When you use the Witch's precious treasure, #b#t01002971##k, you hear a voice that sounds like the Witch.
The Witch says she must make a Broomstick she can ride in order to release the magic binding her and fly away.
Bon voyage!\r\nYou must help the Witch make her Broomstick 5 times by #rDecember 8th#k. Otherwise, it all goes to waste!

string.name: name
string.value: The Witch's Treasure Chest
#b#p9000059##k says he has something to tell you and it has to do with the Witch.
He says he'll tell you how to open the Witch's Treasure Chest.

Remember you can open the Witch's Treasure Chest by leaving one #b#t4001300##k in front of the chest per day. \r\nRemember everything goes to waste if you don't release all 5 seals by #rDecember 8th#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Heena and Sera
#bMaple World#k, where fantasy and reality meet and have pie! This is the world where many people are eager to listen to my own story. I better go talk to #bHeena#k first.
Heena told me her sister #bSera#k also likes to meet with new travelers, and wanted me to go see her. Apparently, Sera's near by, hanging laundry. I better head #bright#k.
Sera told me to take the #bportal on the right#k and move forward.

string.name: name
string.value: A Petrified Mouse
You have found an interesting artifact.
If you take this Mouse to a Maple Admin, you will receive something as a token of appreciation.

You have taken the Mouse, which was once involved in a Macro, to a Maple Admin. The Maple Admin thanked you and reminded you that MapleStory is much more fun when you actually play the game than when you use some illegal program to play it for you.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Glasses
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found a pair of glasses that look like Gaga's. Let's take them to Gaga and see if he recognizes them.
Gaga was thrilled that you found the glasses he lost when he was abducted by a UFO.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Crystal Ball
You have found an interesting artifact.
This item looks like Cassandra's Crystal Ball. Let's go talk to Cassandra.
She thanked you for finding her cracked Crystal Ball and said she'd restore it and put it to a good use.

string.name: name
string.value: A Shiny Watch
You have found an interesting artifact.
A watch...? Whose is this? Let's report it to a Maple Admin!
This fancy watch apparently belongs to Corba. Will you take it to Corba yourself? Or will you leave it with the Maple Admin?

string.name: name
string.value: A Nice Cleat
You have found an interesting artifact.
A cleat... Who does this belong to? Let's report it to a Maple Admin first.
Perhaps it belongs to Vaughn Lee, Stan, or Louie?

string.name: name
string.value: Quest Completion Book
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found a Quest Completion Book. Just as you are about to report it to a Maple Admin, you wonder what it was used for.
Upon returning it to the Maple Admin, he thanked you and said more and more Maplers participate in quests nowadays.

string.name: name
string.value: A Pretty Hair-Tie
You have found an interesting artifact.
This pretty Hair-Tie has [Manji] written on it. Let's take it over to Manji.
Manji seemed a bit flustered and quickly took the Hair-Tie. Something's fishy...

string.name: name
string.value: An Old Shoe
You have found an interesting artifact.
You have found an Old Shoe that belongs to a Maple Admin. How in the world does anyone lose a shoe?
The Maple Admin says he lost his shoe when he was chasing after someone who was using an illegal macro program. He has given you a reward for returning his shoe to him.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 1000 points acquired!
You have acquired 1000 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 1000 points in Artifact Hunt.

When you reached 1000 points in Artifact Hunt, the Maple Admin said he'd give you twice the points until you reach 3000 points. Not bad! He also says he'll give you another present when you reach 2500 points.

string.name: name
string.value: Nina's Brother Sen

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
Apparently, #bNina#k, a proud resident of the Mushroom Town, has a little brother...
Nina asked me to ask her brother #bSen#k what he wants for dinner. Since Sen's at the #bresidential area of Mushroom Town#k, I better go inside the house where he stays.
Sen told me he wants a tasty #bMushroom Candy#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 2500 points acquired!
You have acquired 2500 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 2500 points in Artifact Hunt.

When you reached 2500 points in Artifact Hunt, the Maple Admin cast magic to enhance your Weapon Attack and Magic Attack. He says he'll cast more magic when you reach 4000 points and give you another boost.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt 4000 points acquired!
You have acquired 4000 points in Artifact Hunt.
You have acquired 4000 points in Artifact Hunt.
When you reached 4000 points, the Maple Admin cast better magic on you! He says he'll reward you with a Participation Prize if you obtain at least 5000 points.

string.name: name
string.value: Artifact Hunt Participation Prize
You've obtained over 5000 points in Artifact Hunt. The Maple Admin says he'll reward you with a Participation Prize.
You've obtained over 5000 points in Artifact Hunt and received a Participation Prize from Gaga.
You can receive presents as well as a boost in your AP if you rank within the top 10. Would you like to take the challenge?

string.name: name
string.value: Vaughn Lee's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Cleat to Vaughn Lee. Let's take the Cleat over to Vaughn Lee in Magatia!
When you hand the Cleat to Vaughn Lee, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Stan's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Cleat to Stan. Let's take the Cleat over to Stan in Magatia!
When you hand over the Cleat to Stan, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Louie's Cleat
Find the legendary Cleat that Vaughn Lee, Stan, and Louie made together in their youth. But which of them deserves to receive the Cleat once it's found?
You have decided to return the Louie to Vaughn Lee. Let's take the Louie over to Vaughn Lee in Magatia!
When you hand the Cleat to Louie, he praises you, saying you're a great judge of character.

string.name: name
string.value: Corba's Watch
Corba says he lost his watch during his transformation.
You told the Maple Admin that you would take the watch to Corba yourself. Let's go find Corba in Leafre!
Corba sincerely thanked you and gave you an amazing present as a token of his appreciation.

string.name: name
string.value: 8 Mystical Treasures
Find the 8 Mystical Treasures. If you find 8 Mystical Treasures, you will receive a special reward.
If you find all 8 Mystical Treasures, Shuang will give you a special present.
You've found all 8 Mystical Treasures and received a Mystical Artifact Discoverer Medal from Gaga.

string.name: summary
string.value: Find 8 Mystical Treasures!

string.name: name
string.value: Start the Artifact Hunt
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started.
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started.
Gaga informed you that Artifact Hunt has started. He says a high score can earn you an awesome reward, so do your best!

string.name: name
string.value: What Sen Wants

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
What Sen wanted was a nice, tasty #bMushroom Candy#k. I better tell this to #bNina#k.
I told Nina what Sen wanted right now.

string.name: name
string.value: Challenge! Honorable Mesoranger
Dr. Kim at the Omega Sector HQ is holding a Physical Fitness Event! Check the #bEvent Schedule on the website#k to see what time the event will occur on your world.
Transform into an Alien Gray and go to the top of the Henesys Pet-Walking Road after you answer the agents' questions. The Maple Admin will tell you which agents you need to meet.
You have completed Dr. Kim's Omega Physical Fitness Footrace.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent E!
Agent M says to go see Agent E. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent E is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent E's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent S now?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent S!
Agent M says to go see Agent S. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent S is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent S's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent O now?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Order! Find Agent O!
Agent M says to go see Agent O. Get the information you need from the Maple Admin and find out where Agent O is.
You must answer some questions if you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger. Get your thoughts together and tackle Agent O's questions.
Shall we head over to see Agent C now?

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Mushroom Candy

string.name: parent
string.value: Nina's Request
I told Nina Sen wanted a Mushroom Candy. She then took out ten of those from her pocket, and asked me if I could give those to him. I better go see #bSen#k right now.
When Sen received the Mushroom Candy, he seemed very grateful and even gave me 2 of those.

string.name: name
string.value: The Return!
Cassandra told you that her crystal ball is telling her that 'he' is coming back. Who is 'he,' anyway? You should visit #bCassandra#k and find out more about this.
Cassandra states that the crystal ball will tell you everything.
Cassandra's crystal ball showed Aran's impending revival. Aran… You want to know more about him!

string.name: name
string.value: Aran's Revival
Apparently, Aran is returning. Who is he exactly? Why did he disappear from Maple World in the first place? For details, you must talk to #bCassandra#k.
Cassandra seems to know quite a lot about him…
Twelve Aran Memory Fragments... If you go see Cassandra, you'll be able to find the Aran Memory Fragments, right?

string.name: name
string.value: Vague Aran Memories
For questions about Aran, you'd better go talk to #bCassandra#k.
She says in order to obtain the Aran Memory Fragments, you have to first collect Vague Aran Memories.
You collected the Vague Aran Memories. Cassandra mentioned a girl that's been waiting patiently at Rien for Aran's revival. What was her name again… Was it Lilin?

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Album
Cassandra seems to be greatly distressed. You wonder what's going on…

Cassandra is panicking because her album is missing, and it may have to do with Gaga. You…need to find all 12 Aran Memory Fragments, but…you should help Cassandra out first, right? If you keep hunting monsters for dropped items, you should find the album sooner or later.
For bringing back Cassandra's album, you received another Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: Dim Aran Memories
For questions about Aran, you'd better go talk to #bCassandra#k.
She says if you want to know more, then you must collect Dim Aran Memories.
You got another Aran Memory Fragment. What will happen when you gather all 12 of them?

string.name: name
string.value: Signs of the Revival
Signs of Aran's revival are slowly surfacing. For details, you should talk to Cassandra.
Apparently, the blocks of ice that sealed Aran have been cracking near town. Where exactly?
Aran Memory Fragments... When will you be able to gather all 12 of them?

string.name: name
string.value: Faint Aran Memories
Memories about Aran are slowly fading from people's consciousness…but you don’t want to give up, and that's why you should go see #bCassandra#k.
Cassandra instructs you to collect Faint Aran Memories.
You think you're about halfway there…

string.name: name
string.value: The Wolf In Waiting
If you want to obtain another Aran Memory Fragment, you should go see Cassandra.
What? Go find a wolf awaiting its master?
You found a wolf that seemed to be waiting for its master, but when you approached, he howled really loudly and ran away, leaving an Aran Memory Fragment in the snow.

string.name: name
string.value: Cloudy Aran Memories
You'd better find some Cloudy Aran Memories.
If you want to obtain another Aran Memory Fragment, you should go see Cassandra.
You got another Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for the Arrival
Cassandra tells you she needs your help. You wonder what's going on…
Cassandra tells you to purchase a weapon from a nearby weapon shop for Aran.
The weapon you got for Aran…is that the weapon he'll actually be using? No way…it's actually giving you goose bumps thinking about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Todd's Hunting Method
At the East entrance of the Mushroom Town, there's a fella named #bTodd#k who can teach me how to hunt in the world of Maple. I better go see him right now.

Todd instructed me that the #bCtrl#k key allows me to hunt in a basic manner, and told me to hunt the Jr. Sentinel nearby. I should hunt #rJr. Sentinel#k, grab 1 piece of #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k and bring them to #bPeter#k to learn hunting methods using skills. 

Jr. Sentinel #r#a1##k 

#i4031802# #t4031802# #b#c4031802##k/1

I have learned that skills can be accessed through pressing #bK#k to open the skill window, and unlike regular attacks, skills can only be accessed by raising the skill level by assigning skill points. He also told me that it's much easier to use the skill by saving it on the Quick Slot. I better do that.

string.name: name
string.value: Lingering Aran Memories
You need to find some Lingering Aran Memories.
You don't think you have enough Aran Memory Fragments yet. This means you should visit Cassandra, right?
You got another Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: The Hero's Memory
All of a sudden, you find yourself gathering the 12 Aran Memory Fragments Cassandra talked about, but…you still don't have enough yet. You'd better go talk to #bCassandra#k.

Wait a minute, she was acting like she was going to give you an Aran Memory Fragment… That kind of annoys you, but you guess you should talk to Cassandra if you want to collect more Aran Memory Fragments.
You can see 12 Aran Memory Fragments being gathered up in one place, but these fragments…seem a lot more interesting…

string.name: name
string.value: Flickering Aran Memories
Finally… You gathered all 12 Aran Memory Fragments, but what now?
You'd better locate those Flickering Aran Memories for Cassandra.
You are short one Aran Memory Fragment. You'll have to ask Cassandra for even the very last one, right?

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth About Memory Fragments
You gathered the 12 Aran Memory Fragments. They seem like meaningless little things. What are they for anyway? You're sure Cassadra knows something about this.
What? These fragments are each supposed to have their own place? You'll have to reorder the fragments.
December 10th, 2009… Will Aran really be revived?

string.name: name
string.value: To Whom Should Cassandra's Album Go?
You've been busy digging up artifacts.
That's when you found Cassandra's album. Hmm, should you give this to Cassandra or to Gaga?
You returned the album to Cassandra, and she gave you an Aran Memory Fragment.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Cassandra's Album
The album holding Cassandra's baby pictures... Oh my, is this really her? You have a hunch that Gaga would love to see this!
When you gave Cassandra's old photo album to Gaga, he seemed elated to finally be free from Cassandra after this.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Cassandra's Album
Of course, it's Cassandra's, so you should return it to her! You'd better return the album to her immediately!
Cassandra breathed a sigh of relief, knowing she finally had her album back.

string.name: name
string.value: Robin the Walking Encyclopedia
#bRobin#k, who exudes confidence as he stands at Snail Hunting Ground 1, apparently knows a lot about job advancements and stats. I better go talk to him right now.

Robin told me that he'll teach me all I need to know about the stats, AP, and job advancement, then quiz me on it. I better learn some things about Ap first before continuing with the quest of Robin the Walking Encyclopedia.
I was able to pass Robin's quiz. Phew...

string.name: name
string.value: Aran Welcome Celebration
To commemorate the launch of Aran, Cassandra has prepared an event that has the odds of you winning at 100%!
In celebration of the legendary hero Aran's release, Cassandra has prepared a foolproof lottery event!
In celebration of the legendary hero Aran's release, Cassandra prepared a huge event. #bFrom December 10th through January 19th#k, this daily event is a guaranteed win for everyone who participates!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value:
#rSelect one of the following:#k
MapleStory-skinned Laptop
Canon Digital Camera
Apple iPod
$25 NX Game Card
Various Cash Items
Aran Paper Box

string.name: name
string.value: Help Hunt the Snails

string.name: parent
string.value: Sam's Request
#bSam#k at the Snail Hunting Ground 1 apparently is looking for me. I better go see him right now...

Sam asked me to take care of some snails to protect #bMaria#k, who ventured off town to collect some mushrooms. I better slay #r10 Snails#k and notify Maria that the field is clear.\n\nSnail #r#a10371##k
I told Maria I took care of the snails.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Master of Combos
You reach Level 15 and #b#p9010010##k approaches you to start a conversation...
Highest Score : #e#r#R10335##b#n Combo#k\n
You were able to check your highest combo score. You're think you're starting to get used to combos now.

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Sam's Request

Maria said that she feels relieved that the snails are gone, and that she can now concentrate on collecting the mushrooms. To make sure no one worries about her, she told me to give this letter to #bChief Lucas#k of #bAmherst#k.
After reading the letter, Lucas seemed quite relieved, and told me he has someone he wants to introduce to me #bthat can train me#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Aran's Return
You reach Level 20 and #b#p9010000##k suddenly starts talking to you about something…

Aran has returned to Maple World! Maple Admin and #p1201000# have teamed up to host an event in celebration of the return of Aran. Apparently, if you reach #bLevel 30(50, 70) as Aran#k, #p1201000# will reward you with a special gift.

Aran has returned to Maple World! Maple Admin and #p1201000# have teamed up to host an event in celebration of the return of Aran. Apparently, if you reach #bLevel 30(50, 70) as Aran#k, #p1201000# will reward you with a special gift.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Present 3
You have reached Level 70 and #b#p9010000##k starts a conversation with you...

#p9010000# tells you since you have reached Level 70, you can receive a #bspecial gift#k from #p1201000#.

#i1112405:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.
Your received #t1112405# from #p1201000#. A special ring that can be worn by any character within the same account. It looks like an item that is not just for an Aran, but for any character.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Out Yoona
Apparently #bYoona#k is in a bit of trouble after wandering outside Amherst.

Yoona obviously didn't think it'd be all that when she left town, only to realize that there were lots of monsters outside. To help her return home, she asked me to take care of some#rBlue Snails#k and #rShrooms#k.

Blue Snail #r#a10391##k 
Shroom #r#a10392##k
I told Yoona that I have taken care of some Blue Snails and Shrooms.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostaligic Reminiscing I
You can apparently get some help from #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor...

You run into #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k takes one look at you, then tells you how you remind him of himself in his younger, traveling days, so he feels the need to help you. He says if you can gather #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k, he'll acknowledge that you are worthy and give you his support. Ha, this should be quite a breeze for a great adventurer like you.

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k

You showed #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor what you were made of as an adventurer. #b#p1002001##k recognized the potential in you and gave you some money to use on your journeys. You're going to put this to good use and become an excellent adventurer.

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Nostalgic Reminscing II
You should visit #b#p1002001##k, who gave you a helping hand last time.

#b#p1002001##k wants to see how much more powerful you've become and tests you to find out.

#t04000024# #b#c04000024#/80#k
#t04000020# #b#c04000020#/100#k
You were able to emphatically prove to #b#p1002001##k that you've gotten much stronger since the last time you met.

string.name: name
string.value: Perfect Pitch - Level Up Event
Music is enjoyed by all people of all ages! Receive a #b#t4310000##k by leveling up during the event.
You can take a #b#t4310000##k to #b#p9000069##k in Henesys and trade it for a rare item.
Music is enjoyed by all people of all ages! Receive a #b#t4310000##k by leveling up during the event.

string.name: name
string.value: 류호의 이주민
류호월드의 주민이라면 마을에 있는 #b카산드라#k를 찾아가 보자.

20레벨을 달성을 하면 마을에 있는 #b카산드라#k를 찾아가 보자.
#n\n#k\n - 레벨 : #b#jlevel##k / 20
20레벨을 달성하여, #b카산드라#k에게 선물을 받았다.

string.name: name
string.value: 류호의 개척자
류호월드의 주민이라면 마을에 있는 #b카산드라#k를 찾아가 보자.

50레벨을 달성을 하면 마을에 있는 #b카산드라#k를 찾아가 보자.
#n\n#k\n - 레벨 : #b#jlevel##k / 50

string.name: name
string.value: Chief's Introduction
For taking care of the snails for the safety of Maria, #bLucas#k offered to introduce me to a person that'll train me. Who would that be? I better go see him.

Lucas told me to head to #bthe East Field of Amherst#k and find #bMai#k, who trains by herself there. He wanted me to to receive Mai's trainings. He said the training will definitely come in handy, since she used to apply her trades at Victoria Island... #k

#y1041# #b (#u1041#)#k
#y1042# #b(#u1042#)#k
#y1043# #b(#u1043#)#k
#y1044# #b(#u1044#)#k
I completed all of Mai's Trainings and returned to Lucas.

string.name: name
string.value: The 2010 Winter King / Winter Queen Event!
Winter is here, and the chilly cold is already affecting everyone! If you wish to become the Winter King or Winter Queen of 2010, you'd better go see Cassandra.
Cassandra says she'll give you a Winter King or Winter Queen medal that can be used until midnight.
If you get more than 20 of these medals from Cassandra, then Cassandra will give you a medal that won't expire for 30 days.

string.name: name
string.value: The True Winter King / Winter Queen Event of 2010!
Winter is here, and the chilly cold is already affecting everyone! If you wish to become the Winter King or Winter Queen of 2010, you'd better go see Cassandra.
What, she's going to give you a present? All you did was train diligently throughout the winter!
On a cold winter day in 2010, you have become the ultimate Winter King or Winter Queen.

string.name: name
string.value: 2009 Pink Flower Floatie!
You want to get your hands on that pink flower floatie. You'd better go talk to #bCassandra#k.
Cassandra says that all you need is an exchange coupon to receive the pretty pink flower floatie.
Spend the chilly days of winter with the pretty pink flower floatie!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's First Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!
I was finally introduced to the person that'll train me through Lucas. Apparently, at the #bEast Field of Amherst#k, I can find #bMai#k training by herself. I better head East.

Mai instructed me to work on my hunting by first working on easy monsters. She then instructed me to hunt #r5 Stumps#k and collect #b3 Tree Branches#k. \n\nStump #r#a10411##k #i4000003# #t4000003# #b#c4000003# #k/3
I managed to hunt 5 Stumps, gathered all the branches, and reported them to Mai.

string.name: name
string.value: Hunter's Luck - Week 1

The time between February and March is what many call the prime hunting season! Receive some hunting pointers from Scadur and become the best hunter on the block!#b

<Event Period>
February 19, 2010 - February 21, 2010

<How to Join the Event>
1. Receive the 2x EXP item that Scadur hands out once a week.
2. Use the item when in need of an extra boost of Luck.
3. Hunt away!

<Notes>
1. 2x EXP item will expire at midnight on Sunday.
2. New 2x item will become available the following Monday.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Second Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!

After coming back from hunting Stumps, Mai thought I had some talent, and proceeded to turn up the training by a notch. This time, I'll have to hunt #r5 Red Snails#k. Apparently they are faster than Stumps, so I better watch out. \n\nRed Snail #r#a10421##k
Red Snails have much higher endurance than Snails and Blue Snails. They also move faster than Stumps. I better not underestimate those sneaky creatures.

string.name: name
string.value: 달은 어떻게 생겼죠?
달이 어떻게 생겼는지 궁금해 하는 귀여운 #b아기 월묘#k를 찾아가 보자.

대체 달은 어떻게 생긴거죠? 마을 어딘가에 보름달이 보인다고 했는데.. 보름달 가까이 가면 #i2430031:#를 더블클릭하여 달사진을 찍어오자.
사진찍는데, 실패했다면 #b아기 월묘#k에게 부탁하여 폴라로이드를 다시 얻을 수 있다.
달사진을 보고 신기해 하는 월묘는 달사진을 보자 매우 기뻐했다. 하루에 한번씩 아기 월묘를 찾아가서 사진을 찍어주자.

string.name: name
string.value: 폴라로이드가 필요해요.
달사진을 찍을 폴라로이드가 필요하다면 #b아기 월묘#k를 찾아가 보자.
달사진을 찍을 폴라로이드가 필요하다면 #b아기 월묘#k를 찾아가 보자.
폴라로이드는 보름달 가까이에서 더블클릭해야 사진을 찍을 수 있다.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Third Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training!

After coming back from hunting 5 Red Snails, Mai told me it's time for me to hunt even more powerful monsters. She then instructed me to hunt #r3 Slimes#k and bring back #b1 Squishy Liquid#k. \n\nSlime #r#a10431##k #i4000004# #t4000004# #b#c4000004# #k/1
After succesfully hunting Slimes, I obtained the Squishy Liquid and reported it to Mai.

string.name: name
string.value: 무지개가 있는 풍경
드디어 시작된 레인보우 위크! 그림 그리기에 서툰 카산드라가 특별히 부탁하고 싶은 일이 있다고 하는데 무슨 일일까? \r\n#b<이벤트 기간>\r\n 2009년10월17일 ~ 2009년11월1일

그림 그리기는 좋아하지만 색칠하기에는 서툰 카산드라가 레인보우위크에 사용할 무지개 그림을 마저 완성해 달라고 부탁했다. 천하의 카산드라도 못하는 일이 있다니... 7색의 크레파스는 가가가 가지고 있다고 하는데 카산드라의 부탁이라고 솔직하게 말하면 크레파스를 안 빌려줄지도 모른다. 
또, 요일마다 빌려주는 크레파스의 색이 다르다는데 무슨 수로 크레파스를 빌려서 그림을 완성하지? #b
- 월요일 : 빨간색
- 화요일 : 주황색
- 수요일 : 노란색
- 목요일 : 초록색
- 금요일 : 파란색
- 토요일 : 남색
- 일요일 : 보라색
#r* 특별히 10월31일, 11월1일에는 원하는 색을 빌릴 수 있다.
아쉽지만 레인보우 위크기간이 지나버렸다. \r\n#b<이벤트 기간>\r\n 2009년10월17일 ~ 2009년11월1일

string.name: summary
string.value: 무지개 그림을 완성하라.

#r* 특별히 10월31일, 11월1일에는 원하는 색을 빌릴 수 있다.

그림 그리기는 좋아하지만 색칠하기에는 서툰 카산드라가 레인보우위크에 사용할 무지개 그림을 마저 완성해 달라고 부탁했다. 천하의 카산드라도 못하는 일이 있다니... 7색의 크레파스는 가가가 가지고 있다고 하는데 카산드라의 부탁이라고 솔직하게 말하면 크레파스를 안 빌려줄지도 모른다. 
또, 요일마다 빌려주는 크레파스의 색이 다르다는데 무슨 수로 크레파스를 빌려서 그림을 완성하지? #b
- 월요일 : 빨간색
- 화요일 : 주황색
- 수요일 : 노란색
- 목요일 : 초록색
- 금요일 : 파란색
- 토요일 : 남색
- 일요일 : 보라색
#r* 특별히 10월31일, 11월1일에는 원하는 색을 빌릴 수 있다.

string.name: parent
string.value: 가가의 크레파스

string.name: name
string.value: Bari's Test
At the #bWest Field of Southperry#k, #bBari#k seems to be looking for me...

Bari told me he had been requested by Mai to test my skills, and instructed me to defeat the most powerful monster in Maple Island, #rOrange Mushroom#k, and bring back #b1 Orange Mushroom Cap#k. \n\nOrange Mushroom #r#a10451##k n#i4000001# #t4000001# #b#c4000001# #k/1
I was able to defeat Orange Mushroom and bring back an Orange Mushroom Cap to Bari. This completed all of Mai's trainings. I think I'm now ready to take on the Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: 골드리치의 나침반
카산드라가 골드리치의 보물섬에 무슨 일이 생긴 것 같다고 하는데.. #b카산드라#를 찾아가 보자.
보물섬의 위치를 알려줄 나침반이 필요하다면 카산드라에게 말을 걸자.

string.name: name
string.value: 골드리치의 나침반
카산드라가 골드리치의 보물섬에 무슨 일이 생긴 것 같다고 하는데.. #b카산드라#를 찾아가 보자.
보물섬의 위치를 알려줄 나침반이 필요하다면 카산드라에게 말을 걸자.

string.name: name
string.value: Biggs's Story on Victoria Island.
I better go to #bSouthperry#k and meet up with #bBiggs#k to learn more about Victoria Island, like Bari said.

Biggs told me the basics needed to learn more about Victoria Island, and advised me that everyone that has landed in Victoria Island from Maple Island needs to visit Olaf. Once I get to Victoria Island, I better head to #bLith Harbor#k and meet up with #bOlaf#k.
Olaf seemed genuinely happy to meet a new traveler, and told me if I needed any information on job advancements, he's the man to talk to.

string.name: name
string.value: Designated Monster Effect
Designated Monster Effect
Collect 5 #b#M1047# cards#k and receive bonus EXP when hunting.\r\nWhen hunting #r#M1047##b, receive #r#x1047# #b#k
You have received bonus EXP from the Monster Book effect after hunting the designated monster.

string.name: name
string.value: 별별 페스티발
반짝반짝 빛나는 밤하늘의 별만큼이나 반짝반짝 빛나는 메이플만의 신나는 페스티발! 별별 페스티발에 참여하고 싶다면 #b11월3일부터 11월18일까지#k #b카산드라#k를 찾아가 보자!
반짝반짝 빛나는 밤하늘의 별만큼이나 반짝반짝 빛나는 메이플만의 신나는 페스티발! 커다란 왕별을 소중히 간직하고 있으면4 5분이 지날때 마다 품 안에 별이 하나씩 생긴다는데...
반짝반짝 빛나는 밤하늘의 별만큼이나 반짝반짝 빛나는 메이플만의 신나는 페스티발! 커다란 왕별을 소중히 간직하고 있으면 45분이 지날때 마다 품 안에 별이 하나씩 생긴다는데...

string.name: summary
string.value: 5분 동안 카산드라의 왕별을 잘 간직하자.\r\n#b(로그아웃을 하면 왕별이 사라져 버리니 주의해야한다.)

string.name: name
string.value: Job Recommendation
The Maple Administrator seems willing to lend me a hand on job selections...
I was still just getting my feet wet in this game, so the Maple Administrator decided to help select a job for me.
I was still just getting my feet wet in this game, so the Maple Administrator decided to help select a job for me.

string.name: name
string.value: Becoming a Warrior
The Maple Administrator told me that I may be best suited to be a Warrior.
The Maple Administrator told me she'll take me to Perion now to help me make the job advancement as a Warrior.
Should I go ahead and make the job advancement as a Warrior?

string.name: name
string.value: Moon Bunny's Rice Cake

The mysterious Moon Bunny only appears in full moon at #b#m910010000##k. #b#p1012112##k of #b#m100000200##k is looking for brave explorers that are willing to help #b#p1012114##k get #r#t04001101##k.
If you wish to see the Moon Bunny, you'll have to plant the Primrose Seed at a designated spot to bring out the full moon. Protect the Moon Bunny from wild monsters so the Moon Bunny can make #r10 rice cakes#k.

 - #eTime Limit#n : 10 min
 - #eParticipants#n : 3 ~ 6
 - #eRewards#n : #b#i1002798# #t1002798##k
 (After acquiring 20 Moon Bunny's Rice
 Cake, hand them over to Tory for a nice
 hat)

Gather up #b10 Moon Bunny's Rice Cakes#k and hand them to Growlie!

If you wish to see the Moon Bunny, you'll have to plant the Primrose Seed at a designated spot to bring out the full moon. Protect the Moon Bunny from wild monsters so the Moon Bunny can make #r10 rice cakes#k.

Our flawless teamwork allowed Growlie to eat until he couldn't eat anymore, and it became a topic of discussion for many in Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: Lord Pirate

#b#m251000000##k is a peaceful town where the Bellflowers reside... until the sinister #r#o9300119##k invaded without warning! #p2094000# is screaming out for help because the king of the Bellflowers, #b#p2094001##k is kidnapped. Intrude upon the pirates' battleship and find a way to remove #o9300119#.
On Stage 1, the goal here is to defeat all the monsters as quickly as possible. On Stage 2, the battle really takes place on the deck. Make sure to find a hidden route on the deck. On the last stage, defeat #r#o9300119##k and rescue #p2094001#!

string.name: name
string.value: Forest of Poison Haze

A time in the past where one can travel to through the broken Gate of Time. Fairy of Ellin Forest is awaiting a hero who will one day save the polluted forest. But...should anyone interfere with history?

 - #eTime Limit#n : 30 minutes
 - #eNumber of Participants#n : 3 ~ 5 people

From the Time Control Room on top of Halios Tower, you can travel back to the past by passing through the broken Gate of Time.
Another Maple World awaits beyond the gate. It looks like Victoria Island of the past. But what's this? A mysterious person is going around polluting Ellin Forest? Then of course you should help! But no on should interfere with history... Perhaps borrowing Ellin's magic will allow you to save the forest without changing history? Let's make a #b#t1032060##k by collecting #b#t4001198#, the reward for saving the forest.
#eQuest Record#n

#eSummary#n
A time in the past where one can travel to through the broken Gate of Time. Fairy of Ellin Forest is awaiting a hero who will one day save the polluted forest. But...should anyone interfere with history?

By transforming into one of the five past heroes who used to protect Victoria Island, you were able to save Ellin Forest. Of course, it's their name that will be recorded in history... But that's fine. Ellin promised to remember you.

The party that acquires the most CP (points earned by defeating monsters) in 10 minutes will win. Utilize CP to use skills, monsters, and others to disrupt the other team for possible upsets as well.

 (Rombot, Robo)

 from #p2042000#)
