string.name: name
string.value: Fixing Blackbull's House
I heard that Blackbull is fixing his house...

Right here, in this dusty town of Perion, I ran into an oddly-dressed man named Blackbull. He told me he needs to fix is house and wondered if I could help him out by getting him #b30 tree branches and 50 firewoods#k. If I do him a favor, I get myself a nice shield that he has, but what if I say no? I wouldn't ... be ... EATEN BY HIM ... no?? I really hope not...

I got Blackbull of Perion #b30 tree branches and 50 firewoods#k. With these, he can finally fix his house. I got this shield as a reward ... and ... well, scratchmarks here and there, and it looks pretty old ... is this even usable?

string.name: summary
string.value: You must collect the materials to fix Blackbull's house.

string.name: name
string.value: Greetings from the Young Empress.
I have decided to become one of the Knights serving the young Empress and battle the indestructible Black Mage. I better first meet up with #b#p1101000# and formally introduce myself.
#p1101000# expressed her gratitude on my decision to become a Cygnus Knight and made a promise that she will always be there for me.

#p1101000# claims that it is ultimately in my hands in terms of defeating the Black Mage. She says that her trustworthy Tactician, #p1101002#, will be responsible for molding me into a formidable Knight.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart the Tactician
Now I'll have to meet up with #p1101000#'s Tactician, #b#p1101002##k, and discuss what I have to do in the future.

#p1101002# claimed that I may be too weak to fight for Maple World, and therefore refused to name me as a Knight-in-Training. He stated that the training period towards becoming a Knight-in-Training is already set up, and that I'll need to meet up with #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

#p1101002# claimed that I may be too weak to fight for Maple World, and therefore refused to name me as a Knight-in-Training. He stated that the training period towards becoming a Knight-in-Training is already set up, and that I'll need to meet up with #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku the Training Instructor
As stated by #p1101002#, I'll have to first raise my level to 10 and become a Knight-in-Training. I'll have to visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and enter the Training Forest.

I met with #p1102000# at the entrance of the Training Forest. According to #p1102000#, Ereve is bereft of monsters, and instead, we train against a fantasy creature created by #p1101001# called 'Mimi'. He then proceeded to give me a potion called #p1102000#...
#p1102000# shot a warning saying that I will be having a tough time training. I better pack up the potions that he gave me and get ready for the training.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's First Training Session
Let's go visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The first session involved facing off against the weakest Mimi in all of Ereve, #r#o0100120##k, and defeating #r5#k of them in the process. I better hunt down those #o0100120#s in #b#m130010000##k \n\n#o0100120##r #a200031##k
I managed to defeat all 5 #o0100120#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Second Training Session
Let's go visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The second session involved facing off against the 2nd weakest Mimi in all of Ereve, #r#o0100121##k, and defeating #r10#k of them in the process. I better hunt down those #o0100121#s at or near #b#m130010000##k. \n\n#o0100121##r #a200041##k
I managed to defeat all 10 #o0100121#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Third Training Session
Let's go visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

The third session involved facing off against the third weakest monster of Ereve, #r#o0100122##k, and defeating #r15#k of them in the process. I better hunt down those #o0100122#s in #b#m130010100##k. \n\n#o0100122##r #a200051##k
I managed to defeat all 15 #o0100122#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Fourth Training Session
Let's go visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

#p1102000#'s fourth session involves facing off against the fourth weakest... you get the drill. Anyway, an easy Mimi called #r#o0100123##k, and defeating #r20#k of them in the process. I better hunt down those #o0100123#s in #b#m130010100##k. \n\n#o0100123##r #a200061##k
I managed to defeat all 15 #o0100122#s and return. Off to the next session.

string.name: name
string.value: Kiku's Last Training Session
Let's go visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive his fifth training session.

#p1102000# told me I had done a good job, and wanted me to defeat #b3 #o0100124#s#k for the last time. He warned me that unlike other Mimis, #o0100124# has a significantly higher stamina, so I better be careful... \n\n#o0100124##r #a200071##k
I managed to defeat the #o0100124#s and return. #p1102000# greeted me with a smile and told me I am now eligible to become a Knight-in-Training. He then advised me to go see #p1101002# again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Knight
It's time for me to receive the last test given by #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k in order for me to become the Knight-in-Training.

An eternal loyalty towards the Empress. The courage to stand up to the Black Mage. The will power required to help me keep my faith in tact. As long as I don't forget these three, I'll be able to fight until the very end as a proud member of Cygnus Knights.

An eternal loyalty towards the Empress. The courage to stand up to the Black Mage. The will power required to help me keep my faith in tact. As long as I don't forget these three, I'll be able to fight until the very end as a proud member of Cygnus Knights.

string.name: name
string.value: Building a New House For "Blackbull"
I heard that "Blackbull" in Perion is building a new house...

I ran into "Blackbull" again, the guy I helped fix his house. He was surprised at how strong I looked, and asked me for a much harder favor. His cousins from Henesys are all trying to move to Perion, and so he needed to build a new house! To build a new house, he said he needed #b100 pieces of rock from Stone Golem, 30 screws, 30 processed wood, and Blackbull's deed to the land#k. His son had the deed to the land, only to have it stolen by Curse Eye neaer Sleepywood...hmmm...I should be looking for those wandering around the deep forest...

To move all of "Blackbull"'s cousins to Perion, I got him all the items he requested: #b100 pieces of rock from Stone Gollem, 30 screws, 30 refined wood, and 1 deed to the land#k. I got him all these...and yet what if he asks me to actually BUILD a house for him next time up?? Anyway for that, he gave me a little bit of EXP, 15,000 mesos, and a scroll for weapon with 10% success rate. Even my fame went up +2...not bad...

string.name: name
string.value: Welcome to Ereve
You have entered Maple World with a determination to become a #p1101000# Knight. But where is this place? Double-click #b#p1102004##k and start a conversation.

At the request of the Empress, #p1102004#, with his brothers, guides Noblesses who aspire to become a part of #p1101000# Knights. If you #bfollow the arrow to the left#k you'll meet #p1102004#'s brother #b#p1102005##k.
You met #p1102005# as you were asked to do in the quest you received from #p1102004#. #p1102005# seems to have some information for you as well.

string.name: name
string.value: I'll Show You How to Hunt
Let's get some information on hunting from #b#p1102005##k.

#p1102005# briefly explained the basics of hunting and asked that you hunt #r#o100120##ks, the weakest creatures in Ereve, as a test. He says you can attack by pressing the #bCtrl key#k, so let's try it out!
You have come back after hunting the #o0100120#s. #p1102005# says you can meet his brother #p1102006# if you continue to your left.

string.name: name
string.value: How Well Do You Know Your Skills?
Let's get some information on skills from #b#p1102006##k.

#p1102006# informed you that you can open your Skill window by pressing the #bK key#k and suggested that you hunt #r3 #o100121#s#k and bring #b1 #t4000483##k to prove that you know how to use your skills.
You've come back after hunting the #o0100121#s and brought back a #o0100121#'s feather. #p1102006# says #p1102007# is waiting for you. Proceed to the left.

string.name: name
string.value: A Box with Goodies Inside
Let's start a conversation with #b#p1102007##k.

#p1102007#, after telling you about acquiring items from boxes, has asked that you collect a #b#t4032267##k and a #b#t4032268##k from the boxes scattered around the field. He says you can only break the boxes using #bRegular Attacks#k.
Upon receiving a #t4032267# and a #t4032268#, #p1102007# made you a fantastic chair using the materials. If you continue to your left, you'll meet the last brother, #p1102008#. Let's rush over.

string.name: name
string.value: The Empress is Waiting
Let's start a conversation with #b#p1102008##k.

In a courteous tone of voice, #p1102008# said he wanted to quiz you on your newly-gained knowledge to make sure that you learned the necessary basics of Maple World. When you completed the quiz, #p1102008# gave you a #t4032269# and asked you to report to #bEmpress #p1101000##k.
You went to see Empress #p1101000#, and the pale and fragile Empress welcomed you with a warm smile.

string.name: name
string.value: Greetings From the Young Empress
Start a conversation with #bEmpress #p1101000##k, who is sitting quietly next to #p1101001#.

#p1101000# thanked you for becoming one of her Knights and asked that you stay by her side for a long time. She then went on to say that her tactician, #b#p1101002##k, is going to help you become a competent Knight.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

string.name: name
string.value: Do You Know the Black Mage?
If you've finished exchanging pleasantries with #p1101000#, it's time to meet #p1101000#'s tactician, #b#p1101002##k, and ask about your immediate duties.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

#p1101002# said you weren't strong enough to fight for Maple World, let alone appoint you as a Knight-in-Training. He said you must undergo a training course that has been prepared for you. Let's go see #p1102000#, the training instructor.

string.name: name
string.value: The First Knight Training
As #p1101002# has said, you must reach Lv.10 before you can become a Knight-in-Training. Let's head over to #b#m130010000##k to find #b#p1102000#, the Training Instructor#k.

You met #p1102000#, the Training Instructor, in #m130010000#. According to #p1102000#, there isn't a single monster in Ereve, so you must train against illusory creatures named Mimis, which #p1101001# summons. Then #p1102000# asked that you hunt #r#o100122##ks.

You met #p1102000#, the Training Instructor, in #m130010000#. According to #p1102000#, there isn't a single monster in Ereve, so you must train against illusory creatures named Mimis, which #p1101001# summons. Then #p1102000# asked that you hunt #r#o100122##ks.

string.name: name
string.value: The Second Knight Training
Let's start the second knight training with #b#p1102000##k.

The second knight training requires you to hunt #r#o100123#s#k. You must hunt #r20#k of them, which is a little more than what you had to do for your first training. Let's head over to #m130010100# and hunt #o100123#s.
You have come back after hunting all 20 #o0100123#s. Let's continue with the next training.

string.name: name
string.value: The Last Knight Training
Let's begin your last knight training before you become a Cygnus Knight.
This time, #p1102000# has asked you to hunt the strongest of the Mimis in Ereve, the #r#o100124##ks.
You have come back after hunting the #o100124#s. #p1102000# suggested you report to #p1101002#, as you've completed your training.

string.name: name
string.value: Maya of Henesys

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine
I hear that #p1012101# is very sick...

I met this girl named Maya at the old, raggedy townstreet of Henesys. She's been suffering from illness for a long time, so she doesn't look too well to even live a normal life. #bWeird Medicine#k... what a strange name, and she said she'll get a little bit better by taking that... I better go to Lith Harbor and see this guy Teo...
Maya wanted me to go see Teo of Lith Harbor, so I did just that. He promised to give me the Weird Medicine only after I get him a Sparkling Rock.

string.name: name
string.value: 5 Different Paths of Cygnus Knights
Talk to #b#p1101002##k and see if he accepts you as a Knight-in-Training.

#p1101002# showed you the 5 different paths of Cygnus Knights, suggesting that you decide what kind of knight you wish to become. A Dawn Warrior of sword and soul, a Blaze Wizard of magic and flame, a Wind Archer of bow and storm, a Night Walker of night and darkness, or a Thunder Breaker of knuckle and lightning. Which fits you the best? The choice is entirely up to you.

#p1101002# showed you the 5 different paths of Cygnus Knights, suggesting that you decide what kind of knight you wish to become. A Dawn Warrior of sword and soul, a Blaze Wizard of magic and flame, a Wind Archer of bow and storm, a Night Walker of night and darkness, or a Thunder Breaker of knuckle and lightning. Which fits you the best? The choice is entirely up to you.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Finding Sophia

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

Around "The Victoria" in Lith Harbor, I met this heavily-bearded crewmember called Teo. He said he has the #bWeird Medicine#k but he wasn't willing to give it up for free. Instead he said he'll trade with me for a #bsparkling rock#k. I mean, he does look like he knows Maya pretty well, but he still wants to make a deal with me, knowing how sick she is ...?? That's strange... anyway, to get that #bsparkling rock#k, I need to head over to Perion and talk to the #rSophia#k, the daughter of the owner of the department store there.
I finally met Sophia, who's working at the department store in Perion. To make the sparkling rock, she said she needs #bArcon's blood#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Sparkling Rock

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

I finally met Sophia, who's working on her dream as an alchemist inside the department store in Perion. To make the sparkling rock, she said she needs #b50 squishy liquid's, 50 leaves, 20 octopus legs#k and #b1 Arcon's blood#k. Everything else looks reasonable enough except ... Arcon's blood ...??? Fortunately, Sophia knew where to get it. She told me to look for this man named Manji somewhere around Perion. Manji, huh ... where must he be ... ??
Sophia told me that Manji has the Arcon's Blood, which is what the sparkling rock is made of.

string.name: name
string.value: Arcon's Blood?

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

I found Manji at Perion. Just as I thought, he was unwilling to give away #bArcon's blood#k for free. He wants me to go to the underground tunnel in the middle of the island and gather up #b40 Charms of the Undead#k for him ... by the way, who does he think he is, treating me like that??? I'm starting to regret saying yes to Maya in the first place ...
Manji asked for the Charms of the Undead in return to Arcon's Blood.

string.name: name
string.value: Getting Arcon's Blood

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

I gathered up #b40 Charms of the Undead#k from the underground tunnel and got them to Manji of Perion. Still cocky, still arrogant, but following through his promise, he hands over #bArcon's blood#k to me. Maybe he isn't so horrible a guy afterall. Anyway, now I need to gather up #b50 squishy liquids, 50 leaves, 20 octopus legs, and 1 Arcon's blood#k for Sophia.
I brought the Charms of the Undead to Manji and I finally got Arcon's Blood. I should hurry back to Sophia...

string.name: name
string.value: Making Sparkling Rock

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

Sophia looks genuinely surprised that I gathered up every single material needed for that #bsparkling rock#k. Well, it wasn't easy at all ... anyway, she handed me the piece of #bsparkling rock#k made out of all the materials I got for her. Hmmm ... this #bsparkling rock#k ... it gives off a strange light, and then ... it starts glittering, and ... now I can understand why people want this ...!! Well, now that I have it, all I got left is trading it with Teo in Lith Harbor.

Sophia looks genuinely surprised that I gathered up every single material needed for that #bsparkling rock#k. Well, it wasn't easy at all ... anyway, she handed me the piece of #bsparkling rock#k made out of all the materials I got for her. Hmmm ... this #bsparkling rock#k ... it gives off a strange light, and then ... it starts glittering, and ... now I can understand why people want this ...!! Well, now that I have it, all I got left is trading it with Teo in Lith Harbor.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Weird Medicine

string.name: parent
string.value: Maya and the Weird Medicine

I traded the #bsparkling rock#k with Teo of Lith Harbor for the #bweird medicine#k. Now, all I need to do is get this to #rMaya#k, and I'm done, but the more I think about it, the more I regret saying yes. Anyway, this medicine looks quite tasty. If I ever find myself thirsty and without any water, maybe I should just drink it myself. Hahaha...

I went back to Henesys and handed Maya the weird medicine. Hopefully she'll get better after taking this. As a sign of thanks, Maya got me 5,000 mesos and a #bbrown bamboo hat#k. This hat ... I mean, it looks like it's going to help when I'm walking under a blazing sun, but it looks so old and raggedy ... and if I put it on, it makes this weird noise that feels as if some insect is walking around and stuff ... am I going to be alright ... ???

string.name: name
string.value: Pia and the Blue Mushroom
Let's start looking for Pia in Henesys

Underneath the watchtower at Henesys park, I met Pia, who was wearing a teddy bear costume. She was talking about how, on the way to Ellinia, she ran into a couple of blue mushrooms and had a hard time with them. She wanted me to show them who's the boss, and as a proof, she wanted #b60 blue mushroom caps and 60 green mushroom caps#k ... but I can see why she's being attacked anyway ... anyone that walks around wearing those is bound to be attacked !!!

I got Pia, who had been chilling under the watchtower at Henesys Park, the stuff she requested, #b60 blue mushroom caps and 60 green mushroom caps#k. For that, she got me the scroll for armor def. ... she said all I need to do is click on it at item window, and drag it to the armor. Simple, but ... what if this doesn't work ????

string.name: name
string.value: Jane and the Wild Boar
Let's go look for Jane at Lith Harbor.

At around Lith Harbor near "The Victoria", I met this girl name Jane, who was sporting bunny ears. Jane expressed a desire to travel around the island, but her father just wouldn't let her. She thought if she got a hold of #b80 wild boar teeth and 100 horny mushroom caps#k, then maybe her father would let her go afterall. And for that, she asked me if I could get her those ... I mean, isn't SHE supposed to collect them herself? Anyway it doesn't sound too hard, so I should headover to the highland and start hunting down some wild boars ...

I got Jane #r80 wild boar teeth and 100 horny mushroom caps#k that she requested. Seriously, though, will her dad approve of her traveling with this? Not with the bunny ears she's wearing ... hmm ... anyway, in return, she got me something she's been keeping for a long time: a scroll for weapon for ATT. If this works, then... my weapon's going to be awesome!!

string.name: name
string.value: Time to Choose
I better go talk to #b#p1101002##k and formally receive the blessing to become a Knight-in-Training.
There are five paths to choose from. Warrior of Light, Magician of Fire, Bowman of the Wind, Thief of Darkness, and Pirate of Thunder. What's my destiny?
There are five paths to choose from. Warrior of Light, Magician of Fire, Bowman of the Wind, Thief of Darkness, and Pirate of Thunder. What's my destiny?

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Dawn Warrior
The time has come. If I want to find out more about Dawn Warriors, the Warriors of Light, I should talk to #b#p1101003#, the Chief Knight of Light#k.
If I want to become a Cygnus Knight as a #bDawn Warrior#k accompanied with honor and glory, I should select #p1101003#.
I am now a Dawn Warrior!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Blaze Wizard
The time has come. If I want to find out more about Blaze Wizards, the Magicians of Fire, I should talk to #b#p1101004#, the Chief Knight of Fire#k.
If I want to become a Cygnus Knight as a #bBlaze Wizard#k with flaming expectations for future missions, I should select #p1101004#.
I am now a Blaze Wizard!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Wind Archer
The time has come. If I want to find out more about Wind Archers, the Bowmen of the Wind, I should talk to #b#p1101005#, the Chief Knight of the Wind#k.
If I want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Wind Archer with broad perspectives on life, I should select #p1101005#.
I am now a Wind Archer!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Night Walker
The time has come. If I want to find out more about Night Walkers, the Thieves of Darkness, I should talk to #b#p1101006#, the Chief Knight of Darkness#k.
If I want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Night Walker that embraces the darkness for the sake of light, I should select #p1101006#.
I am now a Night Walker!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Path of a Thunder Breaker
The time has come. If I want to find out more about Thunder Breakers, the Pirates of Lightning, I should talk to #b#p1101007#, the Chief Knight of Lightning#k.
If I want to become a Cygnus Knight as a Thunder Breaker who thoroughly enjoys thrilling adventures, I should select #p1101007#.
I am now a Thunder Breaker!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's First Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist
I heard Jane has another goal...

I ran into Jane again at Lith Harbor, the same Jane that I helped get wild boar's canine teeth for her to travel. She said she got busted for lying that it was her that collected those items...anyway, she gave up on her dream to travel, and now is trying to become an alchemist. She needed some materials to experiment with...and...I'm pretty sure I'm getting those for her. Anyway, she said she needed #b1 pure water, 30 medicines with weird vibe, and 20 malady's experimental frogs#k to try to make an Elixir. Oh, what the heck, I'll get them for her and see if it really works...
I got all the materials needed for Jane to make the elixir. If she does it well, then maybe I can get myself a nice elixir, but what if she fails...is the whole place going to blow up??

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Second Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist

This time, Jane promised she'll make a better item, and wants me to get #b1 Mushmom's spore, 3 of Drake's blood, 100 medicine with weird vibes, and 30 Malady's experimental frogs#k. She said something about making a Power Elixir, the one that can restore both HP and MP at once...

I got all the materials needed for Jane to make the elixir. If she does it well, then maybe I can get myself a nice elixir, but what if she fails...then I don't know if really want to take it...blehhh...

string.name: name
string.value: Jane's Final Challenge

string.name: parent
string.value: Jane the Alchemist

This time, the last time, she promised to make me a mysterious scroll, and that she wanted me to get #ba moon rock, 20 dragon skins, and 10 saps of ancient tree#k for her. I guess I should ask the fairies at Ellinia for the moon rock, right?

I got all the materials needed for Jane to make the scroll. Thankfully, the scroll for glove for ATT was made without a hitch, and she readily gave it to me. If the scroll really works, then I may have myself a dandy of a glove! Anyway, Jane expressed a strong desire to keep experimenting and become a good alchemist someday. Maybe next time I come back here, I may be able to buy an item from her that's not sold in store...nice...

string.name: name
string.value: Alex's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid
I heard there is a runaway kid called Alex in Kerning City...

At the top of the building in Kerning City, I met this kid named Alex, who looked like a runaway kid. He left home a few days ago aftter a spat with his father. He'd been wandering around Kerning City ever since, but now, with no money and a severe case of boredom hitting him, he just wanted to go back home ... with the problem being that he was certain that a whole round of spanking would await him if he did, indeed, return home. So he asked me if I could convince his father Stan, who happened to be the chief of Henesys, to let him return home without any incident. Not only that, he asked me to get his late mother's article, her #bold gold watch#k, from him as a proof. If he had known this would happen, would he have done it nonetheless?
As Alex has requested, I looked for his father in Henesys to get Alex's mother's #bold gold watch#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Talking to Stan

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid

At the entrance of Henesys Park, I met Alex's father Stan, the chief of Henesys. I couldn't even start up a conversation with him at first, but he did offer to speak to me only if I get him #b30 Evil Eye's tails and 60 pig ribbons#k to fix this town. Jeez, why do I have to go through this much trouble just to talk to this grumpy old man?

#t4000007# #b#c4000007##k/30
#t4000002# #b#c4000002##k/60
I talked with Alex's father, Stan, to settle the misunderstandings. For the return, I got Alex's mother's gold watch.

string.name: name
string.value: Mother's Gold Watch

string.name: parent
string.value: Alex the Runaway Kid

At the entrance of Henesys Park, I met Alex's father Stan, the chief of Henesys. I couldn't even start up a conversation with him at first, but once I got him #b50 Evil Eye's tails and 100 pig ribbons#k he requested to fix this town, that was when he decided to listen. He was even more straight-forward and difficult to talk to than I first thought, but I finally convinced him to accept Alex back with open arms. I also got Alex's late mother's #bgold watch#k as the proof. Now, all I need to do is get this watch to Alex in Kerning City, right?

I gave Alex his late mother's #bgold watch#k. Hopefully this will get him home ... as a sign of appreciation, he got me an earing he received from friends he met while traveling here and there. Well, Alex is now forgiven by Stan, but based on the look of his face, I don't know if he really is going to head home right now ... I should check it out the next time I head over to Henesys ...

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen and the Glass Shoe
I heard that Arwen the fairy from Ellinia has lost something...

Arwen the fairy from Ellinia told me that a couple of days ago, on the way to Perion, she was attacked by a monster covered in flame, and lost her very precious #bglass shoe#k in the process. Fairies love glimmering, shiny objects to the point of obsession, so obviously she wants it back badly ... I better hunt some monsters around Perion, and hopefully I can find it there.

I got Arwen from Ellinia the glass shoe she desperately wanted back. I got lucky, finding it from a nasty Fireboar ... phew. Anyway, as a sign of gratitude, she gave me a fairy item. It's really gorgeous and glimmering like a star ... dang, maybe I can use this to make something special ...

string.name: name
string.value: Luke the Security Guy
Let's meet Luke the Security Guy at the entrance of the Henesys Dungeon.

At the entrance of the dungeon, I met Luke the security guy. He wanted to make a healthy dish for his mom, and asked me if I could get him #b100 pieces of Jr. Necki's skin, 10 wings of Stirge, and a bowl of salad#k. He claimed that he's too busy with all the security matters and stuff, but ... he looks like he's just falling asleep at work ...

I got Luke, who is protecting the entrance of the Dungeon, the stuff he asked for. Since he's making the "Snake Drink" and all ... I want a taste of that myself! In return, Luke got me a nicely refined jewel he found from around the area. It's not like a refined jewel drops from the sky ... did someone lose it while traveling? Anyway I should drop by later when the "Snake Drink" gets done ...

string.name: name
string.value: A Clue to the Secret Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book
I heard Mr. Wetbottom in Sleepwood is going through hard times... I should go check him out.

At a VIP sauna in Sleepywood, I met this bald man called #bMr. Wetbottom#k. He has a son, and apparently he ran away from home one day with a book that he cares deeply for. He requested that I find his son and get the book back from him. For a reward, he's offering me a nice sauna robe. He also told me his son Ronnie hangs out at a tree tunnel around Ellinia, so maybe I can find him there. Anyway, is that book more important to him than his son?? What kind of a book is it anyway... ????
I found #bRonnie#k in the tree tunnel, which Mr. Wetbottom asked me to do.

string.name: name
string.value: Hungry Ronnie

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book

Inside a tree tunnel around Ellinia I found #bRonnie#k, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. He said the red book is off limits, but he seems to be starving. In the end, we made a deal that I get him #b50 Lupin bananas, Rina's Unagi Special, and a fresh milk#k, and he gives me the book. According to Ronnie, I can find Rina at Henesys, and as for the fresh milk, I can get it from Rowen the fairy from Ellinia. I have a lot of traveling to do, but oh well...

I got Ronnie all the food he needed, and got the #bSecret Book#k that Mr. Wetbottom had been desperately looking for. It's a weird-looking book with a red cover... I have a feeling that I should not open this book... Anyway I should hurry up and get this to Mr. Wetbottom at the VIP sauna in Sleepywood before it's too late.

string.name: name
string.value: The End of Knight-in-Training
After reaching Level 30, #p1101002# wanted to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# stated that since my level is significantly high and that I am well-versed in the duties and assignments of a Knight, he suggested that it's time for me to remove the in-Training by taking the #bKnighthood Exam#k. To become a Knight on the next level, I better head over to Ereve.

#p1101002# stated that since my level is significantly high and that I am well-versed in the duties and assignments of a Knight, he suggested that it's time for me to remove the in-Training by taking the Knighthood Exam. To become a Knight on the next level, I better head over to Ereve.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Knighthood Exam: Dawn Warrior
According to #p1101002#, I can take my Knighthood Exam if I go see #b#p1101003##k, the Chief Knight of Light. I better head over to Ereve and meet #p1101003#.

The Knighthood Exam has started. The test itself is actually quite simple. I just need to reach the end of the Training Forest, enter #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k, and defeat the Tiguru inside while bringing back #t4032096#. I better find #b30 #t4032096#s#k and bring them back to #p1101003#. \n\n#i4032096# #t4032096# #b#c4032096# / 30#k

I have successfully completed the Knighthood Exam and officially dropped the "in-Training" from my title. As a bonafide Cygnus Knight, I shall do my best to work hard so I will never be ashamed of myself.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Secret to Unagi Special

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book

To get the Unagi special and a fresh milk, I need to gather up the ingredients for those. Rina of Henesys requested #b50 Curse Eye tails and 5 pig's heads#k for the Unagi special. Rowen the fairy of Ellinia asked for a refined piece of glittering #bdiamond#k for a fresh milk. Diamond, huh... how am I supposed to get that rare, expensive item?

Inside the tree tunnel of Ellinia, I found #bRonnie#k, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. He was adamant about not giving away the red book, but he seemed very hungry. I wound up making a deal with him where he would give me the red book after I get him #b50 Lupin's Bananas, Rina's Special Unagi, and a fresh milk#k. According to Ronnie, Rina can be found at Henesys, and the fresh milk can be obtained through a fairy in Ellinia. This looks like quite a task, but oh well... I should get going.

string.name: name
string.value: Cold Milk

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book

To get the Unagi special and a fresh milk, I need to gather up the ingredients for those. Rina of Henesys requested #b50 Curse Eye tails and 5 pig's heads#k for the Unagi special. Rowen the fairy of Ellinia asked for a refined piece of glittering #bdiamond#k for a fresh milk. Diamond, huh... how am I supposed to get that rare, expensive item?

Inside the tree tunnel of Ellinia, I found #bRonnie#k, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. He was adamant about not giving away the red book, but he seemed very hungry. I wound up making a deal with him where he would give me the red book after I get him #b50 Lupin's Bananas, Rina's Special Unagi, and a fresh milk#k. According to Ronnie, Rina can be found at Henesys, and the fresh milk can be obtained through a fairy in Ellinia. This looks like quite a task, but oh well... I should get going.

string.name: name
string.value: Returned Secret Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book
I got Ronnie some yummy food for the Secret Book. I want to peek inside...

I got Mr. Wetbottom the precious Secret Book that he'd been desperately looking for. I asked him if he's worried about Ronnie at all, only to hear that he'll be in good hands with the fairies... well, it'd be best for Ronnie to be with the fairies, right? Anyway, I got the sauna clothes in return for the book... I guess wearing these cumbersome armors around sauna is a ridiculous thing to do. Might as well enjoy it now and chill here at the sauna...

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 100 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
I think Rowen the Fairy in Ellinia has something to ask me...

I ran into #bRowen#k again, the same Rowen who I got a fresh milk from for Ronnie, the son of Mr. Wetbottom. She seemed to be keeping her guards up against humans then, but it looks like she's accepting me as Ronnie's friend...Rowen is assistant of the head magician of Ellinia, Grendel the Really Old, and he's been concerned about the cursed dolls that Grendel the Really Old made with his black magic a long long time ago. The dolls had been sealed up for a while, until a bunch of Lupin's took them and ran away. They have since turned into zombies, and have been destroying the forest. To return the forest to how it was before, someone needs to take down the Zombie Lupin's and take away the #bcursed dolls#k from them ... well, I readily accepted the request of collecting #b100 cursed dolls#k, but am I going to be okay against those crazy monkeys??
I took down a bunch of Zombie Lupin's on a forest near Ellinia, and collected all #b100 cursed dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave me 7 ores. Will the forest really return to normal with this?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 200 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asked me again, this time #b200 cursed dolls#k. Well, that's easy...
I took down a bunch of Zombie Lupin's on a forest near Ellinia, and collected all #b200 cursed dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave me 10 ores. Will the forest really return to normal with this?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 400 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asked me again, this time #b400 cursed dolls#k. 400?? Hmmm...it's getting quite serious now...

I took down a bunch of Zombie Lupin's on a forest near Ellinia, and collected all #b400 cursed dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave me 5 very-hard-to-find ores. Will the forest really return to normal with this?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 600 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asked me again, this time #b600 cursed dolls#k. 600?? THAT'S A LOT....

I took down a bunch of Zombie Lupin's on a forest near Ellinia, and collected all #b600 cursed dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave me the scroll for gloves. Will the forest really return to normal with this?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 1000 Cursed Dolls

string.name: parent
string.value: Rowen the Fairy and the Cursed Doll
Rowen asked me one last time, this time #b1000 cursed dolls#k. Why does she need that much? Is she trying to sell them all???

I took down a bunch of Zombie Lupin's on a forest near Ellinia, and collected all #b1000 cursed dolls#k for Rowen. In return, she gave me a nice hat. I've collected so many of those for her, but it looks like Zombie Lupin's aren't decreasing in any way shape or form ... what's going on? Anyway, at least it seems that the fairies may not have such animosity towards humans now ... and that's fine with me hehe ...

string.name: name
string.value: Don Hwang's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
I heard that I can get a job if I go see Nella at Kerning City...

I gave Nella 1000 mesos as a commission for hooking up Kerning City citizen's request. First request was to get the materials for Don Hwang, the owner of armor shop. The materials for making new armor are #b50 Green Mushroom caps#k and #b50 Bubbling's huge bubbles#k. It wouldn't be that hard, since I can easily find Green Mushrooms near the Ellina and Bubblings at the Subway.

I gave what Don Hwang asked for and I got bunch of lemons for return. I wonder what kind of armor would Don Hwang make. Nella said there are many more requests I can do. I should visit Nella every once in a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
I got the second request from Nella. Shumi wants to make a house for her little puppy. To make a puppy house, she needs #b5 Processed Woods#k and #b5 Screws#k. I need to get those ASAP.
I gave what Shumi asked for and I got bunch of cakes for return. Now, Shumi's little puppy has her own house~ I should get back to Nella for more requests.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Treasure
#p1101002# is contacting me in an emergency manner. I wonder what happened.
Something terrible must have happened at #bEreve#k. I better go find out.
According to #p1101002#, an important item from Ereve has been stolen by one of the minions who serves the Black Mage. What must that be? I better head over to Ereve.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Master of Disguise
The detailed instructions on searching for the thief will be given by #b#p1101003##k, the Chief Knight of Light. I better talk to #p1101003#.

Apparently, the member of the Black Wings has yet to escape Ereve. If we just search the island thoroughly, we may be able to find the culprit. First, I'll need to visit #b#p1101002##k and receive a #bInvestigation Permit#k, followed by a thorough search of Ereve to find #r#o9001009##k. Once I find him, I'll need to defeat him in a battle and bring back #b#t4032101##k in the process. The problem is that the enemy, being the #o9001009#, is adept at transforming into different persons, so I better talk to each and every one of them to figure out who's real or fake. 

#o9001009##r #a203011##k 
#i4032101# #t4032101# #b#c4032101# / 1#k
I was able to defeat #p1104001# the #o9001009#, a member of the Black Wings, and managed to recover #t4032101#.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Ereve Investigation Permit
So it seems that if I want to conduct a thorough search on Ereve in search of the Master of Disguise, I'll have to first receive a Investigation Permit. I better talk to #p1101002#.

He claims that due to handing out too many Investigation Permits in times like this, the Investigation Permits have actually run out. He then asked me if I could get him some #t4005004#s so he can issue new Investigation Permits...
I wound up giving #p1101002# some #t4005004#s, and received a Investigation Permit in return. It's now time for me to conduct a thorough search of Ereve.

string.value: Andre's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
I got the third request from Nella. Andre from the hair salon wanted some Seafood Soup. I should get #b100 Octopus Legs#k and #bPure Water#k for his Seafood Soup ingredients.
I gave what Andre asked for and I got the glove for return. I hope he enjoys his hearty bowl of Seafood Soup. I should get back to Nella for more requests.

string.value: Shinsoo's Teardrop
It seems like #p1101003# has something to say about the recovered treasure...
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight.
For defeating #o9001009# and recovering Shinsoo's Teardrop, I was promoted to Advanced Knight. I'll need to make sure to keep going so I won't lower the standards of the Advanced Knights.
