string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Faymus's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

Nella said I look much stronger than last time. First request is to get ingredients for Dr. Faymus, the owner of potion shop. He needs #b100 Horny Mushroom Caps#k and #b50 Jr. Necki Skins#k. Taking on Jr. Necki's might be little tough, but I will give it a try.
I gave what Dr. Faymus asked for and I got bunch of white potions for return. I wonder what kind of potion would Dr. Faymus make by using those materials. I should get back to Nella for more request.

string.name: name
string.value: Chris's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request

I got the second request from Nella. Chris got his pillow stolen few days ago and he can't sleep well since then. To make a new pillow, he wants #b50 stiff feathers#k and #b20 leathers#k. I should get them ASAP.
I got what Chris asked for and I got refined steal and bronze. Chris can finally sleep well in his new pillow. I should get back to Nella for more requests.

string.name: name
string.value: Cutthroat Manny's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Nella & Kerning City Citizen's Request
I got the third request from Nella. Cutthroat Manny wants to get #b150 Evil Eye Tails#k for his dinner. He wanted to make a bowl of Evil Eye Stew. Now that sounds delicious!
I gave what Cutthroat Manny asked for and I got shoes for return. Now... Cutthroat Manny doesn't have to worry about his dinner menu for a while. I should get back to Nella for more request.

string.name: name
string.value: Luke the Security Man's Wish to Travel
I hear that Luke the Security Guy made up his mind on something...

I met Luke at the entrance of the dungeon again. The Snake Drink back then is gone now because his mom drank it all...anyway, Luke was ready to quit the boring life of a security man and wanted to travel...and to make a glove that befits the traveling, Mr. Smith of Perion suggested #b1 black feather, 10 Orihalcon Plates, 50 dragon skins, 40 screws, and 3 horns of Taurospear!!#k That's insane...well, I'm guessing he wants me to collect them for him...oh, do the fairies of Ellinia know something about it?

I got Luke all the materials he needed for the nice glove, and return, he gave me a very precious item that has been passed down from generaition to generation, an #bold bronze normal Helm#k. I feel like I'm losing out on this deal...but I can't get mad at him since it's been passed down from generation to generatoin. I heard Mr. Thunder can make this helmet even better...I should go there sometime later..

string.name: name
string.value: First Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.
Let's go meet Ronnie in the woods in Ellinia.

Ronnie from the forest of Ellinia asked me a favor of gathering up materials to build a house for the newborn fairies that are to come down the road. #b50 of orange mushroom caps, leaves, squishy liquid, and red snail shells each#k ... I guess I can get most of these from the monsters around the prairie ...
I got all the items Ronnie requested, but when do I get rewarded for this? What? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Second Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

This time Ronnie wanted #b50 of octopus legs, Curse Eye tails, wild boar tooth, and the charm of the undead EACH#k. These are probably available by the monsters around the deep forest, highland, and ant tunnels.
I got them all for Ronnie. Please don't tell me he wanted all these for free...!

string.name: name
string.value: Third Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

This time Ronnie wanted #b50 each of Drake's skull, Stone Gollem's pieces of rock, the skin of Croko, and Lupin's banana#k. I can probably get those from the monsters at the ant hole, prarie, and at swamp...this is getting quite difficult now...
I got them all for Ronnie. I'm still not getting anything?? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Last Material for Building a New House

string.name: parent
string.value: Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House.

Ronnie asked for the last time. This time he wanted #b50 each of medicine with weird vibe, dark stone gollem's pieces of rock, Wild Kargo's eyes, and Tauromacis's horns, along with 1 diamond#k. I can sort of get this, but for me to hunt at subway, deep forest, the ant tunnel ... it sucks!!

I got all the materials Ronnie needed for the last time. Is this it? For the reward, he gave me a pair of shoes he got as a gift from the fairies that found it somewhere around the forest. Somehow, he can't put the shoes on, so I'm getting it ... hopefully it works ... haha

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's First Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya
Let's go to Maya in Henesys

I got a favor request from Maya of Henesys, who has been collecting various items. She wanted #b50 each of snail shells, blue snail shells, mushroom spores, and tree branches#k. Maybe..well it looks like I can get these from the monsters around the prarie...
I got all the items Maya requested, but when do I get rewarded for this? What? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Chasing the Knight's Target
#p1101002# seems to have a new assignment for me.

I have received a new assignment. The assignment deals with supporting Advanced Knight #p1103000# that is chasing the Black Wings that are targeting the Empress. The last trace of #p1103000# was found in #b#m211000000##k, and he has instructed me to go to #m211000000# to find #p1103000#.

I have received a new assignment. The assignment deals with supporting Advanced Knight #p1103000# that is chasing the Black Wings that are targeting the Empress. The last trace of #p1103000# was found in #m211000000#, and he has instructed me to go to #m211000000# to find #p1103000#.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Hunting the Zombies
#b#p2020006##k of #b#m211000000##k apparently knows something about #p1103000#...

#p2020006# told me she's not sure where #p1103000# is now, but she was able to confirm that he did stay at #m211000000# for a lengthy period of time, and he was busy #rhunting the zombies#k. Not just a regular hunting, but with a purpose: to find a clue that may lead to something.
According to #p2020006#, #p1103000# was actively hunting the zombies. Not just a regular hunting, but hunting with a purpose: to find a clue that may lead to something.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Black Scale
While slaying the zombies, I was able to obtain an item called #t4001207#. Once I did that, #p2032001# approached me.

#b#p2032001##k warned me that #b#t4001207##k contained a curse-like power that spread all over this world, and that since it's a dangerous item, he wanted me to hand it in to him so he could break the curse. While listening to #p2032001# talk, however, I noticed #p1103000#'s name being mentioned... \n\n#i4001207# #t4001207# #b#c4001207# / 1#k
I gave #p2032001# the #t4001207#. #p2032001# told me that #p1103000# gave him #t4001207# too the other day, and that he recently moved to #m240000000# to find out more about #t4001207#.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Outcasts
According to #p2032001#, #p1103000# recently moved to #m240000000#. I better head down to #b#m240000000##k and ask #b#p2081000##k about #p1103000#.

According to #p2081000#, #p1103000# went to visit the #bDragon Outcast#k outside town. Apparently, the scale of the Dragon Outcast is similar to #t4001207#'s... I better go visit Dragon Outcast. His house is #bconnected to #m240020401# or #m240020101##k.

When I asked #p2081012#, the Dragon Outcast, about #p1103000#, he seemed perturbed by my question and got mad at me for it. Apparently, #t4001207# is not his. He thought it might have to do instead with the stolen dragon egg incident at #m240000000#...

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Egg
#o9001010#? Something about it seem suspicious... I better ask #b#p2081012##k, the Dragon Outcast.

#p2081012# told me if I wanted to find out more about #o9001010#, then I'll have to eliminate one #r#o8180000##k and one #r#o8180001##k. He wanted to leave the house, but not with those creatures out there... I better help #p2081012# out. 

#o8180000##r #a204041##k 
#o8180001##r #a204042##k

The one responsible for stealing the dragon's egg in #m240000000# turned out to be #o9001010#. Even the name seemed quite suspicious. Maybe #p1103000# looked into #o9001010#. I better go visit #o9001010# right now. #b#o9001010#'s cave is located near the dragon's nest#k.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Cave of the Black Witch
I better go visit the #bCave of the #o9001010##k as instructed by #p2081012#.

There was a note posted on the wall of the cave. After reading the note, I noticed that it may have been written by #p1103000#. The subject of the curse was not found, but the device was found, recovered, and sent back to Ereve. I may have been one step too late. #p1103000# must have completed his assignment already. I better return to #bEreve#k.

There was a note posted on the wall of the cave. After reading the note, I noticed that it may have been written by #p1103000#. The subject of the curse was not found, but the device was found, recovered, and sent back to Ereve. I may have been one step too late. #p1103000# must have completed his assignment already. I better return to Ereve.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Knight That Disappeared

I may have failed the assignment of providing support for #p1103000#, since he already completed his assignment before I could reach him. I better return to #bEreve#k and report the results to #b#p1101002##k.

I was going to complain to #p1101002# about doing all that work for nothing, but he seemed more concerned that #p1103000# hasn't come back and that something might be up. He then asked me if I could return to the #bCave of the #o9001010##k and find out if there's another note somewhere inside.

#p1101002# told me #p1103000# has not yet come back and that something might be up. He then asked me if I could return to the #bCave of the #o9001010##k and find out if there's another note somewhere inside.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Curse of the Black Witch

...Wait, is this Ereve? But Ereve's usually not like this. And why are the Chief Knights standing like that? No one's answering! Only #p1101001# seemed to be barely awake. I better talk to #b#p1101001##k.

#p1101001# told me the lady in front is actually #r#p1104002# the #o9001010##k and that she has put a curse on everyone in Ereve. He mentioned that most of them on the island should be able to weather it, but the Empress might be in grave danger... I better defeat #o9001010# and break the curse now! \n\n#o9001010##r #a204071##k

The cunning #o9001010#, after realizing that Ereve, which is protected by #p1101001#, may be hard to enter, used #p1103000# to throw in cursed items, then cursed the whole island through that! Fortunately, after defeating #o9001010#, the curse seems to have been lifted.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Knight of the Empress
I received a call from #p1101000#, the young Empress herself.
The young Empress thanked me for my efforts in saving Ereve and decided, through my accomplishments and past work, that I would be promoted to the position of Chief Knight. Chief Knight?

I wound up being anointed as the new Chief Knight for the Cygnus Knights. I made a promise to the Empress that the moment the Black Mage reawakens, I will be the first in line to defeat the Black Mage.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Second Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

This time Maya wanted #b50 each of fireboar teeth, Bubbling's huge bubbles, pig ribbons, and tablecloths#k. Apparently, I can get those by hunting down the monster around the plateau, subway station, and prairies ... well, that's easy!
I got them all for Maya. Please don't tell me she wanted all these for free...

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Third Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

This time, Maya requested #b10 Lupin Dolls and 50 each of Cold Eye's tail, Tortie's shell, and Iron Hog's Steel Hoof#k. Apparently I can get those through monsters at the highland, beach, and prarie. This is getting harder now...
I got them all for Maya. I'm still not getting anything?? How many more times do I have to do this??

string.name: name
string.value: Maya's Last Collection

string.name: parent
string.value: Collecting For Maya

Maya requested, for the last time, #b50 each of Clang's claws, Dark Stone Gollem's pieces of rock, the eyes of Wild Kargo, and Tauromacis's horns, along with one diamond#k. Apparently I can get those through monsters at the beach, deep forest, and deep into the ant tunnel ... this is RIDICULOUS! It's too hard !!

I got all the items Maya requested for the last time...or is it? As a sign of appreciation, she gave me a pair of shoes her grandma made for Athena Pierce, the chief of this town. It may be really old, but it still looks solid like brand new!!

string.name: name
string.value: Looking for the Red Cape

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend
Let's go to Pia in Henesys

I ran into that same teddy-bear-costume-wearig Pia at the Henesys Park. I did her a favor and took care of the blue mushrooms before. This time, she wants to make a present for a friend in Ellinia who wants to go out on a journey. The claw that she wants to make for her consists of #b15 silver plates, 50 dragon skins, and 40 screws#k...and for the friend, she also wanted me to get back the #bRed Cape#k that Rina of Henesys borrowed. If I get her all these...am I going to be richly rewarded?
I decided to go to Rina to get the #bRed Cape#k back, which she has borrowed from Pia.

string.name: name
string.value: What Pia has Borrowed

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

I went to see Rina at Henesys, and instead, she tells me she took that red cape because Pia didn't return the items she borrowed from her. She said, if she gets her items back, then the cape is hers again...the borrowed stuff are #b1 black crystal, 1 ancient scroll, and 30 horns of Tauromacis.

I went to Rina to get Pia's cape, but Rina told me that she is keeping the cape until Rina brings back what she borrowed from Rina. She said she will return the cape if she gets back what Pia has borrowed from her.

string.name: name
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

string.name: parent
string.value: Pia's Present For a Friend

I got Rina #b1 black crystal, 1 ancient document, and 30 horns of Tauromacis#k, and in return, I got Pia's #bred cape#k back. With that and #b15 silver, 50 dragon skins, and 40 screws#k, I should go back to Pia...

I got Pia of Henesys Park all the materials she requested for her friend's claw, and in return, got myself a thief-only clothes...wow...since that was made just for me, I should take good care of these, right? Anyway, did that friend of Pia's leave by now? Who knows? I may see him sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Hero's Gladius

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji's Old Gladius
Let's look for Manji in Perion

I ran into Manji from Perion again, the same Manji that I met while I was helping the little Maya get her medicine. He was shocked by my stronger appearance, and wanted to ask me for a favor. Long long ago, he was in danger of being attacked by Balrog, only to be saved by the legendary hero Tristan. He died in place of Manji, and for that, he's been keeping that sword to this day. Too bad the sword has been soaked in Balrog's evilness and is as ragged as possible. It's too embarrassing to even call it a sword now. Anyway, he gave me the #rOld Gladius#k and wanted me to reawaken it for him. If it indeed gets reawaken, it becomes the #bHero's Gladius#k ...I should go see Chrishrama of Sleepywood just the way Manji said it...

It seems that this Gladius which Manji told me is one fine sword. I had to make a hard decision choosing one bwtween the #bGladius#k and the #bSkull Earring#k which Manji offered me, but I will not regret.

string.name: summary
string.value: I need to rewaken the Hero's Gladius and take it to Manji.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 7,500 EXP #Wselect# 1 #i1302015:# #t1302015:# 1 #i1032012:# #t1032012:# Can proceed to the "Rewakening the Gladius" quest. You can now begin the "Manji's Request" quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Rewakening the Gladius

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji's Old Gladius

I found Chrishrama of Sleepywood, and showed him the #bOld Gladius#k that Manji gave me. He claimed to have made it himself, and that he needs a #bstar rock, 1 piece of ice, 1 ancient scroll, and 1 flamed feather#k. I've never heard of any of those, so I don't know how I'm going to even start with this...Chrishrama said they only way I can get is to talk to Mike who's guarding the entrance of the dungeon.

I got all the materials needed to reawaken the sword to Chrishrama. He couldn't believe his eyes, but went on with it, and reawoke the sword into #bHero's Gladius#k. It gives off a mystic light...and it's a really nice sword! Hmmm...I don't know if I should really give it to him...

string.name: summary
string.value: I need to find the materials needed to reawaken the Gladius and take it to Chrishrama.

string.name: name
string.value: "Mar" the Fairy and the Water of Life

At Ellinia, I ran into a fairy that's been busily studying the magic of life. Her name is "Mar" and after taking a look at my pet that's been turned into a doll, she told me she can make it come back alive with #bThe Water of Life#k and #bThe Scroll of Life#k. I heard that she knows Cloy of Henesys... since it looks like a pet trainer named #bTrainer Bartos#k of Henesys knows something about the scroll of life, I should head over there...

After easily passing the test from Trainer Bartos of Henesys, I got a hold of #bThe Water of Life#k and #bThe Scroll of Lifel#k, and got that to "Mar" the fairy. With her magical power and the items I got her, she turned the doll back into a living pet. I can hang out with him for a while longer now ... sweet ...

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama and the Diet Medicine
Let's go look for Sabitrama in Sleepywood.

In front of Sleepywood Hotel, I met #bSabitrama#k, a medicinal herb trader who seems to be the younger brother of Chrishrama. He said he found a place where he can finally find the herb that he needed for this medicine he's working on...and that he asked if I could go in that forest and grab an herb called #bPink Anthurium#k. It consists of green grass and a small pink flower ... I better remember this well and get him the exact same one. I heard the place is near Ellinia ... I should go there and talk to this guy #bShane#k ...

Thankfully I got the flower that Sabitrama wanted from the Forest of Patience, and as a sign of appreciation, he gave me a #bscroll for the overall armor#k. Oh, and he also said that from here on out, I can enter the Forest of Patience without having to pay Shane of Ellinia. Based on what I've heard, the diet medicine Sabitrama's working on is for Shane's fiance ... I better get back in the Forest of Patience when I have some time ...

string.name: name
string.value: 기사의 품위
#p1101002#가 뭔가 할 말이 있는 모양인데...
#p1101002#는 레벨 50이 되었는데도 걸어 다니는 건 기사의 품위에 어울리지 않는다며 #b몬스터 라이딩#k에 관한 정보를 알려 주었다. 그의 말에 의하면 기사들만의 라이딩이 있는 것 같은데...
#p1101002#는 레벨 50이 되었는데도 걸어 다니는 건 기사의 품위에 어울리지 않는다며 몬스터 라이딩에 관한 정보를 알려 주었다. 그의 말에 의하면 기사들만의 라이딩이 있는 것 같은데... 에레브로 가서 구체적인 이야기를 들어 보자.

string.name: name
string.value: 나인하트의 소개장
#b#p1101002##k가 기사들의 몬스터 라이딩에 대한 정보를 알려주겠다는데...
수련의 숲에서 남쪽으로 가면 #b라이딩교관 #p1102002##k를 만날 수 있다고 한다. #t4032115#을 가지고 가면 몬스터 라이딩에 대해 알려줄 거라는데....

string.name: name
string.value: 티티아나의 알
#b라이딩교관 #p1102002##k에게서 기사들만의 몬스터 라이딩을 배울 수 있다는데...
#p1102002#는 기사들의 라이딩은 #t1902005#를 통해 한다며 #t4220137#을 주었다. #b본인과 경험을 공유한다면 알을 깨울 수 있다#k는데... 그렇게 해서 깨어난 #t1902005#만이 진정 주인을 따른다는 것이다. 그럼 #t4220137#을 키워 보자.

string.name: name
string.value: 키리두의 소개장
#t1902005#를 깨우는데 성공했다. 몬스터 라이딩의 다음 단계는 뭘까? #b#p1102002##k에게 물어보자.
#t1902005#는 깨어났지만 라이딩을 하려면 #t1912005#이 필요하다. #t1912005# 만드는 실력은 그보다는 #b아쿠아로드#k의 #b#p2060005##k가 낫다고 하니 #p2060005#에게 가서 #t1912005#을 구해 보라는데... #t4032116#을 가지고 #p2060005#에게 가보자.

string.name: name
string.value: 안장 만들기
몬스터 라이딩에 필요한 #t1912005#을 #b#p2060005##k에게 구할 수 있는 것 같은데...
#p2060005#는 #t1912005#을 만드는 건 어렵지 않지만 재료비는 줘야 한다며, #p1102002#의 소개를 받아 왔으니 특별히 싸게 해서 #b1000만 메소#k를 달라고 말했다...\n\n #b10,000,000만 메소

string.name: name
string.value: 기사의 라이딩
#t1912005#까지 구했으니 이제 다시 #b#p1102002##k에게 가자.
#p1102002#에게서 몬스터 라이딩 스킬을 배우고 라이딩용 #t1902005#를 받았다. 좋아, 이제 #p1101002#에게 무시당하지 않고 기사의 품위를 유지할 수 있겠지...
#p1102002#에게서 몬스터 라이딩 스킬을 배우고 라이딩용 #t1902005#를 받았다. 좋아, 이제 #p1101002#에게 무시당하지 않고 기사의 품위를 유지할 수 있겠지...

string.name: name
string.value: 티티아나를 잃어버렸어요!
#t1902005#를 잃어버리고 말았다. 어떻게 하지? #b라이딩교관 #p1102002##k를 찾아가 보자.
환상생물인 #t1902005#는 주인과 일정 시간 이상 떨어져 있으면 자연히 소멸해 버리기에 다시 #t1902005#를 갖고 싶다면 #b처음부터 알에서 다시 깨워야 한다#k고 한다. 열심히 사냥해서 다시 #t1902005#를 깨워 보자.
다시 한 번 #t1902005#를 깨웠다. #p1102002#는 다시는 잃어버리지 말라고 신신당부 했다.

string.name: name
string.value: 기사의 품격
#p1101002#가 뭔가 또다시 할 말이 있는 것 같은데...
#p1101002#는 레벨이 90이 되었는데 아직도 일반 #t1902005#를 타고 있는 건 상급기사의 품격에 어울리지 않는다며, 몬스터 라이딩에 관한 새로운 정보를 알려주었다. #b라이딩교관 #p1102002##k에게 가면 더 강력한 라이딩에 대해 알 수 있을 거라는데...
#p1101002#는 레벨이 90이 되었는데 아직도 일반 #t1902005#를 타고 있는 건 상급기사의 품격에 어울리지 않는다며, 몬스터 라이딩에 관한 새로운 정보를 알려주었다. #p1102002#에게 가면 더 강력한 라이딩에 대해 알 수 있을 거라는데...

string.name: name
string.value: 티티아나의 탈피
#b#p1102002##k에게 더 강력한 라이딩에 대해 물어보자.
경험을 축적한 #t1902005#는 탈피하여 더 강력한 힘을 가질 수 있게 된다고 한다. 하지만 탈피하는 동안에는 매우 쇠약해진다는데... 탈피하는 동안에는 타고 다닐 수 없다고 하니 #t1902005#를 필요로 하는 일이 있다면 모두 처리하고 오자.

string.name: name
string.value: 유리온실 돌보기
#p1102001#에게 맡겨둔 #t1902005#를 받아 탈피시켜 보자.
탈피를 위해 #t4220138#에 들어가 있는 #t1902005#를 돌보자. 먹이는 #b#m240000000##k의 #b#p2081004##k이 만드는 농축 이유식이다... 모든 먹이를 주어 #t1902005#를 온전히 탈피시킨 후 #p1102001#에게 돌아오자.
#p1102001#는 #t4220138#에서 탈피가 끝난 #t1902005#를 꺼내 주었다. 하지만 당장 타기는 어려울 것 같다는데...

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama's Anti-Aging Medicine
I heard that Sabitrama in Sleepywood is making a new medicine...

I ran into #bSabitrama#k again in front of the Sleepywood hotel, the same one I helped get herbs before. This time, he said he found a place where I can get the important herb that he needed for his new medicine. He asked me if I could go into that forest and grab #bDouble-rooted Red Ginseng#k for him. The root is in two, and red ... I should remember it well and find the same one once I get to the top. The place where this may be at is #bShane#k of Ellinia ...

Thankfully I got the one that Sabitrama asked me to get, and for that, I got rewarded with a mysterious rock. And from here on out, I don't have to pay Shane everytime I go in the Forest of Patience. From what I hear, that anti-aging medicine Sabitrama is working on may be what Shane needed ... if I have time, I should go back in there ...

string.name: name
string.value: 티티오의 탄생
농축 이유식을 먹여가며 #t1902005#를 길렀다. 이제 탈피한 #t1902005#를 탈 수 있는 걸까? #p1102001#에게 가보자.
#t1902005#의 탈피는 완료 되었지만, 탈피로 인해 쇠약해져 있더 당장 타기는 무리라고 한다. #b#t4032117##k를 먹이면 금새 기운을 차릴 것 같다는데... #m230000000#로 가서 #b#p2060005##k에게 #t4032117#를 구입하자.

string.name: name
string.value: 켄타의 영양제
#t1902005#를 탈피시키기 위해서는 #p2060005#의 #t4032117#가 필요하다고 한다. #b#p2060005##k를 만나 보자.
#t4032117#는 아는 사람이라 싸게 해서 #b2500만 메소#k라고 한다... 도대체 영양제의 재료가 뭘까. 새삼 궁금해진다... \n\n#b25,000,000 메소#k

string.name: name
string.value: 티티아나를 탈피시키고 싶어요!
잃어버려서 다시 키우게 된 #t1902005#를 #t1902006#로 탈피시키고 싶다면 #b라이딩교관 #p1102002##k를 찾아가 보자.
#p1102002#는 특제온실에서 탈피를 마친 #t1902006#를 꺼내 주었다.

string.name: name
string.value: John's Pink Flower Basket
Let's go meet John at Lith Harbor.

At Lith Harbor, I met a fisherman named John. He wanted to get his wife a nice flower basket for their upcoming anniversary. He asked me if I could get him #b10 Pink Violas#k for her. According to him, a mysterious statue can lead me to where the flower is. Sleepywood ... SLEEPYWOOD ??? That's FAR !!!

I got John all #b10 Pink Violas#k. With these, he can make a beautiful flower basket for his wife on their anniversary. As a sign of appreciation, John got me a whole bunch of screws left over from ships here and there. By the way, if there are this many screws that have fallen out of ships, then how in the world are they even working ...? Are they carrying passengers on it ???

string.name: name
string.value: Knight's Dignity
#p1101002# seemed eager to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# told me that for a Level 50 knight to walk around to various destinations seems beneath my rank, and gave me information on #bMonster Mount#k. According to him, there might be a Mount that's available exclusively for the knights.

#p1101002# told me that for a Level 50 knight to walk around to various destinations seems beneath my rank, and gave me an information on Monster Mount. According to him, there might be a Mount that's available exclusively for the knights. I better head off to #m130000000# and hear the story in detail.

string.name: name
string.value: Mounts for Knights
I better talk to #b#p1101002##k and get some information on Monster Mounts for Knights.
#p1101002# told me I'll need to visit #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k, who's at the #bHatchery#k raising the Mimis for Mounts.
I met with #p1102002# the Mount Trainer.

string.name: name
string.value: Raising Mimiana
I better visit the #bHatchery#k and talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about the Mounts for knights.

#p1102002# told me the Mounts for the knights are through #t1902005#, a type of Mimi, and told me I'll have to raise #t1902005# on my own. He then handed me a small egg... #t1902005# can be raised by #bsharing my experiences with it#k.
After fully raising #t1902005#, I handed it back to #p1102002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Riding Mimiana
How does a fully-grown #t1902005# act? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k for the answer.

#p1102002# told me that #t1902005# may have grown quite a bit, but it's not ready to be mounted, and told me I'll need to make it stronger by feeding #t1902005# with some of #b#p2060005#'s Supplements#k. He then instructed me to go purchase #p2060005#'s Supplements. Aren't they quite expensive?
#p1102002# handed me a mountable #t1902005# and #t1912005#, and taught me the Monster Mount skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Supplements for Mimiana
In order to strengthen #t1902005# so I can Mount it, then I must feed the creature with #p2060005#'s Supplements. I better go visit #b#p2060005##k at #b#m230000000##k.
#p2060005# told me he would give me a discount on his supplements since I knew him, then proceeded to charge me 10 million mesos for them. Seriously, what's inside these Supplements?
Saddened, but undeterred, I managed to purchase #p2060005#'s Supplements.

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Saddle
I lost the #t1912005# for Mounts. What should I do...? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainerk# for help.

#p1102002# told me because of budget issues, he couldn't give me a spare #t1912005#, and told me I must come up with a new #t1912005# on my own... It is rumored that #p2060005# of #m230000000# is a great maker of #t1912005#s... but I have a feeling it's going to be very expensive. I'll have to bring the materials and the service charge for the #t1912005# to #p2060005#.
I handed #p2060005# the materials for #t1912005#, along with the service charge, and received #t1912005# in return. I better make sure not to lose #t1912005# ever again.

string.name: name
string.value: Re-raising Mimiana
I lost #t1902005#. What should I do? I better talk to #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about this situation.

#t1902005# is a fantasy creature that naturally dissolves if it stays away from its master for a prolonged period of time. In short, if I want #t1902005# back, I'll have to #bawaken the creature from the egg stage, starting over from scratch#k. #p1102002# said he can get the Supplements for me, but I'll have to pay for it again... sigh. I'll have to rack up enough experience to awaken #t1902005# once more.
I was able to awaken #t1902005# once more. I better not lose it again.

string.name: name
string.value: A Knight's Pride
#p1101002# said he had something to tell me... again...

#p1101002# was worried that I was at Level 100 and still riding a regular #t1902005#, which is beneath my level as a high-ranked Knight. He then informed me about Monster Mount. I guess I can find out more about an enhanced Mount from #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k...

#p1101002# was worried that I was at Level 100 and still riding a regular #t1902005#, which is beneath my level as a high-ranked Knight. He then informed me about Monster Mount. I guess I can find out more about an enhanced Mount from #p1102002# the Mount Trainer...

string.name: name
string.value: Raising Mimio
I better ask #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k about an enhanced Mount.

Since #t1902005# acquired a wealth of experience, it is now eligible to acquire more power. The problem is, I'll have to feed it with only the top-notch kind of food. To have it resemble the greatness of a dragon, I'm going to feed it with the Special Formula for the dragons in #m240000000#. Pam is the one that sells the Formula.
I was able to purchase all the Formulas and feed them to #t1902005#. Once that took place, #t1902005# went through shedding and became #t1902006#.

string.name: name
string.value: John's Present
Let's go see John at Lith Harbor again.

I ran into John the fisherman again at Lith Harbor. This time, he wanted to get his wife Blue Viola for her birthday. He asked me to get #b20 Blue Violas#k for him. The scent of Blue Violas last over 500 years...and according to John, they can be found through the mysterious statue again, where the flower may be found. Man ... do I HAVE to go in there again??

I got John all #b20 Blue Violas#k. It has a nice scent to it, but 20 of them? Makes my head spin...As a sign of appreciation, John got me a nice glove he found inside a ship. I mean, it looks like someone accidentally left that glove in there...is he allowed to give it to me like that? What if I wear this around town and run into the actual owner of it??

string.name: name
string.value: Kiridu's Calling
Suddenly, #p1101002# approaches you.
#p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor,#k saying that your Mount may be in trouble.
#p1101002# suggested that you take your Mount and go see #p1102002#, the Mount Instructor, saying that your Mount may be in trouble.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo

string.name: name
string.value: The Mount in Danger
Let's show your #t1902006# to #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor#k.

#p1102002# says your Mount is suffering because you've gotten too strong for your Mount to keep up. He says he can try to recover your weakened Mount by putting the Mount inside a special Incubator, which will cost you a usage fee of #b50,000,000 Mesos#k.
You have given 50,000,000 Mesos to #p1102002#.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo

string.name: name
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo
Let's go check with #b#p1102002##k, the Mount Instructor, to see whether your Mount will recover its health if it goes into the special Incubator.

#p1102002# says he's done everything he could but the Mount keeps getting weaker and weaker. As a last resort, he suggests you seek help from #b#p1101001##k. He then hints that you may gain something more valuable if you #bsincerely devote time and energy to your Mount#k.
The Mount which #p1101001# had revived was not the same #t1902006#.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Birth of Shinjo

string.name: name
string.value: The Rebirth of Shinjo
If you wish to turn your #t1902006# into a #t1902007# again, you must go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor#k.

#p1102002# said he's learned to summon #t1902007# from #p1101001#, but that he couldn't do such a favor for someone who's careless enough to lose his #t1902007#. He then proposed that you pay him #b100,000,000 Mesos#k as a testament of your devout determination to never lose your Mount again.
You paid 100,000,000 Mesos to #p1102002# and received a #t1902007#.

string.name: name
string.value: John's Last Present
I heard John has one final thing to ask me...

I ran into John the fisherman again at Lith Harbor. This time, he told me his mother passed away recently, and he wanted to get her some White Violas for her. He asked me to get #b30 White Violas#k for him. The scent of White Violas last over 1000 years...and according to John, they can be found through the mysterious statue again, where the flower may be found. Man ... do I HAVE to go in there again??

I got John all #b30 White Violas#k. It has a nice scent to it, but 30 of them? Makes my head spin...As a sign of appreciation, John gave me a set of his mother's earrings. These earrings look like they are made of some common flowers, but it seems there's something to it...

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Coin
Let's start looking for Shumi in Kerning City.

I met this girl name Shumi at Kerning City. She was devasted about losing the lucky coin that she borrowed from a friend and that she was asking me to find it for her. She also told me a bunch of guys draped in white cloth took it from her at the subway, so they may be found at the #bconstuction site B1#k, deep in the station ... I should get in there first ...

I found the lost coin that Shumi of Kerning City was looking for, and returned it to her. A precious coin borrowed from her friend, huh ... as a reward, she gave me a whole bunch of the return scrolls ... not bad at all!! She also said other items can be found at #bconstruction site B1#k ... I should check it out later ...

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Bundle of Money
Let's go look for Shumi in Kerning City.

I ran into Shumi again at Kerning City. She seemed really worried about how she lost her rent money because a Stirge flew over and snatched a bundle of money away from her. Man ... do I have to walk back in there again ... can I just pay the rent for her? Anyway like last time, I need to go back in there, this time to #bconstruction site B2#k and find the bundle of money she lost. Aye, better go in there now...

I got Shumi from Kerning City the lost bundle of money. I guess she can pay her rent now...and as a reward, she got me #b100 Mana Elixir's#k...she also said I may find other items at the #bconstruction site B2#k...I should go check it out sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Shumi's Lost Bundle of Money
Let's go look for Shumi in Kerning City.

I ran into Shumi again at Kerning City. A while ago, she got a favor from JM From the Streetz to get an elixir for him, only to have the sack of money fall down and lose it all in the process. I guess I can find it at the deep part of the subway station, the #bconstruction site B3#k, again.

I got Shumi of Kerning City the lost sack of money. With that, she can finally get the stuff JM requested. As a sign of thanks, she gave me #bscroll for shoes for speed#k. Since there are other items that can be found at #bconstruction site B3#k , maybe I should head back in there sometime...

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach
A beautiful girl by the name of Riel from Florina Beach seems to be in need of help...
Riel introduced me to a part time job, where I have to collect #b10 Coconuts#k. Why don't I start collecting those delicious looking Coconuts over there on the right?\n\n#t4000136# #c4000136#/10
I brought back fresh coconuts just like Riel said. Riel told me I can come back for work anytime I want. I guess I won't be starving here in Florina Beach.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach II
Riel in Florina Beach askes me a question about Florina Beach. Piece of cake~ I can answer that before I start my work.

I have to prepare the recipe for 12 people, and bring it to Riel in Florina Beach.

#t4000136# #c4000136#/#r12#k 
#t4000043# #c4000043#/#r130#k
 #t4000029# #c4000029#/#r12#k
I answered all the questions that Riel gave me. I passed Riel's tests and she took the recipe for 12 people.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach III
I worked part-time gathering recipes for cooking meals for the tourists coming to Florina Beach.
Emergency for the girl living in Florian Beach.

string.name: name
string.value: Training Never Ends
#p1101002# seems eager to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

string.name: name
string.value: A New Skill for Dawn Warriors
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101003##k...

#p1101003# told me there is indeed a new skill, but it's dangerous for me to learn the skill right now based on my level. He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #b#t4032121##k... \n\n#i4032120# #t4032120# #b#c4032120# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032120#. #p1101003# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called Brandish.

string.value: A New Skill for Blaze Wizards
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101004##k

He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #t4032121#...\n\n#i4032121# #t4032121# #b#c4032121# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032121#. #p1101004# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called Ifrit.

I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032122#. #p1101005# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called the Hurricane.

He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #b#t4032121##k...\n\n#i4032123# #t4032123# #b#c4032123# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032123#. #p1101006# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called the Triple Throw.

string.value: A New Skill for Thunder Breaker
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101007##k

#p1101007# told me there is indeed a new skill, but it's dangerous for me to learn the skill right now based on my level. He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #b#t4032121##k...\n\n#i4032124# #t4032124# #b#c4032124# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032124#. #p1101007# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called the Barrage.

string.name: name
string.value: Special Taste of Florina Beach

I need to collect some of the recipes to develop the Special Taste of Florina Beach. I heard that #b10 #t4000136#, 10 #t4000043#, 10 #t4000044#, and 10 #t4000029##k are necessary. Will Valen's new recipe succeed~?
I'm familiar with working on Florina Beach. I visited Riel one more time and helped her out. Why is she so desperate to help Valen?
Riel is trying to develop special dish of Florian Beach.

string.name: name
string.value: Training Still Never Ends
#p1101002# seems to want to talk to me about something...
#p1101002# asked me if I had mastered all the skills I possessed, and he also confided in me that the Chief Knights came up with new skills again. Then he challenged me to learn that as well.
#p1101002# asked me if I had mastered all the skills I possessed, and he also confided in me that the Chief Knights came up with new skills again. Then he challenged me to learn that as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Another New Skill for Dawn Warriors
I better ask #b#p1101003##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

#p1101003#told me that if I wanted to learn a new skill, I'll have to prove my skills again by entering #bHall #4#k at #m130020000#, where a tougher test will take place... \n\n#i4032125# #t4032125# #b#c4032125# / 1#k
I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032125# in return. #p1101003# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Advanced Combo Attack.

string.value: Another New Skill for Blaze Wizards

I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032126# in return. #p1101004# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Meteo Shower.

I better ask #b#p1101005##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

#p1101005#told me that if I wanted to learn a new skill, I'll have to prove my skills again by entering #bHall #4#k at #m130020000#, where a tougher test will take place... \n\n#i4032127# #t4032127# #b#c4032127# / 1#k
I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032127# in return. #p1101005# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill, and taught me Bow Expert.

I better ask #b#p1101006##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032128# in return. #p1101006# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Venom.
