I better ask #b#p1101007##k about this new skill per comments from #p1101002#.

#p1101002#told me that if I wanted to learn a new skill, I'll have to prove my skills again by entering #bHall #4#k at #m130020000#, where a tougher test will take place... \n\n#i4032129# #t4032129# #b#c4032129# / 1#k
I managed to defeat the boss monster again and brought back #t4032129# in return. #p1101007# told me I have proven that I deserve to learn the new skill and taught me Speed infusion.

string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's First Worry
I hear that Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys is worried about something...

I ran into Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys, who flushed with concerns here and there. She said there is not enough decoration for the village festival, and asked me to get #b50 Bubbling's Huge Bubble, 20 Slime Bubbles, and 100 Pig's Ribbons#k. 

Bubblings Huge Bubbles : #c4000037#/50
Slime Bubbles : #c4000010#/20
Pig's Ribbons : #c4000002#/100
I brought back all the stuff Mrs. Ming Ming asked me for, but I'm sure these decorations are not the only things needed for the festival...

string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry
I heard Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys has a new worry...

I met Mrs. Ming Ming again in Henesys who was preparing for the village festival. She said she needs food to prepare for the festival, and asked me to collect #b20 Pig's heads, 60 Octopus Legs, and Estelle's Special Sauce#k. To get the special sauce, I think I'll have to go find Estelle near Ellinia.
I met up with #bEstelle#k near Ellinia to get her #bSpecial Sauce#k, but she apparently she doesn't want to give it to me for free...

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry
I ran into #bEstelle#k near Ellinia. She was making a necklace for her mother's birthday present. If I can get her #b1 Garnet#k, she was willing to give me the special sauce.

I got #b1 Garnet#k for Estelle, who I met near Ellinia, for making her mother's birthday present. She gave me #bEstelle's Special Sauce#k. I better collect other materials and return to Mrs. Ming Ming.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Fossil Dig-up
I heard that #p1022006# the archeologist is searching for something in the Rocky Mountains on the East side of Perion...

#b#p1022006##k the archeologist who I ran into on the rocky mountains on the east side of Perion said he lost the fossils he collected near Perion. He asked me to bring back #b100 #t4031146##k and #b100 #t4031147##k which #b#o1110100##k and #b#o1130100##k took. How can he lose something so important like that? He is careless than he looks...

#t4031146# #c4031146#/100
#t4031147# #c4031147#/100
I found the fossil which #b#p1022006##k lost.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering a Box of Fossil

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Fossil Dig-up

#b#p1022006# the Archeologist#k said that it is not safe to put the valuable fossils in the tent. He asked me to take the fossil and deliver it to #bDr. #p1032104##k in Ellinia. He also wrote a letter of introduction for me to show him.

#b#p1022006# the Archeologist#k in Perion said that it is not safe to put the valuable fossils in his tent. He asked me to deliver it to #bDr. #p1032104##k in Ellinia. Dr. Betty said it is going to be really busy from now. He asked me to stop by again and give him a hand afterwards. Fossils huh...? Should I give it a try?

string.name: name
string.value: Research on Plant Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Plants
Dr. Betty, a biologist near Ellinia is looking for an assistant.

#bDr. Betty#k asked me to work as an assistant for a while. My first task from her is to collect #b20 #t4031150#s#k. I can see various plants covering the woods in Ellinia.\n\n#t4031150# #c4031150#/20
My first job as Dr. Betty's assistant was to collect some plants in the woods in Ellinia and sample them. It wasn't that hard I guess.

string.name: name
string.value: Research on Animal Fossils

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Fossils
Dr. Betty in Ellinia told me that she needs #b1 #t4031151##k for her research. She asked me to find her daughter near Henesys, and bring it back to her. Where would Anne be?
I met Dr.Betty's daughter, Ann, playing near Henesys by herself.

string.name: name
string.value: Transporting Drake's Skull

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Fossils
I received the #t4031151# from Anne, Dr. Betty's daughter. Now I have to deliver this carefully to Dr. Betty...
I collected some plant samples and Drake's Skull to help Dr. Betty's research on fossils. I can't wait to see the results...I'll go and see Dr. Betty, because he said he would tell me when I go back.

string.name: name
string.value: Progress on Fossil Research

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Betty's Research on Plants
I heard Dr. Betty has finished the research on plants. Maybe I should go and see how it is.

I met Dr. Betty again. Doctor told me the research was finished, and explained it to me. Then Doctor told me to take the Research Report and deliver it to Dr. Winston in Perion. Dr. Betty also informed me that if I take #b100 #t4000005#s, 50 #t4000018#s, 1 #t4031153#, and 1 pair of #t1032000##k, Dr. Winston would be really happy. 

#t4000005# #c4000005#/100
#t4000018# #c4000018#/50
#t4031153# #c4031153#/1
#t1032000# #c1032000#/1

I delivered Dr. Betty's Fossil Research Report to Dr. Winston in Perion. Along with the report, I also gave him the leaves, firewoods, Stump's tear, and earrings. In return, Dr. Winston gave me the Leaf Earrings.

string.name: name
string.value: Are You Sure You Can Leave?
Apparently, #p1101002# wants to tell me something...
#p1101002# told me I may be a knight, but I still have a long way to go before he can send me out on assignments, and asked me to train more.

#p1101002# told me I may be a knight, but I still have a long way to go before he can send me out on assignments, and he asked me to train more with the help from #p1102000# the Training Instructor...

string.name: name
string.value: 1st Acclimation Training
I better take #p1101002#'s advice and go see #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k.

#p1102000# told me he expected me to come and suggested that I take the Acclimation Training before entering Victoria Island. He then proposed that I head over to the end of the Training Forest and enter #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k to hunt the #r#o9300271#s#k that are inside.\n\n#o9300271##r #a207011##k
I managed to defeat 30 #o9300271#s.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Acclimation Training
I shall receive the 2nd Acclimation Training from #b#p1102000##k.
This time, the monsters in question for Acclimation Training are #r#o9300272#s#k. I'll need to enter #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k and battle against #o9300272#s... \n\n#o9300272##r #a207021##k
I managed to defeat 30 #o9300272#s.

string.name: name
string.value: 3rd Acclimation Training
I shall receive the 3rd Acclimation Training from #b#p1102000##k.

This time, the monsters in question for the Acclimation Training are #r#o9300273#s#k. He warned me that these monsters have quite a temper and that I better be careful. I better return to #bthe 1st Drill Hall#k and hunt #o9300273#s. \n\n#o9300273##r #a207031##k
I was able to hunt 30 #o9300273#s. Now that I have reached Level 13, I should return to #p1101002# and receive an assignment.

string.name: name
string.value: A Mission in Henesys
I have finally reached the level it takes to receive an assignment as a Cygnus Knight. I'll need to visit #bthe Tactician for Cygnus Knights, #p1101002##k, for an assignment.
I finally received the first assignment from #p1101002#, asking that I head over to #b#m100000000# in Victoria Island#k and provide support for #bAgent #p1103001##k.

I finally received the first assignment from #p1101002#, asking that I head over to #m100000000# in Victoria Island and provide support for Agent #p1103001#. I guess this kind of assignment is very common, since the Cygnus Knights are sent to different parts of Maple World to collect information on the Black Mage.

string.name: name
string.value: A Cynical Orange Mushroom
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000# in order to receive the next assignment.

According to #p1103001#, #o1210102# has been looking suspicious lately. Some of the #o1210102#s appear to offer a cold, cynical look, and #p1103001# believes they may be linked to the Black Mage. He then assigned me to hunt down #r#o9300274##k... 

#o9300274##r #a207051##k 
#i4032190# #t4032190# #b#c4032190# / 1#k
I was able to hunt down all the #o9300274#s that were out there. #p1103001# then told me to come back later, as he decided to continue to investigate on other suspicious creatures in this area.

string.name: name
string.value: A Black Shadow in the Pig Farm
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who seems to have some new information to share.

#p1103001#, who claims black shadows have been spotted all around #b#m100020000##k, asked me if I could investigate the forest in East. He told me to #broam around my mouse cursor until I can click on something, then click on it#k.
I reported the suspicious black shadow hidden in the forest that I spotted to #p1103001#.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolt of the Pigs
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who apparently received some disturbing news.

Was I too late in finding that black shadow? Apparently, the #o1210100#s at the #o1210100# Farm have caused a revolt. The agent believes that one of Black Mage's men has probably set up a device in the area that causes such chaos. #p1103001# assigned me to defeat the #r#o1210100#s#k and if I happen to come across an item called #b#t4032130##k, then I should bring it back to him. 

#o1210100##r #a207071##k 
#o1210101##r #a207072##k 
#i4032130# #t4032130# #b#c4032130# / 1#k

I was able to eliminate #o1210100#s and prevented their revolt from being carried out any further. After handing in the #p1103001# to #t4032130#, he had a disturbed look on his face. I wonder what's going on.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Henesys Complete
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103001##k of #m100000000#, who seems eager to talk to me.
#p1103001# told me that would conclude my assignments here in #m100000000# and asked me to hand in the Mission Report and #t4032131# to #b#p1101002##k in #bErev#k.
After receiving the report and the doll, #p1101002# told me to go train to make myself more useful while he goes through the report.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Kerning City
#p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
I received a new assignment from #p1101002#, which is to travel to #b#m103000000##k of Victoria Island and provide support for #bAgent #p1103002##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Stranger's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Mystery of Naora Hospital
I heard there is someone in Naora Hospital in Kerning City...

I met #b#p1052105##k in Naora Hospital in Kerning City. #b#p1052105##k wanted to see how the surgery went, but there was no mirror. #b#p1052105##k asked me to hunt down a #bWild Boar#k and collect #b20#t4031155##k...\n\n#t4031155# #c4031155#/20
For the Stranger I met in Naora Hospital, I actually collected #t4031155# and brought back to her.

string.name: name
string.value: Hidden Inside the Trash Can
I'll need to talk to Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# about the next assignment.

#p1103002# told me that sources confessed to a huge number of #bstrange dolls#k dumped inside the #m103000000# subway, and that he wanted me to bring back one of those. I'll have to dig in through the #btrash can inside the subway#k in #m103000000#... \n\n#i4032136# #t4032136# #b#c4032136# / 1#k
I managed to find #t4032136# and gave it to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Fake Doll
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# found a new information he'd like to share with me.

#p1103002# told me that the dolls inside the trash can were fake and that the real dolls may have already been absorbed by #o1210103#s. He then assigned me to defeat #r100 #o1210103#s#k and bring back #b30 #t4032137#s#k...

#o1210103##r #a207111##k 
#i4032137# #t4032137# #b#c4032137# / 30#k
I was able to eliminate the #o1210103#s and bring back #t4032137#s to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: I Shall Pick 'Em All!
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# had something to tell me.

#p1103002# said there were so many dolls with him that he couldn't tell which one was which and wound up asking #b#p9000008##k to sort out the dolls for him. My job is to go up to him and ask for the real doll from the pile.\n\n#i4032138# #t4032138# #b#c4032138# / 1#k
I was able to score the real #t4032138# from #p9000008# and handed it to #p1103002#.

string.name: name
string.value: A Deal With Mr. Pickall
Per #p1103002#'s order, I better go up to #b#p9000008##k and ask for the real #t4032138#.

#p9000008# told me he couldn't give me the real doll because he wasn't paid a dime for this work. In fact, he wanted me to pay him the fee for it. He even suggested that if I couldn't pay for it, then I'll have to work. I'll need to give him #b#t4032139##k, which is very common among #r#o1210103#s#k, in order for him to cough up the real doll. \n\n#i4032139# #t4032139# #b#c4032139# / 10#k
I was able to give #t4032139# to #p9000008# and received the real #t4032138#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Kerning City Complete
Agent #b#p1103002##k of #m103000000# told me he had something to tell me...
#p1103002# told me this wraps up my work in #m103000000# and that I'll need to hand in the Mission Report and #t4032140# to #b#p1101002##k.

After receiving the report and the doll, #p1101002# told me one of Black Mage's men is indeed a Puppeteer, and that this may all stem from him. He then told me this still needs more investigation and asked me to train harder so that I can make myself useful for the upcoming missions.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Ellinia
It looks like #p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
I received a new assignment from #p1101002#, which is to head over to #b#m101000000##k of Victoria Island and provide support for #bAgent #p1103003##k.
I wound up meeting Agent #p1103003# at #m101000000#...

string.name: name
string.value: Maybe it's Arwen!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me she suspects that #b#p1032100##k might be controlled by the Puppeteer, and asked me to give Arwen #b#t4032142##k, which can be purchased at #b#m101010103##k. Her theory was that if Arwen is controlled, then she would dread it; if Arwen is free, then she'd be ecstatic over it... \n\n#i4032142# #t4032142# #b#c4032143# / 1#k
Arwen thanked me for giving her #t4032142#, for she was very thirsty at the time and proceeded to finish it in one giant gulp.

string.name: name
string.value: The Plants are Suspicious!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me she's starting to worry about the #bplants that are growing in #m101010000##k. It looks like she plucked out a fruit from one of those plants and got violently sick. She suspects that one of the Black Mage's men injected some poison in the plants. I better pluck out a fruit to see if it's true. \n\n#i4032143# #t4032143# #b#c4032143# / 10#k
I gave #t4032143# to #p1103003#. After looking through the charts, #p1103003# found out that the fruits that are being produced at this time of the year can cause food poisoning...

string.name: name
string.value: Maybe it's Grendel!
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000# about a new assignment.

#p1103003# told me #p1032001# looked very suspicious. She said she always had #p1032001# in mind every since she found out about his past, which involved dabbling with dangerous black magic. She then assigned me to visit #b#m101000003##k, where #p1032001# lives, and wanted me to conduct a #bfull search in his house#k while #p1032001# is away.

While conducting a full search in #p1032001#'s house, I was ambushed by a black shadow. Thankfully, I came out alive. After telling her what happened, #p1103003# stopped and started thinking about something...

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Ellinia Complete
I better talk to Agent #b#p1103003##k of #m101000000#, who wanted to talk to me about something.

#p1103003# told me this makes it clear that #p1032001# is not guilty and that this assignment has been wrapped up for now. She then handed me the Mission Report on the black shadow and asked me to hand it in to #b#p1101002##k.

I handed #t4032144# in to #p1101002#. #p1101002# seemed worried that the power of the Puppeteer seems to be growing by day and that I'll need to get stronger in order to one day stop the Puppeteer cold in his tracks. He then ordered me to keep training until the next assignment becomes available.

string.name: name
string.value: Stranger's Identity

string.name: parent
string.value: Mystery of Naora Hospital

The Stranger I met in Naora Hospital was shockingly a Ghost! She was waiting for Naora, not knowing that she herself is dead... This Stranger wouldn't believe that she is dead. She told me that she needs #b100 Charms of the Undead#k in order to live again, and asked me to find it. Can she really live again with just these...? \n\n#t4000008# #c4000008#/100

#p1052105# who I met in Naora Hospital was a Ghost. She was staying in the Hospital, not knowing that she's dead. She couldn't live again with #t4000008#. It seems that she already knew she couldn't make it...I really hope she returns to heaven.

string.name: name
string.value: Before the Mission in Perion Begins
It looksl ike #p1101002# is trying to give me a new assignment. I wonder what it is...
#p1101002# finally gave me a new assignment, but before even starting, he wanted me to get to Ereve so I could make a delivery to someone else...
#p1101002# finally gave me a new assignment, but before even starting, he wanted me to get to Ereve and pick up an item for the upcoming assignment.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Perion
#b#p1101002##k told me there's an item that I'll need to deliver that is crucial to this upcoming assignment.
#p1101002# wound up giving me #t4032145#. He told me I'll soon discover the reason for the item and asked me to deliver #t4032145# to #bAgent #p1103004##k of #b#m102000000##k.
I wound up giving #t4032145# to #p1103004#.

string.name: name
string.value: Wooden Mask
I better ask Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# about the new assignment.

#p1103004# told me something's not right in #b#m101030102##k, and wanted me to go there and eliminate #r#o2230110#s#k. After eliminating #r#o2230110##k, I also have to bring back #b#t4032146##k... 

#o2230110##r #a207221##k 
#i4032146# #t4032146# #b#c4032146# / 1#k
I was able to eliminate #o2230110#s and brought back #b#t4032146##k. #p1103004# had a serious look on his face while looking at the detector...

string.name: name
string.value: Stone Mask
Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# has a new assignment for me...

#p1103004# told me this time, the detector reacted in the direction of #b#m101030103##k and assigned me to eliminate #r200 #o2230111#s#k there, while bringing back #b#t4032147##k. 

#o2230111##r #a207231##k 
#i4032147# #t4032147# #b#c4032147# / 1#k
I was able to eliminate all the #o2230111#s. #p1103004# then proceeded to look at the detector again...

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Perion Complete
Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# wants to talk to me about something...
#p1103004# told me the assignments for #m102000000# are now complete and asked that I turn in the Mission Report along with #t4032148# to #b#p1101002##k.
I wound up giving #p1101002# #p1103004#'s report and #t4032148#.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission in Sleepywood
#p1101002# wants to talk to me about an assignment...

#p1101002# told me he detected a strong force of darkness around #b#m105040300##k and wanted me to look into #r#o9300285##k. The problem is there's not a single agent currently assigned there, so he wanted me to gather up the information from scratch by myself...
I was able to gather up all the information and write up a report to #p1101002#.

string.name: name
string.value: Information From Those Who Remember
Maybe #b#p1061011##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061011# told me he can give a useful information on #o9300285# if I can eliminate #r250 #o2230101#s#k for him. \n\n#o2230101##r #a207261##k
According to #p1061011#, #o9300285# is a little boy whose name is #r#p1104000##k...

string.name: name
string.value: Sabitrama's Information
Maybe #b#p1061005##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061005# told me he can give a useful information on #o9300285# if I can eliminate #r200 #o2230100#s#k for him. \n\n#o2230100##r #a207271##k
According to #p1061005#, #o9300285# lives somewhere around the Cave of #o2230100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Chrishrama's Information
Maybe #b#p1061000##k of #m105040300# can tell me something useful about #o9300285#...
#p1061000# told me he can give a useful information on #o9300285# if I can collect #b100 #t4000015#s#k for him. \n\n#i4000015# #t4000015# #b#c4000015# / 100#k
According to #p1061000#, #o9300285# seems to doodle in front of #p1061006# when busy. If I look closely into #p1061006#, I may be able to find something...

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Statue's Information
According to #p1061000#, there may be some clues of #o9300285# on the surface of #b#p1061006##k. I'll have to talk to #p1061006#.
Something seems to be written on it, but it's hard to see. I'll have to move #p1061006# around.
At the back of #p1061006#, I found some writings on it with a horrible handwriting. It said: The password is XXXXXXX is a genius #o9300285#!

string.name: name
string.value: Camila's Gem
I heard that #p1012108# in Henesys is worrying about something...
I met #p1012108# in Henesys. #p1012108# asked me to deliver #b#t4031156##k to #b#p1012107##k for her, because she is afraid. I heard I could get to #m900000000# through #m100030000#...
I delivered #p1012108# to #p1012107#. I'm sure they are really close freind, since they give what's most precious to them. I wish I could meet a friend like that during my journey...

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Puppeteer!
I better report the information gathered in #m105040300# to #b#p1101002##k.

#p1101002# told me he's certain the boy carrying the doll is indeed #o9300285#, and assigned me to enter the #bhome of #o9300285##k at the Cave of #o2230100# and defeat #r#p1104000# the #o9300285##k. \n\n#o9300285##r #a207301##k

I was able to defeat #p1104000# the #o9300285#. Afterwards, when I asked #p1101002# of the word "Black Wings" that I picked up during our battle, he revealed that the Black Wings are a group that follows the Black Mage and #p1104000# was also a member as well.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Maple History Book
Jay of Henesys has something to ask regarding the Maple History Book.

#p1012109# of Henesys asked if I could find #b#t4031157##k, #b#t4031158##k, #b#t4031159##k and give them to #b#p2041022##k of Ludibrium. #b#t4031157##k was the one that went missing in on the way to Orbis; #b#t4031158##k being kept at a treasure chest at Grendel the Really Old's house in Ellinia; and #b#t4031159##k, apparently being stolen by the Chronos
I gathered up all 3 Maple History Books, gathered them up, and handed them to #p2041022# of Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Maple History Book 2
I found all 3 Maple History Books, and gave them all to #p2041022#. He gave me #t4031160# and told me to go see #b#p1012109##k.
I showed #p1012109# the #t4031160# that Tigun gave me, and in return, he gave me #t1012109:#. As a sign of thanks for finding the history book, #p1012109# gave me #t1012109:#.

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle's Special Sauce

string.name: parent
string.value: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry

I received the special sauce from Estelle near Ellinia. I guess I have to return to Mrs. Ming Ming with #b20 Pig's Head and 60 Octopus' Legs#k. 

Pig's Head : #c4000017#/20
Octopus' Legs : #c4000006#/60
Estelle's Special Sauce : #c4031154#/1
I got all the materials that Mrs. Ming Ming asked me to get, and gave it to her. I can't wait to see the village festival!

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Warrior
What do I have to do to make the job advancement as a Warrior? I'll have to go see #p1002101# of Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# of Lith Harbor tells me I can choose to become a #bWarrior#k if I'm at least on #blevel 10#k. He tells me I'll need to see #r#p1022000##k of #rPerion#k ... but how do I get there? I'll have to check on the world map. (#rW#k)
I have learned what it takes to become a true Warrior through #p1022000#. Hope this is the right path I'm taking...

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Bowman
What do I have to do to make the job advancement as a Bowman? I'll have to go see #p1002101# of Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# of Lith Harbor tells me I can choose to become a #bBowman#k if I'm at least on #blevel 10#k. He tells me I'll need to see #r#p1012100##k of #rHenesys#k ... but how do I get there? I'll have to check on the world map. (#rW#k)
I have learned what it takes to become a true Bowman through #p1012100# of Henesys. Hope this is the right path I'm taking...

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Thief
What do I have to do to make the job advancement as a thief, just like #p1052001# of Kerning City? I'll have to go see #p1002101# of Lith Harbor and find out myself.

#p1002101# of Lith Harbor tells me I can choose to become a #bThief#k if I'm at least on #blevel 10#k. He tells me I'll need to see #r#p1052001##k of #rKerning City#k ... but how do I get there? I'll have to check on the world map. (#rW#k)
I have learned what it takes to become a true Thief through #p1052001# of Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of a Magician
What do I have to do to make the job advancement as a Magician? I'll have to go see #p1002101# of Lith Harbor and find out myself.

#p1002101# of Lith Harbor tells me I can choose to become a #bMagicianr#k if I'm at least on #blevel 8#k. He tells me I'll need to see #rGrendel the Really Old#k of #rEllinia#k ... but how do I get there? I'll have to check on the world map. (#rW#k)
I have learned what it takes to become a true Magician through the chief of all wizards, Grendel the Really Old. Hope this is the right path I'm taking...

string.name: name
string.value: A Lesson on Job Advancement
What do I have to do to choose a job of my liking? I'll have to see Olaf of Lith Harbor.
I'll have to listen to #p1002101# carely as he describes the in's and out's of each and every job, because he'll quiz me on it afterwards.

I answered all the questions #p1002101# asked. I'll have to be at least on #blevel 10#k in order to become a #ba Warrior, a Thief, a Bowman, or a Pirate#k, and #blevel 8#k to become a #bMagician#k. Warrior-hopefuls will need to head over to Perion for job-advancement, Kerning City for thief-hopefuls, Ellinia for magician-hopefuls, and Henesys for Bowman-hopefuls.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stump Horror Story
Ayan of Perion says she can't take one step out of town. I wonder why...

I met Ayan of Perion. Apparently, she cannot remember anything about her childhood, and she lives everyday in fear of Stumps. So scared, in fact, that she can't even dare to look at it. Accompanied by this paralyzing fear of Stumps, she cannot take one step out of Perion, and asks me to take them out for her sake. Are they really THAT scary? \n\n#o0130100# #r#a20821##k
I took out Stumps for the sake of Ayan in Perion. She can finally venture outside without having to worry about them!

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus's Hang Glider
Apparently there's someone at Kerning City by the name of #p1052106# that stands on top of a building just staring at the sky 24/7.

I got to meet #b#p1052106##k on top of a building at Kerning City. He seems like a nice guy who has an unquenchable thirst for flying, and he wants to create a Hang Glider to fulfill his dream of flying. He asks me if I can gather up the materials for the Hang Glider, and even though the process of making the Hang Glider seems dubious at best, I can't say no to his sincere desire to fly. I'll need to get him #b50 #t4000042#s, 10 #t4003001#s, and 50 #t4003004#s#k.

#t4000042# #b#c4000042##k/50
#t4003001# #b#c4003001##k/10
#t4003004# #b#c4003004##k/50

I got the materials needed for #p1052106# to make the Hang Glider and realize his dream of flying. I just wonder if Stirge's wings are enough to make the Hang Glider. I don't know if this will really work, though, so I'll check up on him around the time when the Hang Glider should be ready to take flight.

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus and the Balloon
I wonder how Icarus's doing with the glider...maybe I should go check up on him at Kerning City.

Icarus had failed to create a working Hang Glider, and is now attempting to create a flying balloon on his never-ending quest for flight. This looks just as preposterous as his last attempt, but I don't think I can stop him. To make the flying balloon, he needs #b100 #t4000035#s#k and #b10 #t4031164#s#k. Hope this works...

#t4000035# #b#c4000035##k/100
#t4031164# #b#c4031164##k/10

I got the materials needed for #p1052106# to make the flying balloon and realize his dream of flying. I don't know if his "flying balloon" will indeed fly, but there's a chance that it may indeed work. I'll check up on him around the time when the flying balloon should be ready to take flight and see if he's for real this time.

string.name: name
string.value: In search of Wing the Fairy

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill
I wonder how Icarus's doing with the flying balloon...maybe I should go check up on him at Kerning City.

Icarus had failed to make the flying balloon, but his never-ending quest for flight remains. This time he wants to deviate from the scientific approach to flight and opts for the magical approach, and asks me to see his best friend #b#p1032106##k at Ellinia, the town of fairies. Apparently Wing the Fairy knows the way to make #b'#t4031163#'#k...I'll need to see that fairy at Ellinia for Icarus's sake.

string.name: name
string.value: The Ingredients for the Flying Pill

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill

I meet Wing the Fairy at Ellinia, and he doesn't seem to like people in general. How is he best friends with Icarus in the first place?? Anyway, he says in order to make #b#t4031163##k, he'll need #b50 #t4000036#s#k and #b20 #t4031165#s#k. So that's all it takes?

#t4000036# #c4000036##k/50
#t4031165# #c4031165##k/20
As Wing the Fairy asked, I got her mysterious medicine and leaves of witch grass. Could she make Flying Pill with these?

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Flying Pill

string.name: parent
string.value: Icarus and the Flying Pill
#bWing the Fairy#k of Ellinia asked me to take the Flying Pill to Icarus. So this little pill is all it takes to fly? I need to get this to Icarus ASAP.
I got Icarus the Flying Pill that Wing the Fairy of Ellinia made. I hope it works for him.

string.name: name
string.value: The Reason Behind the Mushroom Studies
I should go see Bruce in Henesys...

I got to meet Bruce, who has been studying the monsters and animals in general in Henesys. His bright smile and the easy-going demeanor belies the painful fact that his daughter has been missing for some time, and that he's been studying the mushroom monsters for the sake of finding a clue on his daughter's whereabouts. He asks me if I can help him out, and I just can't say no to a worthy cause like this...

#t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/10 
#t4000001# #b#c4000001##k/40
I helped Bruce gather up the materials necessary for his studies. Will these help him find his daughter?

string.name: name
string.value: I Need Help on My Homework!
Whenever I walk past Wing the Fairy of Ellinia, he seems to be asking for help. I wonder what it is...

Wing the Fairy of Ellinia seems to have a general disdain for humans. Definitely not the kind of attitude I expect from someone in need of help. He asked me if I can get him 30 tree branches, 30 squishy liquids, and 10 slime bubbles. He needs them so he can make a potion for his homework. 

#t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/30 
#t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/30 
#t4000010# #b#c4000010##k/10
I helped Wing the Fairy of Ellinia with his homework. I have no idea how that potion works, though.

string.name: name
string.value: I'm Bored 1

string.name: parent
string.value: I'm Bored
I should go see Icarus, who's at the top of a building in Kerning City. He seems to be bored out of his mind.
I got to talk to Icarus of Kerning City. Just what exactly is he doing staring aimlessly at the sky anyway? He seemed to be really bored, and asked me if I can answer his set of questions.
I answered all the questions that Icarus of Kerning City asked. That was easy.

string.name: name
string.value: I'm Bored 2

string.name: parent
string.value: I'm Bored
I answered all the questions that Icarus of Kerning City asked. That was easy.

I answered all of Icarus's questions, but he still seemed bored out of his mind. He asked me if I could get him a toy that he could play around with. 

 #t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/40 
#t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/40
I had fun playing around with Icarus.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter 1

string.name: parent
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter
I wonder how Bruce is doing in Henesys these days...

I met up with Bruce in Henesys, and he had great news: He finally found his daughter!!! There was one problem, however: She seems to be suffering from amnesia, Bruce gave me a toy that his daughter played around while growing up, and asked me if I can give that to her.
I found Ayan and gave her the toy sword.

string.name: name
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter 2

string.name: parent
string.value: I Need to Find My Daughter

Amazingly, Ayan recovered from amnesia with the help of the toy sword. That's just amazing!!! The only thing left now is for Ayan and Bruce to finally meet up, but first, I got to get this letter from Ayan to Bruce.
I'm so glad that Ayan got her memory back. I'm even gladder that Bruce got to finally see his daughter again! What a moment...

string.name: name
string.value: Taking Out the Alligators 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Alligators at the Swamp
I heard something happened to the tribesmen of Perion. I should go talk to Ayan about this.

I met up with Ayan in Perion. She told me that a few days ago, a group of tribesmen went hunting in the swamps and wound up being ambushed by a group of alligators. She was worried about the sudden surge of alligators taking over the swamps and asked me to take them out before they spawn out of control. I'll have to kill #b250 #o3110100#s#k and #b40 #o2130103#s#k while taking #b20 #t4000034##k along the way.

#o3110100# #r#a20942##k
#o2130103# #r#a20941##k
#t4000034# #b#c4000034##k/20

The tribesmen of Perion got ambushed by the alligator herd at the swamps, so Iyan asked if I could help take care of the alligators. I responded by taking out #b250 #o3110100#s#k and #b40 #o2130103#s#k. Hopefully this will put some peace back into the swamp.

string.name: name
string.value: Taking Out the Alligators 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Alligators at the Swamp
Ayan of Perion is desperately looking for me. Is something wrong??

I found Ayan, and she seemed to be in a state of panic. She was walking around the swamp when she ran into a bigger, stronger, and more dangerous group of alligators than the previous ones. She ran back to Perion and had been looking for me ever since, so I could help her out once more. This time, I'll need to kill #b120 #o5130103#s#k and take #b50 #t4000033#s#k along the way. 

#o5130103# #r#a20951##k
#t4000033# #b#c4000033##k/ 50
I took out 120 #o5130103#s from the swamps, just like the way Ayan asked me to. I'll have to revisit that spot from time to time and take out the alligators before they spawn out of control.

string.name: name
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger I

string.name: parent
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger
Apparently a strange vibe has been permeating deep inside the dungeon of Victoria Island. I should meet up with the Insignificant Being for details.
I need to gather up 33 Cold Steam from Cold Eye that'll be used in a spell that can only be conducted by the Insignificant Being.\n\n#t4031212# #b#c4031212#/33#k
The Insignificant Being finally gave me a chance. Where can I gether up the items needed for the spell?

string.name: name
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger II

string.name: parent
string.value: A Spell that Seals Up a Critical Danger
The Insignificant Being said he needs to gather up the ingredients necessary to use as a spell to seal up the danger that's been spread all over the deep regions of the Dungeon.

I need to gather up the items that the Insignificant Being needs to seal up the curse. The items are: 33 Wild Kargo's Spirit Rocks, 18 Tauromacis Spirit Rocks, and 18 Taurospear Spirit Rocks ... 

#t4031213# #b#c4031213#/33#k
#t4031215# #b#c4031215#/18#k
#t4031214# #b#c4031214#/18#k
I gathered up the spirit rocks for Wild Kargo, Taurmacis, and even Taurospear. Is there more left?

string.name: name
string.value: Camila's Lost Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...
Apparently, Camila of Henesys lost something...

She was devastated that her friend, who lives far from here, sent her a letter, only to be stolen by the notorious Curse Eye's. She was crying as she asked me for help. I may have to find the letter for the sake of Camila, but where is that girl?\n\n#t4031239# #b#c4031239##k/1
I recovered Camila's letter that had been stolen from the Curse Eye's. It should be fun writing letters to people far from me...

string.name: name
string.value: Two Ways to Get to Korean Folk Town

string.name: parent
string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...

The letter that was sent to Camila was written by her pen pal, and it said she might not be able to write her again. Camila sensed something wrong might have happened to her friend, and asked me if I could visit her at Korean Folk Town, where she lived, and check on her.
At Korean Folk Town, I was able to meet Camila's pen pal, Kong Ji. She looked ecstatic after I gave her Camila's reply letter.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Missing Kid 1
You hear someone scream from the ark, saying something about a kid that's gone missing. The ark can't leave until the kid's on board. What should you do?

#p1209000# is pleading with you to find the child. The kid's apparently lost somewhere in the forest. She says you're the only one who even has a chance of succeeding... #bSo you'd better go into the forest and look for him!#k
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You'd better take him back to the ark.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Missing Kid 2
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You should take him back to the ark.
You barely managed to find the kid deep in the forest. You should take him back to the ark.
You barely managed to rescue the kid. There's not much time left! The ark must leave before the Black Mage attacks!

string.name: name
string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Sky
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the sky?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the skypath and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then to #bLudibrium#k? And once I get there, I'm supposed to walk my way down there through #bHelios Tower#k. That's pretty far...

string.name: name
string.value: The Return of the Hero
Where is this? What's going on? You don't even know who you are.

#p1202001# seems to be really excited at having met a hero. A hero? Who…you? Judging from what #p1201000# is saying, maybe you really were a hero in your past life. But you have no recollection of it…

Since drinking the potion, your HP recovered quite a bit. You still don't know what's going on, but considering how nicely everyone's been treating you, they must have good intentions. You should have no trouble going back to town now...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to 'The Weapon That Disappeared' quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Weapon
You should talk to #b#p1202002##k on your way back to town.
#p1202002# tells you it's an honor to meet a real hero and pleads with you to say hello to his brother #b#p1202003##k, who's also eager to meet a hero.
#p1202003# said that a true hero should never be without a weapon and gave you a sword. A hero without a weapon? Were you really a hero to begin with?

string.name: name
string.value: Abilities Lost
You should talk to #b#p1202004##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202004# says that it makes perfect sense that you don't know how to hold a weapon, since you've lost your memory. He then tells you that maybe battling a monster would jog your memory and asks you to defeat #r#o9300383##k. You wonder if you can do it.
You defeated #o9300383#, but it hasn't jogged any memories. You have a feeling that your skills and abilities were lost, just like your memories. What kind of a hero are you if you have no abilities?

string.name: name
string.value: A Gift for the Hero
You should talk to #b#p1202005##k, standing on the road to town.

#p1202005# confesses that he's always wanted to build one particular gift for a hero and that he's stored all the necessary components in a box. He asks you to break open the box and bring him the items inside. Break boxes by swinging at them with regular attacks, then collect the #b#t4032309##k and #b#t4032310##k.
You received a chair from #p1202005#. #p1202005# encouraged you by telling you that you are still a hero even though you've lost your powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Account
Now that you're safely in town, you should listen to #b#p1201000#'s#k account of what happened in the past, and how you became a hero in the first place.

According to #p1201000#, a few hundred years ago, a group of #bheroes#k valiantly fought against the #rBlack Mage#k who controlled Maple World. Apparently, you're one of them. But because of the Black Mage's curse, you lost your memories and abilities, and was frozen in ice until you were awakened recently.

According to #p1201000#, a few hundred years ago, a group of #bheroes#k valiantly fought against the #rBlack Mage#k, who controlled Maple World. Apparently, you're one of them. But because of the Black Mage's curse, you lost your memories and abilities, and was frozen in ice until you were awakened recently.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 1

#p1201000#'s debriefing allowed you to understand the gist of what happened between the heroes and the Black Mage. You have a hunch there may be another showdown with the Black Mage down the road, and that you'll be an important part of it. You should see what #b#p1201000##k thinks you should do next.

#p1201000# tells you that you'll have to do everything you can to regain your abilities. First, however she suggests you warm up, seeing how you were frozen in ice for hundreds of years. The first level of basic training is monster hunting. You'd better head to #b#m140020000##k and start hunting.
You were able to defeat the #o0100131#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 2
Basic Training continues. If you want to start the second stage of Basic Training, you should talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that this time you have to go to #b#m140020100##k and defeat some #r#o0100132#s#k. Come to think of it, #p1201000# seems different from the time you first saw her, back when she had that mystical aura about her...
You defeated the #o0100132#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Training 3
Basic Training continues. If you want to start the third stage of Basic Training, you should talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# wants to step up the intensity of the training and asks you to defeat #b#o0100133#s#k. This is getting more intense, but when you mentioned that to #p1201000#, your protests were ignored. Shoot, you'd better just head over to #b#m140020200##k.
You defeated the #o0100133#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Basic Fitness Test
You think you have gained some much needed stamina through training. You should talk to #b#p1201000##k and receive the test for the final stage of your Basic Fitness Training.
#p1201000# told you battle #r#o0100134#s#k. This time, you need to head to the other side, to the west side of town where #b#m140010200##k is. Fortunately, that doesn't seem too hard.
You eliminated the #o0100134#s. You can see how much your stamina and power have improved. What next?

string.name: name
string.value: Korean Folk Town : Through the Ocean
How about going to the Korean Folk Town through the ocean?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Camila said she'll give me a few essential items for the trip. What must those be?

Through Camila's request, I have decided to travel to Korean Folk Town through the ocean and meet her pen pal, Kong Ji. Okay, so I first go from #bEllinia#k to #bOrbis#k, then from #bOrbis Tower#k all the way down to #bAqua Road#k? I think she told me to take the #bDolphin Taxi#k at Aquarium...

string.name: name
string.value: Nella's Dream

string.name: parent
string.value: Fanzy the Mysterious Cat
Apparently, #p1052103# of Kerning City had a weird dream ...
I heard a really weird dream story from #b#p1052103##k, who lived in Kerning City. She ran into a cat in the middle of a green forest full of trees... and she can't tell if it's a dream or for real.
In the middle of the forest in #m101000000#, I found the mysterious cat that #p1052103# had seen in her dream.

string.name: name
string.value: Fanzy's Red Furball

string.name: parent
string.value: Fanzy the Amusing Cat

The mysterious cat that I ran into in the middle of Ellinia forest introduced itself as Fanzy, and it's a cat that is raised by a fairy living in Ellinia Forest. A few days ago, while hanging out in the forest, it lost the #b#t4031273##k that's been given by its master. Fanzy really wanted me to find it for it, so in the middle of the forest, I better find #r#o0210100##k, fight to get #b#t4031273##k back, then bring them back to Fanzy with my pet by my side for a handsome reward... \n\n#t4031273# #b#c4031273##k / 1
I brought the #t4031273# back from #o0210100# to #p1040002#, and to my delight, #p1040002# increased the closeness level between my pet and me.

string.name: name
string.value: DANGER! <1-G. Mushroom>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere Deep in the Forest...
Eliminate #b99#k Green Mushrooms, then find "The Rememberer." \n\n#o1110100# #r#a21051##k
I tried eliminating the Green Mushrooms all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: DANGER! <2-H. Mushroom>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere around Ant Tunnel...
Eliminate #b99#k #o2110200#s, then find "The Rememberer." \n\n#o2110200# #r#a21061##k
I tried eliminating the #o2110200#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere around Ant Tunnel...
Eliminate #b99#k #o2230101#s, then find "The Rememberer." \n \n#o2230101# #r#a21071##k
I tried eliminating the #o2230101#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: POLLUTED! <1-Evil Eye>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere around The Cave of Evil Eye...
Eliminate #b99#k #o2230100#s, then find "The Rememberer." \n\n#o2230100# #r#a21081##k
I tried eliminating the #o2230100#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: POLLUTED! <2-Curse Eye>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere Deep in the Forest...
Eliminate #b99#k #o3230100#s, then find "The Rememberer." \n\n#o3230100# #r#a21091##k
I tried eliminating the #o3230100#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: POLLUTED! <3-Jr. Boogie>
I heard there's a warning sign on monsters somewhere around The Cave of Evil Eye...
Eliminate the Jr. Boogie's you'll find at The Cave of Evil Eye and bring back #b10#k horns of Jr. Boogie to "The Rememberer" as proof... \n\n#t4000067# #b#c4000067##k/10
The dungeon now features strange monsters such as Jr. Boogie. Wonder if there's more coming...

string.name: name
string.value: The Five Heroes
In order to begin real training, you must first figure out which of the five heroes you were, but you don't remember anything… You'd better discuss this with #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# tells you while she was excavating heroes from ice, she found a weapon used by one of the heroes. She placed it in town. She wonders if it was yours. If it was, then you would be #bAran, the hero that used a polearm#k...

#p1201000# told you while she was excavating heroes from ice, she found a weapon used by one of the heroes. She placed it in town. She wondered if it was yours. If it was, then you would be #bAran, the hero that used a polearm#k...

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Polearm-Wielding Hero

Apparently, a hero's weapon can recognize its owner, which means the weapon would react the moment you touched it...if you were indeed the hero that wielded a polearm, that is. You should head to town and click on #b#p1201001##k.

The moment you touch the #p1201001#, you feel memories flood through you, but you aren't sure if you're really reminiscing or just imagining things. You should try holding the #p1201001# one more time.

You remembered a time when you held the weapon, flashbacks of gripping the polearm in your two hands…while standing in front of the Black Mage. Yes, you were Aran, the warrior that wielded the polearm to perfection.

I tried eliminating the #o3230100#s all-together, but the number didn't seem to decrease at all.

string.name: name
string.value: Planting Trees
I heard #p1022006# is looking for ways to liven up the barren grounds of Perion.

Thanks to the excavation project, Perion and its surrounding areas have been rapidly deteriorating. To liven up the area, #p1022006# wanted me to get him Seedlings to plant around the area. Get #p1022006# #b54 #t4000195#s#k from #b#o1140100#s#k at #rExcavation Sites#k. \n\n#t4000195# #b#c4000195##k/54
I defeated #o1140100# and collected #t4000195#. #p1022006# promised to liven up the currently-barren Perion by planting lots of trees around the area, and he'll be the first to start it.

string.name: name
string.value: Shawn the Excavator's Request
#p1022006#, who resides at the East Rocky Mountain, said Shawn the excavator asked him for a favor...

Lately, the excavation site has been hit with an unknown monster. As a result, #p1022006# requested that I study the reason behind the monster's creation. To conduct the research, I'll have to collect #b5 each of #t4000196# and #t4000197##k that #b#o2230110##k and #b#o2230111##k use. 

#t4000196# #b#c4000196##k/5 
#t4000197# #b#c4000197##k/5
He said studying #t4000196# and #t4000197# will take some time. I better wait til it gets done with.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate Monsters from the Site
#p1022006# asked me to wait while he's analyzing #t4000196# and #t4000197#.

#p1022006# seemed shocked to find out what he had found out through studying #t4000196# and #t4000197#, but he didn't want to divulge the information on me. He wanted me to first eliminate the monsters, so I'll do that. 

#o2230110# #r#a21182##k
#o2230111# #r#a21181#
Winston claimed the monsters have decreased dramatically, but I disagree. Not only that, but I felt a strange vibe around the excavation site. What would that be...

string.name: name
string.value: Notice from the Excavation Team
Someone's telling me there's an urgent notice posted on the bulletin board at the excavation camp.

I read the notice posted on the board at #m101030104#. Apparently, many of the excavators were attacked by the Army of Skeletons around the tomb site, and wanted someone to eliminate #r200 Skeleton soldiers, 100 Skeleton officers, and 40 Skeleton commanders#k. In addition, the board stated that as evidence, whoever eliminated those monsters will have to bring #b60 ribs, 40 pelvic bones, and 20 horse skulls#k. 

#o5150001# #r#a21193##k
#o6230602# #r#a21191##k
#o7130103# #r#a21192##k

#t4000206# #b#c4000206##k/60
#t4000207# #b#c4000207##k/40
#t4000208# #b#c4000208##k/20
I eliminated the skeletons at the tomb site and collected their bones to show them to Shawn the excavator.

string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest
#p1032001#, the chief of #m101000000#, apparently wants my help. I better go see\n#p1032001#.
I received a request from the chief of #m101000000# and headed over to see #p1032001# as their messenger. #p1032001# was worried I may get lost on the way.
#m101000000#'s chief #p1032001# needed a favor, so I went. #p1032001# said when I go to #b#m240000000##k in Ossyria, and I need to see #m240000000#. I'd better hurry!

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of Its Rightful Owner
As soon as you reach Level 30, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you…
#p1201000# tells you that the polearm is acting strange and that it might be trying to send you a message. You'd better head to #b#m140000000##k and check on the state of the #bpolearm#k.
Standing in front of the polearm is a strange-looking boy who you've never met before. Who is that? That kid does look a bit familiar. What? That boy is #p1201001#? No way…!

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Mirror of Desire
The polearm introduces itself as Maha and demands that you remember him. What are you supposed to do? You'd better consult #b#p1201000##k about this.

#p1201000# states that the voice is really #p1201001#'s voice, and that you need to remember something about #p1201001# to appease him. If you head west of #b#m140000000# to #m140030000##k, you'll find the Mirror of Desire, which has the power to display whatever you desire. Maybe you should check it.

You were able to faintly encounter your past through the mirror. You saw the time you first got your polearm. When you mentioned the story, #p1201002# seemed relieved. Thanks to #p1201002#'s help, you were able to recover some of your dormant abilities.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Ultimate Weapon

You look into the Mirror of Desire. There's a split second when you think you've lost your mind, but then… Where are you? Are you in the past? This feels like deja vu. You remember this, from a long, long time ago, when you begged #b#p1203000##k to make you the best polearm in the world.

When you ask #p1203000# for the best polearm available, #p1203000# takes a long look at you and says you'll need to prove your worth. Your mission is to battle the #r#o9001012#s and defeat them. You also have to gather #b#t4032311#s#k.

You managed to gather all the #t4032311#s required. #p1203000# liked you fearless attitude, and handed you the polearm wrapped in cloth. The polearm, #p1201002#, and… Unfortunately, that was the extent of your memories.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Messenger of the Fairy Forest

After some convincing from the chief of #m101000000# #p1032001#, I have decided to leave #m101000000# as the messenger of #p1032001#. #p1032001# warned me that I may get lost on the way there since it's my first time there, and gave me #tLeafre Guidebook# as well as a flight ticket. By the way, what's this item that I'm suppose to deliver to Tatamo?

I received a request from #p1032001#, the chief of #m101000000#, to head to a place called #b#m240000000##k of Ossyria. #m240000000# is a town entrenched in Minar Forest somewhere in Ossyria, and I was told to deliver an item to the chief of the town, Chief Tatamo, for him. I'll have to deliver the #b#t4031345##k that #p1032001# gave to #b#p2081000##k of #b#m240000000##k.

I managed to deliver the Pure Water of Protection that Chief Tatamo requested to Grendel The Really Old, the chief of Ellinia. As a sign of gratitude, Chief Tatamo gave me 2 magic seeds that allows me to teleport between Ellinia and Leafre.

string.name: name
string.value: Manji and the Secret Group
I heard #p1022002# of #m102000000# was visited by a group of strange people the other day...

#p1022002# told me a group of strangers came up to him and asked for help. He politely declined, but felt bad about it, and have been thinking about it ever since. He desired to send someone to help them for him, and asked me to prove my worth to him so he can send me there.\n\n#o2130100# #r#a21221#
I took care of 15 #o2130100#s, gaining approval from #p1022002#.

string.value: Assignment of a Sand Crew
#p1022002# of #m102000000# seems to have something to tell me...
#p1022002# received a word from a group of strangers to relay a message to me. #b'Go visit #p2012019# of #m200000000#.'#k. #p1022002# tells me he doesn't know anything else.
At #m200000000#, I met #p2012019#, carrying a small box around its neck.

I gave the box that was hanging around #p2012019#'s neck safely to #p2101002# of #m260000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: To the Desert...
I'm now ready to go to whereever #p1022002# is going to take me. I should go see #p1022002# now.
Where is #p1022002# going to take me...
#p1022002# have sent me to Nihal Desert.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's First Training Session
I became a Warrior! Have no idea at all what to do. Let's get help from former Warrior trainer #b#p1022000##k.
#p1022000# suggests to hunt monster as a basic training. He told me to beat #r#o0130100# 20#k. #o0130100# lives in #m102000000# town so he said it's easy to find them.\n\n#o0130100# #r#a21281##k
I beat off 20 #o0130100# and reported to #p1022000#..simple eh?

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Second Training Session
With help from a former Warrior trainer, I became stronger but still have a long way to go. Let's go to #b#p1022000##k again.
#p1022000# told me to continue hunting monsters as I still lack basic training. This time, I have to hunt #r50 #o0130100##k....\n\n#o0130100# #r#a21291##k
I've done 50#o0130100# and reported #p1022000#. Haha~all 50 monsters...I'm getting stronger!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Third Training Session
I'm getting used to being a Warrior..but still have a long way to go. #b#p1022000##k wants to help me out..
#p1022000# told me that a Warrior needs to have endurance and patience. He ordered me to hunt #r80 #o0130100##k . 80 #o0130100# ... Not easy, eh? \n\n#o0130100# #r#a21301##k
I'm done with all 80#o0130100# . Phew... It certainly was not easy.

string.name: name
string.value: A Weapon Never Leaves Its Owner
As soon as you reach Level 70, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you…
#p1201000# tells you that the polearm is acting strange once again and that it might be trying to tell you something. What's the problem this time? You'd better head over to #b#m140000000##k.
#p1201002# told you that a thief came to the island late one night and removed a Red Jade from his body! He asked you to catch the thief and told you that the thief headed toward #m140020300#...

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Catch that Thief!
So what exactly happened to make you return to the island? You'd better go talk to #b#p1201002##k.
You successfully eliminated #o9001013#, but the #t4032312# was nowhere to be found. When #p1201002# found out what happened, he went crazy.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

#p1201002# was devastated to have his #t4032312# stolen! The thief responsible for this mess, #o9001013#, apparently headed toward #m140020300#. Maybe he's planning to escape on a boat. You need to go to #m140020300# and battle #r#o9001013##k.\r\n\r\n#o9001013##r #a213011##k

string.name: name
string.value: Making Red Jade
You think you may have to make a new #t4032312# for #p1201002#, but you don't know where to start, since you don't know what to use or how to make it. Maybe #b#p1201000##k knows a thing or two?
You successfully made a #t4032312#. Thankfully, #p1201002# seemed quite satisfied with it. Having recovered the powers of the Red Jade, #p1201002# unlocked more abilities for you.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

#p1201000# tells you to head over to #m140030000# and use the Mirror of Desire to discover how to make a #t4032312#. That seems to be the only possible solution. Oh well…you should go to #b#m140030000##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032312# #t4032312# #b#c4032312# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Friendship with Yeti

So, you follow #p1201000#'s instructions and look in the Mirror of Desire once more. Your vision gets dark for a second, but then you find yourself in #m211000000#, once again returning to the past. Standing before you is a Yeti in tears. What's going on? You'd better talk to #b#p1203001##k.

#p1203001# thanked you for retrieving his gem and taught you how to make a #t4032312# as a token of his appreciation. #t4032312# can be made using #b1 Dark Crystal, 3 Diamond Ores, and 3 Garnett Ores#k and combining them with the #bMaker Skill#k. Don't forget it when making the #t4032312# for #p1201002#.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

Sniffling heavily, #p1203001# says a thief stole his gem. He is distraught that his red gem is gone, after he had so painstakingly created it. A red gem? It must have something to do with the #t4032312#! You should find the thief on behalf of #p1203001#.

#o9001013##r #a213031##k
#i4032339# #t4032339# #b#c4032339# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Warrior's Last Training Session
Now I look like a Warrior. #b#p1022000##k wanted to help me out with a final training session...
#p1022000# asked me to hunt #r15 #o1110101##k for a test. #o1110101# looks like #o0130100# but much stronger monster. He also tells me not to be too relaxed.\n\n#o1110101# #r#a21311##k
I've wiped out 15 #o1110101#. Wasn't easy but I was successful anyway. Through the training, I feel I'm a real Warrior in front of #p1022000# .

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's First Training Session
I became a Magician! Have no idea at all what to do. Let's get help from my former Magician trainer #b#p1032001##k.
#p1032001# suggests to hunt monster as basic training. He told me to beat #r8 #o0210100##k. He told me that #o0210100# can be easily found in town #m101000000# .. \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21321##k
I beat off 8 #o0210100# and reported to #p1032001#. Simple, eh?

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Second Training Session
With help from the Magician trainer, I became stronger but still have a long way to go. Let's go to #b#p1032001##k again for my second training session.

#p1032001# told me to continue hunting monsters as I'm still training. This time, I have to hunt #r20 #o0210100##k. 20 #o0210100#... I'm a little nervous, but can't stop here!\n\n#o0210100# #r#a21331##k
After eliminating 20 #o0210100# and reported to #p1032001#. #p1032001# looked happy, and even smiled at me!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Third Training Session
I'm getting stronger. #b#p1032001##k suggests another training session as I'm improving gradually .
#p1032001#'s training is to eliminate #r35 #o0210100##k. I've dealt with these many times and have nothing to worry about. Let's go and get #o0210100#. \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21341##k
I hunted down 35 #o0210100# 35. It wasn't easy but I did it! Haha. I think I'm quite good!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Magician's Last Training Session
I've improved a lot. #b #p1032001##k wants to test me!
#p1032001# asked me to hunt #r10 #o1110101##k. #o1110101#, unlike #o0210100#, is much stronger. BE ALERT! \n\n#o1110101# #r#a21351##k
I killed 10 #o1110101#. Still need to be trained, but I think I'm quite a good Magician.

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Bowman's First Training Session
I became a Bowman! I don't know what to do now. My former Bowman trainer #b#p1012100##k will help me.
#p1012100# suggests to hunt monster as a basic training. She told me to beat #r16 #o0210100##k. #o0210100# can be easily found near town #m100000000# she told me.\n\n#o0210100# #r#a21361##k
I eliminated 16 #o0210100# and reported to #p1012100#. Simple, eh?

I got 40 #o0210100# and reported to #p1012100#. 40 is not that many...I hope!

string.value: Beginner Bowman's Third Training Session
I'm getting used to being a Bowman but still need to be trained. #b#p1012100##k wants to help me out.
#p1012100# says Bowman should be calm and have strong willpower. For further training, she ordered me to hunt #r65 #o0210100##k. 65 #o0210100# ... Quite a few... \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21381##k
I got 65 #o0210100# . Phew... Wasn't easy, but I did it!

string.name: name

I'm starting to look like a Bowman. #b#p1012100##k wants to help me out with a final training session...

I'm done with 15 #o1210101#. wasn't easy but successful. I became a real Bowman recognized by former Bowman trainer, Helena.

#p1052001# suggests to hunt monsters as basic training. He told me to defeat #r20 #o130100##k. He told me #o130100# can be easily found near #m103000000# ... \n\n#o130100# #r#a21401##k

string.name: name
string.value: Weapon Starts a Fight… with His Owner?
As soon as you reach Level 120, #b#p1201000##k strikes up a conversation with you…
#p1201000# alerts you that #p1201002# is acting strange once again and urges you to visit #b#m140000000##k immediately. She also warns that she's never seen it act this way…
#p1201002# seemed to be in great pain. What's going on here?

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

string.name: name
string.value: Taming the Polearm
Something must be wrong with the #b#p1201002##k. What's going on, you wonder? Why is he in so much pain?
You were able to defeat the #o9001014#. Once the rage subsided, #p1201002# helped awaken more of your past powers.

string.name: type
string.value: [Job Adv.]

#p1201002# confesses that, because he spent the last few hundred years without a master, the hint of darkness that existed in his heart has begun to spiral out of control in the form of rage. He's begging you to get rid of the rage. Apparently, if you defeat #p1201002#, the rage will stop. It doesn't look easy by any means, but it is what a master must do. You'd better take on the #r#o9001014##k.\r\n\r\n#o9001014##r #a214011##k

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Thief's Second Training Session
I became stronger but have a long way to go. Let's go to #b#p1052001##k again for training.
#p1052001# told me keep hunting monsters as I lacking basic training. He told me to eliminate #r50 #o130100##k... \n\n#o130100# #r#a21411##k
I've eliminated 50 #o130100# and reported to #p1052001#. 50 of them....I'm great, I thought. Then, #p1052001# warned me that I should not let my head swell too big...

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Thief's Third Training Session
I'm getting used to being a Thief but still need to be trained. #b#p1052001##k wants to help me...
#p1052001# said a Thief needs concentration and calmness. For further training, he asked me to get #r80 #o130100#s#k. 80 #o130100#s...that's pretty many. \n\n#o130100# #r#a21421##k
80 #o130100#s were eliminated. It was tough. I need to be trained more...perhaps I should find a training partner.

string.name: name

I look like a Thief. For me, #b#p1052001##k wants to help me out with a final training session...
#p1052001# wants to test me and asked to hunt #r10 #o1120100##k. He told me #o1120100# is the strongest monster in #m103000000# and to be alert. \n\n#o1120100# #r#a21431##k
I hunted down 10 #o1120100#. It was not easy but I was successful. Now finally, #p1052001# won't call me a novice!

During the excavation, Doctor #p1022006# said he heard a rumor about a very old tree living in #m102000000#. However, he had no clue on what kind of tree it was, or where exactly it was located. That's why he's asked me to visit #b#m102000000# village to collect information on this particular tree.#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Old Snail

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail
Heard #bPia#k in #bHenesys#k got her hands on a strange book. What kind of book could it be? Let's go see her.

The book is about the #boldest snail#k in Maple World and its #b#t2210006##k. It looks like Pia is interested in the snail's shell because it makes wishes come true. Jay is the original owner of the book; he must know something about the author. Let's go see him. \n\n#i4161035##t4161035# #b#c4161035#/1#k
Jay said that the author of Legend of the Snail was his great-grandfather, also known as \n#bAlloy, Mrs. Ming Ming's grandfather, Alloy#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Hero of the Story

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Took Jay's advice and visited Mrs. Mingming to ask about Alloy, the author of Legend of the Snail. She said her grandfather's latest letter was about #bWing, the Fairy of Ellina#k, and suggested I go see Wing.
Wing the Fairy recalls Alloy as the human who obtained Mano's shell and prolonged his lifespan. Let's ask some more questions.

string.name: name
string.value: Snail Hunt

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Wing the Fairy not only knew about Alloy, but also knew of the snail with #r#t2210006#, Mano#k. Wing offered to give Mano's location on one condition; save the #bsnail shells#k.

#i4000019##t4000019# #b#c4000019#/10#k
#i4000000##t4000000# #b#c4000000#/10#k
#i4000016##t4000016# #b#c4000016#/10#k
Gave snail shells to Wing the Fairy and in return got information that Mano frequently appeared near the thicket around the beach. Let's go back to #bPia#k.

string.name: name
string.value: A rainbow snail shell that makes wishes come true!?

string.name: parent
string.value: Legend of the Snail

Pia asked me to go to the thicket around the beach and take out #rMano#k. I'm to bring back #b#t2210006##k. So you get to stay here while I do all the work for you again? Don't you think this is a bit too much? I might use all of the #t2210006# for myself!
#t2210006# wasn't an item that makes dreams come true. It turns people who use it into snails. Phew... learned a good lesson not to believe in rumors, otherwise I would be the one crawling about.

string.name: name
string.value: Sacrifice to King Clang

string.name: parent
string.value: Defeat King Clang!
Rumor has it that a fearful monster is lurking about the beautiful #bFlorina Beach#k. #bRiel#k, a girl of the Florina Beach, must know something about this monster.

The terrible monster #rKing Clang#k followed the warm current all the way to Florina Beach. Riel says that beautiful girls are being sacrificed to suppress King Clang's anger. Riel and her sisters, Roel and Rael, have taken a bet on who will be sacrificed to the monster, and asks me to be the judge of their dreadful bet. They can't be serious about this, right?

#y2158# #b#u2158##k
#y2159# #b#u2159##k
#y2160# #b#u2160##k
Helping Riel

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Riel
Riel, Rael and Roel starts betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's first meet with #bRiel#k.

Riel secretly asks to help her win the bet. Her deal is to defeat #r50 Clangs#k. How do I get myself into these situations? I'd better help her with this, and then talk about how ridiculous this bet is.\n\n#o4230104# #r#a21581##k
Defeated all Clangs for Riel.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Roel
Riel, Rael and Roel starts betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's meet with #bRoel#k.

Roel looks just like Riel but with a tougher attitude! Her dare was to take out #r50 Lorangs#k. Roel asks me to help her win the bet. I'd better help her with this, and then talk about how ridiculous this bet is. \n\n#o3230102# #r#a21591##k
Defeated all Lorangs for Roel.

string.name: name
string.value: Helping Rael
Riel, Rael and Roel starts betting on who will be offered to King Clang. The winner gets to be the sacrifice! How can I help these girls get to their senses? Let's meet with #bRael#k.

Shy Rael says her dare was to take out #r50 Torties#k. She doesn't look like a person who'd participate in this kind of bet. Looks can be deceiving. Rael hesitates to ask me to help, but I'd better get this over with and take out those Torties. Then I'll talk about how ridiculous this bet is.\n\n#o4130101# #r#a21601##k
Defeated all Torties for Rael.

string.name: name
string.value: Pucci's Request
#b#p1202007##k, a penguin from #b#m140000000##k, apparently has something to tell you.

#p1202007# says that one of the 'huskies' he was tending was actually a wolf. He doesn't know exactly what happened, but he doesn't want to abandon the infant wolf pup. He wants you to ask around for some tips on how to raise a wolf. Somewhere around Aqua Road, you know that #b#p2060000##k knows a little something about raising wolves...
You were able to meet #p2060000# at #m230010201# of Aqua Road.

string.name: name
string.value: Formula for Your Wolf Pup
You should ask #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k about how to raise a wolf.
Armed with all the ingredients, #p2060000# asked you to wait while she finishes making the #t4032332#.

#p2060000# says that she knows a bit about raising wolves and tells you that she will make #bWolf Pup Formula#k for the weakened baby wolf. The ingredients for the formula include #b#t4000157##k, which can be found on seals, and #t4032331#, which #b#p2060005##k sells.

You should head to the t#b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k and purchase some #t4032331# from #b#p2060005##k.
You purchased the #t4032331#.
#t4032331# costs 10 million mesos. It's a lot to pay, but you gladly pay it, knowing it's what's best for the wolf pup.\r\n\r\n#b10 million mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: Ryko the Wolf Pup
Is the #t4032332# ready? You should talk to #b#p2060000##k of #b#m230010201##k.

You receive the completed #t4032332# from #p2060000#. This should be enough to raise the Wolf Pup for a bit. You should head to #b#m140000000##k right away and give #b#p1202007##k the formula. Pucci is probably waiting somewhere around the #bSnowy Field 2#k.
Having finished the formula, the Wolf Pup seemed to have taken a liking toward you. #p1202007# ended up giving you the wolf pup, which he named #t1902015#, to raise. You vow to take good care of him.

string.name: name
string.value: Wolf Mount
It looks like there are a couple of people who know how to handle Wolf Pups. You should head over to #b#m211000000##k and talk to #b#p2020007##k.
You received the #t1912011# and Mount Skill from #p2020007#. You'll be able to roam through the entire world with this.

#p2020007# has taught you the basics of mounting a wolf! With this, you'll be able to move around faster since you can ride on the wolf's back. Plus you gain valuable bonding time with your wolf. You'll have to gather materials for a saddle, since you won't be able to ride your wolf without one.\r\n\r\n#i4000048# #t4000048# #b#c4000048# / 50#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Wolf
#t1902015# is missing! What should you do? You'd better go to #b#m140000000##k and ask #b#p1202007##k what to do.
You were able to get #t1902015# back. You promise to never, ever lose it again.

#p1202007# says that #t1902015# returned to him in tears and chastised you for not taking better care of it. He then tells you that you need to buy some medication in order to restore poor, weakened #t1902015#'s health.\r\n\r\n#b20,000,000 mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Missing Saddle
You've lost your #t1912011#! What should you do?
After paying the huge service fee and gathering all the materials, you received another #t1912011# from #p2020007#. Better not lose it again!

#p2020007# tells you to gather materials to make another #t1912011# and to also pay a service fee of #b10 million mesos#k for the replacement. What?!

#b10,000,000 mesos#k
#i4000048# #t4000048# #b#c4000048# / 50#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Adolescent Wolf
#b#p1202007##k, a penguin from #b#m140000000##k, wants to talk to you about something.
After listening to everyone's advice on how to raise a wolf, you noticed that your #t1902016# had grown a bit. You need to take good care of your wolf now that it is going through puberty.

According to the data #p1202007# has studied, wolves go through a kind of puberty during their adolescent years. They say that if you don't take special care of wolves during this time, they might not grow properly! #p1202007# then mentions that in order to raise #t1902015# well, you should ask advice from some veterans of wolf-raising.

#y21608# #b(#u21608#)#k
#y21610# #b(#u21610#)#k

string.name: name
string.value: Nanuke's Advice
Since adolescent #t1902015# is now going through puberty, you decide to visit #b#p2060000##k in #b#m230010201##k and ask for some good advice.
You brought the ingredients to #p2060000# and she worked her magic to create some special formula for adolescent wolves.

#p2060000# tells you, when raising an adolescent wolf, it is an absolute must that the wolf be well-fed. She suggests that you make special formula specifically designed for adolescent wolves. #p2060000# volunteers to make some for you. Just gather the ingredients for her.

#i4000182# #t4000182# #b#c4000182# / 200#k
#i4000183# #t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 200#k
#i4000184# #t4000184# #b#c4000184# / 200#k
#i4032333# #t4032333# #b#c4032333# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Kenta's Adolescent Wolf Vitamins
You've decided to prepare a bowl of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins for #t1902015#. Head to #b#m230000003##k to buy ingredients from #b#p2060005##k.
You paid 40 million mesos and bought some of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins from #p2060005#.

#p2060005# claims to have the vitamins necessary for Adolescent Wolves and agrees to sell them to you for 40 million mesos. *Sigh* It's a lot of money, but you should buy them for the sake of your wolf's health and well-being.\r\n\r\n#b40,000,000 mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: A brave Warrior to defeat King Clang appears!

string.name: parent
string.value: Defeat King Clang!
