Complaining Riel soon lightens up and says that a brave warrior must appear to rescue the beautiful girl in distress. Therefore, she asks me to take the role of the warrior and defeat King Clang. What have I done to get myself into these situations!? I'm not the warrior type, but the least I can do is help defeat #rKing Clang#k. \n\n#o5220000# #r#a21611##k
Defeated King Clang and came back to Riel. Riel joyfully says that a brave warrior saved her. It really wasn't for her sake, but Florina Beach is finally back to its peaceful state.

string.name: name
string.value: Scadur's Advice
Since adolescent #t1902015# is going through puberty, you should visit #b#p2020007##k of #b#m211000000##k and ask for some good advice.

#p2020007# says that Wolf Pups need to freely run around fields every once in a while and introduces you to a great spot. Head to #m921110000#, located past the #bWolf-Shaped Rock#k in #b#m211050000##k, and let your pup get some exercise running around the field.
You and your wolf ran across the Field of Wolves and got some good exercise. #t1902015# seemed to have really enjoyed the experience.

string.name: name
string.value: Rebellious Wolf
The wolf that you lost, then recovered, seems to have decreased in size and has quite an attitude too. What should you do? Better head to #b#m140000000##k and talk to #b#p1202007##k.
You paid the educational fees and let the wolf just enjoy himself for once. Fortunately, the wolf seemed to be back to normal size.

According to #p1202007#, a wolf who has lost its way is often unable to get over its trauma, to the point where it shrinks and even acquires a rebellious attitude. The owner, apparently, needs to re-teach the wolf some life lessons. They say you need to invest in some educational expenses...\r\n\r\n#b80,000,000 mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: A Visit from the Wolf Herd
#b#p1202007##k, the penguin from #b#m140000000##k, wants to have a word with you.

A pack of wolves apparently paid a visit to #m140000000# in search of #t1902016#. It must be the family that #t1902016# lost as a pup. You should meet #b#p1202008##k and ask why they're here all of a sudden. #p1202008# is waiting at #m914030000##k, which can be accessed through #b#m140010100#.
You met with #p1202008#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wolves' Test
You need to go see the pack of wolves that are here to meet #t1902016#. They are apparently waiting at #b#m914030000##k, which is connected to #b#m140010100##k.

#p1202008# thanked you for raising their baby pup, but demanded that you return #t1902016# to them. When you told them you weren't interested in returning him, the wolf decided to give you a test to see if you're worthy of raising a wolf. Now you just need to eliminate all the #o9300354#s #p1202008# has summoned.
You passed the test, but #p1202008# still seems to want a word with you...

string.name: name
string.value: A Wolf's Heart
According to #p1202008#, #t1902016# will be in grave danger if you leave it as it is right now. What does that mean? You'd better ask #b#p1202008##k.
You made some #t4032334# and had your #t1902016# drink it. Armed with a stronger heart, #t1902016# has successfully transformed into an adult wolf.

#p1202008# introduced themselves as Silver Wolves, and told you that all Silver Wolves must drink #b#t4032334##k in order to properly grow into adulthood. Otherwise, these adolescent wolves' lives may be in danger. You should gather the ingredients and use the Maker Skill to make #t4032334#!\r\n\r\n#i4032334# #t4032334# #b#c4032334# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Ingredients for the Wolf's Life Water
One of the ingredients for the #t4032334# is the #t4032335#. Maybe #b#p2060005##k at the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells it? You'd better go see #p2060005#.
You purchased the #t4032335# from #p2060005#. You'll use it to make some #t4032334#.
#p2060005# tells you that the #t4032335# that was given by the wolves living in #m230000003# is available, but only at a price. She says it'll cost you 80 million mesos.\r\n\r\n#b80,000,000 mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Chief Wolf's Rage

You may have lost, then found your #t1902017#, but you wish to raise it in a healthy environment. What should you do? You'd better head over to #b#m914030000##k of #b#m140000000##k and see #b#p1202008##k.
You made another #t4032334# and with that,you were able to raise #t1902017# into an adult wolf. You promise to never, ever lose your wolf again.

#p1202008# was angry to see that one of his kids was not raised with respect and gave you a tongue-lashing. He then ordered you to make another #t4032334#...\r\n\r\n#i4032334# #t4032334# #b#c4032334# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Reacquiring the Life Water Ingredients
You need to make the #t4032334# again. You know #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells this so you'd better go see #p2060005# for another #t4032335#.
You paid #p2060005# 100 million mesos and purchased the #t4032335#... You'd better make some #t4032334# right now.
#p2060005# tells you it'll cost you 100 million mesos to buy the #t4032335# because the supply has become more limited since the last time you purchased it.\r\n\r\n#b100 million mesos#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Wolf's Evolution
#b#p1201002##k wants to talk to you about something...
#p1201002# says that he's noticed a formidable force surrounding you and tells you to come see him because he wants to find out what it is. You'd better head over to #b#m140000000##k right now.

#t1902017#, the Silver Wolf, apparently grows with its master. The wolf is able to go through an awakening to get a whole new look once it gains enough strength from its master. This seems to explain your #p1201002#'s transformation into a #t1902018#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Half-written Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter

I found a letter in the trash, all crumpled up in a ball. It looked like someone was in the middle of writing the letter when they decided to throw it away...It's hard to read what's written there because of all the creases everywhere, but I think I see the name ''Athena Pierce'' faintly across the page. I wonder if I can find the person to whom this letter belongs?

While I was trying to read the letter, Muirhat approached me with a suspicious look and started asking why I am reading Kyrin's letter. I told him that I had found it in the trash, and to that, he asked if I would be interested in delivering Kyrin's letter to #bAthena Pierce#k in #bHenesys#k.
I've delivered the letter to Athena Pierce as Muirhat had asked me to.

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce's Smile

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter
I wonder how Kyrin and Athena Pierce know each other? Let me see what Athena Pierce has to say about that.
How surprising! Athena Pierce and Kyrin used to be practically family! I had no idea that the two had such a deep history.

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce's Gift

string.name: parent
string.value: The Lost Letter

I'd better hurry and bring this orgel to Kyrin who is onboard on The Nautilus waiting for me, especially for Athena Pierce's sake who is dying to see Kyrin. Anyhow, it's amazing how deeply their fates are intertwined...
I've delivered the orgel to Kyrin per Athena Pierce's request. Kyrin seemed so happy- I guess it was a good thing that I picked up the letter from the trash after all?

string.name: name
string.value: The Prince's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Whalians and The Nautilus
There's apparently a mysterious dolphin in the corridors of the Nautilus' lower deck. Seems very strange... What would a dolphin be doing out of the water and onboard a ship?

The mysterious dolphin is claiming that he is actually a Whalian prince and that he can't transform back to being a Prince because he is low on mana. Perhaps I should go find a bottle of #bmana elixir#k for the Whalian Prince?
Finally, the Whalian Prince has been replenished with mana. I thought he was just an ordinary dolphin... I mean, who would have known that he could turn out to be such a handsome prince?

string.name: name
string.value: Shining Stone

string.name: parent
string.value: Whalians and The Nautilus

I can't believe that The Nautilus' power is generated by this mystical Shining Stone... That's pretty interesting, I must say. I wonder what the Shining Stone looks like. I should go check out the stone in #bThe Nautilus' Generator Room#k.
While I was touching the Shining Stone, I could actually feel the stone's mystical powers traveling through my entire body.

string.name: name
string.value: Sea Firefly1
Sharyl, the Prince of Whales, hanging out on the lower deck of The Nautilus, says he's got another problem. Let me see what he has to say.

Sharyl, the Prince of Whales tells me some mystical story about a Sea Firefly. I guess there are many other mystical objects on The Nautilus besides the Shining Stone? Anyway, according to Sharyl, the Prince of Whales, the mystical Sea Firefly's powers are diminishing, which is making him worried. I'd better help Sharyl, the Prince of Whales by going to the #bMuse#k of the #bAquarium#k to fill the magic flask with some #bVigor of the Sea#k.
I went to see the Muse who filled the magic flask with the Vigor of the Sea.

string.name: name
string.value: Sea Firefly2
Shouldn't I be getting the bottle back from the Muse and heading back to The Nautilus?
The Muse gave back the magic flask to me, filled with the Vigor of the Sea. I'd better get the bottle to #bSharyl, the Prince of Whales#k right away, before it starts getting dark.
As the Vigor of the Sea is unleashed in The Nautilus, the overall atmosphere turns bright. But why is it that Sharyl, the Prince of Whales is blushing while saying that Kyrin should be so happy?

string.name: name
string.value: The Large Pearl
Apparently Sharyl, the Prince of Whales has yet another problem. Should I go find out what it is?

Sharyl, the Prince of Whales claims that he had left a #bMother of Pearl#k in The Nautilus' #bGenerator Room#k a long time ago. He thinks that there must be a #bLarge Pearl#k in there by now, and wants me to go get the pearl to take to Kyrin. I wonder why Sharyl, the Prince of Whales wants to give the pearl to Kyrin? Anyway, I should remember to beware of #bMuirhat#k while I'm on my way. The Prince warned me to watch out! \n\n#i4031843##t4031843# #b#c4031843##k / 1

Just as I am about to enter the Captain's cabin, Muirhat appears and stands in front of the door, blocking my way. He says that Sharyl, the Prince of Whales must give up hope, and wants me to hand over the pearl! Then he tells me to comfort Sharyl, the Prince of Whales if I see him again... Stay strong, dear Sharyl, the Prince of Whales.

string.name: name
string.value: Information for Dr. Kim

Do you know Rolonay, the smartest genius alive in all of The Nautilus? He is possibly the smartest person in all of Maple World. But he's apparently stuck in a jam, because of all the requests he's been getting from people asking for more and more information. I'd better give Rolonay a hand- But first, I should go see him in the central corridors of The Nautilus.

Rolonay's been working hard to compile all the information #bDr. Kim#k had requested, but says he's too tied up with all the analysis he has to do, to bring the research documents all the way to the Omega Sector. I should help out Rolonay and bring all the research documents to the Omega Sector for him.
I've delivered all the research documents to Dr. Kim, on Rolonay's behalf. That Rolonay, despite his looks, is quite a brainiac!

string.name: name
string.value: New Beginnings

You discovered that you were a hero that used to wield a Polearm, and just like that, you started to remember a number of your former skills. Your recovered skills are far from optimal, but... You should report this to #b#p1201000##k anyway.

#p1201000# seems amazed that you was able to recover so many of your abilities and urges you to start training seriously. She then recommends that you go see #b#p1202006# the Penguin Master#k, an old penguin that's studied the intricacies of various hero skills. He's located in the west side of town at #m140010100#.
You met with #p1202006# in #m140010100#.

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 1
You certainly have doubts, but you'll give #b#p1202006##k the benefit of the doubt and receive some training from him.
You eliminated the #o9300341#s with ease. Judging from how enthusiastic #p1202006# reacted, you are even less inclined to trust him.

According to #p1202006#, the first training lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300341#s#k. He makes it seem like it's some huge hurdle but they don't sound too difficult.\r\n\r\n#o9300341##r #a217011##k

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 2
You still don't trust this #b#p1202006##k, but you might as well receive some training from him.
You defeated the #o9300342#s with ease! #p1202006# may be giving you words of encouragement, but his words are worth very little.

According to #p1202006#, the second lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300342#s#k. Again, he still makes it sound like it's some huge hurdle, but again, they don't sound very tough.\r\n\r\n#o9300342##r #a217021##k

string.name: name
string.value: Train or Die! 3
This #b#p1202006##k is so full of it, but you might as well receive more training from him.

You finished off the #o9300343#s without breaking a sweat! #p1202006# then tells you he's taught you everything that he knows about combat and says that you can go back down the mountain. What…?! You're not even standing on a mountain!

According to #p1202006#, the third lesson involves eliminating #r#o9300343#s#k. He says it's a terribly scary monster to fight, but seriously, how scary could a #o1210100# be, really... \r\n\r\n#o9300343##r #a217031##k

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Steps
After receiving some lessons from #p1202006#, you remembered the Combo Ability skill! You'd better relay this to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says you were probably able to regain your memories of the skill because you swung your polearm around just like how you did in the past. Muscle memory, or something. She seems confident that the more you train, the stronger you will become and the more skills you will remember.

The small step of remembering the Combo Ability skill has opened a world of possibilities for you. You now have the confidence to continue training in the hope of one day returning to your old, heroic self.

string.name: name
string.value: To Victoria Island
Your training continues. You must keep progressing until the Black Mage is defeated once and for all. You should ask #b#p1201000##k what to do next.

#p1002104# the Information Dealer was once a resident of #m140000000# eagerly awaiting the Hero's revival, but he eventually lost hope and left town. He's a distant cousin of #p1201000#. He must have felt bad about leaving #p1201000# all by herself, because he promised to help #p1002104# anytime she needed it.

#p1201000# says you can only train so much in #m140000000# and suggests you venture to #bVictoria Island#k. She directs you to an ally of hers, #b#p1002104# the Information Dealer#k, in #b#m104000004##k.\r\n\r\nIn order to reach #m104000000#, you must leave #m140000000# by boarding a ship. From town, head to your right and continue past the snow-covered field to arrive at a small port operated by penguins. Once there, talk to #b#p1200003##k to board the ship.

string.name: name
string.value: An Information Dealer's Work
You should start training in Victoria Island and ask #bthe Information Dealer of #m104000000##k, named #b#p1002104##k, for some help.
You relayed to #p1002104# all the rumors you heard from #p1002001#. You guess this is the type of thing that informants do all the time.

#p1002104# tells you there's no better way to learn the inner workings of the world than to be an Information Dealer, and he offers you a position working with him. #p1002104# then gives you a simple quest to introduce you to the roles of an Information Dealer and informant. The quest involves finding out the latest rumors the crewmembers of #b#p1002001##k have been talking about.\r\n\r\n#y21707# #b(#u21706#)#k

string.name: name
string.value: Teo's Information
For the time being, you're working as an informant for #p1002104#. Your first task is to approach #b#p1002001##k and ask about any rumors circulating among the crewmembers.
You gave him all the #t4000019#s, and in return, he told you that the crew is currently stressed about the certain revival of the Black Mage. You'd better relay this bit of info to #p1002104#.

#p1002001# tells you that revealing a rumor is no big deal, but he'll only do it under one condition. Turns out he wants some snail shells to treat his arthritis. Fair enough. The area surrounding #m104000000# is infested with snails, so this shouldn't be hard. 

#i4000019# #t4000019# #b#c4000019# / 10#k
#i4000000# #t4000000# #b#c4000000# / 10#k
#i4000016# #t4000016# #b#c4000016# / 10#k

string.name: name
string.value: Your First Informant Assignment
Now that you have an idea of what an informant does, it's time to get your hands dirty. #b#p1002104##k will tell you what to do.

Your first information gathering assignment is to find out why the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# have started acting so wildly. They're usually so tame! #p1002104# tells you to ask the mushroom monster scholar about the occurrence and see if he can shed some light on what's been going on. #b#p1012111##k can be found in #b#m100000000##k.
You met with #p1012111#.

string.name: name
string.value: Check Out the Orange Mushroom
This is your first assignment as an informant. You're here to ask #b#p1012111##k in #b#m100000000##k about possible causes of the #o1210102#'s strange behavior.
You brought the #t4032314#s you found to #p1012111#. He says he's going to start studying the horns and asked you to come back later.

#p1012111# says that you must observe how the #o1210102#s have changed, and see if they've grown new sets of horns. You should eliminate the #r#o1210102#s#k and look for the #b#t4032314#s#k.\r\n\r\n#i4032314# #t4032314# #b#c4032314# / 30#k

string.name: name
string.value: Can you please give Baine a helping hand?

string.name: parent
string.value: A mysterious entity onboard The Nautilus

Baine's job is to monitor the sound waves of The Nautilus. The way the ship sounds is a good indicator of the overall well-being of the ship. Recently, Baine had apparently detected a strange sound coming through the walls on the lower deck. Could this be an ominous sign of things to come?

When Baine detects the strange sound waves coming from The Nautilus, he asks #bBart#k, the #bkeeper of the Watchtower#k, whether he's noticed any changes in sight. The watchtower is apparently on the eastern end of the shipping dock so I'd better look around carefully.
Bart says that he's noticed some strange movements. I wonder what he saw?

string.name: name
string.value: A Monster War?

This is your first assignment as an informant. You wonder if #p1012111# of #m100000000# has been able to poinpoint the cause of the #o1210102#'s recent changes yet. Maybe you should go ask #p1012111# right now.

#p1012111#, who studied the #t4032340#s, came to the conclusion that the #o1210100#s are not properly prepared for combat, which of course threw out the whole theory of a possible monster war. He then asked you to stop by later since he'd like some time to come up with another hypothetical theory to explain this mess.

#p1012111# says that the reason for the #o1210102#'s strange behavior may be the ongoing conflict, and a potential war, between the #o1210102#s and the #o1210100#s. He asks you to look into the #o1210100#s as well and to gather #b50 #t4032340#s#k to aid his research...\r\n\r\n#i4032340# #t4032340# #b#c4032340# / 50#k

string.name: name
string.value: Enter the Cynical Orange Mushrooms!

This is your first assignment as an informant. You're hopeful that this time #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has found the cause of the #o1210102#s' strange change in behavior. You'd better go talk to #b#p1012111##k.
You eliminated the #o9300274# and brought back the #t4032315# for #p1012111#. He found it unusual and asked you to wait while he gives it a detailed analysis.

#p1012111# says that #ra cynical group of #o1210102##ks was seen hanging around #m100000000#. He thinks they may have influenced the regular #o1210102#s as well. He then instructs you to eliminate #r50 #o9300274#s#k and give him #banything you find that might be considered odd#k...

#o9300274##r #a217111##k
#i4032315# #t4032315# #b#c4032315# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: First Assignment, Completed!

Since this is your first assignment as an informant, you are eager to find out whether #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has solved the mystery behind the #t4032315#. Go visit #b#p1012111##k and find out.

#p1012111# says he discovered a faint noise coming out of the #t4032315#, which only #o1210102#s can hear, and that's what's been causing their aggressive behavior. In other words, #bthe #r#o1210102#s' behavior is all because of a puppet#k! Now that you have this case pretty much wrapped up, your should report the info to #b#p1002104##k.

You notified #p1002104# about the cause of the strange behavior among the #o1210102#s, which officially concluded your first ever assignment as an informant. You should probably spend some time leveling up and training yourself now.

string.name: name
string.value: Your Second Informant Assignment
You have reached Level 18, which means #p1002104# will give you your second assigment as an informant. Head over to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k.

The second assignment involves dealing with the suddenly-violent #o1110100#s. Seems quite similar to the first assigment... You should head over to #b#m101000000##k and meet with #b#p1032101##k to discuss the cause of the #o1110100#s' distress.
You met with #p1032101# in #m101000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Mushrooms
This is your second assignment as an informant and you need to ask #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k why the #o1110100#s have suddenly turned so aggressive.
You gave #p1032101# the #t4032316#. #p1032101# seemed shocked that the rumors were actually true and wanted to find out who was responsible for placing a puppet on the #o1110100#s.

#p1032101# says she's heard that a lot of monsters have been going crazy and that they all seem to have something in common: their strange behavior is tied to an odd puppet. Maybe this too is tied to the puppet? You should eliminate the #r#o1110130#s#k and find a #b#o1110100# puppet#k if you can.

#o1110130##r #a217141##k
#i4032316# #t4032316# #b#c4032316# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Tree Witness
This is your second assignment as an informant and the question remains, who planted the puppet on the #o1110100#s? Talk to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k for some answers.
#p1032101# believes that #b#p1032112##k in #m100040000# may have witnessed someone placing a puppet on a #o1110100# and tells you to ask the tree.
#p1032112# stated that recently a little kid was seen carrying puppets in the South Forest. Since then, the #o1110100#s have gotten much more aggressive.

string.name: name
string.value: Second Assignment, Completed!
This is your second assignment as an informant and you must relay #p1032112#'s eyewitness account to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k.

#p1032101# is sure that the changes happening to the #o1110100#s is connected with the kid carrying the puppets and tells you to be extra cautious. Now that this case is pretty much wrapped up, you should relay the information to #b#p1002104##k.

You told #p1002104# why the #o1110100#s have become so aggressive, and that concluded your second assignment as an informant. But you wonder, will the fairies be able to watch over the forest all by themselves?

string.name: name
string.value: Rowen's Request 1
You wonder how #p1032101# is doing overseeing the forest. You feel like you should head to #b#m101000000##k to see her.
You defeated the #o1110100#s and retrieve the #t4032316#, but you were unable to apprehend the actual criminal. Hopefully the kid will show up again…

It seems like the kid with the puppets was once again seen in #m100040000#. Time to eliminate the #r#o1110100#s#k so you can retrieve the #bpuppet#k. 


Regardless of Personality #o9101000##r #a217171##k
#i4032317##t4032317# #b#c4032317# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Rowen's Request 2
You should talk to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k and see if the puppet-toting kid has made any more appearances in the South Forest.
You defeated the #o1110100# and retrieved the #t4032318#. So far, you've managed to foil the kid's plan times times. Perhaps the kid'll give up now…?

#p1032101# says that the kid with the puppet has showed up once again in #m100040003# and wants you to eliminate the #o1110100#s and retrieve the puppet yet again.


Regardless of Personality #o9101000##r #a217181##k
#i4032318# #t4032318# #b#c4032318# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Invitation
A mysterious figure starts talking to you…

When you accept the invitation from the mysterious figure, you find yourself in front of a strange-looking cave! Inside the cave...is the kid with the puppets! So that's the kid responsible for manipulating the monsters in #m100000000# and #m101000000#? Talk to the kid and see what's up.

When you accept the invitation from the mysterious figure, you find yourself in front of a strange-looking cave! Inside the cave...is the kid with the puppets! So that's the kid responsible for manipulating the monsters in #m100000000# and #m101000000#? Talk to the kid and see what's up.

string.name: name
string.value: What is it that Bart saw?

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus
Let me take Bart's status report to #bBaine#k.
I've delivered Bart's report to Baine. By the look on Baine's face, it seems that there's something fishy going on.

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Warning
What would #p1002104# say about the Black Wings? You should talk to #b#p1002104##k, the Information Dealer in #b#m104000000##k, and find out.

He tells you that the Black Wings are an organization conspiring to resurrect the Black Mage and says that this information must be relayed to #b#p1201000##k as well, so he wants you to let #p1201000# know about the situation. In the mean time, Tru plans on utilizing his network as an Information Dealer to gather as much information on the Black Wings as possible.

#p1201000# thought that the fact that an organization like the Black Wings even exists...means that the Black Mage's resurrection is imminent. She encouraged you to train that much harder to regain your old, heroic form. She then taught you a skill called #bPolearm Booster#k which she she learned by poring over an ancient document!

string.name: name
string.value: Your Third Informant Assignment
You have now reached Level 23, which means #p1002104# will soon be giving you your third assignment as an informant. You should head to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# suspects that the #o1140100# case in #m102000000# is similar to the ones in #m100000000# and #m101000000# and asks you to gather some information related to the present case. To get the details, you have to head over to #b#m102000000##k and talk to #b#p1103004##k...
You met with #p1103004# in #m102000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Stumps
This is your third assignment as an informant and this one involves studying the strange-acting #o1140130#s with #p1103004# in #b#m102000000##k. You'd better go talk to #b#p1103004##k.
You defeated 100 #o1140130#s but didn't find any puppets. #p1103004# told you that #o1140130#'s puppet has been detected nearby and that something seems very wrong…

#p1103004# seems to already know that the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior was caused by a puppet and tells you to enter #m101030101# to defeat #r100 #o1140130#s#k and retrieve #o1140130#'s puppet. She also says that if you can't find the puppet even after eliminating 100, you should just come back to see her...\r\n\r\nRegardless of Personality #o9101002##r #a217221##k

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Puppet
This is your third assignment as an informant and you're at #b#m102000000##k with #p1103004#, investigating the causes of the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior. You should talk to #b#p1103004##k.
You retrieved all of the #t4032319#s. #p1103004# seemed genuinely shocked that the puppets were used for such a purpose and told you she'd have to write a report on this. A report? What report?

#p1103004# tells you that the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior was caused by a puppet, but the puppet is not necessarily on the #o1140130#s' bodies, but somewhere outside. You should search the #bPile of Relics#k in #b#m101030101##k and find the #b#t4032319##k.\r\n\r\n#i4032319# #t4032319# #b#c4032319# / 5#k

string.name: name
string.value: Third Assignment, Completed!

This is your third assignment as an informant and this one involves investigating the suddenly-erratic #o1140130#s in #b#m102000000##k. With the help of #p1103004#, you were able to locate the cause of the madness. The case seems to be nearing its end. You should talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# says that the puppet doesn't necessarily have to be on a monster's body, it's enough just to be near a monster. She says that she will take measures to beef up security so the kid with the puppet can't get close to #m102000000# ever again. This concludes the case, and you are going to send the information to #b#p1002104##k.
You updated #p1002104# on what happened in #m102000000#, which concluded your third assignment as an informant.

string.name: name
string.value: 10 Boogies's Request
After the #o1140130# case closed, #p1103004# still seems to need you for something. You wonder what. Better go talk to #b#p1103004##k and find out.

#p1103004# thanks you for helping her solve the mystery, but tells you she has a little predicament: She can't leave her post to submit her report! She wonders if you could deliver the report to her boss for her. So your task is to deliver the #t4032320# to #b#p1101002##k in #b#m130000000##k.

You delivered the report to #p1101002# and received a reward. You noticed that he had a very peculiar way of speaking which, to you, seemed totally inappropriate yet absolutely proper in tone. It reminded you of someone…

string.name: name
string.value: Your Fourth Informant Assignment
You have now reached Level 28, which means #p1002104# will be giving you your fourth assignment as an informant today. Head to #b#m104000000##k and meet with #b#p1002104##k.

Many reports have been filed concerning a bunch of depressed #o2230101#s in #m105040300#. This has to be the work of the puppeteer. Head over to #b#m105040300##k and talk to the person who first discovered this. They say it's a boy named #b#p1061019##k.
You met with #p1061019# in #m105040300#.

string.name: name
string.value: Zombie Mushrooms

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and you need to gather information about the erratic behavior of the #o2230101#s in #b#m105040300##k. You'd better talk to #b#p1061019##k, the witness that reported the incident.
You eliminated the #o2230101#s and retrieved the #t4032321#. #p1061019# seemed to know something about the puppet…

#p1061019# seems terrified to see so many #o2230101#s with such irritated faces. They are preventing him from entering the Ant Tunnel, so he's asked you to find out what has happened to the #o2230101#s. Looks like you'll have to eliminate the #r#o2230101#s#k and retrieve the #b#t4032321##k...

#o9101001##r #a217271##k
#i4032321# #t4032321# #b#c4032321# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Puppeteer's Cave

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and it involves #p1061019#, who apparently remembered something when he looked at the #t4032321# retrieved from #o2230101#. Go talk to him at #b#m105040300##k.

#p1061019# says that he saw a kid carrying around a #t4032321# some time ago. That must have been the Puppeteer! According to #p1061019#, the puppeteer may be hiding near the Evil Eye Cave… You should #bgo up to the Evil Eye Cave and look for the Puppeteer's Headquarters#k.
You spotted the Puppeteer's Headquarters, but you need a password to enter.

string.name: name
string.value: 4th Assignment Completed

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and while you've found the puppeteer's cave, you need a password to enter. Maybe #p1061019# knows what the password could be? Go talk to #b#p1061019##k in #b#m105040300##k.
So you found out the password but decided to first return to #p1002104# and debrief him on the case. This concludes your fourth Informant Assignment. Next up, Operation Puppeteer Headquarters?

#p1061019# says that he doesn't know anything about the password but says that he saw the puppeteer scribble something onto #p1061006# that just might be the password. Find out what the password is by talking to #b#p1061006##k and tell #b#p1002104##k the password is as well.\r\n\r\n#y21730# #b(#u20730#)#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Truth Behind the Black Shadow

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Baine's eyes lit up as he read Bart's report. It was as if he discovered something! He thinks that the ominous feeling he's been getting as of late may have something to do with the Disciples of the Black Magician... Baine thinks it is possible that the Black Magician's Disciples are still in Victoria Island, and asks me to hunt down 20 #rred snails#k and 20 #rpigs#k and to bring back 1 #bBlack Magician's Token#k. 

#i4031846##t4031846# #b#c4031846##k / 1 
#o130101# #r#a21731##k
#o1210100# #r#a21732##k
I've hunted down the monsters and found the Black Magician's Token, and brought it to Baine. I'm afraid there's something much bigger going on than it appears.

string.name: name
string.value: The Cave's Password

This is your fourth assignment as an informant and even though you found the puppeteer's cave, you couldn't enter because you didn't have the password. The code might be written on #p1061006#. Go talk to #p1061006# at #m105040300#.

You found the scribble on #p1061006#. It's written in a near-illegible scribble, but you can still make it out. It says: 'Francis is a genius puppeteer!' All the words in the password have to be exact, including the capitalization and spacing, so be careful.

Rotating the #p1061006# might reveal the scribbles, but it's not moving. Wait a minute, the statue seems to be talking to you directly. 'I want 100 #t4000007#s.' Now you've heard of some outrageous demands, but a statue demanding something from you? Really? Oh well, better find some #t4000007#s.\r\n\r\n#i4000007# #t4000007# #b#c4000007# / 100#k

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Puppeteer!
You have now reached Level 29, which means it's time for you to ambush the #o9300344#, no? You should head over to #b#m104000000##k and notify #b#p1002104##k that you are ready for action.

You defeated the Puppeteer, but he ran away before you could finish him off. All you have left is a document the Puppeteer dropped while running away. When you showed #p1002104# the document, he suddenly looked dead serious.

#p1002104#, seeing that you're determined to attack the #o9300344#, decides to rent a powerful weapon for you. It's a disposable weapon, but it'll be put to good use. Now everything is set for the ambush in #b#m910510201##k. Remember, the password is 'Francis is a genius Puppeteer!'

#o9300344##r #a217311##k
The Black Wings' Clue #t4032322# #b#c4032322# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Black Wings' Conspiracy

The document you extracted from #o9300344# turns out to be a Black Wings document! Unfortunately, the document is written in code. What should you do? Go to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k for some advice.
Looks like the only person that can decode the document is #p1201000#. Head over to #b#m140000000##k and ask #b#p1201000##k to help.

The document says that the Black Wings possess an item known as the #t4032323#. #p1204002#, the puppeteer, is utilizing his special skills in mob manipulation to look for a certain Seal Stone. But what does that mean? What exactly are the Black Wings after?

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Some Strange Information
The moment you reach Level 31, you receive a message from #b#p1002104##k. Is it about a new Informant Assignment? But he's never mentioned anything about it before…
#p1002104# says he has an urgent message for you and asks you to come to #b#m104000004##k right away. You wonder what's going on.

So it turned out that the message was from a fake #p1002104# who belongs to the Black Wings. In other words, the whole thing was a trap laid by the puppeteer to throw you off guard. Luckily, you were able to defeat the puppeteer, but he got away at the last second again. Meanwhile, #p1002104# was ambushed while waiting for a skill from #p1201000# to arrive. Luckily, he kept it safe and gave you the #bCombo Mastery#k skill.

string.name: name
string.value: Traces of the Puppeteer
As soon as you reach Level 37, #b#p1002104##k sends you a message. Is there a new lead?
You defeated the #o9300346# without a definite clue to lead you to the #t4032323#. But then, #p1002104# flashed a comforting smile as if to tell you not to worry about a thing…

#p1002104# says that he's found hidden traces of the #o9300346# and that the puppeteer is hidden in a #bsmall cabin#k somewhere in #b#m105040200##k. He says you have the greenlight to finish off the #o9300346# if you run into him again.


#o9300346##r #a217341##k

string.name: name
string.value: The Seal Stone of Victoria Island
You weren't able to gather any information on the #t4032323#, but #p1002104# seems strangely confident about where you stand. Go talk to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# says that ever since he got ambushed by the #o9300346#s, he's been using any means necessary to find the Seal Stone. He feels that holding on to the Seal Stone would be dangerous, so he wants to store it in #b#m140000000##k, the deserted island. I'd better deliver the #bSeal Stone to #p1201000##k.

#t4032323#. No one knows what its purpose is, but it is obvious that Black Wings want it. Desperately. You can't let that happen… Just as you're thinking this, #p1201000# hands you a new skill called the #bCombo Drain#k.
As soon as you reach Level 45, you receive a message from #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# notifies you of some new information regarding the Black Wings and asks you to head to #b#m200000000##k to meet #b#p2012012# the fairy#k. #p2012012# will probably have some more details about this.
You met #p2012012# the fairy in #m200000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Giant Nependeaths Appear
It seems that something related to the Black Wings is happening in #b#m200000000##k. You should talk to #b#p2012012##k.

After defeating the #o9300347#s, you brought back a #t4032324#. #p2012012# was curious to see who would do such a thing and seemed to worry even more that the sheer weight of the Nependeaths might cause Orbis to sink. She wanted you to discuss the problem about #m200000000# with someone who might know more.

#p2012012# the fairy has noticed that the number of #r#o9300347#s#k has been steadily increasing in #b#m200060001##k and wants you to look into the #o9300347#s there. Apparently, if you're not careful and enter the wrong path from #b#m200060000##k, you may end up in #m200060001# instead, so you should head there right now, eliminate the #o9300347#s, and retrieve any strange items they might drop.\r\n\r\n#i4032324# #t4032324# #b#c4032324# / 5#k

string.name: name
string.value: Sealed Garden
You wonder if #m200000000# will come crashing down because of the sheer weight of the #o9300347#s. You'd better talk to #b#p2032001##k who lives in #b#m200050000##k before that happens.

#p2032001# says that she's worried about the possibility of the #o9300347#s causing #m200000000# to sink, but she says she's actually more worried another issue entirely. The fact that the Nependeaths in Orbis have grown so huge maybe connected with the path to #m920030001#. #m920030001#? This may be related to the Seal Stone somehow. You'd better keep asking #b#p2032001##k more questions.
#p2032001# first had her doubts about whether you could be trusted and was shocked to discover your true identity. She says that she has seen your grand fate…

string.name: name
string.value: To the Sealed Garden
You'll find #m920030001# in #m200000000#... You wonder if it's related to the Seal Stone. You bet #b#p2032001##k in #b#m200050000##k can explain a thing or two.

According to #p2032001#, #m920030001# is where the #bSeal Stone is hidden#k. The only way to enter #m920030001# is through a stem of the Nependeath which connects #m200060001# to #m920030001#. An intruder has actually grown the #o9300347# for this specific purpose. #p2032001# is desperately asking you to prevent the intruders from entering...

So you came face to face with a #o9300348# in #m920030001# and successfully defeated it, but ended up losing the Seal Stone to a member of the Black Wings, #o9300349#, who snatched it away from you. When you asked #p2032001# what you should do, she told you that she doesn't know what they want the Seal Stone for and sat quietly with a grim expression.

string.name: name
string.value: Report to Muirhat

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Baine discovers that the Black Magician's Disciples have been secretly observing The Nautilus. And with that discovery, Baine's report is now ready to be delivered to Muirhat. Baine wants me to bring the report to Muirhat myself, since I gave him so much help with writing the report...

This report contains the Black Magician's Token which I found, plus a description of the strange sound waves that Baine had heard. It also includes information about the suspicious movements that Bart saw. I should take this to #bMuirhat#k.
When Muirhat receives the report, he is surprised and shocked to find that the Black Magician's influence has spread as far as here.

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Seal Stone of Orbis
You lost the Seal Stone of Orbis. What does this mean? Head to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k to get some advice.
After explaining to #p1002104# everything that took place in #m200000000#, #p1002104# felt that this information should be relayed to #b#p1201000##k as well.

#p1201000# seemed glad to have discovered that the Black Wings are after the Seal Stone and that there's more than one Seal Stone out there. She encouraged you with motivating words, then taught you a new skill that she had just decoded, known as the #bCombo Smash#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Investigating Mu Lung
As soon as you reach Level 54, you hear from #b#p1002104##k.
#p1002104# says they've just received word regarding the Black Wings and urges you to go to #b#m250000000##k. Talk to #b#p2090004##k in #m250000000# for more details.
You met with #p2090004# in #m250000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Black Scroll
So what does #b#m250000000##k have to do with the Black Wings? You should talk to #b#p2090004##k to find out.

#p2090004# received a #t4220151# a few days ago from a man who claimed to be the #r#o9300351##k of the Black Wings. But because he took such poor care of the #t4220151#, the contents of the scroll seems to have faded away. You think the only way chance to restore the content is through #b#p2091008# the painter#k.
You gave the restored #t4220151# to #p2090004#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Special Ink
You want to restore the #t4220151# that the Black Wings gave to #p2090004#. The one person in #b#m250000000##k who is capable of doing the restoration is #b#p2091008# the painter#k.
You handed #p2091008# the materials and received #t4032342# in return. You should now open the #t4220151# and pour the #t4032342# over it.

#p2091008# states that to restore the #t4220151#, one must make a #b#t4032342##k and pour it all over the scroll. He then asks you to bring the materials necessary to make the ink, so he can make some for you. 

#i4000286# #t4000286# #b#c4000286# / 50#k
#i4000287# #t4000287# #b#c4000287# / 50#k
#i4000291# #t4000291# #b#c4000291# / 100#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Shadow Knight's Letter
You wonder how #p2090004# will take the contents of the #t4220151# now that it's restored? You should talk to #b#p2090004##k in #b#m250000000##k.

#p2090004# seems to be genuinely panicking and wants you to deliver the #t4220151# to #b#p2091007##k. But how in the world are you going to meet him when he resides at the very top floor of #m925020000#? That's when #p2090004# mentioned the ultimate weakness of #p2091007#'s student, #b#p2091005##k. You'd better head over to see #p2091005#.
You met #p2091007# and handed him #o9300351#'s Letter of Warning.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Meet Mu Gong

The letter issued by #o9300351# of the Black Wings... In order to deliver the letter to #p2091007#, you first must win over #p2091005#, who is one of his students. You'd better head over to #b#m925020000##k and start sweet-talking #b#p2091005##k.

When you brought the #t4000293#s to him, #p2091005# discreetly told you the way to #m925020000#'s back alley. In front of #m925020000# are a some flags. You need to use the portal under the green flag on the right side to get to #p2091007#.

You ask nicely if you can see #p2091007#, but #p2091005#'s stance remains the same: NO. That's when you decide to sweeten the pot, as instructed by #p2090004#, by offering healthy items for the body, which worked like magic. You'd better start gathering up some #b#t4000293#s#k.\r\n\r\n#i4000293# #t4000293# #b#c4000293# / 100#k

string.name: name
string.value: Mu Gong's Test

You wonder what #p2091007# is going to say about #o9300351#'s letter. You should meet with #b#p2091007##k on the #btop floor of #m925020000##k and find out. You can get there via the shortcut in the back alley that #p2091005# told you about.
You emerged victorious over #o9300350#. #p2091007# seemed absolutely shocked to see someone using skills from hundreds of years ago…

When you ask #p2091007# about the Seal Stone of Mu Lung, he says that #o9300351# is a dangerous fellow, but tells you that he also has his guard up around you. He also says that he's wants to test you to see if you're trustworthy. All you have to do is beat #o9300350# in battle.\r\n\r\n#o9300350##r #a217461##k

string.name: name
string.value: Catch the Shadow Knight!

You passed #p2091007#'s test. You should now talk to #b#p2091007##k in #b#m925020000##k and find out more about the Seal Stone. You can get there by going through the back alley that #p2091005# told you about.

You defeated #o9300351# in #m925040100#, but the Seal Stone of #m250000000# was taken from you by the Gentleman of the Black Wings. It seems to be a recurring pattern. When you told #p2091007# that the Seal Stone was stolen, he admitted that he himself did not know the true use of that stone and reassured you that all is well in #m250000000# even if the Seal Stone has been taken.

According to #p2091007#, the Seal Stone of #m250000000# is stored in a place called #m925040100# and the entrance is somewhere between the pillars of #m250000100# and #b#m250020300##k. Find the pillar that has "Entrance" engraved on it and say the password to enter the premises. The password is #bActions speak louder than words#k. You'd better enter #m925040100# and stop #r#o9300351##k, then return to Mu Gong.\r\n\r\n#o9300351##r #a217471##k

string.name: name
string.value: The Stolen Seal Stone of Mu Lung
You lost the Seal Stone of Mu Lung. What does this mean? You'd better head over to #b#m104000000##k and talk to #b#p1002104##k to get some advice.
When you tell #p1002104# about everything that took place in #m250000000#, #p1002104# felt it was necessary for you to tell #b#p1201000##k in #b#m140000000##k about it.

#p1201000# stated that you did get something significant out of this, in that you found out the heroes were the ones that personally delivered the Seal Stone to those towns, and that by making that connection, you can focus on studying those heroes which will in turn lead you to new information. She then gave you a newly-decoded skill called #bFinal Charge#k!

string.name: name
string.value: Back to the Past
When you reach Level 63, #b#p1002104##k sends you a message.

According to #p1002104#, one of the clocktowers in #m220000000# has broken down. This clocktower manages time, and when it broke, it somehow created a path to the past. Exploring the past could reveal some information about Seal Stones. #bThe busted clocktower with the time-control room can be accessed through the ladder on the top floor of Helios Tower#k, so you should make you way over there.

According to #p1002104#, one of the clocktowers in #m220000000# has broken down. This clocktower manages time, and when it broke, it somehow created a path to the past. Exploring the past could reveal some information about Seal Stones. #bThe busted clocktower with the time-control room can be accessed through the ladder on the top floor of Helios Tower#k, so you should make your way over there.

string.name: name
string.value: Disciples of the Black Magician

string.name: parent
string.value: A Mysterious Presence On-board The Nautilus

Muirhat thinks that Disciples of the Black Magician are most likely still lingering by Henesys and The Nautilus. He says that they are probably hiding in deserted house in the forest, disguised. I should get rid of them myself and preserve the peace on The Nautilus. \n\n#o9300156# #r#a21751##k
I've gotten rid of all the Disciples of the Black Magician. Have we finally restored the peace on The Nautilus?

string.name: name
string.value: She Remembers Me
Just as #p1002104# instructed, you use the #m220000000# clocktower to travel to the past. Just as you arrive in the past, someone calls out your name…

#p2131002# seems shocked to see you and greets you like a long-lost sibling. Do you know this person? While you stand there dumbfounded, #p2131002# tells you that #b#p2131000##k is also waiting for you, and that you should make your way to the #bCamp Conference Room#k to let #p2131000# know that you are alive and well.
You finally met #p2131000# in Ellin Forest. #p2131000# seemed glad to see you alive and well, but then learned that you have no recollection of the past and seemed sad to hear it.

string.name: name
string.value: Seal Stone of Ellin Forest
You ran into someone from the past who apparently knew you. Maybe #p2131000# in Ellin Forest knows something about the Seal Stone. You'd better go talk to #b#p2131000##k and find out.
You received the #t4032325# from #p2132000#. #p2131000# told you to head to the #m300000011#.

#p2131000# says that she did store a rock in #m300000011#, which the heroes left for her, and says the rock might be the Seal Stone. Entering #m300000011# to verify whether the rock is actually a Seal Stone requires a #b#t4032325##k. #p2132000# in #b#m300010400##k apparently has it.\r\n\r\n#i4032325# #t4032325# #b#c4032325# / 1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Key
Apparently, #p2132000 has the #t4032325# that can open the safe where the Seal Stone of Ellin Forest is stored. You'd better head over to #b#m300010400##k and talk to #b#p2132000##k.
#p2132000# found one of keys that #p2132000# lost and gave you the #t4032325#.

You ask #p2132000# for the keys, and he seems to panic. He tells you that he may have lost it. It looks like the #r#o5250002#s#k nearby have the key, so it's up to you to defeat them all and retrieve.\r\n\r\n#i4032326# #t4032326# #b#c4032326# / 10#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Seal Stone of Ellin Forest
It turns out that the Seal Stone of Ellin Forest was taken by #o9300353# of the Black Wings. How did this happen? You'd better go talk to #b#p2131000##k in Ellin Forest.

#p2131000# reveals that she has a letter that contains information about another Seal Stone and promises to hand it to you. Unfortunately, you can't take the letter since #b#p2131000# and you are from two separate times#k. \n\nJust when you think it's all over, #p2131000# tells you that she's a fairy with a very long life, and that she will in fact carry the letter to your time. What you need to do now is leave Ellin Forest and #bmeet #p2131000# in your own time#k. You wonder where #p2131000# is? You'd better ask #b#p1002104##k.

You asked #p1002104# whether he knew anyone named #p2131000#. It turned out that #p1002104# is one of the most well-known people in all of Victoria Island. You should head to #m100000201# in #m100000000# to meet Athena Pierce at the Bowman Instructional School.

string.name: name
string.value: Info on Another Seal Stone

You met #p1204031# in the #b#m100000201# of #m100000000##k. Thankfully, the letter hadn't gotten lost, but you think #p2131000# must have been shocked to see you. You'd better to talk to #b#p2131000##k.

#p1012100# flashed a big smile, saying that she knew she'd someday meet you again. She then handed you the letter. It's a great feeling, knowing that you have a friend that remembers you hundreds of years later. You'd better show the letter to #b#p1002104##k.

#p1002104# tells you that the letter is unreadable and that it actually might be cursed. He recommends that you show #p1201000# the letter. Since she seems to be good with spells, she might be able to break the curse.

string.name: name
string.value: Decoding the Letter
You can't read the letter given by #p2131000#. What is this, anyway? You'd better head over to #b#m104000000##k and ask #b#p1002104##k what to do with it.
According to #p1002104#, the letter is written in a secret code. Thankfully, you have a master decoder in #b#p1201000##k, so take the letter and head over to #b#m140000000##k.
#p1201000# said that decoding the letter may take some time and told you she'll let #p1002104# know once it's complete.

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter to the Queen
When you reach Level 68, #b#p1002104##k send a message.

Apparently, #p1201000# succeeded in decoding the letter and it contains some surprising information! Better head over to #b#m140000000##k immediately and talk to #b#p1201000##k about the contents of the letter.
Amazingly, the letter written by the heroes was addressed to the Queen of the time. The actual content of the letter simply asked that the Queen take good care of the Seal Stone of #m130000000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart the Strategist
Now that you know what's written in the letter… what should you do? You'd better go to #b#m140000000##k and talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that it's essential to warn #m130000000# about the Seal Stone and writes a letter urging them to protect it at all cost. Your job is to go to #b#m130000000##k and hand the letter to the Queen, but with that annoying strategist of the Queen, Neinheart, blocking the way, it might be difficult. Maybe you should just talk to the #bStrategist#k instead.
You met the Queen's strategist, #p1101002#. He took the letter and told you he'd take it into consideration, but his eyes tell you otherwise.

string.name: name
string.value: Neinheart's Thanks
#b#p1101002##k is sending you a message…
#p1101002# thanks you for protecting the tears of the Divine Bird and wants to give you a reward for it. You'd better head over to #b#m130000000##k.
As a token of his appreciation, #p1101002# taught you a new skill and mumbled that he hoped you might one day join forces with him. That smile of his seemed to convey a million subtle meanings.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 1

Mrs. Reade, who is in charge of keeping The Nautilus clean, says she is in need of help. Apparently the wash cloths that she uses for cleaning the ship have become tattered from incessant cleaning and she's in need of some new wash cloths... I should go talk to Mrs. Reade myself in the upper deck corridors where she's cleaning.
I'll go find a #bpig's ribbon#k which Mrs. Reade can use as a wash cloth.
Looks like Mrs. Reade's making good use of the pig's ribbon I brought her, but poor Mrs. Reade, she's cleaning all day long...as usual.

string.name: name
string.value: Suspicious John
#p1002001# has noticed that #p20000# has been acting weird lately. You'd better head over to Lith Harbor and talk to #p1002001# to see what's up.
Apparently, #p20000# started displaying some strange behavior ever since he started carrying some wooden box with him. Your task now is to investigate the wooden box that's next to #p20000#.
As you promised to #p20000#, you did not reveal to #p1002001# that the wooden box contained medication for arthritis.

string.name: name
string.value: Secrets of the Wooden Box
#p1002001# asked you to investigate the wooden box that #p20000# always carries around.
You find unidentified medication inside the box.

It turned out that #p20000# had been taking his own special arthritis medicine behind #p1002001#'s back. You made a deal with him, promising not to tell anyone about the contents of his wooden box in exchange for a small reward. You shouldn't tell #p1002001# about the wooden box. Just make something up.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 2

Mrs. Reade, who is in charge of keeping The Nautilus clean, says she's worried about the sanitary conditions of the ship because there has been a huge influx of mice on The Nautilus since the ship has been docked at Victoria Island. Should I help Mrs. Reade get rid of the mice?

The Nautilus has been docked at Victoria Island for some time now, and apparently that causes more rats to board the ship. Mrs. Reade is hyper-anxious having had to deal with all the vermin. I think I'll bring her 50 #bRat Traps#k. I've heard that I could buy mouse traps from the Roches in Ludibrium... \n\n#i4000095##t4000095# #b#c4000095##k / 50
We set up 50 mouse traps. I don't think we'll see any more mice around here... would we?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning The Nautilus 3
Mrs. Reade says her problems just never end...

So we took care of all the rats on The Nautilus but there's still one more problem. And that problem happens to be the main cause of all of Mrs. Reade's problems on The Nautilus- and he still needs to be cleaned! Mrs. Reade's biggest problem is Jack, the one who's to blame for every bit of the mess on The Nautilus! Let me go get some #bPure Water#k so #bJack#k can get a good wash down. \n\n#i2022000##t2022000# #b#c2022000##k / 1
Will Jack ever get clean? All this scrubbing doesn't seem to be making him any cleaner... and I'm scrubbing and scrubbing...

string.name: name
string.value: Protect The Nautilus' Emergency Food Supply

Apparently, pigs and ribbon pigs have been coming onto The Nautilus every night to eat up the ship's emergency food supply. At this rate, the people on The Nautilus may end up starving! I should go see Tangyoon, the ship's Head Chef and talk to him about this.

Tangyoon says pigs and ribbon pigs keep coming onto The Nautilus' emergency food supply and eating up all the food, and there's only a little bit left in storage! I'm gonna have to teach these #rpigs#k and #rribbon pigs#k a lesson they'll remember. 

#o1210100# #r#a21791##k 
#o1210101# #r#a21792##k
I think they must've learned their lesson by now. They'd better stay away from The Nautilus' food supply!

string.name: parent
string.value: Special Recipe for The Nautilus

string.name: name
string.value: Find Fresh Milk

According to those who've tasted Tangyoon's cooking, Tangyoon's dishes give you a mystical experience... They say that Tangyoon's dishes will either transport you to the happiest moment of your life or make you experience a flood-like rush of fantasy the moment you take a bite of it. What IS his secret?

The secret behind Tangyoon's cooking is none other than fresh ingredients! So I guess that means that freshness is the basis of all great cooking? Tangyoon is so serious about making sure that he has the freshest ingredients that he actually raises his own milk cows on The Nautilus for milk... Now that's impressive! Tangyoon wants me to go milk the cows and bring him some milk if I want to try some of his newest dish. Well, I definitely want to try some of his food, so I guess I'll go milk the cows and fill this bottle with milk. I'd better remember that I can only fill up 1/3rd of the bottle from a single mother cow. \n\n#i4031850##t4031850# #b#c4031850##k / 1
Wow! I can't believe I'm telling you this, but Tangyoon's dish was truly amazing. I was touched!

string.name: parent
string.value: Special Recipe for The Nautilus

string.name: name
string.value: Porchay's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians
Porchay, who stays with the Whalians in the Generator Room, says that there is an emergency. I wonder what it is?

I can't believe that the Whalians have completely run out of food! According to Porchay, Kenta has plenty of food ingredients so I should go to #bKenta#k and talk to her. I should take Porchay's letter with me too, right?
I gave Porchay's letter to Kenta.

string.name: name
string.value: Ingredients to Get for the Banquet

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians

Of all the ingredients, I can't believe they ran out of sea horse tail... The Whalians are probably starving so I'd better go get #b40 cans of sea horse tails#k from #bKenta#k and get them some food to eat. \n\n#i4000161##t4000161# #b#c4000161##k / 40
I've collected 40 cans of sea horse tail. This should be enough to cook a dish, right?

string.name: name
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians

string.name: parent
string.value: A Banquet for the Whalians
I'm finally done cooking the special entree for the Whalians. I'd better take it to #bPorchay#k quick!
I don't think the Whalians will have to worry about food for a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Bark's Worry

string.name: parent
string.value: For Kyrin
The Nautilus' First Officer and handsome muscle man, Black Bark has a worry? I should go talk to him in the conference room of The Nautilus' central corridor.

Black Bark wants to give Kyrin a pretty dress for her birthday, something that would express everyone's warmest regards toward her. He's apparently asked his old friend and dressmaker, Mrs. Ming Ming to make the dress, but she's run out of bright white material. She says that a table cloth made of junior lace is best for the dress she's making... I should gather #b40 table cloths#k and bring it to #bMrs. Ming Ming#k. \n\n#i4000035##t4000035# #b#c4000035#/40#k
I've collected the table cloths and have brought them to Mrs. Ming Ming. I wonder what the dress will look like!

string.name: name
string.value: Dress for Kyrin

string.name: parent
string.value: For Kyrin
The dress for Kyrin is finally done. It looks so nice! I should hurry and bring the dress to #bBlack Bark#k.
I wonder if Miss Kyrin will be wearing the dress at her birthday party. Can't wait to see her in the dress!

string.name: name
string.value: Help Me Find My Glasses
Apparently there's someone on the harbor, in trouble. He says he's lost something that's practically like a body part of his...

Having lost his glasses, Abel is unable to see anything. I can't believe the pelicans all went home while he was asleep... Let me help Abel find his glasses in the bushes nearby the #bwatchtower#k, located on the east end of The Nautilus harbor where the seagulls have gathered. And remember, #bAbel's glasses#k have horn-rimmed frames! \n\n#i4031853##t4031853# #b#c4031853##k / 1
Oh~ Abel seems so happy to have his glasses back. But now that he's got his glasses back, he seems like such a different person. Do those glasses have some kind of power?

string.name: name
string.value: A Hole in The Nautilus

Code red~! There's a hole in the ship and The Nautilus is in danger! The Nautilus' crew, Bonnie, is trying everything to stop the hole all by herself... We can't let The Nautilus sink like this! I must go and help!
The hole on the ship must be stopped with a solid horn. I should go and find #b50 solid horns#k before Bonnie loses all her strength. \n\n#i4000073##t4000073# #b#c4000073#/50#k
Whew, I can't believe we saved The Nautilus from sinking into the ocean. Bonnie and I saved The Nautilus!

string.name: name
string.value: Unidentified Strangers
#b#p1012003##k of #b#m100000000##k seems to be facing a pretty serious problem...
#p1012003# says that a group of unidentified strangers have appeared on the eastern coast of #m100000000#, and wants me to find out who they are. I should go to #b#m100030000##k.

There's a huge wooden entryway leading into #m100030000# which I'd never seen before. It almost looks like an entryway to a fortress...I should try talking to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of me. I remember him telling me that a #bpirate #p1072008##k fort is being built here. PIRATES!?

string.name: name
string.value: How to become a Brawler
In order to become a Brawler, I must go see Kyrin.

Kyrin says that she wants to test how far I have gotten on my training before she will help me job advance into a Brawler. I must first hunt down the #rOctopirates#k on the testing grounds and collect #b15 Potent Power Crystals#k . I must remember to use the #rFlash Fist#k skill in order to defeat the Octopirates. \n\n#i4031856##t4031856# #b#c4031856#/15#k
I've passed Kyrin's test! I'm ready now to become a Brawler!

string.name: name
string.value: How to Become a Gunslinger
In order to become a Gunslinger, I must see Kyrin.

Kyrin says that she wants to test how far I have gotten on my training before she will help me job advance into a Gunslinger. I must first hunt down the #rOctopirates#k and collect #b15 power wind crystals#k . I must remember to use the #rDouble Shot#k skill in order to defeat the Octopirates.
I've passed Kyrin's test! I can now become a Gunslinger!

string.name: name
string.value: The Beginner Pirate's First Training Session
I've finally become a Pirate... But I have no idea what I'm supposed to do... I should go to Kyrin, the Pirate Director of Job Advancement.
Kyrin suggests that I go on a light monster hunt to start training. She wants me to hunt down #r11 pigs#k. There's apparently a lot of pigs near Henesys.. \n\n#o1210100# #r#a21931##k
I've hunted down 11 pigs and reported the results to Kyrin. Hehe... That was no sweat!

string.name: name
string.value: The Beginner Pirate's Second Training Session
I've become a bit stronger from the training, but I've still got a long way to go. I should go ask #bKyrin#k for some help!
Kyrin tells me that I still need more training on the basics and suggests that I hunt down some more monsters. She wants me to hunt down #r26 pigs#k this time... \n\n#o 1210100# #r#a21941##k
I've hunted down 26 pigs and reported the results to Kyrin. Hehe, hunting down 26 pigs? It was a total breeze!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Pirate's Third Training Session
I'm finally getting used to being a Pirate, but I still have a lot more to learn. #bKyrin#k says she can help me...

According to Kyrin, I need to train for more composure and perseverance in order to become a great Pirate. She wants me to hunt down 43 pigs this time. #r43 pigs#k indeed... That's no joke! \n\n#o 1210100# #r#a21951##k
Finally! I've hunted down all 43 pigs... Phew...That wasn't as easy!

string.name: name
string.value: Beginner Pirate's Fourth Training Session
I'm finally starting to feel more comfortable in my skin as a Pirate. #bKyrin#k is offering to help train me for this final step...

Kyrin wants to test the skills I've acquired throughout my training. She wants me to hunt down #r10 green mushrooms#k. Green mushrooms are apparently much more powerful than the pigs so Kyrin is warning me to keep alert. \n\n#o 1110100# #r#a21961##k
I've hunted down 10 green mushrooms. That was not an easy task, but in any case, it was a success! Kyrin, the Director of Job Advancement for Pirates, is finally acknowledging me as a real Pirate.

string.name: name
string.value: Tienk, the Monster Book Salesman
As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k the motor-mouth salesman.
As soon as you arrive in #m104000000#, find #b#p0002006##k the motor-mouth salesman.
You have talked to #b#p0002006##k the salesman about the #bMonster Book#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Stone Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r80 Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130101# #r#a21981##k
I've eliminated 100 Stone Golems. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Dark Stone Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r100 Dark Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130102# #r#a21991##k
I've eliminated 100 Dark Stone Golems. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Mixed Golems
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r100 Mixed Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5150000# #r#a22001##k
I've eliminated 100 Mixed Golems. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Skeletons
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r50 Skeleton Solders#k and #r50 Skeleton Generals#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. 

#o 5150001# #r#a22011##k
#o 6230602# #r#a22012##k
I've eliminated 50 Skeleton Soldiers and 50 Skeleton Generals. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Drakes
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r50 Drakes#k and #r50 Ice Drakes#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. 

#o 5130100# #r#a22022##k
#o 6230600# #r#a22021##k
I've eliminated 50 Red Drakes and 50 Ice Drakes. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminate the Tauromacis
Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go see Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r30 Tauromacis#k and #r100 Cold Eyes#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island.

#o 7130100# #r#a22031##k
#o 4230100# #r#a22032##k
I've eliminated 100 Tauromacis. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 1

I've lost my appetite as of late... I wonder if Tangyoon could help me find a newfound appreciation for food by cooking me something new? I'm definitely ready for the challenge now so I should go talk to Tangyoon in The Nautilus' cafeteria. Oh yea, the cafeteria's on the upper deck.

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish as of late, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. He's apparently been working with Evil Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only I would bring him #b40 Evil Eye Tails#k... But come on, Evil Eyes? Does he even know if those things are edible? \n\n#i 4000007##t 4000007# #b#c 4000007#/40#k
Man, just as I'd suspected, Evil Eyes definitely aren't as tasty as I had hoped. But in a burger, well, it's not all that bad after all.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 2
Tangyoon says he's found a new ingredient to work with. I wonder what Tangyoon has in mind now?

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish as of late, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. This time, he says he's been working with Curse Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only I would bring him #b50 Curse Eye Tails#k... Hope it comes out tasty! \n\n#i 4000013##t 4000013# #b#c 4000013#/50#k
Just as I'd thought... Curse Eye Tails aren't meant to be eaten.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Dish 3
Tangyoon says he's found a new ingredient to work with. I wonder what Tangyoon has in mind now?

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish as of late, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. This time, he says he's been working with Cold Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only I would bring him #b50 Cold Eye Tails#k... Hope it comes out tasty! \n\n#i 4000023##t 4000023# #b#c 4000023#/50#k
Just as I'd thought... Cold Eye Tails aren't meant to be eaten.

string.name: name
string.value: Lazy Little Calico

At The Nautilus, there's a kid who is forever curious and loves to make pranks. Bartol tells me now he has a good prank to pull on someone. If I want to join in, I better head over to the middle hallway of The Nautilus to find Bartol!

All #bCalico#k ever does is sleep, sleep, sleep, when what he should be doing is keeping an eye out on the crew's bedrooms. Bartol thinks it would be funny to throw an #bEvil Eye Tail#k onto Calico and see how he reacts. Might be a fun little prank, no? \n\n#i 4000007##t 4000007# #b#c 4000007#/10#k
Calico awakes, in total shock. C'mon, Calico, you've got to stop falling asleep!

string.name: name
string.value: Bartol's Requests
If I'm passing through the central corridors of The Nautilus, I should make sure to stop by and see Bartol. He said he could teach me an easier way to get there...

Well, Bartol says that if I fulfill his request then he would give me a coupon that would allow me to use the warp machine to be warped to the Omega Sector. He says that he has some business to attend to with Shulynch, Muirhat and Black Bark and could use my help...

I fulfilled Bartol's request and received the Omega Sector Warp Coupon in return. I can use this coupon to use the Warp Machine in The Nautilus' Control Room to be warped immediately to the Omega Sector.

string.name: name
string.value: Bring a Lemon for Shulynch
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do?
Bartol wants me to take this lemon to #bShulynch, who is in the ship's Training Room on the upper deck#k. \n\n#i 2010004##t 2010004# #b#c 2010004#/1#k
I've delivered the lemon to Shulynch.

string.name: name
string.value: Take the Gold Pouch to Muirhat
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do?
I should bring the #bGold Pouch#k to #bMuirhat#k as Bartol asked me to. Muirhat is standing #bin front of the Control Room on the upper deck#k.
I've delivered the Gold Pouch to Muirhat.

string.name: name
string.value: Deliver the Tattered Map to Black Bark
I wonder what it is that Bartol wants me to do?
I should deliver this #bTattered Map#k to #bBlack Bark#k in the #bCentral Conference Room of The Nautilus#k.
I've delivered the Tattered Map to Black Bark.

string.name: name
string.value: The Path of Pirate
What do I need to do to make the job advancement to becoming a Pirate? I should talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# says that you can job advance to become a #bPirate#k once you reach #bLevel 10#k by choosing to become a Pirate in Lith Harbor. They say that in order to become a Pirate, you have to talk to #r#p1090000##k of #rThe Nautilus#k... I'd better figure out how to get to The Nautilus on the World Map (#rW#k) so I don't get lost on the way.
I learned a lot about becoming a Pirate from #p1090000#. From here, my journey begins...

string.name: name
string.value: JM's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: The Monster and the Evil Scheme
#b#m103000000# #p1052002##k is looking for someone to uncover the hidden truth about the #rscheme#k...

JM says a monster known as the #r#o6220000##k has been appearing in the #m103000000# sewer system, and wants someone to find out whether it is someone's evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger. He says the person who will help identify the root of this problem must be strong enough to defeat #rthe alligators in the swamp region#k... 

#i4000032##t4000032# #b#c4000032##k/50 #k 
#i4000033##t4000033# #b#c4000033##k/50

When you come back after defeating the alligators in the swamp, JM is convinced that you're strong enough to manage the task. He asks you to come back later so that he can tell you what the next step entails.

string.name: name
string.value: The Run-down Huts in the Swamp

string.name: parent
string.value: The Monster and the Evil Scheme

It seems like the next step entails collecting information. JM says that he is going to leave something for you inside the #bhut#k found deep inside the swamp, so you can retrieve it #bfrom 5 p.m. to 8 p.m.#k... Let's keep track of time and head over to #b#m107000300##k.
You have a crumpled piece of paper containing the list of informants in your hands. Let's go find the informants listed on the paper.

string.name: name
string.value: Find the Crumpled Piece of Paper Again
You have lost the list of informants you retrieved from the hut in the swamp region. What to do...? Let's go see #bJM#k again.

JM scowls and clicks his tongue at you. He says he'll provide you with the list of informants again, but asks you to pay #ba fee of 2000 Mesos#k and instructs you to leave it inside the trash can. Let's head over to #b#m107000300##k.
You have taken the list of informants out and left 2000 Mesos inside the trash can.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Mr. Pickall
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p9000008# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p9000008##k.
According to #p9000008#, #o6220000# looks a lot like #o3110100# but bigger, and it can even use magic. Anyway... He seems like a nice man.
According to #p9000008#, #o6220000# looks a lot like #o3110100# but bigger, and it can even use magic.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Shumi
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p1052102# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p1052102##k.
