According to #p1052102#, the #m103000000# sewer has been emitting a strange odor.
According to #p1052102#, the #m103000000# sewer has been emitting a strange odor.

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Nella
According to the information provided on the crumpled piece of paper, #p1052103# is one of the informants that JM wants you to go see. Let's go find #b#p1052103##k.
According to #p1052103#, #b#p9020000##k the magician in #m103000000# seem rather anxious... Hmmm does she have something to do with the scheme?
According to #p1052103#, #b#p9020000##k the magician in #m103000000# seem rather anxious... Hmmm does she have something to do with the scheme?

string.name: name
string.value: Information from Jake
According to the information provided on the #t4031894#, #p1052006# is one of the informants that JM wants you to see. Let's go find #b#p1052006##k.

While chatting away, #p1052006# suddenly mentions something regarding the #o9300003#... that #o9300003# wasn't always gigantic. He says it was a #o210100# that exponentially grew due to the #bGrowth Powder#k...

While chatting away, #p1052006# suddenly mentions something regarding the #o9300003#... that #o9300003# wasn't always gigantic. He says it was a #o210100# that exponentially grew due to the #bGrowth Powder#k...

string.name: name
string.value: Gathering Information Completed
You have gathered all the information from the informants. Let's give #bJM#k an update about the progress.

As soon as you tell JM the information you have gathered, JM turns pale. Is he surprised at the evil scheme...? JM, with an anxious look on his face, tells you to speak with #b#p9020000##k and ask about #o6220000#.
When asked about #o6220000#, #p9020000# is taken aback by the question and comes clean about the incident... about her accidentally dropping the Growth Powder in the sewer...
The evil scheme to put #m103000000# in danger... it only turned out to be #p9020000#'s clumsiness. Let's go inform #bJM#k.
JM, numbed by the absurdity, asks you to defeat #o6220000#. He seems to have aged 10 years because of this. Poor JM...\n\n#o6220000##r#a22211##k
You have defeated #o6220000# and reported your progress to JM.

string.name: name
string.value: The Forest of Evil

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil
#b#p1032100##k who lives in #b#m101000000##k was in a dangerous situation...

Arwen says she was attacked by a giant monkey monster in the forest. Although she's wasn't hurt, she was angry that something like this was still happening because #p1032001# had casted the magic of darkness during his days of youth. Let's go find #b#p1032001##k.

#p1032001# admits that he did, indeed, make a mistake a while back when he was young that is still affecting #m101000000#. He asks you to find #b#p1040002##k the cat in #b#m101020000##k to see what information you can get regarding the monster that attacked Arwen.

string.name: name
string.value: The Name He Calls

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1040002# knew exactly who #r#o5220002##k the black monkey monster was. #o5220002# seems to have something to do with Arwen... #p1040002# says to bring back #b#t4031925##k from #r#o5300100##k if you wish to find out more about #o5220002#. \n\n#i4031925##t4031925# #b#c4031925##k/10 #k
When given #t4031925#s, #p1040002# says to wait while it finds the entrance to the #m910100000#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rage, Resentment, and Revenge

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1040002# has told you that the entrance to #m910100000# is in #m100040105#. If you want to meet the ghost Fanzy was talking about, head over to #r#m910100000##k. But it seems like the ghost only appears during certain hours... Let's keep track of time since the ghost is said to appear #rfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
The ghost of the cursed forest, #t1032107#. He seems to be cursing someone ceaselessly...

string.name: name
string.value: The Cause and Effect

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1032107#, once an apprentice of #p1032001#, wanted to get close to Arwen, but Arwen could not even remember #p1032107#, and #p1032107# began to take revenge by casting an evil spell on #o4230101# to turn it into #o5220002#... Let's go inform #bArwen#k.
At first, Arwen is shocked and upset at what #p1032107# has done, but seems deep in thought now...

string.name: name
string.value: Arwen's Apology

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

Arwen, after much contemplation, says she can't understand Reef's actions but takes some responsibility for them. She, then, asks you for a favor... to deliver Fairy Hair to #bReef#k. She seems sincere, so perhaps you should help her out. Don't forget that Reef is a ghost who only appears #bfrom 5 p.m. to 7 a.m. of the following day#k.
You have delivered the Fairy Hair to Reef. Reef, surprised at the unexpected gift, asks you to give his apologies to #bGrendel the Really Old#k for having harmed others.

string.name: name
string.value: Defeat Faust

string.name: parent
string.value: The Forest of Evil

#p1032001#, who has heard everything about #p1032107#, claims that #p1032107# was once a polite and mild-tempered person... He speculates that it was the power of darkness that has consumed and changed Reef, and blames himself for it. Then, #p1032001# asks you to defeat #o5220002#... \n\n#o5220002# #r#a22271##k
When you defeat #o5220002# and report your progress to #p1032001#, he says #p1032107#, too, probably feels relieved.

string.name: name
string.value: Reef's Gratitude

#p1032100# and #p1032001#, #m101000000# and #o5220002#. And Reef... The air seems to have been cleared. Although Faust still loiters around the forest, #b#p1032108##k probably feels relieved for the time being. Let's go find #p1032108#.
Appeased, #p1032108# thanks you for your work.
Appeased, #p1032108# thanks you for your work.

string.name: name
string.value: A Way to Fight Off Sleep
I should go see #b#p1040001##k in #b#m106000300##k.

I met with #b#p1040001##k. #b#p1040001##k says he can't stand guard at the dungeon entrance because he keeps falling asleep. If this continues, something bad is bound to happen. I need to find a potion that can fight off sleepiness and give it to #b#p1040001##k.

#i02000000##t02000000# #b#c02000000#/1
#k#i02000001##t02000001# #b#c02000001#/1
#k#i02000002##t02000002# #b#c02000002#/1#k
I fed the potion to #b#p1040001##k but it was no use. But #b#p1040001##k was very appreciative of my efforts.

string.name: name
string.value: A Mysterious Small Egg
It sounds like someone is calling out my name. The dreamy eyes... the luscious purple hair... who are you?

The fairy with the dreamy eyes... and the luscious purple hair talked for a bit, but it wasn't understandable at all. After the fairy disappeared, I found a #bMysterious Small Egg#k inside my inventory. Didn't she say something about it being my friend...? Anyway, better go visit the fairy at #bEllinia#k, the town of Fairies.\r\n#b<Message from the Fairy>\nThe purple bellflower that soaks in the sun in between the skyscraping trees...Follow the path to the unknown that leads you to the bellflower. I will wait for you here.

The fairy with the dreamy eyes... and the luscious purple hair talked for a bit, but it wasn't understandable at all. After the fairy disappeared, I found a Mysterious Small Egg inside my inventory. Reliving the message the Fairy left for me, I went to the area and found Mar the Fairy hiding behind a huge bellflower. Mar mentioned something about being responsible for taking care of a living being, and then gave me a pet as a gift. The mysterious small egg turned out to be a Snail's egg.\r\nAlong with a message that this small snail can only be with me for 5 hours.

string.name: name
string.value: Captain Al, Who Are You?

A middle-aged gentleman who laims to have been the leader of a Family for 30 mind-boggling years... the rumors about this man, #bCaptain Al#k, who can be found in #bLith Harbor#k and #bOrbis Park#k, are running rampant. What exactly is a Family and the Leader anyway? It sounds interesting... better ask #bCaptain Al#k that question myself.
#bCaptain Al#k seemed much more pleasant the rumors suggested. I have a lot to ask... and he said ask him when I'm ready. How about now?

Captain Al's passion for adventure the Family are palpable. Forget the tear-jerking adventures of Captain Al; I'm more interested in the concept of the Family... \nFortunately, Captain Al told me to ask him anytime about the Family. Should I become a Leader myself? Well, first I'll need to find a Junior I can support.

string.name: name
string.value: Find a Junior!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge
#bCaptain Al#k told me to see him if I was ever interested in starting a Family. Better go visit him at either #bLith Harbor#k or #bOrbis Park#k.

Captain Al's mission was simple! He just asked me to find a Junior that I want to support. I better register at least one Junior, then report the results to him.

#rAdd at least one Junior#k
(From the Family window[HotKey : F], press the Pedigree button to check )
I succeeded in adding a Junior under me! Of course, that's how great my leadership is... haha.

string.name: name
string.value: Raise the Rep!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge

#bCaptain Al#k's next mission is for me to reach #r1,000 Rep#k! It's not an easy task by any means. According to Captain Al, this number cannot be achieved without the leadership and the overall support I provide to the Juniors. Captain Al gave me a clue in that I should help Juniors acquire EXP and help them Level Up as much as they can. EXP... leveling up... HOW?

#rAchieve 1,000 Rep#k
(Open the Family window to check the Rep)
I finally reached 1,000 in Rep! ...I have to thank the Juniors that really helped me get there.

string.name: name
string.value: Enjoy the Entitlement!

string.name: parent
string.value: Captain Al's Passing of Knowledge

This task is to enjoy your hard-earned #rEntitlements#k! #bCaptain Al#k's mission is for me to use the Entitlement to spend the #rcurrent Rep down to 500#k. He also wanted to make sure I stacked up enough Reps by saving all the way up to 2,000. Better return to Captain Al once I complete the mission.

#rTotal of at least 2,000 Rep
Current Rep under 500#k
(Open the Family window to see both the current Rep and the total Rep)

Captain Al commended my efforts for successfully accomplishing all the missions, and told me I have the looks to become a great Senior. He also reiterated the fact that it's very important to provide a full support to my Juniors and everyone in the Family. I better ask Al if I have any questions about the Family. Time for me to start a big Family of my own!

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Request
Manji, a solitary warrior in Perion, has asked to see you. He's never been the type to initiate a conversation, let alone a meeting! It must be something important. Let's go see Manji in Perion.

Manji says he felt a threatening energy coming from the deep end of the dungeon, so he asked his young apprentice, #bMu Young#k, to investigate. Unfortunately, he hasn't heard from Mu Young since! He'd like you to find the young man. If the last time Manji heard anything from Mu Young was when he was investigating the central dungeon of Victoria, couldn't he still be inside?

Manji says he felt a threatening energy coming from the deep end of the dungeon, so he asked his young apprentice, #bMu Young#k, to investigate. Unfortunately, he hasn't heard from Mu Young since! He'd like you to find the young man. If the last time Manji heard anything from Mu Young was when he was investigating the central dungeon of Victoria, couldn't he still be inside? \r\nYou were able to find Manji's apprentice, Mu Young, in the Underground Temple of the central dungeon.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go find Mu Young, who is somewhere in central dungeon of Victoria. He probably went down to the Underground Temple to investigate the root of a threatening and mysterious energy.

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog

string.name: name
string.value: How to Shoo Away the Evil
Chrishrama in Sleepywood claims that he's felt an ominous energy. Let's go talk to him.

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him.

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him. Since you've stuck an Charm on all 6 of the Shaman Rocks, let's go see Chrishrama.

string.name: summary
string.value: Place a Charm on the 6 Shaman Rocks located throughout the central dungeon of Victoria to drive out evil!

string.name: name
string.value: The Owner of the Mysterious Note
There is a note inside the Ant Tunnel. Let's pick it up and see what it is.
You've picked up a Mysterious Note inside the dungeon. Let's return this Note to its owner. Hm, could it belong to Mu Young?

Chrishrama says he feels the forces of evil coming from the dungeon and asks that you place a Charm on each of the Shaman Rocks nearby. It sounds a bit superstitious, but let's make him happy and do this favor for him. You have given the Note to Mu Young, whom you met inside the dungeon.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's return the piece of paper you've picked up. Could it be Mu Young's?

string.name: parent
string.value: The Mysterious Note

string.name: name
string.value: Who is the Owner of the Mysterious Note?
While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. Let's defeat the Jr. Balrog.

While talking to Mu Young, you were suddenly transported to a foreign place and a Jr. Balrog appeared right in front of your eyes. As soon as you defeated the Jr. Balrog, Tristan's Spirit appeared. You were able to hear the story of his past life.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Mysterious Note

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go into Tristan's Tomb and talk to his spirit after defeating the Jr. Balrog.

string.name: name
string.value: Balrog and the Seal
Manji's apprentice, Mu Young, has a pensive look on his face. Shall we hear what he has to say?

Mu Young says his master was right to worry. He says, Balrog, who was sealed by Tristan a number of decades ago, is preparing to reemerge. He has asked you to form a Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.

Mu Young says his master was right to worry. He says, Balrog, who was sealed by Tristan a number of decades ago, is preparing to reemerge. He has asked you to form a Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.\r\nBut as you tried to prevent Balrog's revival, he disappeared into thin air, and you had to tell Mu Young.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's form an Expeditionary Team and go into the cave where Balrog is sealed. You will do what you can to prevent Balrog from reviving and report back to Mu Young.

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog

string.name: name
string.value: A Letter to the Master
Mu Young seems to have another favor to ask of you. Let's see what he needs.
Mu Young says he has to further investigate the place, so he'd like me to deliver the letters he wrote to Manji during the past few days.

Mu Young says he has to further investigate the place, so he'd like me to deliver the letters he wrote to Manji during the past few days.\r\nLet's deliver Mu Young's message to Manji in Perion. He thanked you for all your help as you set out to deliver his letters.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's deliver Mu Young's messages to Manji.

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog

string.name: name
string.value: A Request to His Apprentice
Manji, who has received Mu Young's messages, seems to have a favor to ask of you.
Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is currently in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Let's deliver Manji's request to Mu Young.

Manji has asked that you deliver his request to Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple inside the dungeon. Upon receiving Manji's request, Mu Young promised himself that he would always remain mindful of his master's request.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's go find Mu Young, who is in the Underground Temple in the central dungeon of Victoria.

string.name: parent
string.value: Manji and Balrog

string.name: name
string.value: Stay Away From Strangers
Mu Young says he's met a strange man. Could it be someone who is related to the impending revival of Balrog? Let's go find Mu Young.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. He has asked you to look into this and see if you can gather some information about the man. Let's investigate the strange man.

Mu Young claims that he spotted a strange man at the entrance of the Underground Temple. At the request of Mu Young, who has asked you to look into this strange man to see if you can gather some information, you began your investigation.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's start a conversation with the strange man.

string.name: name
string.value: This is something you can make with Balrog Skin.
Let's start a conversation with the strange man.
The strange man said he'd show you something if you bring him 20 sheets of Balrog Skin.
He made you a scroll using the sheets of Balrog Skin.

string.name: parent
string.value: The Strange Man

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's collect 20 sheets of Balrog Skin and take them to the strange man.

string.name: name
string.value: Tristan's Successor
You hear Tristan's Spirit calling you from the Underground Temple. Let's rush over to Tristan's Tomb.

Tristan's Spirit says he'd acknowledge you as his successor if you prevent Balrog from reviving. Wow, the successor of a legendary hero of Maple World? That's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! Let's do it!
Upon preventing Balrog's revival 200 times, you have been named Tristan's Successor.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's stop Balrog from reviving 200 times.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Stop Balrog from reviving 200 times.

string.name: name
string.value: To Tristan's Tomb
You could not defeat the Jr. Balrog in Tristan's Tomb and you want to give it another shot.
You could not defeat the Jr. Balrog in Tristan's Tomb and you want to give it another shot.
You went back to Tristan's Tomb and met Tristan's Spirit after finally defeating the Jr. Balrog.

string.value: Horny Mushroom Caps Research
Apparently, the #bThe Rememberer#k of Sleepywood is conducting studies on mutated Horny Mushrooms. You should go to Sleepywood to find out more.

Some Horny Mushrooms have been acting really mean lately, and there seems to be something suspicious going on. #bThe Rememberer has noticed the change and is conducting studies on these supicious Horny Mushrooms.\r\n
You helped #bThe Rememberer# with his research on Horny Mushrooms, but he seems to need some more information.

The Rememberer says that he must continue his research and that the raging Horny Mushrooms must be stopped in the meantime.

Through research, you discovered that a place known as the Mushroom Castle is in trouble, but even #bThe Rememberer#k had no clue where that is. He recommends you ask #bKarcasa#k in the desert for some information…
You met #bKarcasa#k and asked about the Mushroom Castle, to no avail.

Is he trying to make a fool out of you?

string.value: Scorpions Can't Listen at Night
What? He can't tell you because the Meerkats may overhear? What to do? You'd better talk to the Camel again.
He agrees that the Meerkats might eavesdrop and tells you to go to '#bSahel 1#k' for a private conversation.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Go on to the To the Mushroom Castle! quest.

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...

string.name: name
string.value: To the Mushroom Castle!
You can finally find out what the Mushroom Castle is all about.
The Camel Cab tells you that you need to be over Level 30 for him to give information about the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Reach Lv. 30

string.name: parent
string.value: About the Mushroom Castle...
Camel Cab can finally share information about the Mushroom Castle now that you've reached Level 30! You'd better undergo job advancement and listen to the Camel Cab talk about the Mushroom Castle.

string.name: name
string.value: Camel's Training Session 1 (Repeatable)
Apparently, the Camel Cab is willing to help you train until you reach Level 30.
The Camel Cab helped you train until you reached Level 30.

Apparently, the Camel Cab is willing to help you train until you reach Level 30.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 5,000\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Lim and the Subway

#eJake#k, who works at the #eKerning Ciy Subway Turnstile#k, wants to ask you for a favor. You'd better go talk to him.\r\n#bTip - At the entrance of the subway station in Kerning City, you'll see Shumi sitting down in front.

Jake at the Kerning City subway station needs help. Up north, there's a #e#bsubway station that stopped midway through construction#k#n. Apparently the place is infested with monsters. #e#bMr. Lim#k#n has been sent there to assess the damage, and Jake wants you to follow to see how bad the damage is.\r\nYou should head over to the #e#bConstruction Site North of Kerning City#k#n and find the subway station that's under construction, so you can find Mr. Lim.

Jake, who works at the Kerning City subway station, requested that you meet Mr. Lim at the Construction Site North of Kerning City. Mr. Lim then pleaded with you to check out the old subway platforms for him.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: You talked to #bMr. Lim#k, who was inside the #bAbandoned Subway Train#k located at the Construction Site North of Kerning City.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1,000\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: My dream is to...
Blake has a dream...but he wants you to talk to him about it in a little bit, since he's in the middle of something.
Blake wants to be a singer! Will his dream come true? Talk to #bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records. She's shopping in Kerning Square.
Will Blake's dream ever come true?

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 1,320 EXP\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Lana's Decision
#bLana#k the CEO of Big Hit Records says she needs a few moments to decide whether Blake has what it takes to make a big debut. Talk to her in a minute to see what she decides.
Finally! Blake will be able to make his debut! But first, you must convince the seven star chef #bRobby Fray#k to cater Blake's afterparty.
What? #bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? Well, you gotta do what you gotta do to help Blake make his debut. Talk to Robby Fray again.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 1,280 EXP\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Convince Robby Fray
#bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? If that's what it takes to convince a seven star chef to cater Blake's party, then that's what it takes. Get to it!
Robby Fray needs Bubbles to make his specialty cocktails. Head over to the 1st-2nd floor of Kerning Square and collect Bubbles from the Bubble Teas.
#bRobby Fray#k needs a favor? Well, you gotta do what you gotta do to help Blake make his debut. Talk to Robby Fray again.

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Recipe
You perform a favor for #Robby Fray#k so he would agree to cater the party, but when you go to turn it in, he screams in dismay. It seems like you'll have to do him another favor...

Uh oh. Without his Secret Recipe, Robby Fray can't bear to keep living, let alone cater a party. Hopefully you can find his Secret Recipe before somebody else nabs it.\r\nIt should be with the Doll Claw Games on the 3rd-4th floor of the Shopping Center, right?\r\n
Whew! Finally, you convinced Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to cater the party. Report the good news to #bLana#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Reception Party Preparation, Done!
After all that, you were finally able to convince Robby Fray, the seven star chef, to help. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
Next on the list is getting a makeup artist. Head over to #bTina#k and see if she'll help.
You met and talked with #bTina#k, but it seemed like she wanted you to do something for her first.

string.name: name
string.value: Tina's Proposition
Help #bTina#k with her request, then ask her to help with Blake's debut.
Tina needs key chains to give out to her clients. Collect the key chains and dolls from the Doll Claw Games.
You were able to get a makeup artist for the job. Deliver the good news to #bLana#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Makeup Artist, Booked!
You booked a makeup artist. Report the good news to #bLana#k.
This time, you must book a hair stylist. Go over to #bMarshall#k and ask for help.
#bMarshall#k says he can't design Blake's hair. Why not? This can't be good. Discuss it with #bLana#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Marshall's Refusal
Marshall refuses to help. What is stopping him? Report the bad news to #bLana#k.
Find the Locker Key Marshall lost and open the #bLocker#k at the subway station. He supposedly lost his Locker Key on the 5th-6th floor of the Shopping Center.
You found the Locker Key #bMarshall#k lost, but the locker closed shortly after you opened it. Try opening the locker one more time.

string.name: name
string.value: Legendary Scissors
Open the #bLocker#k again.
When you open the Locker, you find the #bLegendary Scissors#k. Hurry and deliver the scissors to Marshall.
#bMarshall#k was ecstatic when you delivered the Legendary Scissors and agreed to style Blake's hair in a heartbeat. Give #bLana#k the good news.

string.name: name
string.value: Hair Stylist, Booked!
Thanks to your hard work, Marshall agreed to take the gig. Give #bLana#k the good news.
Lana suggested that you ask #bLala#k, Blake's number one fan, for help with the costumes.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear that Blake was finally make a debut, and asked you to give her some time to brainstorm.

string.name: name
string.value: Costume Preparation
Lala is thrilled to hear that Blake is finally making his debut and happily agrees to help with the costumes. Assist #bLala#k to prepare the costumes.
Collect the costumes and props for Blake's debut performance and take them over to #bLala#k.
#bLala#k was thrilled to hear about Blake's debut and asked you to give her some time to think about which costumes would be best for the performance.

string.name: name
string.value: Costume Preparation, Done!
You've completed the costume preparation, but she says something is still missing. What could possibly be missing? Ask #bLala#k what else she needs.
#bLala#k says she needs more than just costumes and wants you to bring perfume that would complete each costume.
#bLala#k wasn't sure which scent would go best with which costume, so she gave you some time to think about it. \r\nHm, you don't seem too sure either. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Rose Scent
You aren't sure which scent would go best with which costume. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this rose scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the rose scent would go best with the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Time to tell #bLala#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Freesia Scent
Lana says the rose scent is perfect for the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Time to let #bLala#k know.
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this freesia scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the freesia scent would go best with the Female Mannequin's Wig. Go tell #bLala#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Lavender Scent
Lana says the freesia scent is perfect for the Female Mannequin's Wig. Better tell #bLala#k.
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this lavender scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the lavender scent wasn't exactly perfect for the Fedora, but that it would work. \r\nAsk #bLana#k what other tasks are left on her to-do list.

string.name: name
string.value: Music Preparation
Lana says she needs to pick out a song for Blake. Talk to #bLana#k for more details on what she needs.
Blake needs a song to perform. Find the CDs at the music shop on the 7th-8th floor and deliver them to #bLana#k.
Lana said the existing hits weren't good enough and asked you to get a new song from #bMaestro Rho#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Request for a New Song

Lana wants you to request a new song from a genius composer? Maestro Rho is not only known for his talents but is also infamous for his arrogance. Oh well, gotta do what you gotta do. Go talk to #bMaestro Rho#k and request a new song.
Destroy the Cheap Amplifiers and find Maestro Rho's lost MP3 player. Follow the sound coming from the 7th-8th floor to where #bJune#k is on duty.

When you found the MP3 player and returned it to Maestro Rho, he said he wanted to listen to some music before helping you. How rude! But this is for Blake, so you should ask him again... And try to be nice.

string.name: name
string.value: Composition Fee
You found and returned Maestro Rho's MP3 player. That ought to be enough to get a new song, right? Ask #bMaestro Rho#k for a new song Blake can perform during his debut concert.
A composition fee? Well, that's somewhat understandable since he's a brilliant composer. Find the Fancy Amplifier Cables on the 7th-8th floor and deliver them to #bMaestro Rho#k.
You have paid the fee, but he still seems reluctant to give you the song. What's up with that? Talk to #bMaestro Rho#k again.

string.name: name
string.value: Say "NO" to Plagiarism
Master Rho doesn't seem like he's ready to hand over the new song even though you've already paid the fee. Why is he so hesitant? Ask #bMaestro Rho#k if everything is okay.

Spirit of Rock is playing Maestro Rho's music without proper approval. Defeat Spirit of Rock and listen to the last song he plays.\r\n\r\nIt is highly recommended that you turn up the volume a bit in the system options so you don't miss any important parts of the song while you're listening.
You have destroyed Spirit of Rock as Maestro Rho requested. But he's still reluctant to let go of his Composition Notes. You don't have much time left. Ask #bMaestro Rho#k for the new song.

string.name: name
string.value: The New Song
He must have found his Composition Notes by now. Go and get the Composition Notes from #bMaestro Rho#k.
Deliver the #bComposition Notes#k to #bLana#k, the CEO of Big Hit Records.
All preparations for Blake's debut performance are now complete. Go over to #bBlake#k and give him the good news.

string.name: name
string.value: Debut Preparations Completed
Everything seems to be in order. Confirm one more time with #bLana#k.
Lana says everything for Blake's debut performance is good to go and wants you to give #bBlake#k the good news.
Blake was beyond happy and gave you a special gift. He then said you should go see #bJune#k at Kerning Square.

string.name: name
string.value: Admission to the VIP Zone
Could it be...? Is it really the VIP Zone in Kerning Square? Rush over to #bJune#k!
He says he'll let you enter the VIP Zone if you bring him VIP Tickets. He says you can get them from any monster in Kerning Square.
He says the VIP Zone can be entered once every 30 minutes. Go see #bJune#k when the 30 minutes are up.

string.name: name
string.value: Blake's Dream
Jake, who works at the subway station at the center of Kerning City has something on his mind.\r\nHead over to #bJake#k and see what's going on.\r\n
Jake says he wants nothing more than to see Blake achieve his dream. Who's Blake anyway?\r\nPass through the turnstile and go over to Kerning Square Station.\r\n
Blake has asked you to wait, as he was in the middle of something.

string.name: name
string.value: The Last Song
Try to remember the last song Spirit of Rock performed.\r\nIf you can't remember, the only thing left to do is to destroy Spirit of Rock again.
Try to remember the last song Spirit of Rock performed.\r\nIf you can't remember, the only thing left to do is to destroy Spirit of Rock again.
You told Maestro Rho the last song Spirit of Rock performed.

You should take the #bletter of recommendation#k from the job instructor and visit #b#p1300005##k in the Mushking Empire.

string.value: The Test
You should meet with #b#p1300005##k of the Mushking Empire.
In order to prove your worth as a candidate for saving Mushking Empire, you should gather #b50 #t4000499#s#k and hand them to #p1300005#.
You proved that you're worthy to save Mushking Empire.

string.name: summary
string.value: You eliminated some Renegade Spores, gathered up #b50 Mutated Spores#k, and brought them back to #p1300005#.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 11,500\r\nCan proceed to 'The Story Behind the Case' quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: The Story Behind the Case
The Head Security Officer of Mushking Empire has something to say.
You need to visit the Mushking Empire's Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
You listened intently as the Mushking Empire's Secretary of Domestic Affairs gave you a timeline of what happened.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should pay a visit to the Mushking Empire's #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 4,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Exploring Mushroom Forest (1)' quest\r\n

string.name: name
string.value: Exploring Mushroom Forest (1)
In order to break through the barrier in Mushroom Forest and rescue the princess…
You should investigate the barrier inside Mushroom Forest and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.\r\n#bInvestigate the barrier in Mushroom Forest : #R2314# / 1 complete.
You looked at the obstruction and saw that it was a powerful magic barrier that cannot be physically broken through. The Secretary of Magic of Mushking Empire might know what to do.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should investigate the powerful barrier inside the Mushroom Forest and report the results to the #bSecretary of Domestic Affairs#k.

string.name: demandSummary

The #bSecretary of Magic#k of Mushking Empire might have an idea about what to do.
You reported the condition of the barrier in Mushroom Forest to the #bSecretary of Magic#k of Mushking Empire.

You're looking for a clue about how to break the barrier from the #bSecretary of Magic#k.
You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.
You told #bScarrs#k about the strange yet powerful barrier in the Mushroom Forest.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should visit #bScarrs#k, the mushroom scholar.

string.name: rewardSummary

string.value: Killer Mushroom Spores (1)

You need to gather the #b100 Poison Mushroom Caps#k required to make the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k and take them to #b#p1300007##k.
You gathered the #b100 Poison Mushroom Caps#k required to make the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k and gave them to #b#p1300007##k.

You gave all the ingredients required for producing the #bKiller Mushroom Spore Potion#k to Scarrs.

string.value: Sending Provisions (1)
Is there a way you can help the soldiers of Mushking Empire, who are running low on supplies? #b#p1300003##k says he wants to have a word with you.
You need to gather #b200 #t4000502#s#k for #b#p1300005##k.
You gathered 200 #b#t4000502#s#k and gave them to #b#p1300005##k to help lessen their supply shortage.

string.name: summary

You need to find the stolen Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire and bring it to #b#p1300003##k.
Seems like #b#p1300003##k wants to tell you something…
You found the #bPrime Minister#k, who stole the #bRoyal Seal of the Mushking Empire#k. You reclaimed the seal and returned it to #b#p1300003##k.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's Violetta?
You found #bPrincess #p1300002##k trapped inside the wedding hall.

string.name: name
string.value: The Story of Betrayal
So who's behind the force that brought down the Mushking Empire?
Eliminate the #bPrime Minister#k, otherwise known as the ultimate traitor.
You eliminated the #bPrime Minister#k, otherwise known as the ultimate traitor.

string.name: name
string.value: The Identity of the Princess
You finally saw the princess, whose looks were indescribable, except to say that her looks were the #bstuff of the highest level of mushroom beauty#k.
You finally get to see the Princess's face!
Go find out the true identity of the Princess.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating the Rest
Apparently, the castle is still populated with the minions of the #bPrime Minister#k...
You need to find the rest of the Prime Minister's minions. They are apparently hiding in an area that can be reached through #bSkyscraper 3#k.
You found the minions of the #bPrime Minister#k and took them all out.

string.name: summary
string.value: You should eliminate the rest of the Prime Minister's army. They are apparently hiding in an area that can be reached through #bSkyscraper 3#k.

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Find the Prime Minister's remaining minions.

string.name: name
string.value: Truth Revealed
Now that everything has been revealed, you get the unenviable task of explaining it all to his highness, the Mushking.
You have to bring the #b#t4032387##k given to you by #bPrincess #p1300002##k to #b#p1300000##k and explain what really happened.
You explained to #b#p1300000##k everything that happened.

string.name: summary

You helped eliminate the remaining minions of King Pepe.

You found the training center for beginner warriors. You'll be able to receive your first set of training lessons from the trainer, Power B. Fore.

string.value: Team Training is Fun! (Party)
They say if you train in a group, the journey becomes more fun for everyone. Get details from Power B. Fore.
They say if you train in a group, the journey becomes more fun for everyone. The journey is long, but if you work with others, you'll all be able to achieve your goals!
You were able to successfully complete Power B. Fore's training sessions.

string.name: summary
string.value: Party hunting allows you to complete quests much more quickly than attempting them alone.

string.name: summary

string.name: name
string.value: Maplemas Surprise Party!
There's an awesome Maplemas party going on in Happyville!
Extra extra! Happyville is holding an amazing party for Maplemas! For more details, please go see Rooney.
I talked to Rooney about the impending Maplemas party. Apparently it's a dress-up party, so I better go talk to Cliff about a possible potion for transformation.

string.name: name
string.value: In Preparation for the Party
I better go see Cliff so I can attend the party that takes place in Happyville.
I have to gather up 50 Rascal's Snowflakes in order to receive the special potion required to transform.
Now that I am ready to dress-up and transform, it's time to party!

string.name: name
string.value: A Secret Note
A secret note came from the Snow Spirit of Happyville. I wonder what happened?

I finally realized the true intent of the Snow Spirit as she strives to protect Happyville from disaster. In order to ruin Scrooge's plan, she asked Alcaster of El Nath for some much needed help. I better go find him immediately!
I gave Alcaster a note from Snow Spirit. Now it's time for me to wait for his reply.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcaster's Reply
Alcaster says he has something for Snow Spirit.
He handed me a reply letter to Snow Spirit, a note that contains the exact method we should take to defeat Scrooge. I better go see her right now!

I gave the Snow Spirit Alcaster's reply letter. She stood quietly for a moment, then gave me something called Force of the Spirit, which she said was the key to defeating Scrooge. What exactly is this?

string.name: name
string.value: Save the Snowman!
Scrooge seems to have started putting his plan into reality. I better go see Snow Spirit.
Protect the snowman from Scrooge and his men!
I was able to protect the symbol of luck here in Happyville, the giant snowman. That really made my day.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Red Dahlia - Pirate
Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy, shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Pirate

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Pirate
The wife of a sailor, eh? I'll bet she needs some help.

I spoke with the lovely Angelique, and I'm going to deliver #b25 Soft Feathers#k to her husband, Richard, for her. He works on Tae Gong's ship in Aqua Road. Once I have everything, I'll head there, drop everything off, and let Angelique know her husband has everything.
I delivered the materials to Richard and he thanked me. His wife must be happy...

string.name: name
string.value: Amoria : Cupid's Courier - Pirate

string.name: parent
string.value: Cupid's Courier - Pirate
Okay, so now I gotta go see the sailor himself. Where must he be?
I delivered everything to Richard and he asked me delivered his letter to his wife.
I delivered everything to Richard and returned to Angelique. She gave me something nice, and I can go back to here anytime for a quick job.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Discovering Secrets

string.name: parent
string.value: The Terror of MV!
Charles the Adventurer prepared something for all Maplers... Let's go find him.
Charles has asked us to get 7 secret letters. Charles said we can find them in a pile of stones. Where should we start to look? \n\n#i4032118# #t4032118# #b#c4032118#/7#k
You've accomplished your job and gained EXP and 1500 mesos. You can move on to the next quest!

string.name: name
string.value: Demise of a Madman

string.name: parent
string.value: The Terror of MV!
Charles has prepared a second task for us. Let's go find him! (You have to form a party for this task)
Charles has asked us to eliminate the madman known as "MV". \n\n#o9400705# #r#a50661##k
You've accomplished your task and gained EXP, 2500 mesos and a special gift!

string.name: name
string.value: MV's Treasure
Lara is looking for a brave adventurer who wants to prove their strength and courage by a dangerous task--finding MV's Treasure.
Lara asked me to find MV's Sabre in MV's Treasure Dungeon. She said that many monsters are guarding the treasure so I should be prepared. \n\n#i4032119# #t4032119# #b#c4032119#/1#k
Lara was really happy when I gave her MV's Sabre, and she gave me a nice gift in return.

string.name: name
string.value: A Headache for Treasure Hunters
Lara has a new source of trouble recently. Let's visit her and find out what's troubling her.

Now I need to take some action. Let's show them who's boss! For Lara! 

#o9400741# #r#a281101##k
#o9400742# #r#a281102# #k
#o9400743# #r#a281103##k
I've done a perfect job with what Lara asked, she is now happy again!

string.name: name
string.value: Cool as Ice
I think it's about time Icebyrd gave me some answers...I should go speak with him.
I've spoken with Icebyrd, and he seems cryptic-what is he hiding?

Icebyrd has revealed the truth to me at last-he was contacted by Subani to establish New Leaf City as well as anchor Masteria to the Maple World. He was sworn to secrecy, and to this day, can never leave the continent. It appears that Subani and Icebyrd are the first line of defense against the demonic Naricain, and by defeating his Twisted Masters; I am now his enemy as well. He also mentioned that our adventures here have just begun...with the Twisted Masters out of the way, what's next? Perhaps answers lie within the #bKrakian Jungle#k, and the mysterious city there...only time will tell!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: 4 Candles
If I go see #b#p9000021##k, I can receive a candle? A special MapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary event...? Sounds interesting~

#b#p9000021##k told me if I safely guard the candles for 30 minutes, I will receive a #b#t04001167##k. Since I have to maintain connection in order to protect the candles, might as well have fun and play all day today.

I received a #b#t04001167##k!\nAfter safely keeping the candles, I received a #t04001167#. I should store away the #b#t04220045##k that I received from #p9000021#.\n#p9000021# said if I collect 5 cake pieces and complete the birthday cake, I will get a large gift.

string.name: name
string.value: 4 Year Anniversary Cake
I finished the birthday cake for #rMapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary#k! \nI should take the cake to #b#p9000021##k.
I finished the birthday cake for #rMapleStory's 4 Year Anniversary#k! \nI should take the cake to #b#p9000021##k.
I delivered the finished cake to #b#p9000021##k. He was so thrilled as if it were his own birthday... I wonder what the connection is between #p9000021# and MapleStory?

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04001126# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party.\n\n #i04032306# #t04032306# #b#c04032306##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody everyday.

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04032307# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party. \n\n #i04032307# #t04032307# #b#c04032307##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody everyday..

string.name: name
string.value: Preparing for Cody's 4 Year Anniversary Party!
#b#p9200000##k is said to be preparing something for MapleStory's 4 year anniversary. I should go see what he's up to.
Cody asked me to get him a #t04032308# from the Cake dungeon in NLC so he can prepare for Maple's 4 year anniversary party.\n\n #i04032308# #t04032308# #b#c04032308##k / 4

#p9200000# was thankful and gave me a special gift. It feels good to know that I've contributed to the preparation of Maple's 4 year anniversary party. I heard that throughout the Maple 4 year anniversary celebration, they will need candles everyday so I should go see Cody everyday.

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: In Search of the Miwok Artifact
I heard Kopee Relicseeker is looking to find the #bMiwok Artifact#k. Let's go ask Kopee Relicseeker what she's after.
Kopee Relicseeker and Toh Relicseeker say they are looking for Miwok Artifacts that have been lost. Let's acquire the #bMiwok Artifact Piece#k from the monsters and take them to her.
Kopee Relicseeker was so happy to find a sign of the Miwok Artifact. She and Toh Relicseeker said they would stay for a while and further search for the Miwok Artifact.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Tribal Ring: Circle of Ancient Thought
Happy to have found the remnant of the Miwok Artifacts, Kopee says she has something to tell me. Let's go and see her.
Kopee offered to make me a Legendary Tribal Ring using the belongings of her Miwok ancestors! I should collect every artifact I find and take my findings to Kopee.

Kopee, using the ancestors' belongings, made me a ring. I received a Circle of Ancient Thought from her! She told me she'd make me one every time I bring her an artifact. I'd better take what I find to Kopee.

string.name: name
string.value: The Legendary Tribal Ring: Circle of Ancient Strength
Happy to have found the remnant of the Miwok Artifacts, Kopee says she has something to tell me. Let's go and see her.
Kopee offered to make me a Legendary Tribal Ring using the belongings of the Miwok ancestors! I should collect every artifact I find and take my findings to Kopee.

Kopee, using the ancestors' belongings, made me a ring. I received a Circle of Ancient Strength from her! She told me she'd make me one every time I bring her an artifact. I'd better take what I find to Kopee.

string.name: name
string.value: Soft and Cozy Chief's Chair
Kopee says she'll make a nice chair for the person who has released the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k. Let's go talk to her.

Kopee says that she'll make you a #bMiwok Chief's Chair#k as a token of her appreciation for your help. She says if I go and talk to Toh Relicseeker and release the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k 20 times using the #bEnchanted Scroll#k, she'll make me the chair. It's a great opportunity for me to receive a reward and the Chief's Chair from the Miwok Artifact.
Kopee gave me a Miwok Chief's Chair as a gift, thanking me for finding the Miwok Artifact. It's an impressive chair that is both soft and cozy.

string.name: summary
string.value: Release the seal on the Miwok Artifact 20 times

string.name: name
string.value: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill
I hear that #b#p2040050##k over in Sleepywood is working on a way to scroll items without equipping them. I should go see Eurek and see how far along his research is--maybe I can learn how to do it!

I spoke with Eurek and he's perfected his method for scrolling unequipped items. I've agreed to gather some materials for him for a trip he's taking. I'll need to get #b#p2040050##k everything he needs: 

#t1302013# #b#c1302013#/1#k
#t2043000# #b#c2043000#/1#k
#t2040000# #b#c2040000#/1#k
#t2040400# #b#c2040400#/1#k
#t2040600# #b#c2040600#/1#k
#b1,000,000 mesos. I can't wait for him to show me how to perform this new skill!

I returned with the materials that #b#p2040050##k asked for and learned how to use scrolls on unequipped items! Eurek also mentioned that in his travels, he'd heard rumors of a powerful monster residing somewhere in Leafre--even stronger than Zakum.

string.value: Spirit Week Event - September 29th
#b#p9010010##k apparently has a special gift in celebration of the new school year...
#b#p9010010##k says that the gift will be mine if only I can keep the candle from blowing out for 1 hour. How exciting!
I received the #bTeleport Rock#k as a gift! This should come in handy if ever I'm trying to go somewhere that's difficult to get to.

string.value: Spirit Week Event - September 28th
I think #b#p9010010##k has something special for me.
#b#p9010010##k says I can trade in a scroll for a scroll cast with her magic spell, which will increase my Success Rate by 5%. I should think about this one, since I can only trade 5 times today.
#b#p9010010##k has given me a scroll with a higher success rate in return. She has a kind heart.

string.name: name
string.value: Meeting the Training Instructor
#b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he will help you train.
He says you can receive additional training from #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k.
The Path of a Warrior..

string.name: summary
string.value: Please go see #b#p9201119##k in #b#m102000000##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 200 Able to proceed to 'Advanced Training-1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'Advanced Training-2' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Training-1
#b#@9201119:#k in #b#m102000000##k says he'll begin the first training.

#b#@9201119:##k's first training requires you to hunt #r#o1110101#s#k.\n\n They can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k. Let's report to #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have completed #b#p9201119##k's first training!

string.name: summary
string.value: Monster Hunt

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,200 Able to proceed to 'Reporting the Training Results' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Training-2
#b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he'll begin the second training.

#b#@9201119:##k's second training requires you to collect #r#t4000005#s#k.

 #r#o1110101#s#k drop #r#t4000005#s#k.

And #r#o1110101##k can be easily found in #b#m101040000##k and #b#m102010000##k.

Let's report back to #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have completed #b#p9201119##k's second training!

string.name: summary
string.value: Hunt the monsters and bring drop items.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,200 Able to proceed to 'Reporting the Training Results' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Reporting the Training Results
Talk to #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completing your training.
Report to #b#@1022000:##k who lives at the very top of #b#m102000000##k since you've completed the training.
You have reported to #p1022000# upon completing all of #b#p9201119##k's training courses.

string.name: summary
string.value: Please find #b#p1022000##k in #b#m102000000##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 #Wbasic# #i2000002:# #t2000002:# #c2000002# 50 #i2000003:# #t2000003:# #c2000003# 50 Able to proceed to 'Meeting Ervine' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Meeting Ervine

string.name: parent
string.value: Drought in Perion
#b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he has a favor to ask. Let's go see him.

#b#m102000000##k gets its water from other regions, as it has always been a region of very little moisture.

But as of late, the water supply has been cut off, resulting in a drought across Perion.

Go talk to #b#@9201120:##k, the plumber in #b#m103000000##k.
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says there might be a problem with the Water Pipe.

string.name: summary
string.value: Please see #b#p9201120##k in #b#m103000000##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Inspecting the Water Pipe' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Inspecting the Water Pipe

string.name: parent
string.value: Drought in Perion
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says there might be a problem with the Water Pipe.

Please inspect the Fire Hydrants to identify the cause of the problem.

Go to #b#m102040000##k and inspect the Fire Hydrants, and bring 3 #r#t4001340#s#k.
(Attack the Fire Hydrants with your weapon.)

Report back to #b#@9201120:##k in Kerning City upon completion.
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says he knows the reason why the Water Pipe is clogged.

string.name: summary
string.value: Inspect the Fire Hydrants and bring 3 chunks of #r#t4001340##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 700 Able to proceed to 'Sticky Slimes!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Sticky Slimes!

string.name: parent
string.value: Drought in Perion
#b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k says he knows the reason why the Water Pipe is clogged.
#r#o210100##k was responsible for the clogged Water Pipe.\nLet's go over to #b#m102040000##k and hunt 30 #r#o210100#s#k! Report back to #b#@9201120:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.
In your first mission as a Warrior, you have stopped the drought in Perion.

string.name: summary
string.value: Monster Hunt

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 800 Able to proceed to 'Visiting Henesys' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Visiting Henesys
#b#@9201120:##k in Kerning City says something is going on in #b#m100000000##k...
Apparently, #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k is angry with anyone and anything that has to do with Perion. Let's talk to him and find out what that's all about.
#bChief Stan#k hates #bPerion.#k

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'What Does Chief Stan Like?' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: What Does Chief Stan Like?

string.name: parent
string.value: What's going on in Henesys?
#b#@1012106:##k in #b#m100000000##k says she knows what #b#@1012003:##k likes.

She says she'll make you something #b#@1012003:##k likes if you bring her the following materials.

#r#t4001343:##k-15
(#r#o1210101##ks drop them, so you can easily find them in #b#m100020000##k.)

#r#t4001344:##k-10
(#r#o1110101##ks drop them and they can be easily found in the #b#m100040000##k map.)

#r#t4001345:##k-1
(#r#o1210102##ks drop them.)

Report back to #b#@1012106:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
It's been said that #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k greatly enjoys playing the guitar.

string.name: name
string.value: The Reason Why Chief Stan is Livid

string.name: parent
string.value: What's going on in Henesys?
It's been said that #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k greatly enjoys playing the guitar.
#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k needs help investigating the incident. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Searching for Clues' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for Clues

string.name: parent
string.value: What's going on in Henesys?
#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k needs help investigating the incident. Let's talk to him.

At the time of the attack, the suspect dropped something, though he couldn't remember what it was since he was knocked unconscious.

He suggests you go to #b#m104040002##k and investigate the area. He says the monsters nearby may have consumed it, so you might be able to find some sort of clue if you continue to hunt them.

Report back to #b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You heard why #b#p1012003##k in #b#m100000000##k was so angry, and you've cleared the misunderstanding. In any case, the suspect still remains a mystery.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,000 Able to proceed to 'Heading Over to The Nautilus!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Heading Over to The Nautilus!

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is the suspect?
#b#@1012003:##k, who has been keeping an eye on #r#t4001341:##k, says he needs some help. Let's talk to him.
He says to go over to #b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k and investigate #r#t4001341:##k.
#b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he's finished analyzing the clues. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Investigation in Progress' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Investigation in Progress

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is the suspect?
#b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he's finished analyzing the clues. Let's talk to him.

Although #b#p1032001##k in Ellinia has received a request to further investigate the matter, he doesn't like talking to strangers.\n\n You may be able to find what he likes, however, if you go see #b#@1092002:##k in the #b#m120000300##k. Let's rush over!
#b#@1092002:##k says he'll make something #b#@1032001:##k likes. Let's go find him at the #b#m120000300##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 200 Able to proceed to 'A Special Wine' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: A Special Wine

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is the suspect?
#b#@1092002:##k says he'll make something #b#@1032001:##k likes. Let's go find him at the Basement of the Nautilus.

He says he needs the following ingredients in order to make the #rV.I. Orange Mushroom Wine#k.

1 #rPig Shaped Bottle#k (a drop item from Ribbon Pigs)
1 #rPig Ribbon#k (a drop item from Ribbon Pigs)
20 #rOrange Mushroom Caps#k (a drop item from Orange Mushrooms)

Report back to #b#@1092002:##k in #bthe Nautilus#k when you collect all the items.
#b#@1032001:##k in #b#m101000000##k is known to love wine. Let's go find him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,000 #Wbasic# #i4032478:# #t4032478:# #c4032478# 1 Able to proceed to 'Solving the Mystery' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Solving the Mystery

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is the suspect?
#b#@1032001:##k in #b#m101000000##k is known to love wine. Let's go find him.
The suspect was #b#@1040000:##k in #b#m106010100##k. Let's rush over to #b#m100000000##k and inform #b#@1012003:##k.
You have revealed the hidden secret of the Iron Fragment and found the suspect. It was #b#@1040000:##k in #b#m106010100##k. A random thought: collecting ingredients for the wine was a lot of work.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Catching the Suspect' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Catching the Suspect

string.name: parent
string.value: Revealing Secrets
#b#@1012003:##k in Henesys says we need to catch the suspect. Let's talk to him.
#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k says to rush over to see the #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2,000 Able to proceed to 'Who Changed Him?' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Who Changed Him?

string.name: parent
string.value: Revealing Secrets
#b#@1012003:##k in #b#m100000000##k says to rush over to see the #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k.
Let's find the #b#@9201119:##k in #b#m102000000##k and get to the bottom of this!

The #bTraining Instructor#k had been consumed by demons, which led him to attack #b#p1012003##k. Then, in order to fill his spot, he had changed his face and location with #b#p1040000##k.\nAs a result of your persistent chase, you were able to uncover the demon's evil scheme with a single clue.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Dances with Andras!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Andras!
#b#@1022000:##k in #b#m102000000##k says he knows something about #rAndras#k. Let's talk to him.
Defeat #rAndras#k the demon!\n\nThere is a Dark Portal in #b#m102020300##k, and you can enter with Andras's emblem. Report back to #b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k after you defeat Andras.

string.value: Unveiling the Secret
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he's identified the emblem. Let's go see what he's discovered.

He says the emblem signifies #rMarbas#k, who is known for spreading diseases. He was sealed in #bEllinia#k, but someone has broken the seal.

First things first, though. He says you he needs a lot of Trees to stop the virus from spreading.
He says to hunt #rDark Stumps#k and #rAxe Stumps#k.
(He says they can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)

Return to #b#@1022000:##k in Perion upon completion.
The emblem signified #rMarbas#k the demon; the virus was stopped by blocking the Water Pipe with the Trees.

string.value: Exp 1,200 Able to proceed to 'Returning to Ellinia' as next quest.

string.value: Returning to Ellinia

Let's go see #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k and hear what he knows about #rMarbas#k.
The person who sealed #rMarbas#k the demon was #b#p1032001##k in #bEllinia#k.

Defeat #rMarbas#k.

Report back to #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k after defeating #rMarbas#k.
You have defeated #rMarbas#k whose seal had been broken. However, who or what is responsible for releasing the seal remains a mystery.

They can be easily found in #b#m104040001##k.

Report back to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
You've completed #b#p9201118##k's first training.

string.name: rewardSummary

She says you must hunt the #rOrange Mushrooms#k and collect the #rOrange Mushroom Caps#k.

The #rOrange Mushrooms#k can be easily found in #b#m104040001##k.

Report back to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
You've completed #b#p9201118##k's second training!

#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k has asked that you bring the #rAntique#k for her. Let's talk to her.

string.value: Antique Search

Let's find the #rAntique#k by searching the boxes #b#m120000300##k, located in the Basement of Nautilus.\n\nReport back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k upon completion.
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says she's being pestered by #rRibbon Pigs#k. Let's talk to her.

She says you can easily find them in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k upon completion.

Take the Antique you received from #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k over to #b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k.

You have gone to #b#p1072008##k in #bNautilus#k at the request of #b#p9201118##k in #bHenesys#k, and have come back with the #rAntique#k from Leafre.\n\nBut the Antique looks much older than anticipated.

string.value: The Legend Has It That...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legend of Ancient Bow
#b#@9201118:##k in #bHenesys#k says he knows someone who can tell you about the legend.

He says the fairies know the most about legends, but they are very reserved and will not talk to strangers.\n\nLet's go over to #bHenesys#k and talk to #b#@1012003:##k, who knows a good deal about the fairies.
#b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says he'll tell you what the fairies like. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'The Fairies Like...' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Fairies Like...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legend of Ancient Bow
#b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says he'll tell you what the fairies like. Let's talk to him.

The fairies are very fond of the sound of Ocarina.



#b#@1012003:##k says he will make you an Ocarina if you bring back the following items.

#rTree Branch#k(a drop item from #rStumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100050000##k.)
#rEllinia Tree Barrel#k(a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.)

Report back to #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1032101:##k in #bEllinia#k will welcome you if you give her the Ocarina. Let's go see her.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,200 #Wbasic# #i4032481:# #t4032481:# #c4032481# 1 Able to proceed to 'Solomon's Bow' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Solomon's Bow

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legend of Ancient Bow
#b#@1032101:##k in #bEllinia#k will welcome you if you give her the Ocarina. Let's go see her.
The #rAncient Bow#k is Solomon's Bow that was used to eliminate the demon. It is said to have been sealed in #b#m101010102##k, so let's head over there.
#b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k says he'd like to restore his lost memory.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Restoring the Memory of the Ancient Bow' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Restoring the Memory of the Ancient Bow

string.name: parent
string.value: The Legend of Ancient Bow
#b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k says he'd like to restore his lost memory.

He said his memory has been sealed, and has asked you to hunt the #rGreen Mushrooms#k nearby and bring back 20 #rMemory Fragments#k.\n\nReport back to #b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k upon completion.
The legend of the bow was about #rSolomon's Bow#k. But something seems incomplete.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,700 #Wbasic# #i4032483:# #t4032483:# #c4032483# 1 Able to proceed to 'Another Storyteller' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Another Storyteller

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k may also know something about Solomon's Bow. Let's talk to him.
#b#@1020000:##k says he's certainly seen the bow before, but that was about it.\n\nThen he suggests #b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k must know more about the bow. Let's talk to him.
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he has something else he wants to say about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 200 Able to proceed to 'Putting the Legend to a Test' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Putting the Legend to a Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k says he has something else he wants to say about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

He says to hunt 30 #rStumps#k in order to test the bow first.

He says you can easily find them in #b#m101040000##k as well as in #b#m102010000##k.

Let's report back to #b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k upon completion.
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k wants to know more about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600 Able to proceed to 'Revival of the Demon' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Revival of the Demon

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1022000:##k in #bPerion#k wants to know more about #rSolomon's Bow#k.

Initially disappointed at the weak bow, #b#@1022000:##k further did some inspection and found a faded emblem that was once sealed on the bow.

This must mean that the seal of the demon has been broken!

Rush over to #bKerning City#k and talk to #b#@1052001:##k, a very dependable source of information.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he's discovered the location of the demon, but you can't enter without a certain item. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'So the Demons Like Noise?' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: So the Demons Like Noise?

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he's discovered the location of the demon, but you can't enter without a certain item. Let's talk to him.

You must have a noisy instrument in order to enter the Dark Portal in #b#m104040002##k.
He says he'll make you a loud instrument if you bring him the following materials.

#rOrange Mushroom Cap#k(a drop item from #rOrange Mushrooms#k)#rOctopus Leg Stick#k(a drop item from #rOctopuses#k. There is a portal near the yellow barricade in #b#m103010000##k which leads to a hidden map where many Octopuses can be found.)
#rPumpkin Head#k(a drop item from #rRibbon Pigs#k that can be easily found in #b#m103020100##k.)

Report back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k when you finish collecting all the items.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k say he has located the demon but has no way of catching him. Let's talk to him first.

string.value: Exp 1,400 #Wbasic# #i4032482:# #t4032482:# #c4032482# 1 Able to proceed to 'Catching the Demon' as next quest.

string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k say he has located the demon but has no way of catching him. Let's talk to him first.
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k is said to be the descendant of the hero who made #rSolomon's Bow#k. Find her and see if you can get her to tell you how to recover the power of Solomon's Bow.
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says she knows how to restore the power of Solomon's Bow. Let's talk to her.

string.name: rewardSummary

string.name: parent
string.value: Solomon's Bow
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says she knows how to restore the power of Solomon's Bow. Let's talk to her.
She says you need a #rDemon Hunting Scroll#k in order to restore the power of #rSolomon's Bow#k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
You have restored the power of the legendary, demon-hunting #rSolomon's Bow#k and identified the location of #rAmdusias#k!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1,800 #Wbasic# #i1452084:# #t1452084:# #c1452084# 1 Able to proceed to 'The Final Battle with Amdusias' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Final Battle with Amdusias
#b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k says it is now time to defeat #rAmdusias#k the demon. Let's talk to her.

She says you can find the Dark Portal where #rAmdusias#k is hiding if you go to #b#m104040002##k. You can enter using #rDarkween's Monster Drum#k.

Defeat #rAmdusias#k!

Report back to #b#@1012100:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
You have defeated #rAmdusias#k whose seal has been broken. Who or what is responsible for breaking the seal, however, still remains a mystery.

string.value: Finding Muirhat

Let's go find #b#@1092007:##k in #bNautilus#k for additional training.
The Path of a Pirate..

string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k says she may know a way to reveal the portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k that has been covered. Let's go find her.

#b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k says she'll reveal the green portion of the map if you hunt #rSlimes#k and collect #rSquishy Liquids#k. Although #rSlimes#k are found everywhere, a great number of them can be found in #b#m101010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k upon completion.
#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says he may know of a way to unveil the rest of the map. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says there is no free lunch! He asks you to bring him some #rPork#k that would complement the fancy wine he just received as a gift.
He says it's a drop item that can be acquired from #rRibbon Pigs#k, which can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k upon completion.
#b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k says he may be able to uncover the red portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k says he may be able to uncover the red portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k says he can recover the portion of the map covered in red if you bring him a #rFlint#k. (a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)\n\nReport back to #b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k upon completion.
#b#@1020000:##k in #bPerion#k suggests that you go to #b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k for additional information. But first, let's talk to #b#@1020000:##k.

string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says the map is cursed with the blood of an animal, so you must calm the soul of the animal. Let's talk to her.

#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says you must have music to calm the soul.
She has asked you to bring back the following items.

#rLong Strong Stick#k(a drop item from #rStumps#k.)
#rSmall Snail Shell#k(a drop item from #rRed Snails#k.)
#rPiece of White Pants#k(a drop item from #rDark Stumps#k that can be easily found in #b#m102020100##k.)

#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k will be able to solve the last mystery. But first, let's talk to #b#@1022007:##k.

string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k will be able to solve the last mystery. But first, let's talk to #b#@1022007:##k.
Let's ask #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k for help in order to solve the mystery of the white portion on the #rDirty Treasure Map#k, since he's known to be an extremely reliable source.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he may be able to reveal the white portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'The Mystery of the White Portion' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Mystery of the White Portion

string.name: parent
string.value: Unveiling the Map
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he may be able to reveal the white portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k has asked you to bring him #rInk#k (a drop item from #rOctopuses#k) in order to uncover the mystery of the Treasure Map. He says there is a hidden portal that will take you to a location filled with #rOctopuses#k near the yellow barricade in #b#m103010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k upon completion.

The #rDirty Treasure Map#k is covered in Green, Red, and White.

Green was removed from the map using the Slime Eraser.
Red was vaporized by the Flint, and the curse of the animal's blood was released using Ayan Mercury's Microphone.
White, after being sprayed with the special Ink, quickly revealed the map.

The map has finally been completed!
