string.value: Exp 1,400 #Wbasic# #i4032489:# #t4032489:# #c4032489# 1 Able to proceed to 'The Completed Treasure Map' as next quest.

#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he doesn't have a clue where this location is, and instead, suggests that you visit #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k.
#b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k claims to know the location indicated on the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's go find him.

He says he's certain that he's seen it while he was visiting #bNautilus#k, and suggests you go to #b#m100030000##k to search and investigate the area.\n\nReport back to #b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k upon completion.
#b#@1012003:##k in #bHenesys#k says it is necessary that you look into the emblem on the #rOld Worn-out Paper#k. Let's talk to him.

string.value: The Completed Treasure Map

He tells you to find #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k in order to further investigate the emblem on the #rOld Worn-out Paper#k.
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the emblem signifies a demon. Let's talk to her.

string.value: There Are No Treasures?!

string.name: parent
string.value: The Completed Treasure Map
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the emblem signifies a demon. Let's talk to her.
#rCrocell#k who was sealed in the Bottom Floor of Nautilus has been released. Let's go find #b#@1092013:##k in the Generator Room and sort out this situation.
The Treasure Map has been completed, but it turned out to be the demon's prank!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 300 Able to proceed to 'Searching for the Demon' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for the Demon
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says the demon must be sealed again. Let's talk to her.

You will find a box you have not seen before in #b#m120000300##k. She says to use the #rOld Key#k you acquired awhile back to investigate the box, and that you will find a message from the demon.\n\nReport back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k upon completion.
You have found #rCrocell's Emblem#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 700 Able to proceed to 'Treasure, and Crocell the Demon' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Treasure, and Crocell the Demon
#b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k says it is now time to defeat #rCrocell#k. Let's go find her.

If you go to #b#m100030000##k, you will find the Dark Portal where #rCrocell#k is hiding. You can enter using #rCrocell's Emblem#k. Defeat #rCrocell#k!\n\nReport back to #b#@1072008:##k in #bNautilus#k upon completion.
Although you have defeated #rCrocell#k, whose seal had been broken, who or what is responsible for the broken seal still remains a mystery.

string.name: name
string.value: Who Broke the Seal of Andras?

string.name: name
string.value: Revealed Identity
Collect 5 clues for #b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k.
Collect 5 clues from Perion, Ellinia, Kerning City, Nautilus, and Henesys and take them over to #b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k.
You have taken all the clues to #b#p1061011##k in #bSleepywood#k. He says to come back after you reach #rLv25#k if you want more training.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 5,000 Able to proceed to 'The Rememberer's Training-1' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'The Rememberer's Training-2' as next quest. Able to proceed to 'The Rememberer's Training-3' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Training-1
#b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k says he has Special Training-1 prepared for you.
Please hunt 50 #rHorny Mushrooms#k.
You have completed #b#p1061011##k's Special Training-1.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2,000 Able to proceed to 'Secret of Astaroth' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Training-2

string.name: rewardSummary

string.name: name
string.value: Secret of Astaroth
#b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k says he has figured out the mysterious emblem. Let's go find him.
Let's talk to #b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k.
You have heard the secret of Astaroth from #b#p1061011##k in #bSleepywood#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 500 Able to proceed to 'How to Avoid the Stink' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] I Need an Umbrella!
#b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k says she hates getting wet in the rain.

Although usually sunny, #b#m100000000##k has rainy days from time to time. Because #b#@1010100:##k hates getting wet in the rain, she has asked you to bring her some materials with which she can make an umbrella.

Bring 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k after hunting #rGreen Mushrooms#k.
(You can easily find them in the #b#m105050400##k.)

Report back to #b#@1010100:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have collected 20 #rGreen Mushroom Caps#k for #b#p1010100##k since she said she wanted to make an umbrella.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] The Pigs Are Ruining the Produce!
#b#@1012108:##k in #b#m100000000##k has a favor to ask of you.

She says the #rPigs#k are devouring all of the produce and has asked you to hunt them.

Hunt 30 #rPigs#k.

Report back to #b#@1012108:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated the #rPigs#k that were ruining the produce.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] The Terrorizing Red Ribbon Pigs
#b#@1012109:##k in #b#m100000000##k says he needs your help.
He wants you to eliminate 40 #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that are pestering the people.\n\nReport back to #b#@1012109:##k in #b#m100000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated a herd of #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that were pestering the people.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Pigs at the Corner
#b#@1052103:##k in #b#m103000000##k is worried because there are too many #rPigs#k around. Let's go find her.

She says there are too many #rPigs#k on the way to #b#m103000000##k from #b#m100000000##k.

Hunt 30 #rPigs#k in #b#m103020000##k!

Report back to #b#@1052103:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.
You have swept the #rPigs#k that were blocking people's way to #b#m103000000##k!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] That Red Isn't For Everyone!
#b#@1052000:##k in #b#m103000000##k needs your help.

He wants you to hunt 30 #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that have the same red as his hair.
He says they can be easily found in #b#m103020100##k.

Report back to #b#@1052000:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.

You have eliminated the #rRed Ribbon Pigs#k that have a red similar to #b#p10502000##k's hair. Seeing how you've done this ludicrous favor for him, it is obvious that you are a very kind and generous person.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Intimidating Octopuses
#b#@1052106:##k in #b#m103000000##k has a simple favor to ask you.
He wants you to hunt 30 #rOctopuses#k that have been pestering him. They can be easily found in #b#m103010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1052106:##k in #b#m103000000##k upon completion.
As requested, you have hunted the #rOctopuses#k that have been pestering #b#p1052106##k in #b#m103000000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] Eww, It's Slimy!
#b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k has a favor to ask...

Something slimy is making it hard for the fairies to fly in the forest.

He has asked you to eliminate #rSlimes#k and bring back 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k 20.

Report back to #b#@1032106:##k in #b#m101000000##k when you finish collecting all the Squishy Liquids.
You have collected 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k for #b#p1032106##k. He thanked you for helping the fairies roam the forest freely.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 700

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Why Are Dark Stumps So Dark?
#b#@1032101:##k in #b#m101000000##k says she has a favor to ask you.
She wants you to eliminated 40 #rDark Stumps#k that are emitting foul odor.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032101:##k in #b#m101000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated 40 #rDark Stumps#k that were emitting foul odor.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] You Were Bitten by a Green Mushroom?
#b#@1032104:##k in #b#m101000000##k says she has a favor to ask you.
She wants you to hunt 40 #rGreen Mushrooms#k because she was bitten by one. They can be easily found in #b#m101010102##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032104:##k in #b#m101000000##k.
You have eliminated 40 #rGreen Mushrooms#k that bit #b#p1032104##k in #b#m101000000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Drowsiness from the Orange Mushrooms?
#b#@1092004:##k in #b#m120000200##k has a favor to ask of you.

He says the powder generated from #rOrange Mushrooms#k gets him sleepy.
He has asked you to hunt 30 #rOrange Mushrooms#k.
#rOrange Mushrooms#k can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092004:##k in #b#m120000200##k.
You have eliminated 30 #rOrange Mushrooms#k for #b#p1092004##k the sleepyhead.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 900

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Camouflaging Slimes
#b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k says he has a favor to ask of you.

He says the #rSlimes#k in the forest are so similar to the green leaves that people have trouble telling them apart, which prevents those who are afraid of the monsters from entering the forest.

Eliminate 30 #rSlimes#k. They can be easily found in #b#m100040000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092011:##k in #b#m120000200##k.

The #rSlimes#k in #b#m120000200##k are known to scare people by randomly popping out here and there, and you have eliminated 30 #b#p1092011##ks for #b#p1092011##k in #b#m120000200##k who is terrified of them.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 700

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Destructively Strong Pigs
#b#@1092001:##k in #b#m120000300##k says she needs your help.

She wants you to eliminate 30 #rPigs#k that have been ramming into and damaging the ship. They can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1092001:##k in #b#m120000300##k upon completion.
You have eliminated 30 of the #rPigs#k that have been destroying the ship!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 600

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] Red Ribbons Around the Pig's Neck
#b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k has a favor to ask of you.

He wants to conduct research on the Ribbon around the #rRed Ribbon Pig#k's neck.
Hunt #Red Ribbon Pigs#k and collect 20 #rRed Ribbons#k.
#rRed Ribbon Pigs#k can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1092012:##k in #b#m120000200##k upon completion.
You have collected 20 #rRed Ribbons#k for the research.

string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Sweep the Snails!
#b#@1022007:##k in #b#m102000000##k has a favor to ask of you.
She says there are way too many Snails and would like you to eliminate 10 #rRed Snails#k and 10 #rBlue Snails#k.\n\nLet's report back to #bAyan#k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have swept out the Snails near #b#m102000000##k!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 800

string.name: name
string.value: [Collect] Preparations for the Traditional Ceremony
#b#@1020000:##k in #b#m102000000##k has a favor to ask of you.

He says he needs #rLeaves#k to use in a traditional ceremony for his ancestors.
Eliminate #rDark Stumps#k and collect 20 #rLeaves#k.
#rDark Stumps#k can be found all throughout #b#m101030300##k and #b#m101030000##k.

Report back to #b#@1020000:##k in #b#m102000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated #rDark Stumps#k and have collected #rLeaves#k for the traditional ceremony.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Avoid the Stink
#b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k says he's found additional information on Astaroth.

He has discovered where #rAstaroth#k is, but says no one can reach that place due to the extremely foul odor. However, he has offered to make you a Gas Mask, if you bring him the necessary materials.

30 pieces of #rWild Boar Leather#k, 30 #rEvil Eye's Eyeballs#k, and 30 #rCharm of the Undead#k

Let's report back to #b#@1061011:##k in #bSleepywood#k upon completion.
The #rWild Eye's Gas Mask#k has been finished. Oh boy, the mask is stinky. This probably can't be worn unless the outside stink is exponentially worse and absolutely unbearable.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6,000 #Wbasic# #i1003036:# #t1003036:# #c1003036# 1 Able to proceed to 'For the peace of Victoria Island...' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: For the peace of Victoria Island...
The time for battle has arrived. Please visit #bthe Rememberer#k in #bSleepywood.#k

You can reach #rAstaroth#k by going through the door in the #b#m105050400##k. It's filled with a horrible stench, so the #rWild Eye's Gas Mask#k is needed. Defeat #rAstaroth!#k Return to #bthe Rememberer#k in #bSleepywood#k once your task is completed.
You defeated the demon #rAstaroth#k, who threatened the peace in Victoria.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Trick or Treat
They say that Cassandra has prepared a fun event in commemoration of the Halloween Season. Would you like to learn more about it?

Cassandra has asked that you bring her 31 Green Halloween Stick Candies. The candies are carried by Monsters during the Halloween season, and Cassandra says that the monsters in the Haunted Mansion have more than others. Who knew that Cassandra had such a craving for sweets, but this should be easy, right?\n\n#i4032444:# #t4032444:# #c4032444# / 31

It's not certain whether Cassandra was happy because she received the candies or because she pulled off a trick... Regardless, it always feels good to help someone, no? You can receive another Halloween task if you return to Cassandra after 1 hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Witch Malady's Secret Mission
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.
Witch Malady has appeared in town. This is the busiest time for Witches, so why has she appeared here? Let's ask Witch Malady for an explanation.

string.name: name
string.value: Stinky Seasoned Cursed Frog Eggs and Mushrooms

The basic ingredient for this dish recipe is #bCursed Frog Eggs#k. It also needs #bOrange Mushroom Caps or Horny Mushroom Caps#k. Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?
After reciting a strange chant, the Witch makes you a dish that doesn't look too appetizing.

string.name: name
string.value: Dreamy Bloody Mushroom Wine

The basic ingredient for this dish is the #bCursed Cat Spittle#k. It also needs #bOrange Mushroom Caps or Horny Mushroom Caps#k. Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?
After reciting a strange chant, the Witch makes you a dish that doesn't look too appetizing.

Be sure to look around carefully, as they say that the frogs and cats roam around town when they are hungry. Sure, you might feel a bit wary about eating something that the Witch prepared...but it's not like you'll die, right?

string.value: Witch's Dark Token
Witch Malady is in need of #bDark Tokens#k. Collect them and bring them to her.
Witch Malady is in need of #bDark Tokens#k. Collect them and bring them to her.
Witch Malady is in need of Dark Tokens. Collect them and bring them to her.

string.name: name
string.value: Butler: "The Trap"
Things might seem rather ominous, but you must finish what you’ve started. Let’s see what the butler, who is in the Foyer, has in mind.
It looks like you’re fighting a girl ghost. And you also need to collect #r20 Cursed Dolls#k. You could very well be dreaming…
Yes, you did it! The ghost has been vanquished and you collected #r20 Cursed Dolls#k! Perhaps you’ve finally arrived at the end of this saga.

Yes, you did it! The ghost has been vanquished and you collected #r20 Cursed Dolls#k! Perhaps you’ve finally arrived at the end of this saga.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Help Me"
The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Rotting Skeletons#k are defeated.
The #b100 Rotting Skeletons#k have been defeated. Olivia is now able to enter her home, but this might just be the beginning.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Find My Daddy"
Those monsters have been defeated, but it looks like Olivia has something else to request.

In order to find the right key to the Piano Room, you must first obtain #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. Though it would be easier if you could just break that door open instead...
You collected the #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. But there's still more work to be done before you can relax.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Bring My Daddy"
Is she still looking through those keys? Maybe she could benefit from some helping hands.

Olivia handed you her letter asking that you deliver it to her father right away. You can rescue Joe by using the key inside the letter. Now, let’s see where this place is and get him out of there quick!
There must be some relief since you were able to unlock the Piano Room and get that letter to her father. But wait, you might just have another monkey on your back...

string.name: name
string.value: Joe: "Clear the Way"
It looks like you found Olivia's father, Joe. Although he seems a little distraught, you will need to escort him to the front yard.
Joe would like you to kill #b100 Glutton Ghouls, 1 Psycho Jack #kso that he’d be able to walk through the hallway untouched.
You were able to defeat the#b 100 Glutton Ghouls, 1 Psycho Jack #k. The hallway is now clear for him to escape.

string.name: name
string.value: Father: "Dirty House"
Well, the hallway is clear, but it doesn't appear like Joe is ready to move. What is it now?
Joe wants you to go #rfetch his butler, Steward#k, for him. Who does he think you are--his butler?
You finally located #rSteward the butler#k in the right room. He doesn't appear to be too happy at your arrival, though.

string.name: name
string.value: Steward: "I'm a Butler, Not a Maid!"
You have arrived before Steward. It's uncertain how happy he'll be to see you though, especially when he hears what kind of job he'll have to do cleaning up this mess.
The butler advised that you to collect #b10 Tombstones#k to prove to Jonas that you are serious about the mission.
Yes! You were able to collect the #b10 Tombstones#k and show Jonas that you want this whole thing to end. But it's questionable whether he got it completely...

string.name: name
string.value: Jonas: "Jonas' Presence" 1
What in the world is Jonas doing, still hanging around? Whatever the reason, this haunting stuff needs to stop. You're about to have the chance to tell him face-to-face.

It appears Jonas would like you to retrieve #rSophilia’s Favorite Doll#k. He mentioned that Sophilia kept her favorite doll inside a crate in one of her rooms. Bring it back to him. Where in this big ol' house could it be?
So, you finally got your hands on #rSophilia’s Favorite Doll#k. Will this do the trick?

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Help Me"
The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k are defeated.
The #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k have been defeated. Olivia is now able to enter her home, but this might just be the beginning.

Is she still looking through those keys? Maybe she could benefit from some helping hands.

Olivia handed you her letter asking that you deliver it to her father right away. You can rescue Joe by using the key inside the letter. Now, let’s see where this place is and get him out of there quick!
There must be some relief since you were able to unlock the Piano Room and get that letter to her father. But wait, you might just have another monkey on your back...

string.name: name
string.value: Joe: "Clear the Way"
It looks like you found Olivia's father, Joe. Although he seems a little distraught, you will need to escort him to the front yard.
Joe would like you to kill #b100 Psycho Jacks, 1 Sophilia Doll #kso that he’d be able to walk through the hallway untouched.
You were able to defeat the#b 100 Psycho Jacks, 1 Sophilia Doll #k. The hallway is now clear for him to escape.

string.name: name
string.value: Father: "Dirty House"
Well, the hallway is clear, but it doesn't appear like Joe is ready to move. What is it now?
Joe wants you to go #rfetch his butler, Steward#k, for him. Who does he think you are--his butler?
You finally located #rSteward the butler#k in the right room. He doesn't appear to be too happy at your arrival, though.

string.name: name
string.value: Steward: "I'm a Butler, Not a Maid!"
You have arrived before Steward. It's uncertain how happy he'll be to see you though, especially when he hears what kind of job he'll have to do cleaning up this mess.
The butler advised that you to collect #b10 Tombstones#k to prove to Jonas that you are serious about the mission.
Yes! You were able to collect the #b10 Tombstones#k and show Jonas that you want this whole thing to end. But it's questionable whether he got it completely...

string.name: name
string.value: Jonas: "Jonas' Presence" 2
What in the world is Jonas doing, still hanging around? Whatever the reason, this haunting stuff needs to stop. You're about to have the chance to tell him face-to-face.

It appears Jonas would like you to retrieve #rSophilia’s Favorite Doll#k. He mentioned that Sophilia kept her favorite doll inside a crate in one of her rooms. Bring it back to him. Where in this big ol' house could it be?
So, you finally got your hands on #rSophilia’s Favorite Doll#k. Will this do the trick?

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Help Me"
The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Twisted Jesters#k are defeated.
The #b100 Twisted Jesters#k have been defeated. Olivia is now able to enter her home, but this might just be the beginning.

string.name: name
string.value: Olivia: "Find My Daddy"
Those monsters have been defeated, but it looks like Olivia has something else to request.

In order to find the right key to the Piano Room, you must first obtain #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. Though it would be easier if you could just break that door open instead...
You collected the #b25 Silver Keys, 25 Gold Keys, and 25 Brass Keys#k. But there's still more work to be done before you can relax.

string.value: Dirty Treasure Map
#bKyrin#k in #bNautilus#k has something to give you.
Let's uncover the hidden secrets of the Treasure Map.
The Treasure Map has been completed, but there are no treasures!

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow Turkey Egg Hunt
Cody says he has a special request to ask of you in celebration of Thanksgiving. See what it could be!

Cody's been busy collecting #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k in celebration of Thanksgiving! Hunt the #bTurkey Monsters#k that have been appearing around the #rTowns and Mini-Dungeons of Henesys, Kerning City, Perion, Ellinia, and Orbis#k and collect as many #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k as possible for Cody!
Cody says he is truly grateful for your help and is asking you to come back and see him again in 30 minutes. Seems like he's got another favor to request.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Turkey Egg Hunt
Cody says he has a special request to ask of you in celebration of Thanksgiving. See what it could be!

Cody's been busy collecting #bGreen Turkey Eggs#k in celebration of Thanksgiving! Hunt the #bTurkey Monsters#k that have been appearing around the #rTowns and Mini-Dungeons of Henesys, Kerning City, Perion, Ellinia, and Orbis#k and collect as many #bGreen Turkey Eggs#k as possible for Cody!
Cody says he is truly grateful for your help and is asking you to come back and see him again in 30 minutes. Seems like he's got another favor to request.

Cody says he is truly grateful for your help and is asking you to come back and see him again in 30 minutes. Seems like he's got another favor to request.

string.name: name
string.value: The Object of Professor Foxwit's Interest
Professor Foxwit in NLC has a deep interest in the Turkey Commando’s Eye. If you happen to come across any of these eyes, be sure to bring them to Professor Foxwit in NLC.
Professor Foxwit in NLC has a deep interest in the Turkey Commando’s Eye. If you happen to come across any of these eyes, be sure to bring them to Professor Foxwit in NLC.
Professor Foxwit in NLC has told me a fascinating story about Turkey Commandos.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 50,000 Meso

string.name: name
string.value: Festival of Lights - Building the Altar

string.name: parent
string.value: Festival of Lights
Hmm, that woman looks like she's preparing some sort of celebration... I should check it out.

I spoke with Hannah, and she's preparing a Festival of Lights. I've agreed to help her build the Altar by gathering 25 Altar Pieces. She mentioned that the monsters would already have an axe stuck in them, so I should hunt those.
I collected the 25 Altar Pieces and returned to Hannah. She was happy, and began building the Altar. She also mentioned that I could come back for more work when I have a chance

string.name: name
string.value: New Year's Presents from Cassandra
Cassandra says she's giving out New Year's presents every day for those who log in. So go visit the ever so generous Cassandra!
What presents has #bCassandra#k prepared?
#bCassandra#k says she will give out a New Year's present every day until January 19th for simply logging in.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Present 1
You have reached Level 30 and #b#p9010000##k starts a conversation with you...

#p9010000# tells you since you have reached Level 30, you can receive a #bspecial gift#k from #p1201000#.

#i1112413:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.
Your received #t1112413# from #p1201000#. A special ring that can be worn by any character within the same account. It looks like an item that is not just for an Aran, but for any character.

string.name: name
string.value: Lilin's Present 2
You have reached Level 50 and #b#p9010000##k starts a conversation with you...

#p9010000# tells you since you have reached Level 50, you can receive a #bspecial gift#k from #p1201000#.

#i1112414:# 

You are told to go straight to #b#m140000000##k and meet #b#p1201000##k.
Your received #t1112414# from #p1201000#. A special ring that can be worn by any character within the same account. It looks like an item that is not just for an Aran, but for any character.

string.name: name
string.value: Cupid's Lost Arrows
Have you heard about #bCupid's Lost Arrows#k? You can find out more from #rCassandra.#k
Please bring me #b50 Cupid's Lost Arrows.#k You can get them from any monster. I will give you an awesome Valentines present when you bring them to me!
You can repeat this quest every 2 hours until #rFebruary 17th 2010.#k However, you'll only be able to receive the Cupid Wings Cape once. After that, you'll just receive additional #bEXP.#k

string.name: name
string.value: Mardi Gras Throws
Would you like to participate in #rthe Mardi Gras Festival?#k If so, please see #bGaga.#k

Monsters attacked the storage room and looted the Beads we were saving up for the festival, stealing everything! If you eliminate the monsters and bring me #b10 Bead Necklaces#k, I'll make you #ra Mardi Gras Feather: Green, Purple, Red#k--whichever one you want!
You have returned with 10 Bead Necklaces that will be used in #bthe Mardi Gras Festival.#kYou can participate in this event until #rFebruary 21th, 2010.#k

string.name: name
string.value: Mardi Gras Green Masks
Go see #bGaga#k if you want #ra Green Mask#k to wear to the festival!
I'll make you #ra Green Mask#k you can wear to the festival if you bring me #b10 Green Mardi Gras Feathers!#k
You received #ra Green Mask#k by collecting 10 Green Mardi Gras Feathers.

Scadur seems up to something big this time. I should move to El Nath and see what he is looking for...

So Scadur is going to set-up a "Leather Festival" on El Nath... I'm out to find and collect all these items for him. Hope the reward of this mission is really worth it...

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - PQ Mania
#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n\n#kYIf I achieve rank S in 5 party quests, I can get the #e#bPQ Mania#k# title? Dalair is waiting for a Warrior that can earn this honorable title.

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k 
 - Party Quest S Rank : #b#jscnt##k / 5 
 #jgaugePqS# #jperPqS# %

I got rank S in 5 party quests! Dalair, the representative or the God of Honor, gave me the title of '#bPQ Mania#k'. He said this title is only for a small number of explorers like me who devote themselves to party quests.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Quest Specialist

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n\n#k A Warrior who completes 800 quests, not including event quests... I don't even know if that's possible. The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said a title called #e#bQuest Specialist#k#n will be given to the one who accomplishes this amazing feat.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n

#k - Completed Quests : #b#jcmpcnt##k / 800(excluding events)

#b#eTitle Challenge - Quest Specialist#n

#k - Completed Quests : #b#jcmpcnt##k / 800(not including events)
 #jgaugeQCnt# #jperQCnt# %

I finished 800 quests, not including event quests! On behalf of the God of Honor, Dalair awarded me with the title, '#bQuest Specialist#k'.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Celebrity!
#b#eTitle Challenge - Celebrity#n\n#kA title given to those who increase their popularity by 1,000 within the 30 day time limit. I should talk to Dalair and try out for the #e#bCelebrity#n#k Medal.

I raised my popularity by 1,000 within 30 days! Even Dalair seemed surprised by it, and he gave me the '#bCelebrity#k' title. Ha, maybe I should try out for the '#bMaple Idol Star#k' medal now.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Diligent Explorer

#b#eTitle Challenge - Diligent Explorer#n\n#kIf I log on for 3 or more consecutive hours for 27 days within the 30 day time limit, I can earn the #e#bDiligent Explorer#k#n title. I should go see the Monk of Honor, Dalair.

The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said diligence is the first criteria of being an explorer and applauded me. Then he gave me the '#bDiligent Explorer#k' title for successfully completing the challenge.

string.name: name
string.value: One Who's Touched the Sky
You'll need to aim higher and shoot further to make it to the top! Apparently, if you visit all the areas in the highest regions of Maple World, something good might happen.
#b#eTitle - One Who's Touched the Sky#n#k\r\nVisit the highest regions of Maple World, where you can practically touch the sky.\r\n#bA total of 5 regions: Completed #R27018# Regions.#k
#b<One Who's Touched the Sky>#k. There's nothing like the view from the top of the world, where you can practically touch the sky.

string.name: name
string.value: Title Challenge - Veteran Hunter

#b#eTitle Challenge - Veteran Hunter#n\n#kHunt #r1,000,000#k monsters that are higher level than you within 30 days! The Monk of Honor, Dalair, is looking for a clever hunter who has stamina. Anyone who completes this task will receive the title, #e#bVeteran Hunter#k#n. I heard that the person with the highest score will receive another title called #e#bLegendary Hunter(Special Title)#n#k...

#b#eTitle Challenge - Veteran Hunter#b#n

#k - Time Left : #Qdaylimit#Days #Qhourlimit#Hours #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds

 #jgaugeHunt# #jperHunt# %

* Only monsters that are higher level than you count 
 (Characters that are level 120 or higher must hunt monsters that are level 120 or higher
 in order for it to count)

#b#eTitle Challenge - Legendary Hunter#n(Special Title)#k

 - Hunted Monster Count #1

I tried out for the Veteran Hunter title, which you get by hunting as many monsters your level or higher that you can within a specific time limit. Dalair said that if I want to become the '#bLegendary Hunter#k', don't forget the hunting record resets every 1st day of each month. Oh, he also said if I lose the Veteran Hunter medal, I have to redo the challenge so I should make sure to take good care of it.

#k

#k

Foxwit needs the drops of some raid bosses to research the cause of the recent upheavals. Guess it's time to join some expeditions.

string.value: Monster Expert

#b#eTitle Challenge - Monster Expert#n\nCollect #k#b30 Monster Cards#k. Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for explorers who know everything there is to know about the monsters in Maple World. He says anyone who collects more than 30 Monster Cards will receive the #bMonster Expert#k#n title.
Collect the Monster Cards, which will help you understand the tendencies, habitats, and dropped items of various monsters. Some cards have special powers that will help you in your adventures.
