I did bring this half suspecting this might be a scam, but really... is it enough to cure #p2111005#? The president of Alcadno Society, #b#p2111001##k, might correctively find out the list of ingredients for this.
#p2111001# said this medicine indeed cures #p2111005#'s sickness... Why in the world was #p2111003# holding on to the medicine #p2111002# made all this time??

string.name: name
string.value: De Lang and Humanoid A

string.name: parent
string.value: Who is De Lang?

#p2111001#'s eyes normally scare me off, but his eyes seem sad today. According to him, #p2111003# was found at #p2111002#'s lab when the lab exploded because of the failed experiment. No one knows when or how it was made... and Humanoid himself doesn't remember his origins. \n\nMaybe #p2111002#'s experiment didn't fail as everyone believes... the one item that #p2111003# is holding on to, despite not remembering anything from the past, says it all. I better go to #b#p2111005##k and give her #p2111002#'s piece of mind.

#p2111005# seemed stunned when receiving the medicine, but then turned into pure joy and happiness. #p2111005# seemed determined to get better with the medicine, so she can really improve her alchemy skills to one day turn #p2111003# into a human being. Hopefully her experiment will end up being successful.

string.name: name
string.value: Parwen's Pass

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage
#p2111006# is the chatty ghost at the basement lab of #m261000000#. Apparently, he knows a secret passage in #m261000000# that no one is aware of... I better go talk to #b#p2111006##k.

#p2111006# said that a long time ago, when he was an alchemist at #m261000000#, he had a #bpass#k that gave him access to the secret passage that connects Zenumist to Alcadno. ...a Secret Passage? That sounds very interesting! #t4031745# believed that #rCytis#k might have taken it, so I'll have to find the pass myself and use it at the entrance of the Secret Passage.\n\n#i4031745##t4031745# #b#c4031745##k/1
I brought #t4031745# to the entrance of the Secret Passage, but the door didn't open. What the...

string.name: name
string.value: Searching for the Master Key

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage

I told #p2111006# that his pass was useless, and he told me that since it's such an old pass, that its verification code might have expired. Why did I put so much hope into this? But, says #p2111006#, he will do everything in his power to give me an entry to the Secret Passage, and asked me to find #b100 #t4000363#s#k from #r#o6110301##k.\n\n#i4000363##t4000363# #b#c4000363##k/100
I fell for #p2111006#'s promise, and got 100 #t4000363#s from #o6110301#. That's when #p2111006# started making new combination of verification codes out of the #t4000363#s.

string.name: name
string.value: Verifying the Password

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret, Quiet Passage

#p2111006# said he came up with the master code that'll allow me to gain free access to the Secret Passage, and gave me a long list of numbers. Sigh... this is so complicated, I'll have to write it down somewhere.
When I entered the master key #p2111006# gave me, the Secret Passage opened up, and now I have unlimited access to the passage. Hmm... he's much more helpful than I thought.

string.name: name
string.value: Zenumist and the Ostracized Research
Apparently, #b#p2111008##k, an alchemist from Zenumist, wants something...

#p2111008# mentioned that there was an alchemist that has been ostracized by everyone for trying to combine the works of Zenumist and Alcadno, #b#p2112014##k, and he was interested in obtaining the Lab Report. He wanted me to acquire #b#t4031774##k for him, and in order to do so, I'll have to find someone that is aware of #p2112014#'s current whereabouts... \n\n#i4031774##t4031774# #b#c4031774##k/1
I acquired #t4031774# and gave it to #p2111008#. Peering through the results, Bedin's eyes were flashing with interest.

string.name: name
string.value: Alcadno and the Ostracized Research
Apparently, #bRussellon#k, an alchemist from Alcadno, wants something...

Russellon mentioned that there was an alchemist that has been ostracized by everyone for trying to combine the works of Zenumist and Alcadno, #bYulete#k, and he was interested in obtaining the Lab Report. He wanted me to acquire #b#t4031774##k for him, and in order to do so, I'll have to find someone that is aware of #p2112014#'s current whereabouts... \n\n#i4031796##t4031796# #b#c4031796##k/1

I was able to find Yulete's Lab Report, and gave it to Russellon. According to him, Yulete's studies were released at the height oc the conflict between Zenumist and Alcadno, and mentioned that if he released it at an opportune time, then he could have received a much more favorable response.

string.name: name
string.value: Studying Frankenroid 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Keeny's Research on Frankenroid
Magatia's diminutive Fairy alchemist, #bKeeny#k, is lately studying hard on mechanical dolls, Roids.

Keeny said she heard a rumor that the mysterious alchemist #bYulete#k invented a new type of Roid, and wanted to study more on his Frankenroid. Good thinking, except finding Yulete, who has been virtually banished from Magatia, and actually #btalking#k to him might be difficult...
While helping Romeo and Juliet out, I was able to learn of Yulete's true intentions and was able to meet with him.

string.name: name
string.value: Studying Frankenroid 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Keeny's Research on Frankenroid

Yulete seemed ecstatic to help Keeny out. Then he proceeded to bring out the well-organized blueprint of Frankenroid and told me to tell her if she had any questions, she's more than welcome to ask him herself. I better give this blueprint to #bKeeny#k.
After receiving the blueprint of Frankenroid, Keeny seemed beyond words. She felt like this would really help her make Humanoid A's wish come true.

string.name: name
string.value: Yulete's Request

For a while, he was so jaded that he wanted to take on Magatia all by himself, but now that someone recognized and appreciated his greatness, Yulete seems to finally find some peace in himself... I better find #bYulete#k, who might be hiding somewhere in #bMagatia#k.

Yulete made a promise that from here on out, instead of conducting experiments to be accepted by others, he's going to do it for his own satisfaction. Conducting these studies and experiments by himself seem a little difficult, though. I better help Yulete out. #k

#y3366# #b (#u3366#)#k
#y3367# #b(#u3367#)#k
#y3368# #b(#u3368#)#k

I was able to really help Yulete complete his experiments. He may not have been universally accepted by his peers, but he's indeed a genius alchemist. An alchemist like him is more than capable of raising the bar of alchemy in Magatia much higher.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Reagent
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.

Yulete asked me to help him #bmake the Reagent#k. I'll need to pour the prepared liquid in the beaker and make the reagent, but I heard that the liquids have to be poured in sequencce. .. and the sequence is #bred, green, yellow, blue, and purple#k! Let's make this. \n\n#i4031798##t4031798# #b#c4031798##k/1
After successfully making the reagent, I reported the results to Yulete. He thanked me for helping him with something that he considered was a difficult task.

string.name: name
string.value: Organizing the Lab Report
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.

Yulete asked me to organize his Lab Report. At his #bLab 2#k, there are so many reports that he had written that have been spread out all over the place, that it needs to be organized in the worst way. I better start gathering up some #breports#k. \n\n#i4031797##t4031797# #b#c4031797##k/20
I gathered up the reports and gave to Yulete. Organizing all these reports will keep Yulete busy for a while.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Obstacles
To help Yulete out, I volunteered to assist him on his research. What can I do for him? I better go see #bYulete#k.
Yulete asked me to eliminate the monsters that stand in his way of conducting experiments. It seems like the monsters he created from the past have come back to haunt him. \n\n#o9300153# #r#a33681##k
I was able to eliminate all the monsters that were of hindrance to Yulete in the lab. Yulete breathed a sigh of relief that he can now use that lab.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Present

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Flowers
Romeo had finally received the okay to date Juliet, but he had been hard at work researching. Has he been dating well? Let's check up on #bRomeo#k.

Romeo was still worried about what to get her, so I advised him to get Juliet a flower. Like a true alchemist, Romeo thought of the Snowfield Rose and asked me to help him get one. Thankfully, he knew how to make the seeds, so all I need to do is get the #bMay Mist#k. \n\n#i4000361##t4000361# #b#c4000361##k/20
I found the Snowfield Rose and gave it to Romeo. Romeo told me to wait as he wants to finalize the process himself, with all his heart.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Flowers

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Flowers

Romeo was able to complete the making of Snowfield Rose, but he's terribly shy. So shy that he was too terrified to give the flower to #bJuliet#k himself, and asked me to deliver the flower to her for him. I didn't know he was like this...
I gave Juliet Romeo's flower. Thankfully, she seemed very satisfied with the choice of the present. Good thing he didn't give her something like a Scorpion Needle.

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Feelings

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response
Juliet received a Snowfield Rose with Romeo's true feelings laden in it. I better go see her and see how she feels about the present.

Juliet was so happy about Romeo's Present that she wanted to give Romeo something in return. After taking some time wondering what would be the perfect present for him, she decided to... make him some clothes. She's an alchemist... how will she make clothes for him? Anyway, since Juliet asked for help, I'll need to see #bSirin#k of #bAriant#k.
When I told Sirin of Juliet's story, she told me to wait for a second. She didn't seem to be sweating it one bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Sirin's Tailoring Methods

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response

Sirin was more than happy to accommodate, by giving me the pattern to the nicest clothes she has in store. So all I need to do is give this to Juliet?...hmmm... something tells me this might not end up the way I had in plan. Anyway, I better give #bJuliet#k the patterns first.
After giving Juliet the pattern, she jumped for joy. That's the good part. Can she really make the clothes based on the pattern, though?

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Response

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Response

Juliet was able to make the clothes. It was very well-made, actually. She must be good with her hands. There's one slight problem, though... I wonder if she'll really give it to Romeo, because it is DEFINITELY FOR WOMEN!! I knew something wasn't right. Despite the concerns, Juliet asked me to give this "dress" to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very happy to receive the clothes that Juliet made for him. Seriously, is he going to wear that dress with the pink ribbon on? Alchemists are really strange.. that's for sure.

string.name: name
string.value: Writing Romeo's Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter

Romeo is an alchemist from Magatia. I don't know about his alchemy skills, but his dating skills leave a lot to be desired, and he seems to be really concerned about that as well. I'll need to talk to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo wanted to write a love letter to Juliet that conveyed his true feelings towards her, but he seemed to be struggling with words. I'll have to come up with something very creative for Romeo...
Struggling, but slowly making progress with the letter, Romeo sure is trying to impress Juliet. I wonder how the letter will end up.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: Romeo's Love Letter
After finally completing the letter, Romeo asked me if I could deliver the letter to #bJuliet#k for him. What am I, their loyal servant???
After receiving Romeo's heartfelt letter, Juliet shed a tear of joy. I don't understand how that letter brought her to tears, but...

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet is Impressed

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox
Juliet seemed very much in love with Romeo after receiving the letter, which meant one thing. Juliet wants to repay the love with a present of her own. I better go see #bJuliet#k.

Juliet decided the best way to respond to the letter was to cook for him by making a lunchbox. ...A lunchbox by an alchemist from Alcadno... I better help her make one before Juliet poisons Romeo to death with her toxic cooking skills. I better buy the #blunchbox recipe#k from #bHan the Broker#k. \n\n#i4031785##t4031785# #b#c4031785##k/1
I handed Juliet Han the Broker's recipe for lunchbox.

string.name: name
string.value: Han the Broker's Recipe
I better stop Juliet before she accidentally poisons Romeo with her toxic cooking skills. I'll need to hurry up and see #bHan the Broker#k so I can buy a recipe for a nice food from him.

Han the Broker was noticeably complaining, and told me if I wanted his #blunchbox recipe#k, then I'll have to fork over #b20,000 mesos#k. That's really pricey, but he's the only way I can acquire the recipe here in Magatia...
I got the recipe from Han the Broker. This recipe also gives me this uneasy feeling. This time, it's not the contents, but the broker himself that worries me...

string.name: name
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox

string.name: parent
string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox

Juliet's Lunchbox is now complete. It doesn't look all that great, but... seriously, she made this for Romeo, a person she dearly loves, so come on, it can't be toxic, right? Whatever happens to him, I'm sure the great alchemists in Magatia can save him. I'm worried about the lunchbox, but I better still give this to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very ecstatic to receive the lunchbox. Hopefully he won't die on me.

string.name: name
string.value: Romeo Proposes
Romeo is an alchemist in Magatia that's currently dating Juliet like there's no tomorrow. He has finally decided to pop the question to Juliet. I better go visit #bRomeo#k.

Romeo told me although he may not be perfect, he's sure that Juliet will understand and take him regardless, and that's how he came to conclusion to propose to her. He then asked me to find a perfect engagement ring for her. The ring can be purchased at #bWedding Village#k through #bAllegro#k.\n\n#i4031806##t4031806# #b#c4031806##k/1

I got the engagement ring and gave it to Romeo. Now, all he has to do is come up to her and propose successfully. They may be an odd couple, but they do fit like a glove. Hopefully their love will come to fruition.

string.name: name
string.value: Allegro, the Master of the Rings
Romeo had decided to propose to Juliet. To help fascilitate that, I better get him a nice ring. The ring can be acquired through Allegro, the master of rings at Wedding Village.

Allegro said the perfect ring for Romeo and Juliet might be the Silver Wing Ring that represents purity, and asked me to gather up the materials for him. 

#i4021007##t4021007# #b#c4021007##k/2 
#i4011004##t4011004# #b#c4011004##k/2
I received the ring from Allegro. I better give this to #bRomeo#k now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Unidentified Group
#b#m261000000##k's #b#p2111007##k seems to be concerned about something. What must that be? I better go ses #p2111007#.

#p2111007# said recently, someone purchased an inordinate amount of jewels and machinery, so much so that he wanted to make sure who that person might be that made the massive order. These items seemed to have been shipped to #b#m100030000##k...

At #m100030000#, I saw a tree entrance that had not been seen before. It looked like an entrance to a fort... So when I tried to speak to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of the entrance, he said a new fort for #bPirate #p1072008##k is currently being built.

string.name: name
string.value: Yulete's Reward
#b#p2112014##k, a genius alchemist who isn't universally accepted but deserved to be, may know what #t4001159# and #t4001160# are for. I better go talk to #p2112014#.

After carefully examining #t4001159# and #t4001160#, #p2112014# stated that #bby combining the marbles that contain the essence of the two studies, he can actually form a whole new power that encompasses them all#k. I have a feeling that the materials required for this might be extensive... I better get #t4001159# and #t4001160# first.
Only #p2112014# might be capable of combining the two distinctive styles of work like Zenumist and Alcadno and make something out of it.

string.name: name
string.value: Moren's Upset

string.name: parent
string.value: Gordon Passes His Magic

Keol and Ramain have been concerned lately because Moren seemed to be letting out a heavy sigh every other minute. They may not try to show it, but the two are struggling right now, so for the sake of these three, I better ask Moren what's up.

Gordon's Secret Technique! This is something I didn't even see coming. A secret technique that even the creator of the Maker skill cannot pray away. Moren had high expectations that this technique would further advance the Maker skill. I decided to visit Gordon in El Nath without notifying Moren. Who knows, I might be the one learning that skill instead.

After calmly answering Gordon's questions, I was able to have this rolling in no time. Gordon at first seemed taken aback that the very existence of the technique had been exposed, but seemed to have gotten over it quickly. He then made a proposition where if I pass his test, then he'll share his technique with me. I wonder what that test is...

string.name: name
string.value: Gordon's Magic Iron

string.name: parent
string.value: Gordon Passes His Magic

Just as Gordon says, being a great craftsman requires patience and stamina. Gordon then gave me a test where he assigned me to gather up some Jr. Yeti Skin, which are also used as primary materials for shoemaking. I wonder what that secret technique is... I better come back ASAP.\n\n#i04000048# #t04000048# #b#c04000048##k / 50

I finally found the secrets to Gordon's technique! Well, the important aspects here are the two types of Magic Pentagrams that's used to create a new scroll, and the Magic Magic Iron that helped press them. The Magic Magic Iron that Gordon gave me... it seemed like it had some sort of a story behind it, but I was not able to listen to it in detail. I should ask him about that the next time I see him.\nAccording to Gordon, when summoning the Maker skill, when I have the Magic Magic Iron equipped in my hand, then I'll be able to create new scrolls.

string.name: name
string.value: Gordon's Warm Heart

Oh my gosh... I wound up losing #b#t1122013##k! I swear I kept it with me, but while I looked away, I wound up... misplacing it. Sigh, there's nothing I can do, I better just visit #b#p2020002##k and tell him what happened. Do I really have to go to #b#m211000100##k and face the music?

He knew I had misplaced it? He picked it up from the streets? I was shocked to hear what #b#p2020002##k told me. Honestly, losing it really made me feel guilty about it, but at least it's back in my hands now! Phew... I'll need to start another conversation with him.

I really didn't see it coming. I was totally unaware that he had left #b#m211000100##k and was watching me from the back... thankfully, #p2020002# had the item with him, and he just gave me back the item without much of a lecture. I felt so bad and embarassed that I vowed never to misplace the item ever again.

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Stan's Letter
Chief Stan wants to ask me for something... I wonder what it is...

I met with #bChief Stan#k, who was at Henesys in Victoria Island. He handed me what appeared to be an old, sealed letter, and wanted me to deliver it to Dr. Kim of Omega Sector. He said to get to Omega Sector, I'll need to first get on board on a ship ride from Ellinia to Orbis, followed by the ride to Ludibrium from there.

I met Dr. Kim at Omega Sector, and handed him the #bsealed letter#k that Chief Stan gave me. This place seems to be full of facilities designed in anticipation of the alien invasion... I should talk to Dr. Kim whenever I have a chance...

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : Blueprint for New Robot

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments
Dr. Kim of Omega Sector has apparently come up with something incredible...

Dr. Kim of Omega Sector gave me the Blueprint Machine for the new robot that's currently in development, and he requested that I show this to Chury, Hoony, and Gunny. I should meet up with #bChury#k first; he's at the #bOmega Sector Silo#k.
Dr. Kim gave me a mission to show Chury the blueprint of the new robot that he's currently making, and I did just that. Chury seemed impressed by it.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Chury

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met Chury at the Silo of the Omega Sector and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k, which contains the blueprint of the new robot, that I got from Dr. Kim. Chury wanted to show this to Hoony, so he asked me if I could show the Blueprint Machine to Hoony, as well as provide him with #b20 Space Foods#k, for he had been away at the Field for a while. Space Food, huh... I think I can find them through Barnard Gray the alien. I'll run into on the way to the Field. \n\n#t4000117# #b#c4000117##k/20

I met up with Chury somewhere around the Omega Sector Silo. Chury wanted me to show the Blueprint Machine to Hoony, as well as give him some food. In turn, I gave Hoony some Space Food to last him a while, and showed him the Blueprint Machine.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Hoony

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met Hoony at a Field around Omega Sector, and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k, as well as provide him with #b20 Space Foods#k. Hoony said that he fixed #bGunny's Laser Gun#k that he was asked to fix and requested me if I could give him his #bLaser Gun#k as well as show him the Blueprint Machine. He should be somewhere around the Field. Where could he be...

Hoony wanted to show the Blueprint to Gunny. He was already on his way to give Gunny a new weapon, so he asked me if I could give him the new gun, as well as show him the Blueprint. After much searching around, I was able to finally find him and gave him the gun.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting with Gunny

string.name: parent
string.value: Dr. Kim's Comments

I met up with Gunny at a field around Omega Sector, handed him his #bLaser gun#k, and showed him the #bBlueprint Machine#k. Gunny appreciated my effort and requested that I report this all to Dr. Kim. This Command Center warp capsule seems like a useful item.

As Dr. Kim requested from the Command Center in the Omega Sector, I showed the blueprint of the new robot to Chury, Hoony, and Gunny, while simultaneously solving their problems. Dr. Kim was very pleased with the results, and wanted me to drop by again sometime, for he could use my help.

string.name: name
string.value: An Important Robotic Part

string.name: parent
string.value: Supplying the Robotic Parts
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

From the Command Center in the Omega Sector, Dr. Kim requested that I receive 3 important mechanical parts from Cheng the Assistant at the Toy Factory of Ludibrium. Man ... when am I going to find time to go all the way up to Ludibrium?
Dr. Kim of the Command Center in the Omega Sector gave me a mission to receive some stuff from Cheng the Assistant of the Toy Factory. The parts I received seem to be very important for something.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering the Robotic Parts

string.name: parent
string.value: Supplying the Robotic Parts

I met with Cheng the Assistant at the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, and he handed me 3 boxes full of robotic parts, which will be used to make the robot. Now I should just hand them over to Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

At the Toy Factory in Ludibrium, Cheng the Assistant gave me 3 boxes of robotic parts so I could deliver them to Dr. Kim of the Command Center in the Omega Sector. After delivering the goods to Dr. Kim, he gave me a Warp Capsule, which will enable me to transport to Ludibrium in an instant. Hmmm... this looks like something I can use!

string.name: name
string.value: Retrieving the Robotic Parts
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

I met with Dr. Kim again at the Command Center. Dr. Kim was furious over the fact that someone stole 3 boxes full of robotic parts. He requested that I check into the hidden place at the Boswell Field, break all the Alien boxes, and recover the 3 missing boxes.

#t4031141# #b#c4031141##k/1
#t4031142# #b#c4031142##k/1
#t4031143# #b#c4031143##k/1
I retrieved the 3 boxes full of robotic parts that were stolen by the Aliens, and gave them back to Dr. Kim at the Command Center. This should speed up the development of the new robot.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Aliens
I should go see Dr. Kim at the Command Center in the Omega Sector.

Dr. Kim of the Command Center notified me that a powerful new Alien has appeared somewhere around the Boswell Field, and wanted me to eliminate it for them. He said he had to ask me for help since the new robot isn't ready just yet... I need to head over to the hidden place at the Boswell Field and defeat at least 5 #bMT-09#k's.\n\n#o5120100# #r#a34081#
I managed to eliminate all 5 MT-09's that Dr. Kim of the Command Center requested. I really hope that the new robot is made soon, so I don't have to ever do this again.

string.name: name
string.value: Where is Dogon's HQ?
I should go see Chury of Omega Sector.

I met with Chury at the Silo of the Omega Sector again, and he requested that I find a secret base of an apparent alien-worshipper. I'll need to find Dogon's HQ, which is hidden somewhere around the Fields nearby Omega Sector, find #bDogon's Report#k from the box at the Dogon's HQ, and give them to Chury.

I gave Chury, who was waiting for me at the Silo of the Omega Sector, the #bDogon's Report#k that I found from Dogon's secret base. I can't believe someone is actually helping aliens... now THAT's quite shocking.

string.name: name
string.value: Hoony's Toothache
I should go see Hoony of Omega Sector.

I met with Hoony again at a field around Omega Sector. Hoony seemed to have an affinity for sweets, and it did not do his teeth any good. Now, he needed Pain Reliever to relieve the excruciating pain on his teeth. My job now is to get the #bPain Releiver#k from the Omega Sector, and give it to Hoony.
I purchased the #bPain Reliever#k from Dr. Pepper at the Omega Sector Silo, and gave it to Hoony, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Seriously, enough with the sweets!

string.name: name
string.value: Chief Gray's Sign
I should go see Gunny of Omega Sector.

I met up with Gunny again at a field around Omega Sector. Lately Gunny has been on a mission to trace Chief Gray's every move, but due to the fact that he gets lost easily, he had been having trouble locating it. I'll need to defeat Chief Gray's for Gunny and collect 5 signs that they wear with them, so I can give them to Gunny.\n\n#t4000125# #b#c4000125##k/5
I collected Chief Gray's signs and gave them to Gunny, who's at a field around Omega Sector. With this sign, Gunny may be able to have an easier time tracing Chief Gray.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Grays
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

At a field around Omega Sector, I met this strangely-dressed man who called himself Black Mesoranger. He requested that I eliminate the alien that's been taking over Kulan Field, the #bBarnard Gray#k, 25 of them to be exact.\n\n#o4230116# #r#a34121#
I successfully completed the mission from Black Mesoranger by defeating the #bBarnard Grays#k. It seems, however, that there will be much more dangerous aliens monsters around Kulan Field

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Chief Gray
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

I met with Black Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. She wanted me to take out #bChief Grays#k, considered as a high rank among the Grays, as well as collect 3 of their #bnotes#k from them. Chief Grays are very rare among all Grays and they are few and far between. How am I going to find them? \n\n#t4031102# #b#c4031102##k/3

I took 3 #bnotes#k from the Chief Grays and gave them to Black Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Apparently, these notes contain the history of the Grays... hopefully these notes can be deciphered soon!

string.name: name
string.value: The History of Zeta Leticulan
I better go see Black Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Kulan Field.

I met Black Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. She said the notes have been deciphered, and they revealed that the original planet in which the Grays lived in has been affected with lethal contaminants. Ever since then, they've been looking for a new place to live in, and the Earth turned out to be an ideal place for them. She said that she needed to see which lethal containments aliens couldn't stand that currently infest their original planet, and requested that I extract the #bskin cells of Barnard Gray, Zeta Gray, Ultra Gray, and Chief Gray#k.

#t4031103# #b#c4031103##k/1
#t4031104# #b#c4031104##k/1
#t4031105# #b#c4031105##k/1
#t4031106# #b#c4031106##k/1

I extracted the cells of #bBarnard Gray, Zeta Gray, Ultra Gray, and Chief Gray#k, and handed them to Black Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. If the pollutants are poisonous enough for them to leave the planet for good, then our planet may not be safe for much longer...

string.name: name
string.value: The Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who's somewhere around the Boswell Field...

I met up with #bPink Mesoranger#k at the Boswell Field near Omega Sector, and she looked very concerned over her never-ending habit of oversleeping. She asked if I could get her 20 #bTable Clocks#k that are dropped from monster #bTick-Tock#k. I better start heading down to the bottom of the Ludibrium Clocktower. \n\n#t4000114# #b#c4000114##k/20

I gathered up #bTable Clocks#k for Pink Mesoranger, who was stationed somewhere around Omega Sector, so she can overcome her chronic oversleeping. But then again, she always had trouble waking up, so I may have to find something more powerful for her...

string.name: name
string.value: Assembling the Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who should be around Boswell Field.

I met Pink Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. I was expecting her to tell me that she's been waking up on time, only to find out that all of her clocks have been destroyed. She said she needed a special alarm clock, and to make it will require #b2 Special Batteries, 10 Cogs, and 10 Table Clocks#k. To obtain the special batteries, I'll have to defeat Master Robo at the Ludibrium Clocktower.

#t4031115# #b#c4031115##k/2
#t4000114# #b#c4000114##k/10
#t4000115# #b#c4000115##k/10

To make a special alarm clock for Pink Mesoranger, stationed at a field around Omega Sector, I gathered up a bunch of #bSpecial Batteries, Cogs, and Table Clocks#k as materials. I sure hope this clock does not break on her.

string.name: name
string.value: A Sleeping Monster

string.name: parent
string.value: Delivering the Alarm Clock
I should go see Pink Mesoranger, who's somewhere around Boswell Field.

I ran into Pink Mesoranger again at Boswell Field, near the Omega Sector. She said that the items I gathered up for her last time has been sent to #bKevin the Soldier#k of Omega Sector, and that he should be ready with the #bSuper Alarm Clock#k. My task is to get it from him for her. I hope she'll be able to wake up on time with this baby.
I received a request from Pink Mesoranger to receive the Alarm Clock from Kevin the Soldier for her. The clock looks very well-made.

string.name: name
string.value: The Completion of the Alarm Clock

string.name: parent
string.value: Delivering the Alarm Clock
I received the #bSuper Alarm Clock#k from #bKevin the Soldier#k, who was at the Omega Sector, for Pink Mesoranger. Now all I have to do is deliver this to her.
#bKevin the Soldier#k made the #bsuper alarm clock#k for Pink Mesoranger, stationed at a field around Omega Sector, and I delivered it to her. Hopefully this will enable her to wake up on time.

string.name: name
string.value: Trading with Alien Gray
I better go take a look at Alien Gray, who's somewhere around Kulan Field.

I ran into #bAlien Gray#k at Kulan Field around Omega Sector. He claimed that it's the Omega Sector, not them, that's been the bad one, and it asked me to help it invade the Sector by getting a number of materials from the Omega Sector Silo. I really don't feel good about helping it, but... oh well... I'll need to enter the Omega Sector Silo and bring out #b3 Secret Documents#k. \n\n#t4031116# #b#c4031116##k/3

I got the 3 secret documents out of the Silo and handed them to #bAlien Gray#k, which was at Kulan Field of Omega Sector. I was richly rewarded for my effort, but I can't believe I fell for Gray's lies... I better hope the Omega Sector does not find out about the fact that I actually helped out the aliens...

string.name: name
string.value: The Effort to Make-up
I better go see Yellow Mesoranger at the Safety Zone.

I met with Yellow Mesoranger at a field around Omega Sector. She alerted me that she's aware of the fact that I helped out Alien Gray, and that if I am to dispel the notion that I'm on the alien's side, I'll have to make an effort to make-up for my blunders. In order to regain their trust, I'll have to eliminate the aliens. \n\n#o4230118# #r#a34201#

I may have helped out Alien Gray in a moment of chaos, but after successfully completing the mission Yellow Mesoranger gave me, I think I regained some of her trust. It just seems like the aliens do not want to peacefully coexist with us.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting Meteorite Samples
I better go see Yellow Mesoranger at the Safety Zone.

I met up with Yellow Mesoranger again at a field around Omega Sector. Displaying her faith in me, she requested that I pick up #b6 Meteorite Samples#k that's been scattered all over Kulan Field for further investigation. If I take care of this mission, I'll probably gain some more of her trust... \n\n#t4031117# #b#c4031117##k/6
I gathered up the meteorite samples from the Kulan Field and gave them to Yellow Mesoranger, who was at a field around Omega Sector. Hopefully this will jumpstart the studies.

string.name: name
string.value: Fuel for MT-09
I should go see Kay the engineer at the Omega Sector.

I met an engineer named Kay at the Omega Sector Silo. She said she'd been looking for an assistant, and asked if I could help her out. For my first task, since she's trying to develop a new machine that recycles MT-09's fuel, she wanted me to collect #b5 MT-09's Fuels#k.\n\n#t4000126# #b#c4000126##k/5
I went around and collected the fuel for MT-09. This was for Kay the Engineer, who was at the Silo of the Omega Sector. I wonder what kind of a machine Kay will make with the fuel...

string.name: name
string.value: The New Control Program

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot
I should go see Kay the engineer at the Omega Sector.

I met Kay the Engineer again at the Silo of the Omega Sector. She first wanted to make sure that I didn't forget that I volunteered to be her assistant. Then, she said she needed a number of memory cards that contain Rombot Control Program, and asked me to collect 3 #bRombot's Memory Cards#k, which can be found through Rombot the monster at the Eos Tower. Then, I'll have to pay a visit to #bPorter#k at the Command Center in the Omega Sector and have him decipher the memory cards, and then hand her the #b3 Deciphered Memory Cards#k to her.
I defeated the Rombots that have been hidden in Eos Tower and got a hold of the #bRombot's Memory Cards#k. I then handed them to Porter to decipher the code.

string.name: name
string.value: Porter the Undependable

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot
I need 3 of Rombot's Memory Cards so #bPorter#k of Omega Sector can decipher them.
Porter made a colossal mistake and destroyed one of Rombot's Memory Cards. I can't believe I just trusted this man to do this job!

string.name: name
string.value: Porter's Mistake

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot

I met #bPorter#k at the Command Center in the Omega Sector and gave him Rombot's 3 memory cards, but oh my... he was unable to decipher one of the three, and destroyed it. I'll need to find another one of Rombot's Memory Card for Porter.
I watched over Porter's deciphering with an uneasy feeling, but thankfully he didn't make any mistake this time around.

string.name: name
string.value: The Brilliant Assistant

string.name: parent
string.value: The Control Program for Rombot

Once again, I gave #bPorter#k Rombot's Memory Cards. Fortunately, the deciphering worked this time around, and I was able to get a hold of #b3 Deciphered Memory Cards#k for Kay. Now all I have to do is give them to her.
I gave Kay, who's at the Silo of Omega Sector, the #bDeciphered Memory Cards#k that she requested. I'm anxious to see what she makes out of them.

string.name: name
string.value: Porter's Secret Letter

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship
I should go see Porter of the Omega Sector.

#bPorter#k, who's at the Command Center in the Omega Sector, requested that I deliver a letter to #bKay the Engineer#k at the Omega Sector Silo. This letter has to be delivered on time, so I'll have to hurry up and give it to her. I wonder what's written in this though... maybe it's a love letter. Hahaha.
I gave Kay the Engineer, who was at the Omega Sector Silo, the letter from Porter. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like a love letter. It's about a disappeared Dropship

string.name: name
string.value: Where is the Dropship?

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship

I was able to hand #bPorter#k's letter from the Command Center in the Omega Sector to #bKay the Engineer#k, who was at the Omega Sector Silo, on time. I was expecting it to be a love letter, to no avail. Instead, it was about the missing dropship, and its current location. That's boring... anyway, Kay requested that I find the Dropship, which should be somewhere around Boswell Field, and check out the pilot's livelihood.
I found an empty dropship at the Boswell Field, and it appeared to have mislanded here. The pilot is nowhere to be found; a letter was found instead.

string.name: name
string.value: The Pilot's Whereabouts...

string.name: parent
string.value: The Missing Dropship
I found what appeared to be a broken Dropship around Boswell Field, but the pilot is nowhere to be found, and instead, I was able to find a letter inside. I better give that letter to Kay.

I found a letter inside the broken Dropship, and gave it to #bKay the Engineer#k at the Omega Sector Silo. With a sad look on her eyes, Kay said she was glad to find out the pilot was at least alive. Now, where would that pilot be...?

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 100 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.

I met Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector, and he asked for my help to gather up some items to make various kinds of medicine. He said he needed #b100 Mateon Tentacles#k, which can be obtained by taking out the aliens. It's quite amusing to think that the alien tentacles can be used as an ingredient to make medicines. Rice really wanted me to keep it a secret, since this was something even the famous Dr. Pepper was unaware of, and he's thinking of making a patent out of it. Well, time to collect some tentacles! \n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/100

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b100 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will the research start now? I wonder what kind of the antidote this will produce. I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 200 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b200 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/200

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b200 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 300 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b300 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/300

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b300 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 400 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b400 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/400

Rice the Medic of Omega Sector requested the #b400 Mateon Tentacles#k, and I gathered up all of them. Will this prove to be a turning point on the research? I should go see Rice right about the time when the tentacles run out.

string.name: name
string.value: Collecting 500 Mateon Tentacles

string.name: parent
string.value: The Antidote
I should go see Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector.
Rice said the research has gone well, but realized it required much more materials than the ones I got for him, so I'll have to give him #b500 Mateon Tentacles#k.\n\n#t4000120# #b#c4000120##k/500

I gathered up enough Mateon Tentacles for Rice the Medic at the Omega Sector to make the new antidote. Was that the reason? It looks like Rice created the medicine that even the great Dr. Pepper couldn't make. Once he gets the patent on it and mass-produce it, he may be sitting on a huge pile of cash. Will he share a little bit of that with me~??

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Mateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met Green Mesoranger at Boswell Field around Omega Sector. Green Mesoranger said he heard a lot about me through other Mesorangers, and asked if I wanted to tackle a Mesoranger mission. First I decided to help Green Mesoranger by helping his mission to #beliminate 100 Mateons#k.\n\n#o4230119# #r#a34351#

I took out 100 Mateons, just the way Green Mesoranger from Boswell Field asked. The duties of the Mesorangers don't seem to be over, though, so if I have some time to spare, then I maybe I should go check Green Mesoranger then.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Plateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met up with Green Meoranger again at the Boswell Field of Omega Sector. This time, Green Mesoranger said that the #bPlateons#k, which are far more dangerous than the Mateons, are threatening the Omega Sector and that I'll have to take care of them, while bringing #b80 Plateon's Helmets#k as evidence.\n\n#t4000121# #b#c4000121##k/80

I took out the Plateons and collected 80 Plateon Helmets, just the way Green Mesoranger from Boswell Field asked. The duties of the Mesorangers don't seem to be over, though, so if I have some time to spare, then I maybe I should go check Green Mesoranger then.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Plateon and Mecateon
I better go see Green Mesoranger, who should be somewhere around Boswell Field.

I met up with Green Meoranger again at the Boswell Field of Omega Sector. As a last task, Green Mesoranger asked me to eliminate the #bPlateons#k again, and collect #bMecateon's#k weapons, which are very high-quality. I need to take out #b150 Plateons#k and collect #b120 Mecateon's Laser Guns#k for him.

#o4230120# #r#a34371##k
#t4000122# #b#c4000122##k/120

Just the way the mission stated by Green Mesoranger of Boswell Field, I took out the Plateons and collected Mecateon's laser guns. Green Mesoranger seemed genuinely surprised by the fact that I took care of all the missions, and told me it'd be a pleasure to work with me again. Now, THAT felt good!

string.name: name
string.value: The Ore of Dark Crystal
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector..

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector. The general said we'll be able to obtain the powerless, lightless #bDull Crystal#k that have been used up at the Eos Tower from #bDrum Bunnies#k. While most would dismiss the item as nothing more than a useless crystal, the general believed it had something important hidden in it, and that he requested me to gather up #b20 Dull crystals#k at the Eos Tower. I'll need to get those crystals from the Drum Bunnies at the tower.\n\n#t4031135# #b#c4031135##k/20

Just like the way General Mastro instructed, I went to Eos Tower, took out took out the Drum Bunnies, and gathered up #b20 Dull crystals#k for him. While looking at the crystal, he mentioned that there must be something inside these crystals to turn these previously-adorable Drum Bunnies to something of a menace. I wonder exactly what's inside it.

string.name: name
string.value: Where's the Power of Origin?
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector..

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector. The general said after investigating the dull crystals from the Drum Bunnies, he realized that the aliens may have a clue about this, and instructed me to find Alien Gray. There may be an item around Alien Gray that may provide clues for this. Of course, it won't just cough up the item, so I may have to look around the area where it's at. \n\n#t4031136# #c4031136#/1

Just like the way General Mastro instructed, I found a hidden document that appeared to have been purposely hidden Alien Gray. The general said, after putting the document through Alien Language Translator, it said a Dark Cryastal Ore with its dark force will turn a harmless doll into a monster. He wanted all the crystals gone before it gets too late.

string.name: name
string.value: Terminating the Dark Force.
I should go visit General Maestro at the Omega Sector..

I met General Maestro, who's in command of a humongous army at the Omega Sector, again. The general said although a perfect solution hasn't been presented yet, there's something for me to do. He wanted me to bring back #b30 Dull Crystals#k and #b10 Dark Crystal Ores#k from the Drum Bunnies at the Eos Tower.

#t4031140# #b#c4031140##k/30
#t4004004# #b#c4004004##k/10

Just like the way General Mastro instructed, I gathered up the #bDull Crystals#k and #bDark Crystal Ores#k from the Drum Bunnies. Hopefully this'll stop the bunnies for a while, but this ain't over. I wonder when peace will actually settle on the Eos Tower.

string.name: name
string.value: Help Kevin the Soldier's Vacation Plans

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach
I heard Kevin the Soldier has something related with VIP ticket to Florina Beach at Omega Sector.

Kevin the Soldier was drafted into the army, but was never thrown in combat, and instead, is relegated to security duties at the Omega Sector. Feeling bored from all the security work, Kevin decided to earn some brownie-points for vacation by hunting down Mateons, and enlisted for my help. 

 #t04000120# #b#c04000120##k/25 
 #t04031206# #b#c04031206##k/1
What can I do with a Ripped Travel Ticket? I better check on Nara the Tour Guide first, just the way the ticket said.

string.name: name
string.value: A Chat with Nara the Tour Guide

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach
Nara said a Ripped VIP pass will not work, nor can it be re-published, but the way to leave may be easier by paying a visit to Shuri, the the Tour Guide at Orbis.
Hmmm ... so something as simple as making a new ticket cannot be done, huh. Alright, since I'm here and all, why don't I just take a crack at it til the very end?

string.name: name
string.value: Recovering VIP Ticket to Florina Beach

string.name: parent
string.value: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach

I visited Shuri, and she mentioned that the VIP ticket cannot be re-issued, but it can be recovered. To recover the ripped VIP ticket, I'll need a few items... 

 #t04000059# #b#c04000059##k/50 
 #t04000060# #b#c04000060##k/30 
 #t04021007# #b#c04021007##k/3
After recovering the ripped VIP Ticket to Florina Beach, I was given the VIP Ticket to Florina Beach, a lifetime pass, as a sign of thanks.nNow it's a matter of taking a vacation whenever I want.

string.name: name
string.value: The Binding
The number of ghosts have increased dramatically, that it got to the point of #p2041026# being sent to Ludibrium to do something about it. I should go see him.
I was able to meet #p2041026# past the Path of Time of Ludibrium. He wanted me to eliminate the bindings of #o7130300#, and collect the bindings for him. \n\n#t4000148# #b#c4000148#/20#k
I helped #p2041026#, who was hastily sent to Ludibrium, eliminate the bindings that enclosed #o7130300#.

string.name: name
string.value: Free Spirit
The number of ghosts have increased dramatically, that it got to the point of #p2041026# being sent to Ludibrium to do something about it. I should go see him.
I was able to meet #p2041026# past the Path of Time of Ludibrium. He wanted me to free #o6230500#s and collect their souls. \n\n#t4000144# #b#c4000144#/80#k
I helped Ghosthunter Bob find freedom for Master Soul Teddys.

string.name: name
string.value: The Soul Collector
Ghosthunter Bob of Ludibrium is complaining that he lost the vacuum that gathers up the spirits in it..

Apparently, once Ghosthunter Bob focuses on eating, he will never realize about anything and everything, including the thefts. This is the reason he had no idea his Soul Collector had been missing. I better help him find it back. 

#t4031193# #b#c4031193##k/1 
#o8141000# Eliminate #r#a34461##k
I helped Ghosthunter Bob recover the lost Soul Collector.

string.name: name
string.value: Destroying the Power of Evil

Dark Tachion is an altered version of Tachion, which is the source of power that forms the Time Sphere. It should be deemed dangerous now, and since a creepy, evil force keeps seeping out of it, it must be a dangerous time here. I should destroy this at the lava deep in El Nath.

After taking care of Papulatus, it coughed up Dark Tachion, emitting a dark force in the process. To destroy this, I went to the deepest part of El Nath where the lava flows. I better destroy this by dropping it in the boiling lava.
After entering a hidden area where the lava flows, I found a Suspicious Lava. This is where I threw the Dark Tachion to destroy it. The force of evil disappeared along with the Tachion itself.

string.name: name
string.value: Mason the Collector

string.name: parent
string.value: Mason the Collector
I should meet Mason, who newly moved into a previously-empty house at Ludibrium.

The bird with an odd way of talking, Mason the Collector is always busy looking for something to collect. It especially has a fondness for sparkling objects, and apparently found the Aurora Marble at the Warped Path of Time. Hmmm... wonder who has that item? \n\n#t4031189::# #b#c4031189#/1#k
At the Warped Path of Time, I took out the Lazy Buffys, collected the Aurora Marble, and handed it to Mason.

string.name: name
string.value: Mason the Collector Ⅱ

string.name: parent
string.value: Mason the Collector
It seems like Mason the Collector has a favor to ask other than that of Aurora Marbles.

Mason the Collector took a look at the Aurora Marble, and wondered... how it would it look like in an original state of form? It looks like Buffy' marble have been shaped in such way through an outside force... nn#t4031195# #b#c4031195#/10#kn#t4000129# #b#c4000129#/50#k
Just like Mason the collecting fanatic wanted, I managed to gather up more Lazy Buffy marbles and Aurora marbles. In return, I received an item from him that looks quite useful...

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of the VIP Ticket
Where did the ripped piece of the VIP ticket go? I better go see Kevin the Soldier.
The ripped piece of the VIP ticket is missing, so I went to Kevin the Soldier for its whereabouts. Kevin wound up picking up the ticket after I left.
I was looking for the ripped piece of the VIP ticket for a looong time, and I fund out that the ones I dropped, Kevin the Soldier managed to pick them up and save them. Phew~~~

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of the VIP Ticket
Where did the ripped piece of the VIP ticket go? I better go see Kevin the Soldier.
The ripped piece of the VIP Ticket has disappeared, so I asked Kevin the Soldier for some help..
Fortunately, even after losing a ripped piece of VIP ticket, Kevin the Soldier was picking up after me. Phew... thanks a lot =)

string.name: name
string.value: Blocktopus is an Alien?
I heard that #p2050001# of #m221000000# has something new to research, and is in need of help...

As someone who tirelessly studied life in space, #p2050001# wondered if a monster from Eos Tower, #b#o3230302##k, is in fact an alien. He said details could be found out by having an octopus key chain......

#i4000099##t4000099# #b#c4000099#/1#k

Then... if there's a more definite evidence than #t4000099#, maybe we'll find out a more accurate answer.
Gave #p2050001# #t4000099#. Will #p2050001# be able to find the correlations betwee #o3230302# and aliens?

string.name: name
string.value: Zeno, the Formidable Enemy
#b#p2050001##k from #b#m221000000##k has requested your cooperation to save the world...

Boasting a firm build and intelligence, #o6220001# is a new type of robotic ordnance. But #o6220001# has been acting strangely as of late... It attacks everything including the Grays. #p2050001#, curious as to why #o6220001# has suddenly turned ill-tempered, has asked you to talk to #b#p2050002##k to gather information about #o6220001#.
When asked about #o6220001#, #p2050002# denies knowing anything about it... Hm, he seems suspicious.

string.name: name
string.value: Wave Translator
Let's go to #b#m221040100##k to find #b#p2050002##k.

When you tell #p2050001# that you couldn't get any useful information from #p2050002#, he suggests he build #b#t4031927##k. He asks you to find the materials so that he can build the translator that can decode the ultrasonic waves that Grays send each other using their tentacles. 

#i4000119##t4000119# #b#c4000119#/30#k
#i4000118##t4000118# #b#c4000118#/30#k
#i4000125##t4000125# #b#c4000125#/1#k
#i4031926##t4031926# #b#c4031926#/10#k
When you brought him all the materials he's asked for, #p2050001# made you a #t4031927#. Hmm, but he says this one might malfunction since he hasn't had the time to test it...

string.name: name
string.value: The Endangered Lives of Grays
How well does the Wave Translator work? Let's hurry over to #m221040100# and try talking to #b#p2050002##k.
While hiding the #t4031927# behind your back, you approached #p2050002#. #p2050002# tells you that nothing is going on but says something completely different through the ultrasonic waves.
You've gotten a bunch of #ruseless information#k... which means the Wave Translator probably malfunctioned. Let's return to #b#p2050001# and have him build you a new #t4031927#.#k

string.name: name
string.value: The Endangered Lives of Grays
Let's to talk to #b#p2050002##k with the new #t4031927#.

While hiding the #t4031927# behind your back, you approached #p2050002#. #p2050002# says nothing is going on but says something completely different through the ultrasonic waves. \n\n According to the #t4031927#, it seems that the Grays have broken the console which controls #o6220001#. Oh my... no wonder #o6220001# has been acting out of control.

The #p2050002# becomes flustered as soon as he recognizes the #t4031927# you're holding, but informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's go tell Dr. Kim.

string.name: name
string.value: The Battle Against Zeno

The #b#p2050002##k, who has failed at keeping #o6220001# under control, informs you that #m221000000# will be in danger if nothing is done to control #o6220001# soon. Let's hurry over to #b#p2050001##k and let him know.

When you tell #p2050001# everything you've heard from #p2050002# using the Wave Translator, #p2050001# asks you to defeat Zeno for the safety of this world. Based on #p2050001#'s speculation, #o6220001# can be found in a place called #b#m221040301##k, where you can reach from #m221040300#. Let's rush over to defeat #r#o6220001##k once and for all! \n\n#o6220001# #r#a34571##k

You have defeated #o6220001# and reported your progress to #p2050001#. Not only does #m221000000# have to worry about the safety of the world, but also the safety of the #p2050002#... No wonder #m221000000# is always busy.

string.name: name
string.value: Revolutionary Defensive Wall Construction Plan
#b#p2050009##k in #b#m221000000##k wants to share his new plans with someone.

#b#p2050009##k suggested that we help #b#p2050008##k. He says we can prevent aliens from attacking by using solid #b#t04000101##k to build a defensive wall around #b#m221000000##k. In order to find out if this plan is possible, we need to get #b#t04000101##k and get it tested by #b#p2050001##k.

#i04000101##t04000101# #b#c04000101#/20

#r30 minute time limit

It's sad that #b#p2050009##k really thinks his idea is brilliant but #b#p2050001##k is right. This plan clearly makes no sense and doesn't even need scientific testing in order to prove that... Ugh, next time I should think things through before I offer to help. I hope I grew at least a little bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Path to the Past
I arrived at the majestic temple high above the sky, the Temple of Time. A fussy looking #b#p2140000##k standing in front of the three doors begins to talk to me...

#p2140000# said there was an incident recently where an intruder broke in through the Door to the Past and that until the case is resolved, they will not be letting regular visitors inside the Temple of Time. He says if I really want to go in, I can, but it will be a waste of time... Well, should I just #bgo in for now#k?

#p2140000# said because time goes backwards in Memory Lane, you can't go forward unless you are given permission. He says I would need to get permission from the Goddess... How do I get permission from the Goddess?

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane1

I went inside the temple through the broken Door to the Past, but I kept circling back to the same place. This Temple of Time...I can't go forward unless I get permission from the Goddess. How do I get permission from the Goddess? I should ask #b#p2140000##k.

He says the Goddess is in eternal sleep but if I get permission from the Goddess' representative, #p2140000#, I can go through Memory Lane. #p2140000# said that he needs someone to #binvestigate the break in#k, and that if I agree to do it, he will grant me permission.

When I said I would gladly do it, #p2140000# said he will have to first #btest#k me and see if I can withstand the flow of energy that governs Memory Lane. The test is none other than defeating #r999#k #r#o8200001#k in #m270010100#... 

#o8200001# #r#a35011##k
I defeated 999 #o8200001#. #p2140000# was impressed, and I was able to go further in. But...

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane2

As #p2140000# said, I was able to pass #m270010100# and go all the way to #m270010200#. But I couldn't move beyond that... I thought I was given permission, what's going on? I'm going to have to complain to #b#p2140000##k.

He said the permission he gave me was only up to #m270010200#, and that if I wanted to go in further, I would have to prove myself for that as well. When I told him that I definitely want to explore more, he said to go to #b#m270010200##k this time and defeat #r999 #o8200002##k... \n\n#o8200002# #r#a35021##k

I defeated 999 #o8200002#. #p2140000# was once again impressed and granted me permission. I get a feeling that this permission is only good up to #m270010300#. If I want to go in further, will I have to prove my strength again?

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane3
I received permission to go all the way to #m270010300#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270010300##k and take out #r999 #o8200003##k. \n\n#o8200003# #r#a35031##k
I defeated 999 #o8200003#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270010400#.

#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, defeat the giant Whale of Time, #r#o8220004##k, at #b#m270010500##k \n\n#o8220004# #r#a35051##k
I defeated the Whale of Time, #o8220004#. #p2140000# granted me permission. I should be able to go past Memory Lane now.

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Memory

string.name: parent
string.value: Memory Lane
I defeated #o8220004# as #p2140000# told me to, but strangely, I can't go past #m270010500#. Something doesn't seem right... I should go ask #b#p2140000##k.

Whale of Time, #o8220004#, eats memory as its staple food. #p2140000# said that my memory was eaten by #o822004# while I was fighting it and therefore I couldn't pass through Memory Lane. He said I might be able to retrieve my lost memory if I go see #b#p2140001##k, the Memory Keeper.
I met #p2140001#, the Memory Keeper.

string.name: name
string.value: Memory Keeper

string.name: parent
string.value: Memory Lane

I went to go see #p2140001# just as #p2140000# told me to. He immediately knew that I lost my memory and said in order to retrieve the lost memory, I would need to go back to the beginning where my adventure began...
After talking to the Memory Keeper, I went to my previous job post at Victoria Island to retrieve my memory. I wonder if I got my memory back? I guess I'll know when I try to go past Memory Lane...

string.value: The One Who Walks Down the Road of Regrets1

string.name: name
string.value: Frozen Emotions

string.name: parent
string.value: Road of Regrets
I received permission from #p2140000# but I wasn't able to get past #m270020500#. Is there another problem? I should go talk to #b#p2140000##k.

#o8220005#, the Ice Knight who protects the temple, has frozen his emotions so that regret would never cause him to fail a mission. #p2140000# said it seems like #bmy emotions have been frozen as well#k while fighting him. He continued to say that those with frozen emotions don't feel any regret and can't pass through the Lane of Regret... So what do I do? \n\n Then #p2140000# suggests perhaps #b#p2140002##k, who can make all sorts of things, might be able to help me.
I met with #p2140002#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Sorcerer Who Sells Emotions

string.name: parent
string.value: Road of Regrets

I met with #p2140002#. He noticed right away that my emotions had been frozen and told me to buy his #bpotion#k if I want to thaw out my emotions. He says it's not cheap but it will definitely work. However, there's just one side effect to the potion...

I drank #p2140002#'s potion. Due to the side effect, all of my HP and MP were drained, making me temporarily unavailable for combat, but I think I found my emotions back. I should try going past the Road of Regrets now.

string.name: name
string.value: The Goddess' Blessing

string.name: parent
string.value: Road to Oblivion
I received permission from #p2140000#, but once I went deep inside the temple, something was stopping me and I couldn't go in further. What did I lose this time? I should go see #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# scratched his head and said he didn't know what happened this time. He said unless I lost my Oblivion, which doesn't even make sense, there should be no reason I can't pass through the Road to Oblivion. \n\nHe suggested that maybe the #bGoddess' Promise#k has been broken and told me to go see #b#p2140003##k to check the records of the promise.

I met with #p2140003#. He said he had been waiting for me and began explaining things as if he already knew what was going on. He said that the blessing of the Goddess of Time, can never disappear or be taken away, and it was still valid... However, he said there is another reason why I can't go deep into the temple.

string.name: name
string.value: Force Field

string.name: parent
string.value: Road to Oblivion

When I told #p2140003# everything I heard from #p2140000#, he knew right away. He said the reason the inside of the temple is blocked is because of an #rintrusion by an outside force#k! #p2140000# said it must be because a #rforce field has been set by an intruder#k and that I need to break the force field and find out who the intruder is. He says I need the power of the Guardians of the Past in order to break the force field... 

#i4000446##t4000446# #b#c4000446##k/10
#i4000451##t4000451# #b#c4000451##k/10

#i4000462##t4000462# #b#c4000462##k/1
I brought him all the items. The Keeper of the Temple gave me a marble with special powers, and said that I should be able to break the force field with this...

string.name: name
string.value: Beyond the Ruins
#p2140000# made the intruder's force field ineffective. What was this intruder planning to do? I should ask #b#p2140000##k.

#p2140000# said that he has no idea what the intruder wants. There's nothing but a ruin deep in the temple and nothing to take from the Path of Past. 'Perhaps the #rMirror of the Goddess#k...?', he mumbled and then shook his head and said 'no way....'. But just in case, he told me to go past #b#m270040000#, to #m270050000##k and check...
When I told #p2140000# that someone summoned a strange monster from the Mirror of the Goddess, his face turned pale.

string.name: name
string.value: In Search for the Lost Memory

According to the Memory Keeper, in order to find my lost memory, I need to go back to the starting point of my adventure. Starting point of my adventure? Let's see... Wouldn't that be when I left Maple Island to Victoria Island for the first time and got my job? I should go see #b#p1022000##k.

It had been a long time since I last met with #p1022000#. He said he remembered back when I was just a beginner and I knew nothing. He was happy to see how I've grown into a great warrior. I was touched that he still remembered our first meeting from such a long time ago.

string.name: name
string.value: Breaking the Force Field
I wanted to go deep inside the temple, but I couldn't because of the intruder's force field. I should try making the item that can destroy the force field with help from #p2140000#.

In order to make the #t4032002#, the item that can destroy the force field, I need 10 Smiley Masks, 10 #t4000451#, 10 #t4000456# and 1 each of #t4000460#, #t4000461# and #t4000462#. All these items can only be found in the Temple of Time.
When I brought all the ingredients to #p2140000#, he made me the #t4032002#. Now I should be able to go deep inside the temple again.
