마을의 장로님인 #b#p9250014##k의 도장을 받아야 하는데, 명상 중이시라고 한다. 잠시 후에 말을 걸어보자.
마지막으로 만날 요원은 #b#p9250004##k이다. 들리는 소문에 의하면 그분은 유명한 무예타이 사부라고 하던데..
마지막 요원인 #b#p9250004##k를 만났다.

string.name: name
string.value: 플로팅마켓 수호대 가입완료

string.name: parent
string.value: 플로팅마켓 수호대 가입하기
이제 마지막 도장만 받으면 나도 수호대에 가입할 수 있다. 어서 #b#p9250004##k의 도장을 받도록 하자.
수호대 요원들의 도장을 모두 받았다. 이제 수호대장 #b#p9250012##k만 찾아가면 나도 수호대원이 될 수 있다.
수호대원들의 도장을 받고 나도 플로팅마켓 수호대에 가입했다. 앞으로 할 일들이 기대되는걸…

string.name: name
string.value: 수호대의 첫 번째 임무

string.name: parent
string.value: 플로팅마켓 수호대 임무
드디어 수호대에 새로운 임무가 접수 되었다고 한다. 어서 빨리 태국 플로팅마켓 수호대의 대장인 #b#p9250012##k를 찾아가 봐야겠다.

플로팅마켓 수호대원이 된 나에게 주어진 첫 번째 임무는 플로팅마켓을 혼란스럽게 하는 몬스터들을 처리 하는 것이다. 

#o2130103# #r#a42171##k 
#o9420000# #r#a42172##k
하하하! 수상시장 수호대로서의 첫 번째 임무를 성공적으로 해냈다. 이번 일로 내가 얼마나 용감한 요원인지를 보여 준거다.

string.name: name
string.value: 수호대의 두 번째 임무

string.name: parent
string.value: 플로팅마켓 수호대 임무
내가 처리해야 할 수호대의 또 다른 임무가 있다고 한다. 나 없이는 제대로 되는 게 없다니까. 하하. 어쨌든 수상대장 #b#p9250012##k를 다시 찾아가봐야겠다.
나의 두 번째 임무는 수호대장 #b#p9250012##k에게 #r#o9420004##k이 삼킨 열쇠를 찾아다 주는 것이다. \n\n#i4031388##t4031388# #b#c4031388#/1#k
두 번째 임무 역시 쉽게 처리 했다. 나는 정말 멋진 수호대원이다. 하하!

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko's Concern
#b#p9110002##k is responsible for taking care of a small altar over in Mushroom Shrine. She seems to be concerned about something...

Tired of cleaning up after those pesky #o9400000#s, #p9110002# wants me to gather #b100 #t4000064#s#k. I'd hate to see the #m800000000# covered in filth, so I've decided to help her. Time to pluck some #t4000064#s!\n\n#t4000064# #b#c4000064#/100
I gave #p9110002# a whole bunch of #t4000064#s. It felt good seeing her being ecstatic over a bunch of #p9110002#s. Hopefully this will restore #m800000000#'s beauty...

string.name: name
string.value: Kino Konoko vs Fire Raccoon
#b#p9110002##k, who resides in the Mushroom Shrine, is having a bit of trouble with Fire Racoons. I should see if I can help!

Kino Konoko tells me that the food vendors and restaurants in #m800000000# are suffering from #b#o9400001#s#k attacking their places. I better help them out. I would not want to miss out on some great food around here! Now, where can I find #o9400001#?\n\n#o9400001# #r#a43011##k
I let #p9110002# know that I took care of 100 #o9400001#s. She was ecstatic, to say the least. Hopefully that'll keep the #m800000000# food from disappearing...

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k of #b#m800000000##k has an item she really would love to have. What must that be?

It turns out that the item #p9120001# wants to have is a muffler made out of #t4000066#. A muffler made out of Foxtails. Hmm...I don't get why she'd want to wear a muffler in such warm weather, but I did promise to get her #t4000066#s, She needs 100, so I'd better get started. So, that's #b100 #t4000066#s#k... \n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/100#k
I gave #p9120001# 100 #t4000066#s. Hmmm, but this isn't as much as I thought. Can she really make a muffler out of this?

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Muffler 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#b#p9120001##k, who wanted to make a #t4000066# muffler, haven't finished making it. I wonder what she's lacking...

#p9120001# wanted to make a muffler out of #t4000066#, so I gave her 100 #t4000066#s. Despite the work, #p9120001# flat-out insisted that she asked for 300 all along, and demanded that I get her 200 more. I didn't need to hear that from her, but I'll have to get her 200 more... #b200 more #t4000066#s#k? That's a lot!\n\n#t4000066# #b#c4000066#/200
I gave #p9120001# 200 #t4000066#s. Hopefully this will do.

string.name: name
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Coat

string.name: parent
string.value: Hanako's Foxtail Wardrobe
#p9120001# seemed to be dissatisfied with just having a #t4000066# muffler, and wants something more. What would that be...

It turns out #p9120001# wanted not just a #t4000066# muffler, but a #t4000066# coat. Seriously, why does she need a coat at #m800000000#... This defies anyone's logic, but oh well... How am I going to gather up #b400 #t4000066#s#k?\n\n #t4000066# #b#c4000066#/400
I gave #p9120001# 400 #t4000066#s. I understand her need for pretty things, but wearing a muffler AND a coat at #m800000000#? #p9120001#'s just weird.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Dark Cloud Fox
The 'best-dressed' lady of #b#m800000000##k, #b#p9120001##k, seems to be perturbed at something...

I found #p9120001# enraged - it appears her newly-purchased fabric was destroyed by a pack of #o9400004#es. For someone as vain as she is, this is devastating. As a result, I promised her to eliminate #b80 #o9400004#es#k for her.The things I do for friends... \n\n#o9400004# #r#a43051##k
#p9120001# seemed thankful for me eliminating 100 #o9400004#s. She must have bought some new fabric already.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lantern at Mushroom Shrine
#b#p9120003##k, a proud resident of #b#m800000000##k, seems to be annoyed by something.

#p9120003# was indeed annoyed by something. She was disturbed that the #t4000222#s that are being used at #m800000000# is apparently stuck with ghosts. This isn't annoying; this is downright creepy. I better kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and get her some #b#t4000222#s#k, just the way #p9120003# said.

#o9400011# #r#a43061##k 
#t4000222# #b#c4000222#/50
I eliminated #o9400011# and got some #t4000222#s for use. The more I think about it, I think #o9400011# is much more of a dangerous presence than an unlit street at night.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Ghosts
#b#p9120003##k of #b#m800000000##k seems to have something to tell me. I wonder what it is...
#p9120003# told me I have a whole bunch of #o9400003#s around me. That's creepy, to say the least. I better kill off #b80 #o9400003#s#k right now.\n\n#o9400003# #r#a43071#
After letting #p9120003# know that I've killed 80 #o9400003#s, she tells me that there aren't any #o9400003#s hovering around me. Phew...

string.name: name
string.value: Water Goblin's Cucumber
#b#p9120003##k's farm, located at #b#m800000000##k, seems to have been robbed. What happened?

#p9120003# states that the only items stolen at her farm are the #b#t4000223#s#k, and she was very confident that it was the work of #b#o9400012##k. She asked me to eliminate 80 #o9400012#s and recover 40 #t4000223#s in the process. A monster that prefers to eat #t4000223#? Interesting, especially since most kids hate that

#o9400012# #r#a43081##k 
#t4000223# #b#c4000223#/40
After eliminating #o9400012#s and recovering a whole bunch of #t4000223#s, #p9120003# had the look of satisfaction on her face.

string.name: name
string.value: Eliminating Blue Mushmom
#b#m800000000##k is apparently in deep trouble. I better go see #b#p9120003##k.

Apparently, out of numerous mushrooms that reside in #m800000000#, a few of them turned into mutants, ultimately becoming #b#o9400205##k. #p9120003# was worried that the town was going through a lot of trouble because of them, and wanted me to eliminate #o9400205#s. #o9400205#s are located at #b#m800010100##k. \n\n#o9400205# #r#a43091##k
I eliminated #o9400205#s as ordered and reported them to #p9120003#. Those mushrooms were indeed very hard to handle.

string.name: name
string.value: Rooney's Breaking News
#b#p9250052##k is apparently handing out flyers that contain the breaking news...
Just received a flyer from #b#p9250052##k. The flyer stated that Happyville is in a state of emergency, and for more details, I have to visit #p1022101#.
I asked #b#p1022101##k to inquire more on the stuff written on the flyer.

string.name: name
string.value: News Special Report
People are saying that there is shocking news on the front page of the Maple Herald. What could it be?

You were unable to buy the newspaper because it was already sold out. However, you were able to read from the newspaper clippings behind the sales clerk. They say that Santa Claus will not be coming to Maple World this year. Is it true that he's not coming to town because Maplers stopped believing in Santa Claus? There must be some other reason. #bRooney#k is from Happyville and should know about what's happening. You should go ask.
You wished Rooney a Merry Christmas! Now, you should ask about Santa Claus.

string.name: name
string.value: Disappeared Santa Encyclopedia
You should ask Rooney about the article on Santa Claus.

Rooney felt bad that most Maplers don't believe in Santa Claus anymore. She also mentioned that this is caused by the loss of #bSanta Encyclopedias#k in the town library. She asked that you gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias that the monsters have stolen. Remember, not only is it meaningful to gather all 6 Santa Encyclopedias, but also something good will happen while searching for those books.

#t4161043# #b#c4161043##k/1 
#t4161038# #b#c4161038##k/1 
#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1 
#t4161040# #b#c4161040##k/1 
#t4161041# #b#c4161041##k/1 
#t4161042# #b#c4161042##k/1

Just like Rooney had mentioned, a lot of good things happened to you while searching for the 6 Santa Encyclopedias. Since you did all those good deeds, Santa is certainly coming to town. More importantly, Maplers will now believe in Santa Claus!

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Grandmother Finding

You've found Santa Encyclopedia No.2, regarding Santa's Family History. Santa Encyclopedia No.2 has stories about the lovely wife of Santa Claus, Mrs. Claus. You should visit her by tracing the information written in Santa Encyclopedia No.2.
Mrs. Claus was precisely at the location mentioned in the book. You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus.
You asked Mrs. Claus about Santa Claus, but she pretended as if she didn't know who he was. How will you get her to warm up to you?

string.name: name
string.value: Common Sense Of Santa

You made a visit to Mrs. Claus wondering about Santa Claus's condition, but she wouldn't tell you anything. Maybe you should go find #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, the one that contains the history of Santa Claus, and read up a bit first. Then you should go visit her again.
Thanks to #bSanta Encyclopedia No.1#k, she finally opened up and started talking to you.
Truth always prospers! You were able to discover the real reason why Santa Claus disappeared.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Creation Recipes

Mrs. Claus, who previously wouldn't open up about Santa Claus, finally started talking to you after realizing you had read up on Santa Claus. As you expected, there was another reason behind Santa Claus leaving.

Mrs. Claus told you about the importance of the Christmas Socks. However, she also said that making quality socks is not an easy task. The sock factory ceased its production due to a case of robbery, but she'll be able to make them again with a little bit of your help.\n\n#t4161039# #b#c4161039##k/1

You brought #bSanta Encyclopedia No.3#k to Mrs. Claus who was having a hard time remembering how to make Christmas Socks. But it all came back to her after reading the book. You should wait a while until she finds the frame for the socks.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Actual Creation Action
Mrs. Claus has finally discovered the frame for the socks. You should ask her again.

Mrs. Claus gladly lent you a frame necessary for making Christmas Socks. She also said that yarn with good flexibility is a must. These yarns seem to have been taken by the #bSnowman#k who is highly suspected as the culprit behind the robbery. You can make socks by collecting the yarn and attaching them to the sock frame.\n\n#t4220022# #b#c4220022##k/1
Finally, you made the Socks by getting the necessary amount of yarn. Of course, don't forget to thank Mrs. Claus who taught you the craft.

string.name: name
string.value: Socks Hanging
You've successfully completed the Socks. Mrs. Claus thinks that Santa Claus will be satisfied with them. Now, you must hang the socks in a good location so that it will be seen easily by Santa Claus.

You've found a Christmas tree where you can hang the socks. This tree must be the one that Santa Claus used to visit whenever he was worried. Obviously, this is not a normal tree since it can talk! The tree tells you that doing good deeds will allow you to receive better gifts from Santa. You should go around town to see if there is anything you can do to help.\n\n#t4031885# #b#c4031885##k/4
You've helped the people in Happyville and also received a present from Santa Claus. Here's hoping that everyone will have a Merry Christmas!

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
There is an old man looking sad on the 2nd floor of center tower in Happyville. It must be hard to just pass him by, knowing that he is sad. Go find him and offer him some help.

#bCliff#k has been feeling lonely ever since Torr left to help Santa Claus. You will need to go to the highest point in town to take a picture of #bTorr#k pulling Santa's sleigh.\n\n#t4031881# #b#c4031881##k/1
What?! #bTorr#k is not in the sleigh formation. Rumor has it that there is a Reindeer crying around the corner of town. Could it be #bTorr#k?

string.name: name
string.value: Torr's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: Cliff's Rudolph
You took the picture as Cliff had requested, but Torr was not there! Cliff began to worry greatly about Torr. Let's listen to his unfinished story.

Cliff asked you to check if the reindeer crying around the corner of Happyville is Torr. And if it is, he asked you to #btell Torr#k that he will be waiting on the 2nd floor at the Center Tower of Happyville.
You've sent Torr back to lonely old man Cliff. It will be a warm and happy holiday, at least for those two.

string.name: name
string.value: Santa Cat's request

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney
#b#p9201030##k, who is planning on extensive chimney cleaning, needs some help. #b#p9201030##k should be somewhere around the Chimney in Happyville. You should find out.
You met Santa Kitty #b#p9201030##k in Happyville, who asked you to find Rina#b#p1010100##k in Henesys in order to borrow a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight to be used for cleaning the Chimney.
You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight from Rina#p1010100#k in Henesys.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery of Rina cleaning device

string.name: parent
string.value: Helping to Clean Chimney

You've successfully borrowed a Chimney Sweep and Flashlight from #p1010100#k. Let's take them to #b#p9201030##k in Happyville.

#t4031882# #b#c4031882##k/1 
#t4031883# #b#c4031883##k/1
You brought #b#p9201030##k a Chimney Sweep and a Flashlight. He thanked you and asked for permission to clean the Chimney.

string.name: name
string.value: Warm Milk Delivery

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
Dalphs#b#9220005##k in Happyville has a favor to ask of you.
You met with Dalphs#b#p9220005##k in Happyville. He asked if you could bring a glass of warm milk to #bIcarus in Kerning City#.\n\n#t4031884# #b#c4031884##k/1
You delivered a glass of warm milk to Icarus#b#p1010100##k in Kerning City.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivery the word Thank

string.name: parent
string.value: To sleep Icarus
You delivered a glass of warm milk to #b#p1052106##k. Hope he can go to bed early from now on. You should tell #b#p9220005##k in Happyville about this delivery, as he was worried.
You told Dalphs#b#p9220005##k that the glass of warm milk was successfully delivered to Icarus.

string.name: name
string.value: Bicho's snowman
Bicho in Happyville looks too weak to make a snowman all by himself, but he is doing quite well so far. But it seems like he is looking for someone.
Bicho asked you to find the person who helped him make the snowman. He said that the person is somewhere in Maple World.\n\nHis friend's name is #b#Q4490##k
Due to Bicho's misunderstanding, you were not able to find the Mapler who had helped him earlier. Wait, Bicho is thinking of another name now? You should go visit him!

string.name: name
string.value: Clear the Rubbish
I should go see #b#p9270039##k in Singapore Airport. She needs to say something about our beautiful Singapore.

She asked me to clean up the streets of Singapore. As she works at the Singapore Airport, she sees lots of foreigners complaining that the city does not look the same as before. I should impress foreign visitors again by cleaning up the wastes.

#t4000366# #r#c4000366# / 20#k
#t4000367# #r#c4000367# / 20#k
I feel much better now that I did contribute myself in making Singapore even cleaner.
Let's go look for #b#p9270028##k in CBD!

#b#p9270028##k has asked me to gather up #b#t4000369#s and #t4000370#s#k to make it a lot more safer for Singapore Children to walk around. Well, somebody just don't follow the rules, do they? I should Help #p9270028# to make Singapore a better place.

#t4000369# #r#c4000369#/100#k
#t4000370# #r#c4000370#/100#k
After helping #p9270028#, I feel much safer to walk around in CBD. Hope all the children are feeling the same!

string.name: name
string.value: Stop the Speeder!
#p9270028# in CBD is really concerned about growing number of speeding violations. Let go find him and see what is happening in CBD!

#p9270028# asked me to collect #b#t4000371# and #t4000370##k to warn people how important it is to follow the law. He emphasized that this is only to keep us safe from any danger.

#t4000371# #r#c4000371#/100#k
#t4000370# #r#c4000370#/100#k
I feel so good that I have contributed myself making Singapore a better and safer place to live in.

string.name: name
string.value: Technical Assignment
Rumor has that #b#p9270029##k in CBD is kind of sick. I should go find out what's up with him.

#p9270029# asked me to gather some requirements for his school work. Why is he asking such things from me? He didn't seem that sick! Anyway, I will be kind enough to help him out this time. But only this time though. Let's just gather those items and deliver it to #p9270034#.

#t4000374# #r#c4000374#/2#k
#t4000375# #r#c4000375#/6#k
#t4000376# #r#c4000376#/1#k
I was able to provide #p9270034# the required items for #p9270029#. Hope he does the same for me when I feel sick!

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
I think I just saw a Fashionable lady, #p9270032# in CBD waiving her hands at me! Am I that Attractive?

#p9270032# has asked me to gather #b#t4000035##k and #b#t4000021##k in order to make a fashionable brand new Indian Costume.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/20#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/20#k

Now that I have brought all the required items to #p9270032#, I never have seen someboy so obssessed with her fashion that much. Talking about the fashion, there is no one that dresses better than me in MapleS.E.A.

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
#p9270032# who is ossesed with fashion is looking for help once more. What should it be this time?

She is definately obssessed with fashion! She wants another dress. Wonder how many dresses she has in her closet. Is she a fashion model or something? Well, let's just give her what she needs.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/25#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/25#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/5
Angie rewarded with carrot cake to me to show her appreciation for gathering her the items for her new clothes. It looks so delicious.

string.name: name
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Angie's Beloved Costume
What? #p9270032# in CBD is looking for me again? I wonder what could it be this time!

No surprise to find out that she wants a new dress! She asked me to gather 50 #t4000035#, 50 #t4000021#, and 10 #t4021003# this time. I really hope that she is satisfied with her dress!

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/50#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/50#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/10#k
Phew... Finally, #p9270032# was able to get all dresses she ever wanted! But speaking of fashion, I am sure that I look much better!

string.name: name
string.value: The secret of the past

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ghostship
#b#p9270030##k in Boat Quay looks like he could use some help of mine. He seems very scared of something. Let's go find out.

#p9270030# told me this weird story about a ghost ship and ghosts along the coast line. Shall I believe him? He is just a nameless wanderer in town, but he seemed to be serious about the story. Let's go and find out if he is telling me the truth. There should be #b#o9420509##k and #b#o9420510##k somewhere around Boat Quay and I am about to eliminate them!

#o9420509# #r#a45101##k
#o9420510# #r#a45102##k
What a surprise! #p9270030# was telling me the truth! I should go see him again since I feel that there are more stories he wants to tell me!

string.name: name
string.value: Making the path to the sea

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ghostship
#b#p9270030##k has more secrets to reveal! Let's go see him again!

#b#p9270030##k has told me that he wishes to sail again with his crew. However, he isn't sure if he can go out to the sea like the old days because of the Ghosts along the coast line. I really want to help him get his dream back by eliminating #b#o9420510# and #o9420511##k.

#o9420510# #r#a45111##k
#o9420511# #r#a45112##k
Yes indeed! I did help #p9270030# to get back to the sea again. But I wonder, he has something more worried about. I think I should go see him again.

string.name: name
string.value: The great secret reveals

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ghostship
#b#p9270030##k is about to reveal more about his secrets! Let's go find him Boat Quay.

The most strongest ghost, #b#o9420512##k is the one that #p9270030# was so afraid of... Well I am not afraid of anything! He asked me to help him get back to the sea by eliminating #b300 #o9420512##k. He told me to bring my friends with me since this ghost is the most powerful one in town. Follow me my fellow Maplers!\n\n#o9420512# #r#a45121##k
Eliminating #o9420512# was not a easy task for me but I did it! Now, I should go see #p9270030# and see if he has left to the sea. Or.. does he have another serious secret, something Big?

string.name: name
string.value: Fight for the future

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret of Ghostship
I sense something that #p9270030# has not told me all of his secrets. There is still something about this Ghosthip. Let's go find out.

Believe or not, #p9270030# told me that there is this Boss Ghost, #r#o9420513##k who controlls all other ghosts in town. Without defeating this monster, the boat quay will never be the same. Let go investigate the Ghostship now. But I must be cautious since he also said theGhostship itself is a big maze... I will have to eliminate #o9420513# and collect #t4000384# as a proof of elimination.

#o9420513# #r#a45131##k
#t4000384# #r#c4000384#/1#k
What an exprience! I am glad that I brought peace to this town and to the sailors! However, I feel that the ghost has not been perfectly disappeared. I should go check every once in a while.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost White Essence
If I lost the #bwhite essence#k, I should go visit #bRalph the wanderer#k again.

I should go eliminate Mr. Anchor once more and gather the red essence. I should really take care of the White Essence this time if Ralph the wanderer gives me the item this time.

#o9420512# #r#a45221##k
#t4000383# #r#c4000383#/300
Phew... I really should go take care of the #bCapt. Latanica#k this time and bring peace to the Boat Quay Town.

string.name: name
string.value: Return of Capt. Latanica
#bRalph the wanderer#k is sensing dark force around the Ghostship Area... I have to check him out once again.

#bRalph the wanderer#k believes that #rCapt. Latanica#k is back!!! He wanted me to enter the engine room once again, but he needs to find out that I am still in shape. I will have to prove to him that I have been training myself and am prepared.\n\n
I was finally able to prove to him that I am still prepared to enter the engine room. Now, Capt. Latanica is all mine!

string.name: name
string.value: A Bright and Sunny Day

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
It is such a sunny day! I really need something to cool down!

#b#p9270061##k says that with the #b#o9420527#s#k running outside the village, we won't be able to go out of the Kampung.They want me to help get rid of them and collect #b50 #t4000465#s#k. \n\n#t4000465# #r#c4000465#/50#k
After getting the #b#t4000465##k they felt less heaty.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 10,000 3,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'Too Hot!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Too Hot!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
Boy... The Weather is hotter than ever!
#b#p9270061##k says that the villagers need 100 more of those #b#t4000465##k to cool themselves down. \n\n#t4000465# #r#c4000465#/100#k
The villagers are happy now to cool down with nice cool coconut juice! Cool refreshment was what exactly they needed.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 20,000 5,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'I am Bored!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: I am Bored!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
People in Kampung village seems not as perky as they used to be. Talk to #b#p9270061##k and see what else he needs to bring the energy back to village.
#b#p9270061##k and entire village are bored and they need me to hunt #b100 #t4000466#s#k so they can entertain themselves with their favorite songs. \n\n#t4000466# #r#c4000466#/100#k
Kampung village is now full of delightful melody playing with finest #b#t4000466##k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 30,000 8,000 Meso Able to proceed to 'All taken away!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: All taken away!

string.name: parent
string.value: Malek's Joy of Music
#b#p9270061##k needs more of the #b#t4000466#s#k to keep the Kampung village safe from #b#o9420528##k.
#bEmo Slimes#k have snatched away all of the #bRebabs#k in the village. Kampung Village now needs#b 150 Rebabs#k to lure those monsters and put the to sleep. \n\n#t4000466# #r#c4000466#/150#k
#b#p9270061##k and the whole village is now safe from #b#o9420528##k, and it seems like there will be a party with some great musics. Kampung village is always a fun place to hang out.

string.name: name
string.value: Poor Blondie

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
Blondie, the poor blonde Kitty has lost her fur due to the hot weather. There must be something that can be done for this poor little thing...
Blondie is now more precious than ever covered up with golden hair, and you have never seen #b#p9270060##k happier for his kitty.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 15,000 Able to proceed to 'Running out of Wigs!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Running out of Wigs!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
#b#p9270060##k is gloomy than ever at the shocking news that Blondie has lost her wig by accident. He's in desperate search for someone who can bring some more #b#t4000467##k from #b#o9420529##k.

#b#p9270060##k needs #b200#k more #b#t4000467#s#k from #b#o9420529##k to cover up Blondie. Hunting #b200 #o9420529#s#k sure is not an easy task. But thinking how much Blondie means to him, it's no wonder he's putting all these effort to make Blondie looks pretty again. 

#o9420529# #r#a45461##k 
#t4000467# #r#c4000467#/200#k
#b#p9270060##k is so happy to see Blondie as she's prancing along the street with new golden wig. Maybe she will stay out of danger for a while..

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 35,000 Able to proceed to 'Tires are missing!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Tires are missing!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries

Lots of people are having trouble going around the town because their tires are suddenly being stolen by sneaky creatures known as #b#o9420530##k. Who could retrieve all those stolen tires from these villains?

#b#p9270060##k is eager to bring those stolen tires back from #b#o9420530##k. Why don't you step up and save all those people from such an inconvenience? 

#o9420530# #r#a45471##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/50#k
#b#o9420530##k may seems disppeared for now, but you can never be sure if there won't be any more of them coming back to town and stealing things from innocent people.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 33,000 Able to proceed to 'Oly Oly is back!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Oly Oly is back!

string.name: parent
string.value: Chee Wee's Worries
#b#p9270060##k has found out that even more tires have been stolen now. It must be those sneaky villain, #b#o9420530##k, back in town!

This stealing must be stopped now! Let's put an end to it, once and for all! 

#o9420530# #r#a45481##k 
#t4000468# #r#c4000468#/100#k
#b#p9270060##k was happy to announce that life in the city is back to normal that everybody is getting proper transportation they need. What a releif!

string.name: name
string.value: Hunger calls

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k looks so down and depressed. Maybe there's something you can do to make her feel better.

#b#p9270059##k is standing with a growling stomach. She doesn't want to eat anything else but famous #b#t2022203##k from Local Speciality Shop in Singapore or Kampung? Let's get #b10 
#t2022203##k for her. 

#t2022203# #r#c2022203#/10#k
Nothing taste better than #b#t2022203##k for an empty stomach.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 6,000 Able to proceed to 'I need Vitamin C' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: I need Vitamin C

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
After eating #b#t2022203##k, #b#p9270059##k had a terrible stomach ache. It seems like someone must help her immediately before she is carried off to the hospital.

Fresh fruit will put #b#p9270059##k's stomach at ease.

#t2010000# #r#c2010000#/5#k 
#t2010003# #r#c2010003#/5#k
Maybe #b#p9270059##k has learned her lession which is to eat proper amount at a time.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 8,000 Able to proceed to 'My Lovely Scarf' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: My Lovely Scarf

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k, one of the most fashionable people in the city, is anxious to get trendy fashion item #b#t4000469##k faster than any others.
#b#p9270059##k has made up her mind not to go out in the city without a matching #b#t4000469##k to go with her new outfit. And she needs 50 of them to choose from. \n\n#t4000469# #r#c4000469#/50#k
She does look pretty with the scarf on her. Before long, there will be many people who will want to have one of those trandy scarfs.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 15,000 Able to proceed to 'My Scarfs are Stolen!' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: My Scarfs are Stolen!

string.name: parent
string.value: Nuri's Health and Beauty
#b#p9270059##k's jealous sisters have taken away all of her scarfs, but #b#p9270059##k won't just sit back and ruin her reputation as the hottest fashion icon in the city. What will she do?
#b#p9270059##k is planning to have even more #b#t4000469#s#k than before. Will she able to get them? \n\n#t4000469# #r#c4000469#/100#k
#b#p9270059##k looks more fabulous than ever. You certainly did her a great favor.

string.name: name
string.value: Gift for Dear Daddy

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party
#b#p9270058##k is lost in her thought. Her daddy's birthday is coming and she wants to give him something special this year.

#b#p9270058##k's daddy is a great fan of music, as well as a collector of all sorts of musical instruments. #b#t4000472##k might be the perfect birthday gift for him. 

#o9420534# #r#a45531##k 
#t4000472# #r#c4000472#/100#k
#b#p9270058##k's daddy was happy with the gift and he promised to take her out for a exquisite dinner.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 10,000 #Wbasic# #i2000005:# #t2000005:# 10 Able to proceed to 'Daddy's Birthday Party' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Daddy's Birthday Party

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party

#b#p9270058##k's daddy is planning to invite 50 most close friends to his birthday party. #b#p9270058##k suggested an idea of giving them with rare gift at the party. What would be the perfect gift to all of the guests?

#b#p9270058##k thought of #b#t4000470##k as a special gift to all guests to her daddy's birthday party. She now needs #b50 #t4000470##k before the party begins. 

#o9420532# #r#a45541##k 
#t4000470# #r#c4000470#/50#k
#b#t4000470##k was a superb gift and every guests who came to birthday party of #b#p9270058##k's daddy were surprised at the unexpected gift and had a jolly time together.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 16,000 Able to proceed to 'Unexpected Guest' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Unexpected Guest

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party

#b#p9270058##k and her daddy were both surprised to see that most of the guests had brought their kids with them to the birthday party. There are no gift prepared for little kids, but #b#p9270058##k doesn't want to send them home with an empty hand. She must think of something very quickly.

Since all adults guests had received #b#t4000470##k as a gift, #b#t4000474##k would be just perfect for little guests. Now it's a matter of time. Enough #b#t4000474##k must be brought back to #b#p9270058##k before the party is over. 

#o9420536# #r#a45551##k 
#t4000474# #r#c4000474#/100#k

Just before the party was over, all kids at the party received surprised gift and was overjoyed. Though #b#p9270058##k had to rush into preparing gifts for those unexpected guests, afterall, more the marrier.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 18,000 Able to proceed to 'Grand Finale' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Grand Finale

string.name: parent
string.value: Surprise Birthday Party
There's nothing betther than great bonfire as a finale of the party. But somehow, there are not enough wooden barrels to creat grand bonfire. #b#p9270058##k must work something out quickily.

#b#t4000473##k would be perfect to create a hugh flame of the bonfire. #b#p9270058##k need at least 100 of them in order make the grand finale of the party. 

#o9420535# #r#a45561##k 
#t4000473# #r#c4000473#/200#k
What a grand finale! It was the best birthday party EVER!

string.name: name
string.value: Lam wants to see the world

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k loves his life in Kampung village, but it seems like he wants to see other parts of the world that he has never seen before.
#b#p9270062##k is super excited to travel outside of Kampung village, but first he needs plenty of #b#t4000475#s#k to go around the city. \n\n#t4000475# #r#c4000475#/100#k
Finally, all tickets have been collected for #b#p9270062##k. But someone must remind him there is much more to prepare before going on a long trip.

string.name: name
string.value: Off to the City

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k just realized he needs something he can use as travel expenses while going around the city. Maybe #b#t4000477##k could come useful because they're such a rare item in the city.

#b#t4000477#s#k can be sold at a high price in the city market place. #b#p9270062##k must have plenty of them before the trip, otherwise he would come short of travel expenses in the middle of the trip. 

#o9420539# #r#a45581##k 
#t4000477# #r#c4000477#/200#k
Now #b#p9270062##k is fully ready for the trip, and it's time to enjoy. Yeah!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 54,500 Able to proceed to 'Gift for Brother' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Gift for Brother

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung

When #b#p9270062##k was in the city for travel, he was so excited that left the gift he got for his brother waiting in Kampung village. Little brother must be so disappointed to find out thre is no gift at all.

#b#p9270062##k must hurry and bring back those forgotten gift for his brother. 

#o9420538# #r#a45591##k 
#t4000476# #r#c4000476#/200#k
#b#p9270062##k's little brother was so thrilled to receive #b#t4000476##k as a gift. What a joy of giving presents to someone you really care for.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 44,500 Able to proceed to 'Merry-go-round in Kampung' as next quest.

string.name: name
string.value: Merry-go-round in Kampung

string.name: parent
string.value: Away from Kampung
#b#p9270062##k was so impressed with one of the merry-go-round he saw during his recent trip, that he decided to build on in Kampung village for little kids.

In order to build a nice sturdy merry-go-round, #b#p9270062##k needs plenty of #b#t4000478##k. Will Kampung village have its very own merry-go-round? 

#o9420540# #r#a45601##k 
#t4000478# #r#c4000478#/200#k
Kampung's very own merry-go-round is finally completed and look at all those joy in little kids' faces!

string.name: name
string.value: Off to the Fantasy Theme Park

Have you been to the Fantasy Theme Park lately? Well, it seems like it's not such a fun place like it used to be. #bLam#k said something scary is going on in there. Wanna know? Go see #bLam#k right now!

#bLam#k said there are 2 fierce monsters appearing in Fantasy Theme Park, threatening all visitors. If nobody stops them, Fantasy Theme Park will soon become their playground. #bLam#k said he knows how to invoke those monsters. You must bring him 10 Rodeo's Scarfs and complete Away from Kampung quest. Then he shall tell you how to defeat those creatures! 

#t4000471# #r#c4000471#/10#k

#y4557#: #r#u4557##k

#y4558#: #r#u4558##k

#y4559#: #r#u4559##k

#y4560#: #r#u4560##k
Let's talk to #bAldol#k. She is at the Entrance to the Spooky World. She will allow you to get into the Spooky World. Let's see what you and your friends can do for Fantasy Theme Park!

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Instructor Test

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command

Pet Trainer Bartos told me if I can prove to him that I am capable of handling pets, then he'll teach me a secret method to handle more than one type of pet...I should visit the Pet Park over in Henesys (by enterting through the hidden portal near the Cat statue).
In order to prove my worth as a pet trainer, I'll have to find the hidden note somewhere in the Pet Park.
I found the note! Finally! Bartos looks like he wants one more thing before teaching me the secret technique...

string.name: name
string.value: The Secret Method

string.name: parent
string.value: Trainer's Command
I'm nearly there, I should visit Bartos and see if I can finally learn Bartos's secret method of handling multiple pets at once.
In order to learn various commands, I'll have to give Bartos the Pet Snack. Hmm, he mentioned a bigger store...
I finally learned the secrets of commanding multiple pets through Bartos. I shall display my talent to the world!

string.name: name
string.value: Robo Upgrade!
Once the Baby Robot has been nurtured to reach level 15, I better take it to Garnox, who specializes in nurturing evolving pets.

Robots, a beautiful product of a perfect blend of technology and magic, can apparently transform into a more mature being. The process just needs requires some materials to work with. I'll need to get #b1 #t5380000##k and #b50 #t4000111#s#k and bring them to Garnox.
What used to be a small robot pet has grown up and became an Adult Robot.

string.name: name
string.value: Educating Smart Pets (Pet Summon)
You have a very smart pet with you. Please take it to Bartos the pet instructor. With his guidance, the pet may do something different.
In order to request Bartos for help in teaching the evolving pet new movements, I'll need to bring him his favorite drink.
I gave Bartos the drink and taught the evolving pet. I can now order the pet to come right next to me. Type /petcome to have your pet come to you.

string.name: name
string.value: Educating Smart Pets (Speech by Itself)
You have a very smart pet with you. Please take it to Bartos the pet instructor. With his guidance, the pet may even start a conversation...
In order to request Bartos for help in teaching the evolving pet new language, I'll need to bring him his favorite drink. The drink can be obtained through merchants.
I gave Bartos a drink and taught the evolving pet. Apparently the pet may start the conversation at times...what would it say...?

string.name: name
string.value: Naomi's Invitation 1
#p9105002# seems to be holding a very fascinating event. I better go check it out.
#p9105002# gave me all the information on the newest event that she planned. I should talk to her again in a bit.
#p9105002# gave me an entrance ticket to participate in the event.

string.name: name
string.value: Naomi's Invitation 2
I better talk to #p9105002# again and hear more about the event.

#p9105002# explained to me in greater detail about the event that's taking place. It looks like I'll need to gather some #t4032056#s, bring them all to #p9105002#, and receive a special prize in return.

I gave #p9105002# some #t4032056#, and she gave me a present in return. I guess I can only enter this event once a day. Seriously, is there no way I can enter again today? Perhaps I could find a ticket elsewhere...

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque, he's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the MesoGears...

+Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Discovery

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
I heard there's an adventurer over at the MesoGears underneath Bigger Ben. What mysteries does it hold? I should find out!

I spoke with the famous John Barricades' one-half of the world famous Barricade Bros. Treasure Hunting Co. He spoke to me about Subani, the legendary mage responsible for the Dark Scrolls throughout the Maple World. He believes there is something within the MesoGears that may be a treasure of his. I've agreed to help clear the way. I'll have to defeat #b50 Killa Bees, 30 Mighty Maple Eaters and 40 Fire Tusks#k so I can explore deeper into the MesoGears...
I cleared a path straight through the MesoGears, and now I can explore there in peace. When I'm ready, I can see John Barricade to continue with the next part of this adventure!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Transgression

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John Barricade is awaiting me at the Temple Hive! He's found something!

I spoke with John, and he's found a set of weird markings in the MesoGears that he can't decipher. He's mentioned that he'll need special crystals known as #bHyper Glyphs#k. I've agreed to snag #b50#k of them so he can decipher the markings. Electrophants...John thinks that the mechanism on their heads may have those Hyper Glyphs inside. I'd better be careful-I don't want to get shocked!
I got the #b50 Hyper Glyphs#k that John needed, and he's hard at work deciphering the markings. I should come back soon to see if he's finished!

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Legacy - Deliverance

string.name: parent
string.value: Subani's Legacy
John has finished deciphering the markings! I need to get back to the Temple Hive now!

John and I spoke again, and something unforeseen happened. I'll have to track down #b50 MesoGears Map Pieces#k so he can put together the map! He mentioned the robots he "borrowed" for some assistance went all crazy, kept saying "#bI.AM.ROBOT#k" as they scurried into the Krakian Jungle...

Finally done! I took the pieces back to John, and he's going to start piecing the map together. However, he did come across a strange ring that passed on to me. If this was the first treasure, I wonder where the rest is...
There's a mysterious traveler in New Leaf City-he doesn't look like he's from anywhere around here. I should ask him what's going on. It could be interesting...

I spoke with Elpam Gorlab, and he's a traveler from Versal, the mirror-world of MapleStory. He traveled here to observe us and our celebration, but due to the appearance of Amoria, he was thrown off-course and landed in New Leaf City. I've agreed to help get him home by collecting #b30 Elpam Magnets#k. He's mentioned that the only creatures that have them here are the Barnard Grays. I'll have to head to Omega Sector and track them down. I didn't know that there was a mirror-world...I wonder if I have a double there...
I got the #b30 Elpam Magnets#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he gave me an Elpam Elixir, something that's sure to help me. It looks like he needs more help though...
Elpam has adjusted his compass, but he still needs my help. I should travel back and see what he needs!

I went back to Elpam for more information, and he's explained that while he was able to adjust the compass, he needs to head back to the moment of his travel glitch to get back to his home safely. I have to hunt down #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and hand them over. That's a full minute and the perfect amount of time for him to travel back. The Tick-Tock monsters should have them, since they tend to keep time. HA!
I got all #b60 Temporal Fragments#k and returned them to Elpam. In return, he's given me a very nice prize he found floating in the rift...!
Icebyrd looks like he needs my help. I'd better get over to New Leaf City and see him!

I spoke with Icebyrd, and he was glad to see me. He's been trying to build the new areas, but the Gryphons have been wreaking havoc on the construction crews. If that wasn't enough, those pesky Boomers are also attacking the machines. I've agreed to help by taking out #b100 Gryphons#k (located in the Highlands) and #bBoomers#k for #b150 #t4000391##k (located in the Badlands) to show them that this city is off-limits!

Man, what a day. I de-clawed the Gryphons and defused the Boomers. Now the city can continue building in peace. Icebyrd said that they may act up again, so I should come back to see if they've been rowdy...

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Warrior
This is Icebyrd Slimm, mayor of New Leaf City. I want to thank you for helping us get the city up and running. I have something for you, so come see me immediately!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!
As a bonus for helping get the city up and running, Icebyrd has given me a Warrior's Throne! This is sure to help me in the battles to come!

string.name: name
string.value: Urban Jungle - Continued
There's a Masked Man in New Leaf City... what's his deal?

I spoke with Jack Masque, he's a bandit prince from Amoria. He's in love with Princess Restless, and is trying to win her love from afar. He's got a passionate hatred for Wolf Spiders, as one bit her just as she was giving him a kiss. So, I've agreed to hunt down 100 Wolf Spiders in return for his thanks and something special he picked up. I should be able to find them in the Temple Hive...

*Phew* I wiped out 100 of those pesky Wolf Spiders, and in return, I received a Leaf Crystal from Jack Masque. I can come back every 72 hours to help him if I want. I wonder what he did to get kicked out of Amoria...?

string.name: name
string.value: Cleaning Up The Streets - Continued
There's a new sheriff in New Leaf City. I should go see who it is!

I met the new sheriff, Lita Lawless. She's an old friend of Icebyrd's, and has taken over as the new sheriff. I've agreed to help her get this town in order, by wiping out #b200 Electrophants and 200 Gryphons#k in New Leaf City. I'd better get started!
I...I did it! 200 of Electrophants and Gryphons has fallen to my might! In addition to that, I got a cool item from Lita as a 'Thank You!' I can return and help her anytime I want from now on...

string.name: name
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz - END

string.name: parent
string.value: Welcome to New Leaf City Quiz
I've successfully solve all the questions but I am still curious of some things...
I was talking with Icebyrd Slimm and wow, there is more to this land of Masteria and New Leaf City than what I learned from the quiz. I want to know more of what happened in this place.
I've asked about the old fable of Masteria and Icebyrd Slimm didn't quite answer my question. Maybe when I become stronger, he will tell me more about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

I visited the Glimmer Man, and discovered that he's an ultra-powerful mage whose ability to turn his entire body into pure diamond (hence his name) has allowed him to journey to space and other inhospitable environments. Through the vast knowledge he's acquired during his explorations, he's also become somewhat of a renowned weapons creator and arms dealer.\r\nThe Glimmer Man has landed in Masteria looking for something called #b#t4031760##k, a rare element from the alternate dimension of Versal he's been dying to experiment with. To thank me for recovering some and bringing it to him, he's promised to make me a weapon of my own from it. However, I've got to also track down #b7 #t4021008#s#k and return these to him as well. Only then can he reduce the naturally unstable Materia down to a useable form. A weapon made from an otherwordly material! I wonder what it does...

I returned to the Glimmer Man and he synthesized the #b#t4031760##k and the #b7 #t4021008#s#k I gave him to form a Materia Orb. He's said his precocious friend Spindle can turn this into a weapon, so I should see him when I'm ready to make the weapon...WOOT! Spindle is currently residing in the Omega Sector. Additionally, anytime I find more White Versal Materia, I can bring it to the Glimmer Man and he'll create another Materia Orb for me so I can make another weapon!

string.name: name
string.value: Brand Materia Continued

string.name: parent
string.value: Brand Materia

Looks like the Glimmer Man is looking for a rare material from the alternate dimension of Versal, the very #b#t4031760##k that I now possess. Perhaps I should visit him in New Leaf City and see what he wants with it. Maybe he'll reward me for bringing him some...

string.name: name
string.value: Interstellar Relics

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

Professor Foxwit spoke with me about the space-based Artifacts suddenly being discovered. He's believes he can invent new and different items with them by using the knowledge he's acquired over years of time-travel. He is willing to experiment on any Artifacts I should find. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and give me a blueprint to make it...

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Artifacts

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.

string.name: name
string.value: Jay's Curiosity

It's weird... When I walked passed #bJay from Henesys#k the other day, he didn't answer my greetings and didn't even notice me there. It looked like he was working on some kind of riddle by himself. Let's find out what Jay is up to these days.

I don't believe I actually offered to help him on finding a historical figure just out of curiosity! I guess it won't hurt to check out the dungeon as #p1012109# requested... But I really doubt I would find anything there. It's a legend, myth, a fairy tale.
I found Bob from #m105090300# and talked with bunch of people about him. He is famous around this world.

string.name: name
string.value: Gwin's Thanks
When I passed by, #b#p1061013##k, someone I really never got to spoke with, looked like he had something to talk to me. Let's go and find out what he has to say to me.

#p1061013# was looking at #t4031447# very closely to see if I did anything to hurt him. I don't know what the deal is but he was scaring me. It makes me wonder why he is obsessed with this particular snail. I should find out by talking to #b#p1061013##k again.
#p1061013# told me what happened between him and Bob. It's amazing that a simple snail actually tried to save human being... Those little monsters we hunt aren't really little at all...

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion
The Rememberer sure would know who Bob is. He's the Rememberer! I should talk with The Rememberer to find out what he knows.
The Rememberer isn't relly being helpful today. Very slow talking, not really informative. I wonder why he is so... depres
He is MEAN! MEAN, MEAN, MEAN! He took away Bob's Snail Shell from me wtihout me letting him! Now, what do I have to do?

string.name: name
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The Rememberer's Passion

I found it! I found Bob again! He must have escaped from The Rememberer by himself! I feel really terrible that I let this kind of things happen. I am going back to The Rememberer to tell him to lighten up.

I don't think The Rememberer gets the whole idea of me doing this. Bob may be just another monster but I know what is right or wrong. And I am going to pay back just the way he did to me. I need to get 1 #b#t4000019##k other than Bob's to pull this off.
I got him! The Remeberer will always remember this day. The day he got tricked by me! Ok. I should stop doing things like this though.

string.name: name
string.value: Grendel The Really Old's Glorious Days
Grendel The Really Old... He lives deep in the forest of Ellinia. Since he's really old, he has to know SOMETHING about Bob. I shall see him now.

Grendel The Really Old was talking out of himself but I got to make him hear what I had to say. He is getting glasses. I hope his eyesight isn't too bad to recognize Bob... After all, Grendel is probably the oldest guy in this world.

Grendel The Really Old got very mad at me for hitting Bob to make him go into his shell. I knew he would know something but never would have guessed they were old friends. I guess I owe Bob a big apology. But how am I going to be able to do that to a snail, especially if he's not coming out from his shell?

string.name: name
string.value: Cody's Confession

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Approval

string.name: name
string.value: Blackbull's Mistake

string.name: name
string.value: Bruce's Research
Bruce, the monster researcher, might know something. Maybe he can tell me how old Bob actually is. If I get to know how old he is, wouldn't that be a discovery of something remarkable?
He does seem to know something about his age but he looks spooked. I shouldn't hesitate to ask him what is wrong!

Wow... Bruce told me that Bob's age is incalculable. This is getting serious, isn't it. A snail that even professional monster researcher can't tell the age. Maybe he was right about asking me to go see Winston. Maybe an archeologist knows more about the history and the age issue than Bruce.

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism
This is a wild guess but... Wouldn't Dances with Balrog know a little bit about Bob? Who knows, I heard that he likes snails. Maybe I will go check with him.
I didn't know Dances with Balrog likes to EAT the snails... Now, what am I suppose to do?! It doesn't look like he is going to give me back Bob's Snail Shell anytime soon...
I had to take off from Dances with Balrog. Who can STAND all that endless talking? I should figure out a way to get Bob back other than talking him through...

string.name: name
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Dances with Balrog's Barbarism

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Scheme Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Winston's Scheme

string.name: name
string.value: A Word to the Wise

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
I hear that Old Man Tom has been hearing noises from the old Prendergast Mansion on the outskirts of New Leaf City. A haunted house? Sounds like the perfect Halloween adventure!

Old Man Tom told me about the haunted Prendergast Mansion. Apparently, the doors won't open for just anyone... I've got to figure out how to get in. Tom mentioned that the toymaker Prendergast used to hold parties for kids for holidays, including Halloween costume parties around this time of year. Maybe if I wear a costume I can get in! Hmmm... Now where can I buy one?

I made it into the old Prendergast Mansion, against the advice of Old Man Tom. I wonder why he's so dead set on keeping people out of the house? Maybe if I explore the house, I can find out more about what happened here...

string.name: name
string.value: The Past in the Present

string.name: parent
string.value: Old Man Tom's Word
Jonas gave me his Toy Workshop Key. He wants me to find someone who will keep it safe and ensure that his twisted toys can't escape his house.

Turns out Old Man Tom is Thomlin Prendergast, Jonas' younger brother. I gave him Jonas' Toy Workshop key to keep. He gave me Sophilia's Necklace, for helping put the spirits in Prendergast Mansion to rest.

string.name: name
string.value: A Cold Hearth
I heard there's an old butler in the Haunted House. Maybe he needs help cleaning it...

I spoke with Edmunds, Butler of the Prendergast Estate. It seems that he' run out of #t4000018# to heat the house, which would explain the chill. I've agreed to help him out and bring back #b60 #t4000018##k so he can refill the fireplaces throughout the house and re-heat the mansion.
I brought back #b60 #t4000018##k to Edmunds; he can get the fireplaces going again now. Hmmm... It seems like there are quite a few fireplaces around this labyrinthine house.

string.name: name
string.value: Eat This!
I keep seeing these fireplaces around the house. I wonder if they lead anywhere...maybe Edmunds knows? He mentioned something about a key. I should press him a bit more.

My hunch was right. The fireplaces are interconnected through the mansion's Chimney; perhaps I can use them as an alternate way of navigating through the house. However, they're locked and Edmunds holds the only key. He will reluctantly give me the key if I collect #b20 of each type of Gummy Slimes#k. There's Red, Green, Purple and Orange ones; so I'll need to hunt all over the house to get them. It'll be tempting to eat them first.

Edmunds reluctantly gave me the Omni Key after I collected the Gummy Slimes for him. With it, I can enter the fireplaces throughout the house and the Chimney to which they all connect. Hmmm... who knows where all these fireplaces lead?

string.name: name
string.value: Special Delivery
There's a beautiful woman in the Prendergast house that looks mildly annoyed... perhaps I should speak with her.

Man! I spoke-no, tried to speak with Ludmilla, and she wouldn't give me the time of day until I agreed to get her #b5 slices of #t2022190##k for Jonas from Olde Sapp Village. A bit strange that she referred to New Leaf City as that, but Miki should have them at the potion shop. What a cranky woman...

Well, I got Ludmilla her #b#t2022190##k, and learned a bit about Jonas and her love...for his money. No wonder Edmunds hates her. I should press that woman for more info about what's going on around here.

string.name: name
string.value: Family Jewels
Oh...looks like Ludmilla is not quite done with me yet. I'd better head back and see what that nag wants now...

I spoke with Ludmilla, and big surprise---her Cherry Pie Ghoulash didn't lure Jonas out. I think he probably pushed a bookcase in front of the door to ensure he never sees her again, but that's just a theory. At any rate, it looks like now her prized jewelry has mysteriously disappeared. She thinks Sophilia's taken it, but I'm not sure if I buy that, seeing as how she's...not around to do that. I have to gather #b20 #t4031769#s#k and #b10 #t4031770#s#k and bring them back to her. The woman complains way too much... sheesh.
I found Ludmilla's beloved jewelry for her. In return she gave me a worn, but well-loved doll. It's seen better days, but it has charm. Someone is probably looking for this...

string.name: name
string.value: A Lost Girl
There's a girl wandering around the Prendergast Mansion. I wonder what she's looking for?

Sophilia is looking for her favorite toy - the very first doll her father made for her when she was a child. She seems to have been looking for it for quite awhile. She mentioned something about Ludmilla having a history of hiding her toys. If I can find Sophilia's doll for her, maybe I can put her spirit at ease.
I gave Sophilia back her favorite doll. She was so happy to get it back that she gave me some of her favorite candy.

string.name: name
string.value: A Father's Love
Jonas gave me a new doll he made to give to his daughter. I don't think Sophilia'll like it as much her favorite one, but I guess I should give it to her anyway, per her father's wishes.
I gave Sophilia the new doll her father made. It made her sad. She asked me give Annabelia, the first doll Jonas made for her, back to her father.
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

string.name: name
string.value: The M-Files
I heard there's a MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) agent in the Phantom Forest! I should investigate what he's investigating!

I spoke with MBI Agent Falcon. He's on the trail of a dangerous specter, but it looks like that crafty ghost gave him the slip by scattering his #b#t4031764#s#k all over the place. I've agreed to collect #b50#k of them so he can continue the hunt!
I tracked down all 50 of Agent #b#t4031764#s#k that he asked for! In return, he's given me Smores! Mmm...if only he had a napkin...

string.name: name
string.value: File Under Incomplete
MBI Agent Falcon is still snooping around the old Haunted House, even after I helped him find some of the Paranormal Activity Report Pages! I wonder why... maybe he still needs help.

Looks like MBI Agent Falcon spoke too soon... 50 pages led him to the wrong, uh, dead guy... but he thinks that if I collect #b100#k more of them, he'll be able to catch Mr. Bones for sure! Whew... 100 pages. I wonder how many pages in total were in his original report?
I tracked down all of the 100 more #t4031764#s#k Agent Falcon requested! Now he can finally go track Mr. Bones... I hope.

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 1

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
Agent Falcon is still hanging out in front of the Haunted House?! Doesn't he have other ghosts to catch, myths to debunk? Maybe I should go see if something's wrong...

I'm starting to think that Agent Falcon spends too much time writing reports, and not enough time doing actual investigative work! The elusive Mr. Bones turns out to be Prendergast, the former owner of this house! Falcon wants me to find Jonas in the Haunted House, give him this Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to fill out, and return the completed form to him.
I got my questionnarie from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

string.name: name
string.value: The Infernal Toy Machine
I keep hearing the groans and bellows of machinery echoing through the house. What is making this racket? Is it where these infernal toys are coming from?

I found Jonas Prendergast in his Toy Workshop at the top of the house, in front of a huge toy machine which seems to be the source of all these infernal toys! It seems that his machine is not functioning properly. If I collect #b50 Firewood#k, #b25 Screws#k, and #b25 Loaded Springs#k, Jonas can build the replacement part to get his machine working properly again. I know that the Rocking Horses will have the #bFirewood#k and the Psycho Jacks will have the #bScrews and Loaded Springs#k. I've got to get what Jonas needs-perhaps this will stop it from churning out all these crazy toys!
I collected the parts Jonas needed to fix his machine. I hope I haven't simply helped a madman create more of his messed up toys.

string.name: name
string.value: In Her Likeness
Looks like Jonas fixed the machine... yet it's still cranking out these crazy toys. Maybe he is bonkers. Or maybe he needs some more help.

Looks like Jonas needs help building a new doll, a more perfect likeness of Sophilia. I don't think he realizes she's dead. In any case, I have to collect #b30 Locks of Doll's Hair, 10 Heartstoppers, 10 Maple Candies, and 10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Why the candies? I may never know...
I collected everything Jonas needed to build his new doll in the likeness of his daughter. I have to say though... it looks nothing like her.
Jonas was very confused by the doll I gave him. He was almost speechless. I hope he is not going any more insane than he is right now.

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.

Jonas gave me all of his Toymaker Gear in return for helping him destroy his twisted creations. He also gave me the key to his Toy Workshop, asking me to give it to someone who will help keep it safe and find a way to restore the Prendergast name.

string.name: name
string.value: Psycho Jack

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Psycho Jacks#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think.
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Sophilia Doll

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Sophilia Dolls#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. But they are scary looking for sure...
cI destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

When I gave Sophilia's favorite doll to Jonas, it seemed to have awaken him from his madness. He's realized that his Toy Machine has been corrupted and is churned out twisted versions of his former creations. Because the machine can't be destroyed, Jonas has asked me to destroy as many of his creations as possible. For every 50 Psycho Jacks, 50 Nightmares, or 50 Sophilia Dolls I destroy, Jonas has promised to reward me with something special.
Looks like he wants me to destroy #b50 Nightmare#k. It shouldn't be too hard, I think. Or is it?
I destroyed some of Jonas' creations and he rewarded me with some of his fantastic Toymaking gear! It seems like a grim endless battle against the tireless Infernal Toy Machine...

string.name: name
string.value: Halloween : Entering the house
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...
I've made it into the Prendergast Mansion! I don't know what Old Man Tom would react to my success though...

string.name: name
string.value: The File Thickens Part 2

string.name: parent
string.value: The File Thickens
I got my questionnarie from Jonas. Now is time for me to hand over this document to Falcon. Maybe he can go back to MBI if I hand him this?

I gave Agent Falcon's Paranormal Subject Questionnaire to Jonas and had him fill it out. Finding him in the labyrinthine mansion was the hard part... Jonas was actually quite cooperative, especially for a spirit. In any case, I returned the completed form to Falcon, who was ecstatic that he didn't have to set foot inside the creepy old mansion again.

string.name: name
string.value: Eat This!
I keep seeing these fireplaces around the house. I wonder if they lead anywhere...maybe Edmunds knows? He mentioned something about a key. I should press him a bit more.

My hunch was right. The fireplaces are interconnected through the mansion's Chimney; perhaps I can use them as an alternate way of navigating through the house. However, they're locked and Edmunds holds the only key. He will reluctantly give me the key if I collect #b20 of each type of Gummy Slimes#k. There's Red, Green, Purple and Orange ones; so I'll need to hunt all over the house to get them. It'll be tempting to eat them first.

Edmunds reluctantly gave me the #dOmni Key#k after I collected the Gummy Slimes for him. With it, I can enter the fireplaces throughout the house and the Chimney to which they all connect. Hmmm... who knows where all these fireplaces lead?

string.name: name
string.value: Smores No More
MBI (Maple Bureau of Investigation) Agent Falcon has been standing in front of the Prendergast Mansion for quite some time. Maybe I should go see why he's still loitering around.

Looks like the bumbling MBI Agent Falcon just can't get a break. Just when he was ready to pack up and leave to report the findings for his Halloween mission, a mysterious little boy appeared and stole all the Smores Falcon had cooked up for his colleagues! Falcon has agreed to pay you 100,000 mesos (from his Agency discretionary account) if you recover #b25#k of his #bSmores#k for him. Easy money - or is it? The Smores look pretty tasty... I guess I'll have to try not to eat them myself as I collect them!

I collected Agent Falcon's #bSmores#k for him... they were a bit dirty but still good, so his colleagues back at the MBI Agency should be happy! In return, Falcon paid me the 100,000 mesos he promised. He also gave me some old medicine bottles that he'd found lying outside the house. They look pretty potent...

string.name: name
string.value: Dinner Fixins'
It's time for Thanksgiving and I'm ready for some home cookin'! I should pay Mom and Dad a visit over in Henesys!

I'm helping Mom and Dad make Thanksgiving dinner! I have to gather one of each ingredient: 1 ear of #b#t2020029##k, a can of #b#t2022262##k, a #b#t2022263##k, bowl of #b#t2022264##k and best of all, #b#t2022261##k. They promised me an #b#t4031529##k if I return quickly. I guess the Turkeys stole all the ingredients to make Thanksgiving fixins'... I guess they think that without the fixins', there'll be no dinner! No dinner? No way! Time to defeat some battle-hardened Turkeys!

My trusty weapon did a fine job of ruffling those rowdy turkeys' feathers, and I obtained all of the ingredients for Mom and Dad. In return, they gave me my #b#t4031529##k! I guess doing chores does pay off! I can take this to any of the Store Vendors in New Leaf City, and receive a #bNexon Game Card#k for it! ...I'd better get out of here before Aunt Petunia shows up! Mom mentioned that I can help her with dinner once a day until it's time to eat!

string.name: name
string.value: Game On! <CVS>
I helped Mom and Dad with Thanksgiving dinner and received my #bAllowance#k! Now I can head to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k and obtain a #bNexon Game Card#k from one of the Vendors!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!

I have my #bAllowance#k, and I'm on my way to #bHenesys, Amoria, and New Leaf City#k! I just have to speak with one of the Vendors there to receive a #bNexon Game Card#k! Just have to make sure I have some room in my ETC slot for it...

I spoke with one of the vendors, and in return for my #bAllowance#k, I received a #bNexon Game Card#k! I can also take this to any of the Store Vendors in #bHenesys, Amoria, or New Leaf City#k if one store happens to be sold out. I can help Mom and Dad everyday until the end of the event, receive #bAllowance#k and get another #bNexon Game Card#k. I should get as many as possible, because when the event ends, it will turn into MaplePoints that I can use in the Cash Shop! Free money! WOO HOO!
