string.name: name
string.value: Little Suzy's X-Mas Dilemma

There's a little girl with a puzzled look on her face in New Leaf City. With X-mas time just around the corner, she should be happy... I wonder why she looks so puzzled and confused instead? Looks like she may need some help with her Maplemas spirit!

Little Suzy was all excited for Maplemas this year... until she learned all about a similar holiday called "Versalmas" from a strange green mouse named O-Pongo. Now she doesn't know what sounds more exciting - Maplemas... or Versalmas? Suzy needs my help to help her decide which version of X-mas she should celebrate this year. In order to do that, I'll have to speak to both Maple Claws and this O-Pongo character, and then come back and talk to her. Maplemas holiday from an alternate dimension, huh? Very curious...

I spoke to both Maple Claws and O-Pongo. It seems that both Maplemas and Versalmas have their merits. In the end, Suzy's put the decision on me: she's asked me to deliver her X-mas Wishlist to one of the two "Santas," which will determine which holiday she's celebrating this year. I have a feeling that this decision is important, that I'm not just making a choice for her... but also one for myself. Which holiday do I believe in?

string.name: name
string.value: The Spirit of Maplemas
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to Maple Claws. I'm sure she's back in town now in Happyville.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to Maple Claws about Suzy's dilemma. Maple Claws listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Maple Claws gave me a message for Suzy: that as long as she remembers the essence of the Maplemas Spirit, it doesn't really matter what holiday traditions she chooses to follow this year. I should return to Suzy with Maple Claws' message once I've also spoken to O-Pongo.

string.name: name
string.value: A Versal Tradition
To help her decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, Little Suzy wants me to go talk to O-Pongo. I'd better speak with this strange green mouse and find out more details about Versalmas.
To help Little Suzy decide between Maplemas and Versalmas, I spoke to O-Pongo about Suzy's dilemma. O-Pongo listened and asked me to deliver a message to Suzy. I should talk to her in a bit.

Versal Power! I spoke with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, who is the "Santa" for the Versal version of Maplemas, and learned a great deal about Versalmas. He told me about the customs for their holiday--quite different from the Maple World! The world of Versal is usually shrouded in darkness; Versalmas is an annual holiday that celebrates the emergence of the sun in their world, which shines for 90 straight days and only for these 90 days. For Versalmas, children receive presents every day for the first 30 days, and get cool treats like Sugar-coated Olives and Caramel Onions! Sounds pretty awesome... Now I'd better speak with Maple Claws and head back to Suzy... It makes me wonder for myself though, which holiday would I pick to celebrate? Hmmm...

string.name: name
string.value: A Very Merry Maplemas
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I'm thinking I should give it to Maple Claws; I should go see her in Happyville.

I can give Little Suzy's Wishlist to Maple Claws. In doing so, she'll be counting on me to help me recover her presents for her this year. All I have to do now is to give Maple Claws the list to cement my decision. Yes... it's going to be a very Merry Maplemas this year!

I thought that Maplemas was the better holiday so I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to Maple Claws. In return, she gave me a red #bMaplemas Hat#k that I can wear proudly to show my Maplemas Spirit! Every time I help Maple Claws recover the presents stolen by monsters, she'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents with her in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring her presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing Maple Claws more presents will also help me earn #bMaplemas Spirit#k! If the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k, Maple Claws will have a special something for me at the end of the event!a

string.name: name
string.value: Happy Versalmas to You
Now that I have Little Suzy's Wishlist, I need to give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo. I should go see O-Pongo in New Leaf City if I want to give it to him. Decisions, decisions...
I'm thinking it's Versalmas for me this year! All I have to do now to cement my decision is to actually give Little Suzy's Wishlist to O-Pongo. I can't wait! It's time for a change of pace!

Looks like I'm celebrating Versalmas this year! I gave #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k to O-Pongo, and he gave me this awesome #bVersalmas Hat#k for me to wear proudly! Every time I bring O-Pongo presents I've collected from monsters, he'll reward me; I'll now be able to redeem presents to him in batches of #b10, 20, 30, 40, 60, 90, or 100#k. I'll get different rewards at different tiers; the more presents I bring at one time, the better the rewards! I'll need to bring him presents appropriate to my level though.\r\nBringing O-Pongo more presents will also help me earn #bVersalmas Cheer#k! If the total amount of #bVersalmas Cheer#k accumulated on my world beats out the total amount of #bMaplemas Spirit#k, O-Pongo will have something really nice for me at the end of the event!

string.name: name
string.value: Elpam's Gift
Looks like Elpam is celebrating a new holiday. I should head over to New Leaf City and check it out!

Elpam is celebrating the holiday known as Versalmas! He'd like me to speak with O-Pongo, the Versalmas Mouse, and the one who gives presents. Looks like Elpam has received his gift from O-Pongo, who is also in New Leaf City, so doing this shouldn't be too tough...

Elpam offered me a slab of #bMelting Cheese#k as a Versalmas gift! Er, a strange gift but I gladly accepted this as a token of friendship! He also said that I should speak with O-Pongo to learn more about this Versal tradition...

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Swowman's Purple box
Bill is frantically looking for a Purple box. I wonder why...
If I find the Purple box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Purple box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's Blue Box
Bill is frantically looking for a Blue box. I wonder why...
If I find the Blue box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Blue box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's Red Box
Bill is frantically looking for a Red box. I wonder why..
If I find the Red box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the Red box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Giant Snowman's White Box
Bill is frantically looking for a White box. I wonder why...
If I find the White box for Bill, she promised to open the box for me. I wonder what's inside that box...
Bill was gracious enough to open the White box for me. It also felt good to contribute 50 mesos towards kids that are less fortunate in MapleStory.

string.name: name
string.value: Easter : Mad Bunny's Easter(Red)
I heard Mad Bunny isn't too happy with Easter. I should go talk to him and see what's up..

Mad Bunny needs #b10 Red Easter Eggs#k and an #bEaster Basket#k from me. He may be one angry bunny, but he did promise to pay me well for my service. 

#t2022538# #b#c2022538#/10#k
#t4031283# #b#c4031283#/1#k
I gave him #b10 Red Easter Eggs#k with the #rEaster Basket#k and he gave me an #bEaster Charm#k with some EXP. Not bad.

string.name: name
string.value: The Wandering Alchemist Eurek's New Skill
I hear that #b#p2040050##k over in Sleepywood is working on a way to scroll items without equipping them. I should go see Eurek and see how far along his research is--maybe I can learn how to do it!
I spoke with Eurek and he's perfected his method for scrolling unequipped items. I can't wait for him to show me how to perform this new skill!

I returned with the materials that #b#p2040050##k asked for and learned how to use scrolls on unequipped items! Eurek also mentioned that in his travels, he'd heard rumors of a powerful monster residing somewhere in Leafre--even stronger than Zakum.

string.name: name
string.value: Monster Riding
The keeper of the #bAquarium#k, #b#p2060005##k, is researching a way to tame and possibly ride monsters. I should take a trip to Aqua Road and see if there's anything I can do to help!

#p2060005# found out that someone is trying to steal his research. #p2060005# asked me to #b watch the wild boar#k and bring back #b#t4031508##k to him. On top of that, he asked me to get the wild boar's #b#t4031507##k as well...I'd better stay alert for this one--I don't want someone to steal his research before I learn how to tame and ride monsters! 

#i4031508##t4031508# #b#c4031508#/5#k
#i4031507##t4031507# #b#c4031507#/5#k.

I obtained the items and returned to the Aquarium. For helping him with his research, #p2060005# gave me the #bmonster riding skill#k and one #b#t1912000##k for the monster. It's time to travel in style! I must look in the Tiger Ridge map, there should be some rubble lying about--a hidden portal. Traveling through it will transport me to a new area with the pigs. I can use the perfume when I'm close to one to capture it. After that, I can equip the Mount and the saddle, and use my new Monster Riding skill to call the mount! I can feed my pet by visiting the Leafre Pet Food Seller, and make it stronger. Hmm...I wonder if there's a way to get a stronger mount? I'd have to be ready for the 4th Job advancement, I'll bet..

string.name: name
string.value: Pheromone Perfume
0 = #b#p2060005##k is performing further research about monster riding. I wonder if he's finished researching #t4031507#? Time to grab my swimming trunks and head back to Aqua Road!

#p2060005# said that he not only did more research on #t4031507#, he's discovered a way to make it work! However, he'll need a special perfume from #bChief Tatamo from Leafre Village#k to make #t2270000# which trains the monster. Leafre is in Ossyria, so I've got a bit of a journey on my hands...\n\n#i4031509##t4031509# #b#c4031509#/1#k.

After a long journey to Leafre, I traveled back to the Aquarium with the perfume in hand and gave it to #p2060005#. He believes that this method should work and gave me #b#t2270000##k for the monster. He told me that if I take it somewhere in the #bnext town# I would be able to train wild boars!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Saddle
I lost the #t1912000# that I received from #b#p2060005##k! What should I do? Hmmm... maybe I should go see #p2060005#. I hope he's nice enough to give me another one!

#p2060005# says that making a #t1912000# for monster riding requires special ingredients. He needs #b200#t4000171#, 200 #t4000030#, 200 #t4000055##k. #p2060005# says he will also need #b5 million mesos#k for "research purposes". I believe this is otherwise known as "extortion". He's probably a bit upset at me for losing the first one. Oh well, looks like I've got some work to do...\n\n#i4000171##t4000171# #b#c4000171#/200#

I returned to #p2060005# with the proper materials and the 5 million meso extortion--I mean "Research Fee". In return for my efforts, I received #t1912000# from #p2060005#. I should be able ride monsters again with this. I'll be sure not to lose it again!

string.name: name
string.value: Lost Perfume

I lost #t2270000#. I can't train the monster without it. What should I do? I should head back to Aqua Road and go see #b#p2060005##k. Maybe I can tell him that I met someone in Amoria and had to go on a date...

#p2060005# says he's heard of this phenomena of people using that perfume on dates. He doesn't understand why, it smells a lot like raw garlic and hot feet to him. Luckily, he has plenty of #t4031507# and he will make me another #t2270000# if I bring him #b#t4031509##k.\n\n#i4031509##t4031509# #b#c4031509#/1#k. I'd better hurry back--I want my new mount!
I recieved #t2270000# from #p2060005#. Phew...I should go train my monster now. On the way, I'll think of a better excuse if I lose the perfume again--this kinda does smell like hot feet...

string.name: name
string.value: Silver Mane
I've heard that #p2060005# has furthered his research and found a way to upgrade my existing mount. A faster monster to ride? I should go see #p2060005# in Aqua Road immediately!

I visited the Aquarium and #p2060005# has indeed found a way to make the mounts bigger, faster and stronger! However, he needs #b#t4000264#, #t4000266#, and #t4000267##k to make the experiement a success. He asked for a "donation" of 50 million mesos to develop the technology for monster and human to co-exist. That's some expensive research! He must be raking it in...

#i4000264##t4000264# #b#c4000264#/600#k
#i4000266##t4000266# #b#c4000266#/400#k
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267#/400#k

It took a bit of time, but I returned with the needed items and "donation" he asked for. #p2060005# made my #t1902000# into a #t1902001#. What a difference! My mount is so much sharper and stronger than before! I can run over almost anything now!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon's Perfume Bottle
It's time to take my mount to another level! Let's go see #p2081000# in Leafre and see if he has any methods to improve my mount!

After reaching Leafre, I spoke with #p2081000#. He confirmed that he does have a way to improve my mount--by turning it into a powerful dragon! However, like most good things in life, this is not free. He's agreed to sell me the dragon's perfume for the low, discounted price of #r20 million mesos#k because it is rare. Really rare. So rare, in fact, that he still has his original stockpile. At 20 Million mesos per, I'm not surprised...

After thinking it over, I gave #p2081000# 20 million mesos and got the dragon's perfume. I took a whiff, it smells like candy, chocolate, and roses...I'm tempted to drink it! However, I want an awesome dragon mount, so I'll have to pass. I can't wait to ride it!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate warrior. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081100##k has something for you...

It's the one thing that countless warriors, who have taken their mind and body to the very limit, strived for, but couldn't get... but now, #p2081100# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate magician. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081200##k has something in store for you...

It's the one thing that countless magicians, who have taken their mind and body to the very limit in search of mana, strived for, but couldn't get... but now, #p2081200# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate Bowman. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081300##k has something in store for you.

It's the one thing that countless bowmen, who have used bows to pierce the darkness this world offers, strived for, but couldn't get... but now, #p2081300# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple world, the one who is considered the ultimate thief. To commemorate your sterling accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081400##k has something in store for you.

It's the one thing that countless thieves, the dominant forces in the dark, strived for, but couldn't get... but now, #p2081400# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #t1902002#.
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top.

string.name: name
string.value: Kyrin's Teaching
Since I still have yet to master Monster Mount and Spirit of the Craftsman, #bKyrin#k volunteered to teach me these skills...
I'll have to go talk to #bKyrin#k about these skills...right?
I was able to learn #rMonster Mount#k and #rSpirit of the Craftsman#k through Kyrin. Time to use them!

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Rider

You have now reached the apex of the Maple World, the one who is considered the ultimate Pirate. To commemorate your incredible accomplishment of reaching level 200, #b#p2081500##k has something in store for you.

It's the one thing that countless Pirates, the undisputed masters of the sea, strived for, but couldn't get...but now, #p2081500# is introducing me to #t1902002#... I heard only the very best in the world of Maple can be friends with #p2081100#
At a point where I never thought I could go any higher, I made a new friend that certainly put me over the top! With him at my side, nothing can stop me!

string.name: name
string.value: Ramain's Amazing Skills

I was finally able to learn the "Maker" skill through Meren. Awesome!! Does this mean I can make something right now from scratch? But... where should I start? While I was standing there not knowing what to do, that was when a man came up to me to tell me something. That man happened to be Meren's friend and a legend in the field of making Monster Crystal, Ramain.

Ramain works with Meren and happens to be known as the master of producing Monster Crystals. He's a nice fellow, but his stuttering makes him really hard to understand. Anyway, after watching me being unsure of myself what to do with the skill, he offered to teach me how to produce a Monster Crystal. He then asked me to make one right there on the spot...\n\n#i4260000# #t4260000# #b#c4260000# / 1#k

Ramain, the master of producing Monster Crystals who is Meren's coworker, taught me how to produce a Monster Crystal. It was a bit difficult to understand him due to his constant stuttering, but it was very helpful. Then, he asked me to make one right there on the spot, challenging me to make 1 #t4260000#, the easiest Monstery Crystal to make. After making one, Ramain took a look at it, and commended me for my effort. Hah! Does this mean I can be considered an Item Producer now?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #1
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, wants a word with me. I wonder what he wants to talk about...

Meren's coworker Keol requested that I make a shoe for him. Even though Meren had already accepted me as his apprentice, it seemed that Keol didn't agree with that. Apparently, he wasn't very pleased with Meren that he was willing to divulge his item-making secrets to everyone, regardless of the skill level. Keol asked me to make a pair of shoes for him... that even a Level 1 can make with ease. Seriously... does he think that low of me? Fine, I'll make the finest pair of those he'll ever see!\n\n#i4001174# #t4001174# #b#c4001174# / 1

Meren's coworker Keol requested that I make a shoe for him. Even though Meren had already accepted me as his apprentice, it seemed that Keol didn't agree with that. Apparently, he wasn't very pleased with Meren that he was willing to divulge his item-making secrets to everyone, regardless of the skill level. Keol asked me to make a pair of shoes for him... that even a Level 1 can make with ease. Seriously... does he think that low of me? But even after seeing my work, Keol just dismissed it as little more than adequate. He also commented that I'll need lots of practice, and gave me a measly Basic Enhancement Gem. I don't like this guy... and I definitely don't like his attitude.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #2
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol requested me to make a pair of shoes for his nephew. His pompous attitude is really hard to take, plus it seems like he's trying to just use me for things like this. I can't back down from someone like him! Fine, here's your pair of shoes!\n\n#i4001175# #t4001175# #b#c4001175# / 1
Meren's coworker Keol requested me to make a pair of shoes for his nephew. Despite my best effort, Keol still doesn't seem to believe I am up to par with his standard of excellence...

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #3
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol received a request to build an equipment, and entrusted me to do the job for him. requested that I build an equipment for him. Karl from Ludibrium is the one that made the request. Wow, so I'm finally getting a legitimate request like this? Time to really put in my A-game!\n\n#i4001176# #t4001176# #b#c4001176# / 10
Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Ludibrium to build a shovel, and he asked me to do it for him. I tried my best, but all I got in return was a sniding remark from Keol.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #4
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
A request was made from Maple Admin to make a White Crewneck Shirt for him. Actually, a 100 of them!!! Oh wow... how am I going to make them all?\n\n#i4001177# #t4001177# #b#c4001177# / 100

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Maple Admin to produce White Crewneck Shirts for beginners, and asked me to do it for him. It was quite daunting to even think about making a 100 of them, but how can I say no to the Maple Admin?? I worked hard and gave Keol all 100 of them, but he still gave me a hard time about the shirts.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #5
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Valen of Florina Beach for a pair of shoes. A pair of footwear on the sandy beach... it probably should be light yet sturdy...!\n\n#i4001178# #t4001178# #b#c4001178# / 5

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Valen of Florina Beach for a pair of beachs sandals, and asked me to do it for him. I tried my best, but of course, Keol believes it's the worst thing in the world.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #6
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from General Maestro of Omega Sector to build a Water Gun for Training, and asked me to do it for him. I better put extra effort into this, since this directly affects the performance of the soldiers.\n\n#i4001179# #t4001179# #b#c4001179# / 7

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from General Maestro of Omega Sector to build a Water Gun for Training, and asked me to do it for him. For someone that does not trust my item-producing skills, he keeps asking me to make one for him. What's the deal with him, anyway?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #7
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol heard that I have reached Level 2 of the Maker skill, and asked if I could make a pair of gloves for him. I really don't understand how someone who's asking for a favor keeps making rude requests!\n\n#i4001180# #t4001180# #b#c4001180# / 1
Meren's coworker Keol asked if I could make a pair of gloves for him. I managed to make one for him, but he told me he can't even wear those outside. Keol really needs to go to the charm school.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #8
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Cliff for a pair of warm mittens, and asked me to do it for him. Here's the man that constantly works for the kids in a warm, loving manner... I better really work hard at this!\n\n#i4001181# #t4001181# #b#c4001181# / 1

Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Cliff for a pair of warm mittens, and asked me to do it for him. I couldn't stand Keol, but I worked hard at it for the sake of Mr. Cliff. Even so, Keol gave me a hard time about the mittens. What is wrong with this guy?

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #9
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol told me he received a massive order from The Nautilus, and he needed help completing the order. He then asked me if I could make a mop for him!\n\n#i4001182# #t4001182# #b#c4001182# / 6

Captain Kyrin of The Nautilus must be a neat freak. Otherwise, she wouldn't have purchased that many cleaning products! I wound up making the mop for Keol so he could ship it and other products to The Nautilus.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #10
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
Mu Lung's brilliant instructor No Gong seemed to have ruined his training uniform, and asked us to make a new one for him.\n\n#i4001183# #t4001183# #b#c4001183# / 30
This time, Keol asked me to create a brand new training uniform for Instructor No Gong of Mu Lung. First off, red belt!!

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #11
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.
Meren's coworker Keol received a request from Chil Sung and Chil Nam of Korean Folk Town to make a rake, and asked if I could make one for them.\n\n#i4001184# #t4001184# #b#c4001184# / 2
I built a sturdy, easy-to-use rake for the delightful brothers Chil Nam and Chil Sung of Korean Folk Town. It seems like even Keol is letting up just a little bit.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Order #12
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, is giving me a new work request. Better go see what it is.

Meren's coworker Keol received a special request from Muse to make a pair of boots for Nanuke, who spends his days alone with the dogs at the Snowy Whale's Island., aand asked if I could make one for him. That's really nice of Muse to do that.\n\n#i4001185# #t4001185# #b#c4001185# / 1
I made a pair of fur boots for Nanuke on behalf of Muse. Whale Island is a cold, cold place to live in, so I made sure to pack in enough fur to make it as warm as possible.

string.name: name
string.value: Keol's Special Order

string.name: parent
string.value: Keol's Order #13
Keol, the pompous working partner of Meren who is as irritable as they come in all of Maple, has a special order for me to process. Better go see what it is.

The moment Keol saw me walk in, he let me have it. That's because a very important order came from Abdullah VIII, and Meren decided to let me take care of it! Wow... I didn't know Meren had that much faith in me. Anyway, since Keol seems very upset over this, I'll have to go make the delivery myself.\n\n#i4001186# #t4001186# #b#c4001186# / 1

The moment Keol saw me walk in, he let me have it. That's because a very important order came from Abdullah VIII, and Meren decided to let me take care of it! Wow... I didn't know Meren had that much faith in me. Anyway, since Keol seemed way too upset to go, I had to go make the delivery myself.

string.name: name
string.value: Abdullah VIII's Statement

string.name: parent
string.value: Keol's Order #13
Abdullah VIII seemed very pleased with the turban and told me to send Meren a royal compliment on his behalf. He also said he already gave Meren the reward. That was quick!

I gave Meren the royal compliment that Abdullah VIII made for him. Meren in turn told me how proud he was of the progress I made as an item-producer. As gratifying as it was to receive compliments from someone like Meren, it also put a lot of pressure on me.

string.name: name
string.value: Meren's New Discovery

#b#m261000000##k is the land where Alcadnos and Zenumists form an uneasy truce in... one day, a news exploded in the Maple World where an alchemist from Zenumist, #b#p2110004##k, discovered a new method that will change the way alchemy works. #p2110004# was also looking for a capable apprentice that will spread his work to mainstream, and this caused a huge number of people to head over to #m261000000#...\r\nHe's apparently staying at #m261000002# of #m261000000#, which is a town of alchemists at Nihal Desert.

After spending a number of years conducting experiments, #b#b#p2110004##k, an alchemist under Zenumist Society, finally discovered a #bnew method#k of producing items, where the item can be created solely out of alchemy. To learn his new method, I visited #p2110004#. He said in order to acquire this new method, I'll have to take three classes... #bthe fundamentals of alchemy, the basic theory of science, and the actual application of alchemy#k...Sheesh, when can I attend all those classes?

#b#m261000000##k is the land where Alcadno and Zenumist form an uneasy truce in... one day #p2110004#, the alchemist from Zenumist, #b#p2110004##k, discovered a new method of item creation that relies solely on alchemy. Apparently, #p2110004# has been looking for an apprentice for his new method, so I went ahead to #m261000000# to visit him.

string.name: name
string.value: Carson's Fundamentals of Alchemy
When I visited Meren to learnhis new method, he instructed me to attend a class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy taught by Carson of Zenumist Society. Ahh... this sounds boring...
Meren said in order to attend the class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy, I must visit the head of Zenumist Society, #bCarson#k.
I managed to stay awake for Carson's class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy. Yay!

string.name: name
string.value: Hughes the Fuse's Basic Theory of Science
When I visited Meren to learn his new method, he instructed me to attend a class on the Basic Theory of Science taught by that eccentric scientist Hughes the Fuse. This worries me quite a bit...
Meren said in order to attend the class on the Fundamentals of Alchemy, I must visit #bHughes the Fuse#k, who is holed up somehwere inside Orbis Tower, doing his own thing.
I was able to keep track of Hughes the Fuse's disorienting science class. Yay!!

string.name: name
string.value: Meren's Class on the Actual Practice
When I visited Meren to learn his new method, he instructed me to attend his class that deals with the actual application of the new method. Oh, so I am actually doing this now...
Meren told me he needs some time to prepare the materials for the class, and told me to talk to him when I'm ready.
I went through Meren's class on the actual application of the new method. This was fun!

string.name: name
string.value: Meren's Second Round of Teaching

I think I have gotten quite familiar with producing items, and I am sure Meren would be shocked to see my prowess in it. Right at that time, Meren called me and told me if I ever had anything to do in Magatia, make sure to stop by and see him.

I wound up heading to Magatia after seeing Meren's message. As soon as I saw him, however, instead of a hearty hug, he gave me a huge scolding. Apparently, he saw one of the items I made at the Free Market, and he was so disgusted by my poor quality of work that he vowed to set me straight by giving me a test.
The test is actually making an Intermediate Monster Crystal. Hmmm... this is quite intense.

#i4260003# #t4260003# #b#c4260003# / 1

Meren gave me a lecture on how I had become complacent, and told me I had to start again from scratch. After passing his test by successfully creating the Intermediate Monster Crystal, he let me go, and I realized my item-producing skills have gotten that much better as a result of his words.

string.name: name
string.value: What Meren Dropped

string.name: parent
string.value: Meren's Third Round of Teaching!

It's been a while since I started producing items. I think I am now at the point where Meren is starting to acknowledge my item-producing skills. He seems to be devoting all of his time to creating a new item. I better stop by and say hello...

Meren had been devoting all of his time to creating a new item. When I visited him at Magatia, he seemed so into his work that he didn't even realize I was there, and kept on mumbling illegible things. That's whn I noticed something dropped behind his back. What is that?

I visited Meren at a lab in Magatia, but he seemed very much into his work that he didn't notice me wakling in. That's when I noticed a piece of paper dropped from behind his back. The note contained a whole bunch of notes. What does it say?

string.name: name
string.value: The Owner of the Note

string.name: parent
string.value: Meren's Third Round of Teaching!
This piece of note that was found in Meren's lab may be his. I better return it to him.
This piece of note that was found in Meren's lab may be his. I better return it to him.

string.name: name
string.value: A Surprise Outcome

string.name: parent
string.value: Meren's Third Round of Teaching!

The piece of paper Meren dropped contained scribbles that seemed like a manual for a Gold Anvil. A Gold Anvil... sounds like something that'd be fun to make. Meren doesn't seem like he wants to make it... so maybe I should try it.\n\n#i4031980# #t4031980# #b#c4031980# / 1
I managed to make a Gold Anvil and gave it to Meren. He seemed astounded by the fact that I was able to make it, and gave me a major praise for being able to do so.

string.name: name
string.value: The Book of Invisible Ink

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

I found a mysterious book deep in the #m230000000# sea while exploring. It is Bowman-related and mentions mastery of a skill known as Eye of the Heart. There's also a fading inscription about obtaining something from the book itself. Could this be a skillbook? I must find out! #p2040052# knows a lot about books. I should ask if he can decipher anything useful from this book...

#b#p2040052##k read the book and speculated that the book must've been written with invisible ink to conceal valuable information. Clever...but not impossible to break. He says I have to get a special type of ink in order to read it. He can use the ink to restore the inscriptions so it is once again readable. The ingredients are #b#t04000183#, #t02022000#, and #t04006000##k...I hope this isn't all for naught...

#i4000183##t4000183# #b#c4000183# / 50#k
#i2022000##t2022000# #b#c2022000# / 10#k
#i4006000##t4006000# #b#c4006000# / 30#k
#i4161018##t4161018# #b#c4161018# / 1#k.
I found the ingridients and returned them to #p2040052#. He said making the ink takes a bit of time, so I'll have to wait until it's ready.

string.name: name
string.value: The Ancient Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

After I handed him all the ingredients, #p2040052# sprinkled the ink on the book. Before our eyes, the ink soaked into the pages and restored the words! It revealed information about the Bowman's ultimate skill! What could that be? It sounds powerful...I should go ask #b#p1012100##k. \n\n#t4161024# #b#c4161024# / 1#k.

When I asked #p1012100# about the book, she was shocked! I related the entire tale of the ink restoring the pages, and how #p2040052# mentioned it was made with invisible ink to prevent knowledge of this technique from spreading into unworthy hands. She has agreed to take a further look into the book to find out more.

string.name: name
string.value: The Bowman's Ultimate Skill

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

While studying the book, Athena remarked that she's heard about the Bowman's Ultimate Skill but has never seen one of these books before. She told me that if one masters this skill, they might even surpass her in level. To discover more, she told me to go see #bRene#k...\n\n#t4161025# #b#c4161025# / 1#k for more information. This is shaping up to be quite a journey...
I traveled to the frozen fields of El Nath and gave the book to Rene. She was intrigued by the book as well, and wants to study it a bit more before she tells me more information.

string.name: name
string.value: Shammos's Advice

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

Despite her vast knowledge of bow-based combat, #p2020010#, like #p1012100#, didn't know much about the skill. I hear #bShammos#k's rambling about something...Perhaps I should pay him a visit...\n\n#t4161026# #b#c4161026# / 1#k
#p2022003# took the book and started reading it. Would he know something? He certainly appeared focused on deciphering what this new skill could be...I hope he can tell me more!

string.name: name
string.value: New Guess

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

My hunch was right about #bShammos#k. He knew a bit more and was able to give me further details, but there's something strange about what #p2022003# said. Let's ask #b#p2020010##k. Finally getting somewhere! \n\n#t4161027# #b#c4161027# / 1#k

I took the book back to #p2020010# following a lead from #bShammos#k. Rene said that #p2022003# used to be human and that I should pay close attention to what he says--both as a warning and path to discovering more.

string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Remembers...

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation

I spoke with #p2020010#, who had a new suggestion to help me piece together this puzzle. She told me to go to see #b#p1061011##k in Sleepywood. I can sense the answers coming soon--they'd better, because my feet are tiring from all this walking! \n\n#t4161028# #b#c4161028# / 1
My journey continues...#p1061011# had no idea about the book. But he said he might be able to point me in the right direction to who would know about the book...

string.name: name
string.value: Insignificant Being

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#p1061011# said #b#p1061012##k will know about the Bowman's ultimate skill. At last! I'm on my way there now! \n\n#t4161029# #b#c4161029# / 1
#p1061012# was aware of the book and gave me the answers I needed. I see that my journey has just begun, but I will gain tremendous power should I see it through to completion. Onward!

string.name: name
string.value: Spiritual Stone of Darkness

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#b#p1061012##k says he can send me to the Bowman's training place if I bring him #b#t4031466##k which is carried by #m910500000#. \n\n#i4031466##t4031466# #b#c4031466# / 50#k
I gave 50 #t4031466#, which is needed to enter #m910500000#, to #p1061012#. I am one step closer to obtaining this ultimate skill. The anticipation is growing within me...

string.name: name
string.value: Junior Balrog in a Different World

string.name: parent
string.value: Extreme Temptation
#b#p1061012##k said he'll teach me the ultimate skill once I go to #m910500000# and get #b300 #o9300085##k. It's almost within my grasp! \n\n#o9300085# #r#a61081##k

After completing the training to catch Junior Balrogs in #m910500000#, I acquired the Bowman's ultimate skill! Power is now mine--I shall master this skill and use it triumph over my enemies in battle!

string.name: name
string.value: Manji's Test

I obtained a book I can't read. It looks like it's written in a strange language. The writing is crude, almost like an animal wrote it...a kind of monster language. I wonder if #b#p1022002##k would know how to read it. Couldn't hurt to speak with him...

My hunch paid off. When I asked #b#p1022002##k about the book, he examined the language closer and came to a conclusion. He said the book is about the #bRush#k skill. He offered to translate, but he said that I must prove myself as one worthy to obtain such power--a true warrior in his eyes. I must eliminate #r200 #o9300087##k in #m910500100# located at the entrance of the Sanctuary, deep in Sleepywood. Manji saw that I was surprised by the high number and advised me to make a party with a few of like-minded companions to ensure victory. This is precisely what friends are for...\n\n#o9300087# #r#a61101##k

With a bit of help from my trusty weapon, I easily defeated the requisite number that #p1022002##k requested. As promised, he translated the book, and it revealed the famed skill known as Rush. I can't wait to try it out!

string.name: name
string.value: The Dragon's Guardian

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
#b#p2081007##k, guardian of the holy dragon Nine Spirit. I heard he knows a lot about dragons.

I met Raul, who introduced himself as the knight who guards the holy dragon, Nine Spirit. He needs help making the dragon grow and I've agreed to assist him. He told me to get #b#t04031449##k in order to make the baby dragon display it's potential power. #t04031449# can only be obtained from a living dragon....If I catch a Wyvern, I'm sure I can get it. \n\n#i4031449##t4031449# #b#c4031449#/20#k
After a bit of Wyvern hunting, I brought #t4031449#, Raul breathed power to the baby dragon. Now the baby dragon has #r#q2321003##k's power!

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 1

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
After speaking with #b#p2081007##k, he said the dragon has not reached maturity. There must be something I can do to increase its' power...
Raul told me to gather #b25 #t4031482##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. It's time to hunt! \n\n#i4031482##t4031482# #b#c4031482#/25#k
After I gave Raul #t4031482#, he awakened #q2321003#'s power. I can feel it radiating...magnificent!

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart
I spoek with #b#p2081007##k, who mentioned that the dragon is not at its full power yet. I must find a way to increase its power further...perhaps through a ritual or item?

Raul has agreed to help me further. He told me to gather #b30 #t04031483##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. I should be able to strengthen the dragon even more! \n\n#i4031483##t4031483# #b#c4031483#/30#k

After a long hunt, I gave Raul #t4031483#. Using it in an ancient ritual, he increased #q2321003#'s power even more. Yet something tells me there is more power within the dragon, waiting to be unlocked...

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Power 3

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart

The feeling I had within was confirmed by #b#p2081007##k. There is a way to unlock more of the dragon's power. I will not rest until I have discovered it. Raul has been helpful thus far--I wonder if he'd be willing to assist me again...
Raul has agreed to help me again. I'm to gather #b35 #t04031484##k if I want to raise #q2321003#'s power. \n\n#i4031484##t4031484# #b#c4031484#/35#k
Another long, but successful hunt. I gave Raul #t04031484#, and he increased #q2321003#'s power even more. When will the dragon reach its full power? It seems to be limitless...

string.name: name
string.value: Bahamut's Completion

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Heart

I once again seek to enhance the power of the dragon. After speaking with #b#p2081007##k, he says the dragon still hasn't reached its full power. I must see this through to the end. The full power of the dragon must be a sight to behold. I must ask Raul for assistance once more to unleash the power of the dragon.

The final step to unlock the dragon's power is at hand! Raul says if I get #b40#t4031485##k he will awaken #q2321003#'s power. He says this will complete the dragon's power. My heart trembles with anticipation... \n\n#i4031485##t4031485# #b#c4031485#/40#k
At last, the dragon's power is complete. And it shall truly be a sight to behold! I will use this power wisely...

string.name: name
string.value: Black Book

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I obtained a peculiar looking book. The entire book, cover to cover, is black so I can't read it.... I'm getting a strange vibe from the book. Perhaps #b#p2081200##k will know something about this book.

#p2081200# said to go see #b#p2060100##k, the witch from the deep sea, to get information about this book. #p2060100#...? Why won't #p2081200# just tell me about the book himself? Would #p2060100# really know anything? I'm skeptical, but I have no choice...I must know more! \n\n#i4001107##t4001107# #b#c4001107# / 1#k
#p2060100# didn't know much about the book itself. However, she seemed to know #bhow to read the book#k. She understood the language, and agreed to tell me what it means upon my return.

string.name: name
string.value: Method of Contradiction

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I went to see #p2060100# with #t4001107#. #p2060100# says I have to burn the book with cold flames in order to read it. A strange, but effective way of hiding the infromation contained within. The information has to be important if someone went through all this trouble. She's agreed to help me. I must gather #b5 #t4000008#, 50#t4000081#, and 100#t4000150##k to make #t4001108# which is needed to burn cold flames. Can I trust this witch? I hope she does not lead me down the wrong path...

#i4000008##t4000008# #b#c4000008#/5#k 
#i4000081##t4000081# #b#c4000081#/50#k 
#i4000150##t4000150# #b#c4000150#/100#k
Success! I gave all the ingredients to #p2060100# to make #b#t4001108##k. Now, I must find a place to properly burn the book...perhaps the sea?

string.name: name
string.value: Cold Flame

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

I found an altar within a deep sea cavern that was emitting cold energy. If I start a cold fire and throw in the black book, I should find out more about the content inside--but what to do after? Perhaps taking the new book to #b#p2060100##k will yield answers. \n\n#i4161017##t4161017# #b#c4161017# / 1#k
The book's identity has been revealed. It was #bCaron's Note#k! One journey ends as another begins...now to find out more!

string.name: name
string.value: Caron's Note

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

According to #p2060100#, the author of this book appears to be Caron, a boatman at the River of Death who takes spirits to the underworld. He wrote stories about ferrying those who died to the underworld; but yet returned, somehow brought back to life. As I continued to read, I noticed a familar name. It was #b#p1061011##k of #bSleepywood#k... #p2060100# told me I could find out about the secrets of death if I meet those who returned from the grave. There is a secret here that I must discover!

#p1061011# knew about Caron as #p2060100# said. It appears there is a way to learn how to bring back the dead back to life. Such a technique would certainly come in handy during encounters with dangerous monsters. I must learn it!

string.name: parent
string.value: Caron's Notebook

When I asked #p1061011# to teach me how to resurrect the dead, he told me that I have to experience death. He told me to go to the dark place across from the Door of death, guarded by #bThanatos#k, at the #bBottom of Ludibrium clock tower#k. I'm a bit scared, but my spirit is telling me that this is the path to take.\n\n#i4031448##t4031448# #b#c4031448#/1#k

That was a tough test, but somehow, I survived. I received the supremely powerful skill known as #b#q2321006##k. #p1061011# said those who obtain such power should never abuse it. This technique, while powerful, breaks one of nature's most sacred laws, that of life and death. I should be careful...

string.name: name
string.value: Return of the Dark Lord

string.name: parent
string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#b#p2081400##k says he has something to tell me...perhaps I should pay him a visit.
#b#p2081400##k told me to meet #b#p1052001##k. Now that I think about it, it's been a long time since I've seen the Dark Lord. He never seems to age...
#p1052001# said he has some interesting suggestions and that if I'm interested, he'll tell me more.

string.name: name
string.value: The Night Warrior

string.name: parent
string.value: The One Hidden in the Shadow
#p1052001# says he has a good suggestion and has offered to tell me more. Perhaps I should accept. I've heard it is unwise to refuse a request from the Dark Lord.

#b#p1052001##k said he wanted me to be his disciple and has entrusted me with disciplining his other students. He told me to defeat his other #b6 disciples#k who are disguised as him and earn their loyalty. He told me if I'm interested to come back to him and ask #bI want to know about being a Thief#k...Is this some sort of game? The Dark Lord is known for his wily tricks and deceitful ways, but also for great power...I will see where this path leads me, hopefully to a new skill! \n\n#o9300088# #r#a61411##k

I defeated the imposters and earned their loyalty. I made #o9300088#, a powerful Thief, into my shadow partner. I can now use him and the other five students in battle to great effect. My enemies will never know what hit them...

string.name: name
string.value: The Great Warrior, Sayram

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior
#b#p2040052##k of #b#m222020000##k says he has something to tell me...

#p2040052# talked about a warrior named #bSeram#k. He mentioned a singing shield which I can use to get information about the old techniques of Sayram. Then he told me to go see #b#p2081000##k at #bLeafle#k to find more information about him...Let's go see #b#m240000000#'s Chief#k with the #b#t4161019##k that 
#p2040052# gave me. Should be an amusing trip at the least. A singing shield? I wonder... 

#i4161019##t4161019# #b#c4161019# / 1#k
Tatamo seems to know about Sayram, however, the singing shield is another matter. I wonder if this is all true or just some kind of joke...perhaps I should talk with Chief Tatamo again.

string.name: name
string.value: Griffey's Necklace

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior

#p2081000# knows about Sayram but doesn't know anything about the singing shield. He says that I might be able to find some information on it from the #b#t04031479##k which Sayram gave to Griffey, whom he dearly loved. So I'll head to Minar Forest and find the necklace from the #o8180001#. Should be a piece of cake...yea, right...\n\n#i4031479##t4031479# #b#c4031479#/1
I found #t4031479#, and after some "persuasion", obtained the necklace. Now to return to Chief Tatamo and see what he says about this.

string.name: name
string.value: Singing Shield

string.name: parent
string.value: Song of forgotten warrior

I'll go see him first then go to the Cave of Life. \n\n#i4031455##t4031455# #b#c4031455#/1#k

string.name: name
string.value: Carta's sin

string.name: parent
string.value: Strong Will
#b#p2081000##k from #b#m240000000##k villiage says he has some information for me...

I learned that Humans used to have strong will power to resist temptation, which prevented them from getting seduced by the monsters. But, #bwitch #p2060100##k took away the people's will power and since then, humans have been falling into seduction. I wonder if this is really true. Let's go ask #p2060100#.
#p2060100# doesn't look too thrilled.

string.name: name
string.value: A Piece of Will

string.name: parent
string.value: Strong Will

When I asked #p2060100# to give back the human's will power, she said she threw it away in the crack of a dimension. She said if I want it back, go to #b#m923000000##k and get it myself. She says #m923000000# can be opened by #b#t4000175##k as many times as I want....As long as I have #t4000175#, she said she would open the dimension. Arite, well, let's get #t4000175# first then. \r\n#i4031472##t4031472# #b#c4031472#/40#k
#p2060100# said that the separated will power can't be simply absorbed back.

string.name: name
string.value: Carta's Worn Bracelet

string.name: parent
string.value: Strong Will

#p2060100# said that the will power needs to be made into medicine for it to be absorbed back. However, she said she won't do it unless I bring her her #b#t4031463##k. She says I can get it from #b#p2040050##k.
Would #b#p2040050##k know about #p2060100#'s bracelet?

string.name: name
string.value: Making a Mithril Bracelet

string.name: parent
string.value: Strong Will

#p2040050# knew about #p2060100#. However, he/she said that I shouldn't deal with her. But I really need the will power... #p2040050# said he needs #p2060100#, #b#t04031464##k and #b10 #t4011002##k to make #p2060100#..Griffey would have old bracelet. 

#i4031464##t4031464# #b#c4031464#/1#k

When I give the bracelet to #p2060100#, she gave me #b#t2280002##k. Now I got the will power back, but do I need to worry about #p2060100#? I think #p2040050# might've put some secret device on the braclet...that makes me feel a lil better

string.name: name
string.value: End of Attributes

string.name: parent
string.value: Inverse Attributes
I have reached the highest level of the attributes. Is there a stronger attribute magic that I can learn? Let's go ask #b#p2020005##k.

#b#p2020005##k mentioned about inverse attributes, and suggested that we research it. He wants me to bring him the ingredients for the research....
#i04000081##t04000081# #b#c04000081#/50#k
#i04000232##t04000232# #b#c04000232#/10#k
#i04000240##t04000240# #b#c04000240#/10

string.value: Inverse Attributes

string.name: parent
string.value: Inverse Attributes
#b#p2020005##k said he will conduct an experiment with the ingredients, and told me to come back to him in a little bit.
I tried the experiment with b#p2020005##k but unfortunately it failed. #b#p2020005##k told me to go to see #b#p2030012##k, an expert on magic ingredients.
#b#p2030012##k said the inverse attributes is a bunch of nonsense. Nevertheless, he seemed intrigued by it and told me to go see #b#p2012017##k, the mad scientist in Orbis.

string.name: name
string.value: Theory on Inverse Attributes of Summoned Beings (Familiars)

string.name: parent
string.value: Inverse Attributes
#b#p2030012##k suggested that I go see #b#p2012017##k, the mad scientist in Orbis Tower.

I followed #b#p2030012##k's advice and went to see #b#p2012017##k. #b#p2012017##k said that it's an interesting theory and said that we should try it on a summoned-being. He says to get him the ingredients.... I can find everything else, but I'll need to see #b#p2030012##k for #b#t4031488##k

string.name: name
string.value: How to Improve Your Strength
I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Buccaneer. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. And she has taught me the super transformation skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Presence of Mind
I've learned the Super Transformation Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

I apparently need to do some intense training in order to be able to freely use the Super Transformation Skill. One of the benefits of the skill is that it will strengthen me and give me a body of steel! I'd better go observe the Red Dragon Turtles whose bodies are equally as hard, and try to stand up against them. To prove that I've done the training, I must defeat #r150 Red Dragon Turtles#k and bring #b50 Hearts of Stone#k to Kyrin. 

#i4031872##t4031872# #b#c4031872# / 50#k 
#o8140701# #r#a63401##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Snatch Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Body of Steel
I've learned the super transformation skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

I apparently need to do some intense training in order to be able to freely use the super transformation skill. One of the benefits of super transformation is that it will strengthen me and give me a body of steel! I'd better go observe the Blue Dragon Turtles whose bodies are equally as hard, and try to stand up against them. To prove that I've completed the training, I must defeat #r150 Blue Dragon Turtles#k and bring #b50 Sturdy Leather #k pieces to Kyrin. 

#i4031871##t4031871# #b#c4031871# / 50#k 
#o8140700# #r#a63501##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Demolition Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: The Study of Space-Time Transformation

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
Rolonay has been deeply immersed in the study of transformation across space and time. I wonder if there's anything I can do to help in his research.

Rolonay thinks that he'll have to rely on some openings between Papulatus' dimensions to transform through space and time. But that won't be as easy as long as Papulatus is around! Rolonay suggests defeating Papulatus to find a clue that might lead to finding the openings between dimensions. I should defeat #rPapulatus#k and look for #bany strange or special objects#k to help Rolonay with his research.
When I defeated Papulatus, I received a strange key. I gave the key to Rolonay, thinking that it might actually be a crucial piece of clue.

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus' Key

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
I should take Papulatus' key to the #bOrigin of the Clocktower#k.
Where am I? There's someone here!

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus in the Past

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space-Time Transformations
That's kind of strange. This doesn't really look like the Origin of the Clocktower as I remember it. I'd better go and talk to Papulatus.
What? I'm really in the past? How in the world did I get here?

string.name: name
string.value: A New Revelation

string.name: parent
string.value: The Secret Behind Space Time Transformations

When I told Papulatus that I had come from the future, he seemed very interested in learning more about me. I guess he got even more excited when I told him that he, in the future, was doing some pretty major things... Little does he know that he's doing some pretty radical, negative things... Anyway, how am I supposed to get back to the future now?

Papulatus asks me to be his guinea-pig for the research he's been working on, which is almost complete. He says he'll send me back into the future where I came from... I don't like the idea that I'm a guinea-pig for his research, but I can't stay in the past like this forever. I guess I should trust Papulatus for now and get back to the future to tell Rolonay about what had happened.
I don't know if it's a remnant of the power I felt during my transition between dimensions but I've somehow acquired the power to control space and time. I'll call this skill 'Time Lift'.

string.name: name
string.value: How to Improve Your Strength
I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Captain. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. Kyrin taught me the Battleship Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Observe the Spirit Vikings
I've learned the Battleship Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

So I guess I still need to learn some more skills before I can use the Battleship Skill, plus I need to learn how to properly control the battleship before I can learn how to use the skill itself... Let me go watch the Vikings in Ludibrium, and to prove that I've completed my training, I must defeat #r150 Spirit Vikings#k and bring back #b50 Spirit Viking Flags#k for Kyrin.
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Battleship Cannon Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Observe the Gigantic Spirit Vikings
I've learned the Battleship Skill but I don't really know how to use it freely as of yet. I can't figure out what the problem is! I'd better ask Kyrin.

So I guess I still need to learn some more skills before I can use the Battleship Skill, plus I need to learn how to properly control and attack from the battleship while riding on it before I can learn how to use the skill itself... Let me go watch the Gigantic Spirit Vikings in Ludibrium, and to prove that I've completed my training, I must defeat #r150 Gigantic Spirit Vikings#k and bring back #b50 Vikings' Token#k for Kyrin. 

#i4031874##t4031874# #b#c4031874# / 50#k 
#o8141100# #r#a63901##k
I took the proof of my training to Kyrin and she taught me the Battleship Torpedo Skill in return.

string.name: name
string.value: Jonathan's Court
I should go and meet with Kidd. His royal highness is asking for me so...
You're telling me he's the Ruling King of the Seagulls? Why would the King of the Seagulls be looking for me? Well, let me go see him and find out.
Jonathan... The King of the Seagulls. Well he certainly has a presence about him.

string.name: name
string.value: Mission Free the Monsters
Shulynch is sending me an SOS signal. Is there an emergency?

Rolonay's old friend, Delli, who, in the past, worked with Rolonay to rescue the monsters that were spellbound by evil powers, is apparently now in grave danger. Shulynch wants me to help rescue her. I'll go and rescue Delli!
I rescued Delli and learned how to become friends with monsters in return.

string.name: name
string.value: The Bowman's Road
They say there's a special gift that Athena gives to those whose finished the Bowman's job.
They say she bids the Bowman success and gives a special gift.
Athena bid me success as a Bowman and gave me an arrow as a gift.

string.name: name
string.value: An Arrangement from the Goddess.
After countless battles... the goddess has prepared something for me. I better go visit the Statue of Goddess at Orbis.

The statue was always silent, but all of a sudden, I could hear a voice. The goddess told me as a person that has reached the highest level that is available, and challenged me to step up and put in the effort to help others. She told me to let her know of my decision. Hmm...

I received a new skill from the Goddess called the Echo of the Hero. This isn't for my own benefit, but for everyone else around me. The statue, which always had a sad face on, seems to be smiling as I look at it once more.

string.name: name
string.value: Protect Ludibrium

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium

A mysterious power appeared in Ludibrium, then suddenly disappeared. Chaos ensued. Now is the time to straighten up the screwed-up time of Ludibrium. I'll need to go see #b#p2041021##k, who's at the #bPath of Time#k under Ludibrium.
I met up with #b#p2041021##k at the Path of Time. I promised him to find a new source of energy that may replace the original Time Sphere, which had been the main source of powerfor Ludibrium.
I gathered up enough #b#t4031170#s#k and gave them to #b#p2041021##k as a replacement for the Time Sphere. I think he can make a new source of power with #i4031170#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Replacement Time Energy

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
The source of energy has been swallowed a whole by #o8500001# with the disappearance of the time sphere. I need #p2041021# to find a way for an alternative.

Thanks to Papulatus Clock with Time Sphere, the monsters below Path of Time have grown much stronger. There is, however, a way to recover the energy from those monsters; defeat them and they'll cough up the item that stores the energy. I'll need to gather up 300 Tachions and 100 Mysteriour Powers. 

#t4031175:# #r#c4031175#/300#k
#t4031171:# #r#c4031171#/100#k
I gathered up #t4031175#s and #t4031171#s as the replacement energy to create the new Time Sphere.

string.name: name
string.value: The Time Sphere

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
I may need to take care of some more business while creating the time sphere. I should go see #p2041021#.
I found the #t4031179:# that #p2041021# was talking about. Apparently, to defeat Papulatus, we need to be at least lvl 80 or higher...

string.name: parent
string.value: Protect Ludibrium
Everything is ready. Now all we need to do is eliminate the evil force that is #o8500001#.

Enter the power-generating room by finding the #b#t4031172:##k by defeating the monsters guarding the gate. I also need to place #b#t4031179:##k at the crack to call #o8500001# out.

#t4031172:# #r#c4031172#/1#k
Eliminate #o8500001# #r#a71031##k

Finally got to eliminate #o8500001#, the evil force-dripping monster that was hogging the Time Sphere and stealing out all kinds of power through Ludarium! The Clocktower shall emit forces of nature, and Ludibrium shall be brought in peace.

string.name: name
string.value: A Piece of Crack
To block the cracked dimension that occurred at a vault, something is needed to block it. I should ask #p2041023# at the tunnel of time for help.

I met up with Flo who told me about Papulatus. He's a monster that came through a crack in dimension to this world. I will need to get #i4031179# to seal up the cracked dimension. I'll need to eliminate #o8141100# and #o8143000# who might have entered this world with #b#o8500001##k and collect the pieces of cracked dimension.

#t4031176#: #r#c4031176#/1#k
#t4031177#: #r#c4031177#/1#k
#t4031178#: #r#c4031178#/1#k
I gathered up 3 types of pieces of cracked dimension and gave it to #p2041023#. I also gave Flo #t4031179#, which has something to do with #o8500002#.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of Crack
If I ever lose the piece of cracked dimension, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon again.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the piece of cracked dimension. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost piece of dimension from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Medal
If I lost the Ludibrium Medal, then I better go see Mr. Bouffon.
I told #rMr. Bouffon#k that I lost the Ludibrium Medal. He told me he was going to give me another chance and that I should go see #rFlo#k immediately.
I was able to regain the lost Ludibrium Medal from Flo. I should seriously take care of Papulatus this time.

string.name: name
string.value: The Lost Piece of Crack
I lost the #t4031179# that #p2041023# gave me. I better go back to #p2041021# and tell him the truth

I lost the #t4031179# that's been given to me by #p2041023#. After telling #b#p2041021##k of the situation, he wanted me to talk to Flo again. I'm afraid #b#p2041023##k may be less than pleased by the fact that I lost a very valuable #b#t4031179##k.

After telling #p2041021# that I lost #t4031179#, he wanted me to go see #p2041023# again and talk to him. #p2041023# was pretty upset that I lost the valuable #t4031179#, but then wanted me to really make sure not to ever lose it again, while giving me the #rlast remaining #t4031179##k that he kept to himself. He warned me that this is the last one, and that if I ever lose it again, #rI won't be able to get it back ever again.#k. I better make sure not to lose it, and give it to #p2041021#.

string.name: name
string.value: Papulatus's counterattack
I thought there would be no problem in the clock tower since I stopped the crack of dimension and got rid of #o8500002#, but I still have things to do. Let's go to #b#p2041021##k.

#p2041021# said that once the crack occurs on the wall of dimension, it becomes weak so that can easily have holes. He was worried that #o8500002# will attack again. #p2041021# asked me to check out on #b#p2041023##k monitoring around the operation room if #o8500002# comes in.
#p2041023# said #o8500002# invaded again showing me the evidence of a piece of dimension crack. He asked me to get rid of #o8500002# as I once killed #o8500002# that I can do it again....

string.name: name
string.value: Moira's Whereabouts

string.name: parent
string.value: War of the Dragons
I heard recently #p2081000# in #m240000000# often looks up at the sky. Who is he waiting for? Let's go see #p2081000#.

#p2081000# in #m240000000# was concerned about #b#p2081006##k, a close magician friend, because he had recently lost contact with her. #p2081006# is very close to dragons in Minar Forest and a few days ago, she went to the forest because she heard that the dragons were under danger. Since then, she lost all contact with her. What could've possibly happened the dragons in Minar Forest and where has #p2081006# disappeared to? Wouldn't I be able to find her somewhere #bbeyond Dragon's Forest#k?
#p2081000# asked me look for magician #p2081006#. After getting lost for awhile, I was finally able to meet #p2081006# at the top of the entrance of the Cave of Life at the dragon's nest.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Medicine for Transformation

string.name: parent
string.value: War of the Dragons

Moira, whom I met at the entrance of the Cave of Life, asked me to defeat Horntail. She said that she would make me a secret medicine that allows one to transform into a dragon, which I'll need to pass through the entrance of the cave that is guarded by Horntail's follower, Keroben . 
Let's get back to Moira with all the ingredients.

#i4001075##t4001075# #b#c4001075##k / 1
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267##k / 1
#i4001076##t4001076# #b#c4001076##k / 1
#i4001077##t4001077# #b#c4001077##k / 10
#i4001078##t4001078# #b#c4001078##k / 1

Moira told me about the war of the dragons and asked me to defeat Horntail. Moira said that she will make me a secret medicine to transform if I bring him/her all the ingredients he/she had asked me, which I would need to get passed #p2081005# and enter Horntail's cave.. Let's get all the ingredients to Moira. Moira made me a secret medicine that can transform me into Cornian.

string.name: name
string.value: Badge of a Squad Member
Moira says she has a personal request...

Moira tells me that she was once a member of the Dragon Squad, and that she is worried about other members, now scattered to the winds. She asked me to look for the badge of the members. She said if I bring three badges from the members and the certificates from Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus by defeating them in battle, she would appoint me as an #rHonorary Squad Member#k and show me the #bsecret passage to cave#k that only members know about....

#i4001080##t4001080# #b#c4001080#/1#k
#i4001081##t4001081# #b#c4001081#/1#k
#i4001082##t4001082# #b#c4001082#/1#k
#i4001085##t4001085# #b#c4001085#/1#k
#i4001083##t4001083# #b#c4001083#/1#k
#i4001084##t4001084# #b#c4001084#/1#k
I gave three member badges and also Zakum, Papulatus and Pianus certificates to Moira. She then appointed me an Honorary squad member and showed me the secret passage to the cave.

string.name: name
string.value: Making the Secret Medicine for Transformation
I want to enter the Cave of Life one more time...I wonder if I could get the transformation medicine again. Let's go see Moira again.

Moira told me to bring her all the ingredients if I want the transformation medicine again. Let's get back to Moira with all the ingredients.

#i4001103##t4001103# #b#c4001103##k / 1
#i4000267##t4000267# #b#c4000267##k / 1
#i4001104##t4001104# #b#c4001104##k / 1

#i4001078##t4001078# #b#c4001078##k / 1
I gave Moira all the ingredients again and she made me a tarnsformation medicine that allows me to transform into Cornian.

string.name: name
string.value: New Life
I should go see Mai right now...

I better get Mai #b10 Mushroom Spores, 10 Snail Shells, and 10 Red Snail Shells#k right now.
#t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/10
#t4000019# #b#c4000019##k/10
#t4000016# #b#c4000016##k/10
I took care of the challenge Mai gave me. That was easy...

string.name: name
string.value: Grako's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
I need to go see Grako!!

Grako of Showa Town has a stomach ache which seems to have stemmed from indigestion. I wanted to get Grako some medicine, but she said she doesn't think she'll need a medicine; instead, she wants to drink soft cider. I should go get some cider for her..\n\n#t2022002# #b#c2022002##k/1
I gave Grako the cider, but... oh man, he's been FAKING IT! Arrrgh... and anyway, he said he actually wants to ask for another favor, this one being REAL. Should I trust him this time?

string.name: name
string.value: Grako's Request 2

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
I heard Grako's best friend #bMariwaka#k, who resides in Showa Town, is going through some hard times. I better go there and check it out myself.
I met up with Mariwaka. Yeah, it looks like something's troubling her...

string.name: name
string.value: Mariwaka's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!

Mariwaka said she got her purse stolen a while ago, and asked me to ask Popo in front of the police station if the police is doing something about it, just in case they found it for her. Man, people in this town looove to ask for favors. So annoying!
Just like Mariwaka asked, I went to where Popo is.

string.name: name
string.value: Mariwaka's Purse

string.name: parent
string.value: Find Mariwaka's Purse!
Apparently, Popo is so busy, he hasn't had time to handle the case of Mariwaka's missing Purse. My gosh! Mariwaka will be really disappointed if I tell her the bad news...

Mariwaka asked me if I could find the purse for her, in place of Popo. She said the thugs walking around the back alley may be the ones that stole her purse. She also mentioned that they have not seen any type of animals in the city for quite some time...I wonder what happened to them...
I returned the purse to Mariwaka, and she was crying with tears of joy. Oh yeah, I remember, she's an actress...! I wonder if she was really acting...

string.name: name
string.value: The Scarred Kitty

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I should go talk to #bThe Scarred Kitty#k.
I should feed this poor-looking #bScarred Kitty#k.

I fed #bThe Scarred Kitty#k at Showa Town, and... WHAT? This kitty's talks! Apparently this kitty was teased, abused, and labeled as a monster cat because it spoke and understood the human language. After thanking me for food, it promised to help me if I ever run into a tight situation.

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I better go talk to #bSakura#k, who's crying in front of the police station.
#bSakura#k wanted me to find the #bBoss Kitty#k that stole her Orange Marble, and retrieve it from it.
I will have to get the orange marble for #bSakura#k. I am sure she is looking for it. So what should be my next move? Perhaps confrontation...

string.name: name
string.value: Learning to Speak the Kitty Language

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
Where's the #bBoss Kitty#k that stole Orange Marble?

I went up to the #bBoss Kitty#k and asked something, only to hear some language I've never even heard of in my life. I better ask #bScarred Kitty#k for some kitty language, then I may be able to pick up on it.
I learned the kitty language through #bThe Scarred Kitty#k! Now I can probably communicate with #bBoss Kitty#k.

string.name: name
string.value: Dealing with Boss Kitty

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I could understand what the Boss Kitty said, but in order to regain #bOrange Marble#k, I'll have to perform a task first.

I'll have to answer every single question fired by the Boss Kitty right. Not only that, in order to even start the quiz, it'll require #b300 Fried Chickens#k. Crazy...I know cats love birds, but that's ridiculous...
Now I must try to talk with the Boss Kitty to propose a deal for that Orange Marble...

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble

I will need to gather up #b300 fried chickens#k for each time it get it wrong and answer all the questions right, then I'll receive the Orange Marble. I better take it back to Sakura.\n\n#i4031064# #t4031064# #b#c4031064#/1
I was able to safely hand the #bOrange Marble#k back to Sakura.
Hmm, I could understand what he is saying. Well, time to make that trade proposal into action.

string.name: name
string.value: Upgrading Zakum Armor
Tsuri, the gregarious fish merchant, claims to have knowledge of the way to awaken the Zakum Armor's dormant power. I can't imagine this armor at its full strength. Such power!

According to Tsuri, in order to reawaken the dormant power, I'll have to eliminate #b20 Maladies#k and #b20 Wild Kargo's#k within the time limit. nnNo. of Maladies Left: #r#a80131##knNo. of Wild Kargos Left : #r#a80132##k

I tried on the Zakum Armor that has been reawaken by Tsuri. I can literally feel the armor's strength, coursing through my veins...as if the fearsome power of Zakum is mine to wield and control...I feel invincible wearing this. This is awesome!

string.name: name
string.value: Sakura's Crying

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
I should go see Sakura, who's crying. I wonder if I can help...
I better talk to Sakura, who still weeps in sorrow. There must be something that I can do, but what?
Sakura murmured something while crying. Perhaps this is the reason behind the flowing tears...

string.name: name
string.value: I should talk to the Boss Kitty in kitty language.

string.name: parent
string.value: Sakura, the Kitty, and the Orange Marble
Now that I mastered the kitty language, I should go talk to the Boss Kitty.
